NK051(zhi)002:1: // ra t+na s+au r+ya tsa n+d+ra dz+wa la d+ai pa
NK051(zhi)002:2: n+aa ma +aa r+ya ma ny+dzu sh+r+ai n+aa ma sam
NK051(zhi)002:3: g+ai ti bri t+ti bi ha ra ti sma //
NK051(zhi)002:5: / 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod
NK051(zhi)002:6: pa'i 'grel pa rin po che nyi zla 'bar ba'i
NK051(zhi)002:7: sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
NK051(zhi)002:10: &&&&&& / rgya skad bod du bsgyur ba /
NK051(zhi)002:11: +aar+ya many+dzu sh+r+ai n+aa ma sam g+ai ti brit+ti rat+na s+aur+ya tsan+d+ra dz+wa la d+ai pa n+aa ma /
NK051(zhi)002:13: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod
NK051(zhi)002:14: pa'i 'grel pa rin po che nyi zla 'bar ba'i
NK051(zhi)002:16: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK051(zhi)002:17: sngon tshe gong nas bskal par sbyangs pa yis //
NK051(zhi)002:18: rab 'byams gsung la ma rmongs sprul pa'i sku //
NK051(zhi)002:19: pad+ma bdag gis mngon par shes pa yis //
NK051(zhi)002:20: bka' rgyud zab mo bkrol bar mi 'os kyang //
NK051(zhi)002:21: 'gro ba drangs phyir rgyud 'di bshad par bya //
NK051(zhi)002:23: dbang po bsam pa mkhyen mchog gis //
NK051(zhi)002:24: sems kyi khyad par ji bzhin du //
NK051(zhi)002:25: bla med 'bras bu thob bya'i phyir //
NK051(zhi)002:26: theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis //
NK051(zhi)002:27: 'gro ba'i don la dgongs nas su //
NK051(zhi)002:28: sems can rnams la bshad par 'tshal //
NK051(zhi)002:30: ma h+aa gu ru pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis /
NK051(zhi)002:31: nyon mongs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gi gnyen por /
NK051(zhi)002:32: sems can rnams la chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri bzhi stong du bka' dgrol bar bya ste /
NK051(zhi)002:33: da ni 'jam dpal gyi rgyud rin po che nyi
NK051(zhi)002:34: zla lta bu 'di tshig gi don gyis theg pa
NK051(zhi)002:35: sna tshogs su bshad par bya ste /
NK051(zhi)002:36: theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis //
NK051(zhi)002:38: tshig rje tshig bdag smra mkhas pa //
NK051(zhi)002:40: tshig gi 'bru bshad par bya ste /
NK051(zhi)002:42: +aar+ya many+dzu sh+r+ai n+aa ma sam g+ai ti /
NK051(zhi)002:44: rgya gar gyi skad chen po bzhi las /
NK051(zhi)002:46: a ba ta shi na'i skad dang /
NK051(zhi)002:47: bi shan ti ta'i skad dang /
NK051(zhi)002:48: b+y+aa ka ra na sde brgyad kyi skad do //
NK051(zhi)002:49: rgya gar skad kyis ni khungs btsun yid ches bla ma dran pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:50: bkra shis byin rlabs dngos grub 'byung //
NK051(zhi)002:51: rang bzo mi 'jug sgra yi gnad //
NK051(zhi)002:56: n+aa ma sam g+ai ti ni mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:57: de ni rgya skad bod skad shan sbyar ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:59: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa zhes bya ba /
NK051(zhi)002:60: de yang rus sbal gyi nur 'gros kyis 'bru bshad pa ni /
NK051(zhi)002:61: dbang po rab la mtshan bstan /
NK051(zhi)002:62: 'bring la spyi dang bye brag gi dbye ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:63: dbang po tha ma la yi ge 'bru gnyer pas bshad pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:64: 'phags pa zhes pa la 'bru lngar bshad de /
NK051(zhi)002:65: rgyu mtshan nyid kyi 'phags pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:66: sngags phyi rgyud sde gsum gyi 'phags pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:67: sngags nang rgyud sde gsum gyi 'phags pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:68: rdzogs pa chen po'i 'phags pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:69: de bzhi las spyi ti yo ga ji ltar 'phags pa'i 'phags lugs dang don rnam pa lnga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:70: de la rgyu mtshan nyid kyi 'phags pa la gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:72: nyon mongs pa ma rig pa'i nang nas 'phags pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:73: dug rnam pa lnga las 'phags pa dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:74: de la 'khor ba'i 'dam nas 'phags pa ni sh+aakya thub pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:75: ma rig pa'i 'dam nas 'phags pa ni rang rgyal bse ru ltar nyag gcig tu gnas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:76: dug lnga las 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:77: sngags phyi rgyud kyi 'phags pa la yang gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:80: yo ga'i 'phags pa dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:81: kri ya'i 'phags pa ni nyon mongs pa'i dri ma lnga dag ste /
NK051(zhi)002:82: dag pa chos nyid kyi lha lngas 'phags pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:83: u pa ya ni sgrib pa rnam pa bzhi dag nas /
NK051(zhi)002:84: rigs gsum gyi mgon pos 'phags pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:85: yo gas ni dug lnga las 'phags te /
NK051(zhi)002:86: rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas kyis 'phags so //
NK051(zhi)002:87: gsang sngags nang rgyud sde gsum gyi 'phags lugs gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:88: ma h+aa yo ga'i 'phags lugs dang /
NK051(zhi)002:89: a nu yo ga'i 'phags lugs dang /
NK051(zhi)002:90: a ti yo ga'i 'phags lugs dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:91: ma h+aa ni phung po lnga las 'phags te /
NK051(zhi)002:93: sangs rgyas lnga bdag cod pan can //
NK051(zhi)002:95: de las a nu yo ga nyon mongs dug lnga las 'phags te /
NK051(zhi)002:97: theg pa de brgyad las a ti yo ga 'phags te /
NK051(zhi)002:98: rdzogs chen gyi 'phags pa la gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:99: theg pa brgyad kyi lta sgom las 'phags pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:100: chos khams dang skye mched lha dang lha mo'i khyad par 'phags pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:101: blos btags pa'i grub pa'i mtha' rnams las 'phags pa dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:102: theg pa dgu po de rnams las rdzogs chen spyi ti yo ga 'phags pa ni gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:103: theg pa rim pa dgu las 'phags pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:104: rgyu'i chos byas pa'i chos rtsol sgrub can rnams las 'phags pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:105: lha sgom spyod 'bras las 'phags pa dang gsum /
NK051(zhi)002:106: theg pa dgu las 'phags pa ni dgu'i gong brgal spyi ti yo ga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:107: rgyu'i chos bya rtsol las 'phags pa ni /
NK051(zhi)002:108: rtsol sgrub bya rtsol rgyu 'bras las 'phags pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:109: lta sgom spyod 'bras bzhi las 'phags pa ni /
NK051(zhi)002:110: theg pa gzhan rnams kyi lta sgom ni /
NK051(zhi)002:112: yid btson bzung gi sgom pa /
NK051(zhi)002:114: re dogs yid smon gyi 'bras bu'o //
NK051(zhi)002:115: de bzhi las spyi ti yo ga 'phags te /
NK051(zhi)002:119: re med rang gnas kyi 'bras bu dang bzhis 'phags so //
NK051(zhi)002:120: ye shes ye shes khyad par 'phags //
NK051(zhi)002:122: 'jam dpal zhes pa yang lnga ste /
NK051(zhi)002:123: mtshan nyid sde gsum gyi 'jam dpal dang /
NK051(zhi)002:124: kri yo ga sde gsum gyi 'jam dpal dang /
NK051(zhi)002:125: bskyed rdzogs rnam gsum gyi 'jam dpal dang /
NK051(zhi)002:126: rdzogs pa chen po'i 'jam dpal dang /
NK051(zhi)002:127: spyi ti yo ga'i 'jam dpal don rnam pa lnga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:128: de la rgyu mtshan nyid kyi 'jam dpal la gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:130: rang sangs rgyas kyi 'jam dpal dang /
NK051(zhi)002:131: byang chub sems dpa'i 'jam dpal dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:132: nyan thos kyi 'jam dpal ni 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:133: rang rgyal ba'i 'jam dpal ni bse ru lta bu'i sangs rgyas so //
NK051(zhi)002:134: byang chub sems dpa'i 'jam dpal ni bcom ldan 'das sh+aakya thub pa dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:135: phyi rgyud sde gsum gyi 'jam dpal la yang gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:138: yo ga'i 'jam dpal dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:139: kri ya'i 'jam dpal ni 'jam dpal nyid do //
NK051(zhi)002:140: u pa ya'i 'jam dpal ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs so //
NK051(zhi)002:141: yo ga'i 'jam dpal ni phyag na rdo rje dang rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:142: gsang sngags kyi bskyed rdzogs gsum gyi 'jam dpal ni /
NK051(zhi)002:143: ma h+aa yo ga'i 'jam dpal dang /
NK051(zhi)002:144: a nu yo ga'i 'jam dpal dang /
NK051(zhi)002:145: a ti yo ga'i 'jam dpal dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:146: ma h+aa yo ga'i 'jam dpal ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
NK051(zhi)002:147: a nu yo ga'i 'jam dpal ni rdo rje sems dapa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:148: a ti yo ga'i 'jam dpal ni dpal kun tu bzang po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:149: de rnams las spyi ti yo ga'i 'jam dpal gyis 'phags te /
NK051(zhi)002:150: spyi ti yo ga la 'jam dpal rnam pa dgu ste /
NK051(zhi)002:151: skye ba med pa'i 'jam dpal dang /
NK051(zhi)002:153: ka dag chen po'i 'jam dpal dang /
NK051(zhi)002:154: dngos med zang thal gyi 'jam dpal dang //
NK051(zhi)002:155: gsal ba ngang dwangs kyi 'jam dpal dang /
NK051(zhi)002:156: rang gsal sgrib med kyi 'jam dpal dang /
NK051(zhi)002:157: rang byung rang mdangs kyi 'jam dpal dang //
NK051(zhi)002:158: rang snang rang grol gyi 'jam dpal dang /
NK051(zhi)002:159: byar med blo 'das chen po'i 'jam dpal dang dgu ste /
NK051(zhi)002:160: de ltar theg pa dgu'i 'jam dpal las spyi ti yo gas 'phags so //
NK051(zhi)002:161: yang na 'phags pa ni theg pa rim pa dgu las 'phags /
NK051(zhi)002:162: 'jam pa ni lta sgom gyi zug rngu dang rtsol sgrub med pas 'jam /
NK051(zhi)002:163: dpal ni ka dag blo 'das te rnal 'byor skal ldan yang rab kyi dpal lo //
NK051(zhi)002:164: yang na dpal ni rnam par gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:165: rtogs pa bdag gi dpal dang /
NK051(zhi)002:166: thugs rje gzhan gyi dpal dang /
NK051(zhi)002:167: byar med blo 'das rtogs pa'i dpal dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:168: gyi zhes pa rtogs pa dang 'brel ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:169: mtshan zhes pa ni ming ngam tshig go //
NK051(zhi)002:170: de yang mtshan la gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:173: mtshan gyi dgos pa dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:174: ngo bo ni yang dag pa /
NK051(zhi)002:175: nges tshig ni don la mtshan btags te /
NK051(zhi)002:177: dag par byed cing sdig sel ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:178: yang dag ces pa ni mi bslu ba'i dgos pa mthar phyin pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:179: barjooda pa zhes pa ni rnam pa gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:182: don brjod pa dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:184: mtshan gyis lha tshogs gsal ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:189: a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:191: yang mtshan brjod thabs kyi gdams ngag ni dgu ste /
NK051(zhi)002:192: mtshan mdo ltar brjod pa dang gcig /
NK051(zhi)002:193: mtshan gsang sngags ltar brjod pa dang gnyis /
NK051(zhi)002:194: mtshan gnyis su med pa mi rtog pa chos nyid du brjod pa dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:195: chos kyi sku thob par bya ba'i phyir brjod pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:196: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku thob par bya ba'i phyir brjod pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:197: sprul pa'i sku thob par bya ba'i phyir brjod pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:198: gzhi skye ba med pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir brjod pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:199: lam ka nas dag par bya ba'i phyir brjod pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:200: 'bras bu blo 'das rtogs par bya ba'i phyir mtshan brjod pa dang dagu'o //
NK051(zhi)002:201: 'o na spyi ti 'di'i lugs kyi mtshan barjooda du med de /
NK051(zhi)002:204: mtshan brjod tshig dang yi ge las 'das te brjod du med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:205: tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste //
NK051(zhi)002:208: gong ma de rnams kyis 'dod cing brjod par byed pa'i thabs la dpa' ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:209: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK051(zhi)002:211: 'jam dpal ces pa ni don rnam pa gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:212: kun rdzob rgya che ba'i 'jam dpal dang /
NK051(zhi)002:213: zab pa don dam gyi 'jam dpal dang /
NK051(zhi)002:214: skye med snying po'i 'jam dpal dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:215: kun rdzob rgya che ba'i 'jam dpal la gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:216: thabs rgya che ba'i 'jam dpal dang /
NK051(zhi)002:217: dkyil 'khor rgya che ba'i 'jam dpal dang /
NK051(zhi)002:218: sku rgya che ba'i 'jam dpal dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:219: de la zab pa don dam gyi 'jam dpal la yang gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:220: rang bzhin zab pa'i chos sku /
NK051(zhi)002:221: ngo bo zab pa'i longs sku /
NK051(zhi)002:222: thugs rje zab pa'i sprul sku dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:223: skye med snying po chos nyid kyi 'jam dpal la yang gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:224: skye ba med pa'i 'jam dpal dang /
NK051(zhi)002:225: ka nas dag pa'i 'jam dpal dang /
NK051(zhi)002:226: dngos med blo 'das kyi 'jam dpal dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:227: 'jam pa ni zug rngu med par 'jam /
NK051(zhi)002:229: rtogs pa bdag gi dpal dang /
NK051(zhi)002:230: thugs rje gzhan gyi dpal lo //
NK051(zhi)002:231: rtogs pa bdag gi dpal ni /
NK051(zhi)002:232: gzhi skye med ka dag tu rtogs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:233: thugs rje gzhan gyi dpal ni /
NK051(zhi)002:234: de ltar ma rtogs pa rnams la skye med ka dag gi don ston pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:235: gzhon nur zhes bya ba lo brgyad pa'i cha byad du bzhugs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:236: gyur pa zhes pa ni yang dag pa'i skye med ka dag tu gyur pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:237: yang na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la zhes pa ni /
NK051(zhi)002:241: mthar thug 'bras bu'i 'jam dpal dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:242: gzhon nur ni ngang dwangs gsal ba'i khye'u chung ngo //
NK051(zhi)002:243: gyur pa ni chos nyid ma'i klong du gyur pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:244: la zhes pa ni gzhi'i la dang /
NK051(zhi)002:246: phyag 'tshal lo zhes pa ni gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:248: thun mong ma yin pa'i phyag dang /
NK051(zhi)002:249: khyad par bla na med pa'i phyag dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:250: thun mong gi phyag ni go sla'o //
NK051(zhi)002:251: thun mong ma yin pa'i phyag ni /
NK051(zhi)002:252: phyag 'tshal ba la dmigs te yid 'khu ba dang bral ba'i don la phyag 'tshal ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:253: khyad par bla na med pa'i phyag ni /
NK051(zhi)002:254: bag chags thams cad ka nas dag par phyag /
NK051(zhi)002:256: dngos med blo'i spyod yul las 'das pa ste /
NK051(zhi)002:257: de las yar gshegs su dgung la shul mi manga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:258: de yan chad kyis klad kyi don phyag 'tshal zhing mtshan bstan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:260: tha bas sh+r+ai ban badz+ra a zhes pa de /
NK051(zhi)002:261: de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
NK051(zhi)002:263: de zhes pa ni 'jam dpal sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba khri drug stong gi nang nas /
NK051(zhi)002:264: rgya gar skad nas bzung ba'i le'u lnga gong du
NK051(zhi)002:265: song ba'i de dag nas a tha zhes pa de
NK051(zhi)002:266: nas so // yang na de nas zhes pa mtshams sbyar ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:267: yang na de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
NK051(zhi)002:268: zhes pa la 'bru bcu tham pas bshad de /
NK051(zhi)002:270: phyi pa thub pa'i rgyud kyi gsum /
NK051(zhi)002:271: nang pa thabs kyi rgyud kyi gsum ste dagu'o //
NK051(zhi)002:272: de la spyi ti yo gas 'phags pa dang bcur 'bru gnyer ro //
NK051(zhi)002:273: de la rgyu mtshan nyid kyi de nas gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:274: nyan thos kyi de nas ni /
NK051(zhi)002:275: rtsol sgrub kyi sgo nas dka' thub dang brtul zhugs spyod pa'i de nas so //
NK051(zhi)002:276: dpal ni bdag gcig pu'i dpal lo //
NK051(zhi)002:277: rdo rje ni rdo rje skyil mo krung du bcas pa nas gnas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:278: 'chang ba ni dka' thub dang brtul zhugs 'chang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:279: rang rgyal ba'i de nas ni slob dpon med par rang gis rtogs pa de nas so //
NK051(zhi)002:280: dpal ni bdag dang gzhan don phyogs gcig tsam gyi dpal lo //
NK051(zhi)002:281: ldan pa ni rten 'brel bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:282: rdo rje 'chang zhes pa ni rnam par rig byed dang rig byed ma yin pa'i don 'chang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:283: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'i //
NK051(zhi)002:284: de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
NK051(zhi)002:286: de nas ni dad pa rnam pa gsum bskyed nas btson 'grus brtsams pa de nas so //
NK051(zhi)002:287: dpal ni bdag dang gzhan gnyis ka'i dpal lo //
NK051(zhi)002:288: ldan pa ni pha rol phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:289: rdo rje 'chang ni bden pa dbyer med kyi don 'chang ba ste /
NK051(zhi)002:290: rgyu'i theg pa'i dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang la gsum du bshad pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:291: phyi rgyud sde gsum gyi de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang la gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:292: de nas zhes pa ni kri ya khrus dang gtsang sbra'i sgo de nas so //
NK051(zhi)002:293: dpal ni bdag don gzhan don no //
NK051(zhi)002:294: ldan pa ni rigs gsum dang ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:295: rdo rje ni phyag na rdo rje ste /
NK051(zhi)002:296: 'chang ba ni dag pa chos nyid kyi don 'chang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:297: u pa ya'i de nas ni gza' skar dus tshigs kyi de nas so //
NK051(zhi)002:298: dpal ldan ni lha ye shes pa dang bdag dam
NK051(zhi)002:299: tshig sems dpa' gnyis rje dang g.yog gi tshul du
NK051(zhi)002:300: ldan pa'o // rdo rje 'chang ba ni rigs bzhi'i don 'chang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:301: yo ga'i de nas ni cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi'i de nas so //
NK051(zhi)002:302: dpal ldan ni yo ga'i lha sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:303: rdo rje ni rdo rje sems dapa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:304: 'chang ba ni rigs lnga'i don 'chang ba ste /
NK051(zhi)002:306: de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
NK051(zhi)002:307: zhes pa nang rgyud kyis gsum du bshad de /
NK051(zhi)002:308: de nas ni ma h+aa yo ga'i ting nge 'dzin
NK051(zhi)002:309: rnam pa gsum gyi sgo nas 'jug pa de nas
NK051(zhi)002:310: so // dpal ni phung po lnga rigs lnga'i sangs
NK051(zhi)002:311: rgyas su rtogs pas rtogs pa bdag gi dpal lo
NK051(zhi)002:312: so // // khams dang skye mched snang srid thams
NK051(zhi)002:313: cad lha dang lha mo'i dkyil 'khor du rtogs pas
NK051(zhi)002:314: na thugs rje gzhan gyi dpal lo //
NK051(zhi)002:315: ldan pa ni cho ga lnga gsum bco lnga'i sgo
NK051(zhi)002:316: nas dbang dang dam tshig thabs dang shes rab gnyis
NK051(zhi)002:317: su ldan pa'o // rdo rje ni gsang ba'i rdo rje'o //
NK051(zhi)002:318: 'chang ba ni snang stong dbyer med kyi don gsang
NK051(zhi)002:319: ba thams dang shes rab zung 'jug tu 'brel ba'i
NK051(zhi)002:320: don 'chang ba'o // a nu'i de nas ni dbyings
NK051(zhi)002:321: dang ye shes kyi sgor zhugs pa de nas so
NK051(zhi)002:322: don 'chang ba'o // // dpal ldan ni dbyings dang ye shes gnyis kyi don dang ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:323: rdo rje 'chang ni dbyings dang ye shes dbyer med pa ste /
NK051(zhi)002:324: ye shes rdo rje 'chang gi don 'chang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:325: a ti yo ga rdzogs pa chen po'i de nas
NK051(zhi)002:326: ni theg pa brgyad kyi rtsol sgrub las 'das pa
NK051(zhi)002:327: de nas so // dpal ldan ni snang srid thams
NK051(zhi)002:328: cad rang byung gi ye shes chen por rtogs pa'i
NK051(zhi)002:330: rdo rje 'chang ni rdo rje lta bu'i sku /
NK051(zhi)002:333: sku gsung thugs dbyer med chen po'i rdo rje 'chang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:334: de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
NK051(zhi)002:335: zhes pa la theg pa rim pa dgur 'bru bshad pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:336: de rnams las spyi ti yo gas khyad par du 'phags te bshad pa /
NK051(zhi)002:337: de nas zhes pa ni theg pa dgu'i zhe 'dod
NK051(zhi)002:338: dang bya btsal rtsol sgrub las 'das pa'i de nas
NK051(zhi)002:339: so // dpal zhes pa ni skye med ka dag gi lta ba bstan /
NK051(zhi)002:340: ldan zhes pas ni dngos med zang ka'i sgom pa bstan /
NK051(zhi)002:341: 'chang ba ni so ma lhug pa rnal ma bya rtsol med pa'i spyod pa bstan /
NK051(zhi)002:342: rdo rje zhes pa ni re med rang gnas sku gsum lhun grub kyi 'bras bu bstan pa ste /
NK051(zhi)002:343: de bzhis theg pa rim pa dgu las 'phags pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:344: yang na rdo rje ni gnyis te /
NK051(zhi)002:345: 'dus byas rdzas kyi rdo rje dang /
NK051(zhi)002:346: 'dus ma byas chos nyid kyi rdo rje dang gnyis so //
NK051(zhi)002:347: 'dus byas rdzas kyi rdo rje la lnga ste /
NK051(zhi)002:348: btags pa ming gi rdo rje dang /
NK051(zhi)002:349: blugs pa lugs kyi rdo rje dang /
NK051(zhi)002:350: bris pa rdul tshon gyi rdo rje dang /
NK051(zhi)002:351: 'dus byas rdzas kyi rdo rje dang /
NK051(zhi)002:352: phyag mtshan rtags kyi rdo rje dang lnga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:353: 'dus ma byas chos nyid kyi rdo rje ni don dam dbyer med 'pho 'gyur med pa ste /
NK051(zhi)002:354: re zhig tsam du dbye na rdo rje la bdun te /
NK051(zhi)002:355: skye ba med pa'i rdo rje dang /
NK051(zhi)002:357: rgyu rkyen med pa'i rdo rje /
NK051(zhi)002:359: gzhan zil gyis gnon pa'i rdo rje /
NK051(zhi)002:360: gdug pa can tshar gcod pa'i rdo rje /
NK051(zhi)002:361: byar med blo 'das kyi rdo rje dang bdun no //
NK051(zhi)002:362: rdo ni snying po 'pho 'gyur med pa /
NK051(zhi)002:363: rje ni 'od gsal 'gag pa med pa la ma bcos par gnas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:364: 'chang ba ni skal ldan bla ma'i gdams ngag 'chang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:366: de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
NK051(zhi)002:368: gdul dka' 'dul ba rnams kyi mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:370: de yang 'bru rnam pa lngar bshad de /
NK051(zhi)002:371: rgyu mtshan nyid sde gsum gyi gdul dka' ba gcig /
NK051(zhi)002:372: sngags phyi rgyud sde gsum gyi gdul dka' ba dang gnyis /
NK051(zhi)002:373: bskyed rdzogs rnam gnyis kyi gdul dka' ba dang gsum /
NK051(zhi)002:374: rdzogs pa chen po'i gdul dka' ba dang bzhi /
NK051(zhi)002:375: spyi ti yo ga'i gdul dka' ba dang lnga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:376: de la rgyu mtshan nyid kyi gdul dka' ba la gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:377: nyan thos kyis yul sems 'dod chags gdul dka' ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:378: rang rgyal gyis bdag gnyis zhe sdang gdul dka' ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:379: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pas gti mug gdul dka' ba dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:380: gdul dka' lugs kyang gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:382: rang sangs rgyas kyis zhe sdang 'dul /
NK051(zhi)002:383: byang chub sems dpas gti mug 'dul ba dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:384: rnams kyi mchog ces pa ni /
NK051(zhi)002:385: nyan thos kyis yul sems gnyis su med pas na mchog go //
NK051(zhi)002:386: rang rgyal gyis bdag gzhan gnyis su med pas mchog go //
NK051(zhi)002:387: byang chub sems dpas bden pa gnyis la dbyer med pas mchog go //
NK051(zhi)002:388: spyi rgyud sde gsum gyi gdul dka' ba yang gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:389: kri yas nyon mongs pa'i dri ma gdul dka' ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:390: u pa yas sems rtse gnyis su 'dzin pa gdul dka' ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:391: yo gas dug rnam pa lnga gdul dka' ba dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:392: de la 'dul lugs kyang rnam pa gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:393: kri yas rigs gsum gyi mgon pos nyon mongs pa'i dri ma 'dul /
NK051(zhi)002:394: u pa yas khrus dang gtsang sbra rnam par rtog pa'i dri ma 'dul /
NK051(zhi)002:395: yo gas cho 'phrul bzhi dang mngon par byang chub
NK051(zhi)002:396: pa rnam pa lngas nyon mongs pa dug rnams pa
NK051(zhi)002:398: gsang sngags nang gi bskyed rdzogs kyi gdul dka' ba yang gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:399: ma h+aa'i gdul dka' ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:400: a nu'i gdul dka' ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:401: a ti yo ga'i gdul dka' ba dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:402: ma h+aa yo ga'i gdul dka' ba ni gnyis te /
NK051(zhi)002:403: sngon byung gi gdul dka' ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:404: rjes 'jug gi gdul dka' ba gnyis so //
NK051(zhi)002:405: sngon byung gi gdul dka' ba ru tra thar pa nag po lta bu'o //
NK051(zhi)002:406: rjes 'jug gi gdul dka' ba ni gsang sngags kyi
NK051(zhi)002:407: lta ba log pa'i sngags pa ngan sems can dam
NK051(zhi)002:409: yang na ma h+aa'i gdul dka' ba ni nyon mongs pa lnga dang phung po lnga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:410: a nu yo ga'i gdul dka' ba ni dug rnam
NK051(zhi)002:411: pa lnga dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su bzung ba'o
NK051(zhi)002:412: // a ti yo ga'i gdul dka' ba ni gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:413: rdzogs chen rang gi gol sar song ba rnams dang /
NK051(zhi)002:414: rdzogs chen lta ba kha 'byams pa rnams dang /
NK051(zhi)002:415: nag po kha 'byams gting nag so so skye bo dang khyad med pa gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:416: de gsum la phye bas dagu'o //
NK051(zhi)002:417: 'dul ba ces pa ma h+aa yo ga'i 'dod lugs bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:418: sngon byung gi ru tra thar pa nag po 'dul
NK051(zhi)002:419: ba'i gnyen por bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje gzhon
NK051(zhi)002:420: nu yab badz+ra he ru kas 'dul ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:421: rjes 'jug gi gdul dka' ba ni sngags pa lta
NK051(zhi)002:422: ba log pa'i zhe sdang dang gdug rtsub can dam
NK051(zhi)002:423: tshig med pa rnams 'dul ba'i gnyen po ni /
NK051(zhi)002:424: bla ma dam pa'i zhal gyi gdams ngag dang bka' brgyud ma nor ba rnams kyis 'dul ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:425: yang na ma h+aa yo ga'i 'dul lugs ni /
NK051(zhi)002:426: ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum gyi sgor zhugs nas /
NK051(zhi)002:427: bsnyen sgrub rnam gsum gyi sgo nas nyon mongs pa
NK051(zhi)002:428: rnam pa lnga btul zhing gnas gyur par ye shes
NK051(zhi)002:429: rnam pa lnga / phung po lnga btul bas gzugs
NK051(zhi)002:430: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs te rigs lnga'i sangs
NK051(zhi)002:431: rnam pa lnga / rgyas so // a nu yo ga'i 'dul lugs ni //
NK051(zhi)002:432: dug rnam pa lnga btul nas ye shes rnam pa lnga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:433: dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su 'dzin pa de dbyings ye shes gnyis su med pas 'dul lo //
NK051(zhi)002:434: a ti yo ga'i 'dul lugs la gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:435: rdzogs chen lta ba kha 'byams pa la /
NK051(zhi)002:436: chos nyid rol pas snang ba chos skur rtogs par byas te 'dul ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:437: rdzogs chen rang gi gol sar song ba la /
NK051(zhi)002:438: rang byung gi ye shes chen por 'dul ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:439: rdzogs chen nag po kha 'byams pa so so skye
NK051(zhi)002:440: bo dang khyad med pa la rig pa gnad la
NK051(zhi)002:441: phabs te chos nyid kyi gnas lugs bstan la 'dul
NK051(zhi)002:442: lo // rnams kyi mchog ces pa ni /
NK051(zhi)002:443: theg pa dgu po rnams kyi nang nas kyang mchog
NK051(zhi)002:444: ces pa spyi phud spyi ti yo ga'i theg pa'o
NK051(zhi)002:445: // spyi ti yo ga'i gdul dka' ba ni gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:446: chos gzhi thog tu lus pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:447: gnas lugs dang rtogs lugs su ma 'byor ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:448: 'og ma bya rtsol gyi khar song ba dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:449: de 'dul ba'i thabs la gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:450: lta ba gzhi thog tu mi btang ste /
NK051(zhi)002:451: skye ba med cing ka nas dag pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:452: gnas lugs kyi kha nas rtogs lugs gzengs bstod de /
NK051(zhi)002:453: 'od gsal ngang dwangs shes rgyud dang 'byor bar bya ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:454: rgyu'i chos zhe 'dod dang rtsol sgrub tu mi btang ste /
NK051(zhi)002:455: byar med blo 'das rtsol sgrub med par bzhag pa dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:456: yang na spyi ti yo ga'i 'dod lug la gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:457: spyi ti byar med blo 'das kyis theg pa rim
NK051(zhi)002:458: pa dgu'i bya rtsol blos btags rnams 'dul ba dang
NK051(zhi)002:459: gcig / spyi ti ka dag rten med kyis phyogs 'dzin gyi lta sgom rnams 'dul ba dang gnyis /
NK051(zhi)002:460: skye med rnal ma byar med so ma yis rtsol
NK051(zhi)002:461: sgrub nyams rtags drod dang mngon shes rnams 'dul ba
NK051(zhi)002:462: dang gsum mo // de rnams kyi mchog ces pa ni /
NK051(zhi)002:463: phyi rgyud gsum gyi mchog yo ga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:464: bskyed rdzogs gsum gyi mchog a ti yo ga rdzogs pa chen po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:465: theg pa rim pa dgu'i zhe 'dod dang rtsol sgrub
NK051(zhi)002:466: rnams 'dul ba'i mchog ni rdzogs pa chen po thod
NK051(zhi)002:467: rgal dgu rtse spyi phud spyi rje spyi ti yo
NK051(zhi)002:469: gdul dka' 'dul ba rnams kyi mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:471: dpa' bo 'jig rten gsum las rgyal //
NK051(zhi)002:472: zhes pa ni dpa' bo zhes pa gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:473: sngon byung gi dpa' bo dang /
NK051(zhi)002:475: gdung 'tshob kyi dpa' bo dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:476: de la sngon byung gi dpa' bo ni gsang bdag chen po /
NK051(zhi)002:477: rjes 'jug gi dpa' bo ni rdo rje sems dapa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:478: gdung 'tshob kyi dpa' bo ni slob dpon dga' rab rdo rje'o //
NK051(zhi)002:479: yang na dpa' bo la 'bru lngar bshad de /
NK051(zhi)002:480: rgyu mtshan nyid sde gsum gyi dpa' bo dang /
NK051(zhi)002:481: gsang sngags phyi rgyud sde gsum gyi dpa' bo dang /
NK051(zhi)002:482: gsang sngags bskyed rdzogs gnyis kyi dpa' bo dang /
NK051(zhi)002:483: rdzogs pa chen po'i dpa' bo dang /
NK051(zhi)002:484: spyi ti yo ga'i dpa' bo dang lnga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:485: de la mtshan nyid sde gsum gyi dpa' bo ni sprul pa'i sku bcom ldan 'das sh+aakya thub pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:486: kri yog sde gsum gyi dpa' bo ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dpal rnam par snang mdzad do //
NK051(zhi)002:487: bskyed rdzogs kyi dpa' bo ni dpal rdo rje sems dapa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:488: rdzogs pa chen po'i dpa' bo ni dpal kun tu bzang po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:489: spyi ti yo ga'i dpa' bo ni ye thog ma ka dag gi sangs rgyas so //
NK051(zhi)002:490: spyi ti yo gas zab pa don du bshad pa'i dpa' bo la gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:491: skye med ka dag gi dpa' bo dang /
NK051(zhi)002:492: byar med blo 'das kyi dpa' bo dang /
NK051(zhi)002:493: dngos med zang ka'i dpa' bo dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:495: theg pa'i lta ba log cing zhe 'dod dang rtsol
NK051(zhi)002:496: sgrub la zhen pa rnams tshar gcod cing 'dul ba'o
NK051(zhi)002:497: // gdul bya gang 'dul na 'jig rten gsum gyi gdul dka' ba rnams 'dul ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:499: 'jig pa la 'jig pas rten pa'i phyir na 'jig rten no //
NK051(zhi)002:500: yang na spyi ti'i gzhung gis /
NK051(zhi)002:503: bya btsal rtsol sgrub kyi chos dang /
NK051(zhi)002:504: re dogs yid smon gyi chos dang /
NK051(zhi)002:505: byas pa'i chos rgyu'i theg pa la brten pa /
NK051(zhi)002:506: 'jig rten pa yin pas na 'jig rten no //
NK051(zhi)002:507: 'dus byas thams cad ni mi rtag go //
NK051(zhi)002:508: byas pa'i chos thams cad ni 'jig cing don med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:509: gsum zhes pa ni gsum tsho gsum la phye bas theg pa dgu yin te /
NK051(zhi)002:510: rgyu mtshan nyid kyi theg pa la gsum /
NK051(zhi)002:511: phyi pa thub pa rgyud la gsum /
NK051(zhi)002:512: nang pa thabs kyi rgyud la gsum ste dagu'o //
NK051(zhi)002:513: de rnams gsum las rgyal ba'i spyi ti yo ga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:518: de gsum las rgyal bas na rgyal zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:519: yang na gsum zhes pa ni /
NK051(zhi)002:523: de gsum las bcom ldan 'das rgyal ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:524: yang na dug gsum las rgyal ba ni dug gsum
NK051(zhi)002:525: sku gsung thugs su rtogs pas na rgyal zhes bya'o
NK051(zhi)002:526: // yang na gsum ste zhes pa /
NK051(zhi)002:527: mtshan nyid sde gsum gyi theg pa ste /
NK051(zhi)002:528: des rgyu dug gsum la sogs te nyon mongs pa
NK051(zhi)002:529: brgyad khri bzhi stong rnams chos kyi sgo mo brgyad
NK051(zhi)002:530: khri bzhi stong gis 'dul zhing btul nas /
NK051(zhi)002:531: nyon mongs rnams las rgyal bas na rgyal zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:532: rdo rje dbang phyug gsang ba'i rgyal //
NK051(zhi)002:534: tshig 'di yo ga la theg pa bcu'i tshul bshad lugs su yong ba la /
NK051(zhi)002:535: yig shog gis ma ldang bas /
NK051(zhi)002:536: skal ldan shes rab can gyis tshig kun la gong bzhin shes par gyis shig /
NK051(zhi)002:537: rdo rje zhes pa gong du bshad zin to //
NK051(zhi)002:538: de la don rtags gnyis kyi rdo rje ni /
NK051(zhi)002:539: don chos sku thig le nyag gcig tu gnas pa'i rtags su lte ba zlum por gnas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:540: don nang du ye shes rnam pa lnga la mnga'
NK051(zhi)002:541: brnyes pa ste nang na rang gsal du gnas pas
NK051(zhi)002:542: phyi rol tu rtags rwa lngar byung ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:543: bum pa'i kha khyer gnyis ni thabs shes rab gnyis kyi rtags so //
NK051(zhi)002:544: dkyil 'khor gyi rtse mo ni ye shes zang thal gyi rtags so //
NK051(zhi)002:545: dbus kyi lte ba zlum por 'dug pa ni skye
NK051(zhi)002:546: med ka dag snying po'i gnas lugs kyi rigs so
NK051(zhi)002:547: // dbang zhes pa ni snying po ka dag gi don la dbang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:548: phyug ces pa ni chos nyid zad pa dang bri ba med pas phyug pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:549: ka dag gi nor bu rin po che la dbang /
NK051(zhi)002:550: mi zad pa'i gter la spyod pas phyug ces bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:551: gsang ba zhes pa snying po'i don blo'i spyod yul du ma gyur pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:552: skye med ka dag gi don rtogs pas 'dus byas
NK051(zhi)002:553: kyi chos las rgyal bas na rgyal ba zhes bya'o
NK051(zhi)002:555: zhes pa gzhi ka dag gi dpe bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:556: pad+ma 'dam gyi nang na gnas kyang 'dam gyi nyes pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:557: dpe de bzhin du skye med ka dag gi don de yang 'khor ba'i 'dam na gnas shing /
NK051(zhi)002:558: dmyal ba'i gnas na tsha grang spyod kyang /
NK051(zhi)002:559: snying po ka nas dag pa'i don de la sdug
NK051(zhi)002:560: bsngal dang 'khor ba'i skyon dang dri mas ma gos
NK051(zhi)002:561: pa'o // dkar po zhes pa chos nyid ka nas
NK051(zhi)002:562: dag pa ste skyon dang dri mas ma gos pa'o
NK051(zhi)002:563: pa'o // // yang na pad+ma dkar po ni me tog pun+da ri ka'o //
NK051(zhi)002:564: rgyas zhes pa gzhi skye med du rgyas /
NK051(zhi)002:567: snying po don la rtogs pa'i ye shes kyi don rgyas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:568: 'dra zhes pa gong ma'i dpe de pad+ma dkar po dang 'dra zhes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:569: spyan zhes pa ma rig pa dang sgrib pa med
NK051(zhi)002:570: pa'i spyan de gsal ba zang thal chen po'i spyan
NK051(zhi)002:571: no // ye shes mig gcig dri ma med //
NK051(zhi)002:573: dri ma ni nyon mongs pa'i dri ma ye shes kyi mig tu dag pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:574: med pa ni rig pa'i ngo bo bshad do //
NK051(zhi)002:575: pad+ma rgyas pa'i gdan la bzhugs //
NK051(zhi)002:576: zhes pa 'di la'ang 'bru lngar bshad de /
NK051(zhi)002:579: sngags nang pa bskyed rdzogs gnyis dang /
NK051(zhi)002:581: spyi ti yo ga'i pad+ma rgyas pa'i gdan dang lngar bshad de /
NK051(zhi)002:583: rgyas pa ni 'dab ma brgyad du rgyas shing gyes pa ste /
NK051(zhi)002:584: bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi gdan no //
NK051(zhi)002:585: rgyu'i theg pa'i lugs kyi pad+ma rgyas pa'i gdan de bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan no //
NK051(zhi)002:586: sngags phyi rgyud kyi lugs kyi pad+ma rgyas pa'i gdan de rigs gsum mgon po'i gdan no //
NK051(zhi)002:587: nang rgyud bskyed rdzogs kyi lugs kyi pad+ma rgyas pa'i
NK051(zhi)002:588: gdan de bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa dang longs
NK051(zhi)002:589: spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyi
NK051(zhi)002:590: gdan no // rdzogs pa chen po'i lugs kyi pad+ma
NK051(zhi)002:591: rgyas pa'i gdan de bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu
NK051(zhi)002:593: spyi ti yo ga'i ye thog ka dag ni sangs rgyas bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi gdan no //
NK051(zhi)002:594: bzhugs pa ni 'pho 'gyur med par bzhugs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:595: yang na spyi ti'i gzhung gi pad+ma ni skyon med ka dag /
NK051(zhi)002:596: rgyas pa ni rtogs pa'i ye shes rgyas pa /
NK051(zhi)002:597: gdan ni stan la mi 'gyur ba /
NK051(zhi)002:598: bzhugs pa ni snying po'i klong na rang byung gi
NK051(zhi)002:599: ye shes chen po 'pho 'gyur med par bzhugs so
NK051(zhi)002:600: // yang na pad+ma rgyas pa ltar rtogs pa'i shes rab rgyas so //
NK051(zhi)002:601: rang gi lag gis rdo rje mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:603: de dag kun la gong bzhin du 'bru lnga lnga theg pa'i rim pa bcur bshad par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:604: rang gi zhes pa rnal 'byor pas /
NK051(zhi)002:605: lag gi zhes pa shes rab /
NK051(zhi)002:606: rdo rje zhes pa snying po skye ba med pa'i rdo rje /
NK051(zhi)002:607: mchog ni byar med blo 'das rtogs pa'i mchog go //
NK051(zhi)002:608: yang na rtogs pa'i don phul du gyur pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:609: yang dang yang du gsor byed pa //
NK051(zhi)002:611: yang dang zhes pa ni snying po'i don te /
NK051(zhi)002:612: yang du zhes pa yan lag rtsal zhes zer /
NK051(zhi)002:613: gsor byed pa zhes pa snying po dang yan lag
NK051(zhi)002:614: tu 'phrad nas dngos med blo 'das chen por rtogs
NK051(zhi)002:615: pa'o // yang na mthu stobs bdag po dpal phyag na rdo rje'i phyag g.yas pa na /
NK051(zhi)002:616: gser gyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa gdug pa can
NK051(zhi)002:617: tshar gcod pa'i don du gyen la yang dang yang
NK051(zhi)002:619: yang na snying po'i gshis zang ka gnas lugs rnal
NK051(zhi)002:620: ma rang gi rgyud la gnas pa de yang dang
NK051(zhi)002:621: yang du 'dris par byed cing rkyen khar mi gtong
NK051(zhi)002:622: bas na gsor byed pa zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:623: khro gnyer rim par ldan la sogs //
NK051(zhi)002:625: khro bo zhes pa ni gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:628: mdzad pa dang bcas nas khro ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:629: gnyer zhes pa khro bo de rnams la gnyer ma rim pa gsum yod de /
NK051(zhi)002:631: dbang du sdud pa'i khro gnyer /
NK051(zhi)002:632: zil gyis gnon pa'i khro gnyer te /
NK051(zhi)002:633: gnyer ma rim pa gsum dang khro bo de rnams ldan no //
NK051(zhi)002:634: ldan zhes pa ni dur khrod kyi chas brgyad dang ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:635: sogs zhes pa ni 'khor gyi khro bo rnams te mang po'i sgra'o //
NK051(zhi)002:637: khro bo ni lta ba log pa la khro /
NK051(zhi)002:638: gnyer ni theg pa'i chos thams cad kyi gnyer 'di nas zin /
NK051(zhi)002:639: rim pa ni theg pa'i rim pa dagu'o //
NK051(zhi)002:640: ldan pa ni skye med ka dag dang ldan la /
NK051(zhi)002:641: sogs pa ni chos kyi sgo mo dpag tu med pa /
NK051(zhi)002:643: bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams kyi nang nas kyang /
NK051(zhi)002:644: de rnams kun dang mthun la /
NK051(zhi)002:645: kun las khyad par 'phags pa'i khyad chos 'di nas ston no //
NK051(zhi)002:646: lag na rdo rje mtha' yas pa //
NK051(zhi)002:648: lag na zhes pa ni khro bo de rnams kyi phyag g.yas pa na /
NK051(zhi)002:649: rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa /
NK051(zhi)002:650: khro bo mtha' yas pa ston pa'i 'khor na gnas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:652: lag na zhes pa ni skal ldan gyi lag pa na /
NK051(zhi)002:653: rdo rje zhes pa skye 'chi 'pho 'gyur med pa'i don rtogs pa /
NK051(zhi)002:654: mtha' yas zhes pa ni rtogs pa mtha' yas pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:655: yon tan mtha' yas pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:656: thugs rje mtha' yas pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:657: byin rlabs mtha' yas pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:658: chos mtha' yas pa dang lnga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:659: dpa' bo gdul dka' 'dul ba po //
NK051(zhi)002:661: dpa' bo skye med ka dag gi dpa' bo /
NK051(zhi)002:662: gdul dka' ba ni theg pa 'og ma'i lta sgom rnams so //
NK051(zhi)002:663: de 'dul bar byed pa'i mchog ni byar med blo 'das kyi spyi ti yo ga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:664: yang rgyu mtshan nyid sde gsum gyi lugs kyi gdul
NK051(zhi)002:665: dka' ba ni dug gsum la sogs te nyon mongs
NK051(zhi)002:666: pa brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo //
NK051(zhi)002:667: de rnams 'dul ba'i mchog ni chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri bzhi stong gis 'dul lo //
NK051(zhi)002:668: de yang ser sna'i gnyen por sbyin pas 'dul /
NK051(zhi)002:669: tshul khrims 'chal ba'i gnyen por tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'dul /
NK051(zhi)002:670: mi bzod pa'i gnyen por bzod pas 'dul /
NK051(zhi)002:671: le lo'i gnyen por brtson 'grus kyis 'dul /
NK051(zhi)002:672: g.yeng ba'i gnyen por bsam gtan gyis 'dul /
NK051(zhi)002:673: shes rab zhan pa'i gnyen por thos bsam sgom gsum gyis 'dul ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:674: 'jigs su rung dang dpa' byad can //
NK051(zhi)002:676: 'jigs su rung ba ni khro bo sku mdog mthing nag zhal gsum phyag drug pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:677: yang na zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum shin tu
NK051(zhi)002:678: 'jigs shing rngams pa skyi g.ya' ba'am skyi bung byed
NK051(zhi)002:679: pa'i rnam pa'o // dpa' byad can zhes pa ni dur khrod chas brgyad kyi dpa' byad can no //
NK051(zhi)002:680: yang na spyi ti'i lugs kyis 'jigs su rung ba
NK051(zhi)002:681: zhes pa ni lta ba shin tu yang 'jigs su
NK051(zhi)002:686: bsgom pa 'jigs su rung ba ni /
NK051(zhi)002:691: spyod pa 'jigs su rung ba ni /
NK051(zhi)002:703: spyi ti yo ga'i dpa' byad kyis theg pa gzhan zil gyis gnon pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:704: rdo rje rtse mo rab 'phro ba //
NK051(zhi)002:706: rdo rje zhes pa ni snying po'i don to //
NK051(zhi)002:707: rtse mo zhes pa thig le nyag gcig go //
NK051(zhi)002:708: rab 'phro ba zhes pa ni ye shes kyi 'od zer rab tu 'phro ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:709: rang gi lag gis gsor byed pa //
NK051(zhi)002:711: rang ni rang gi shes rab /
NK051(zhi)002:712: lag gis zhes pa bka' brgyud /
NK051(zhi)002:713: gsor byed pa zhes pa rtogs pa rang gi rgyud la shar zhing gnas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:714: snying rje che dang shes rab dang //
NK051(zhi)002:716: snying rje chen po ni phyogs mtshams med pa'i snying rje'o //
NK051(zhi)002:717: shes rab zhes pa ni dbye ba med pa'i shes rab bo //
NK051(zhi)002:718: thabs kyis 'gro don byed pa mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:720: thabs zhes pa ni rtogs par byed pa'i thabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:721: 'gro don byed pa ni 'gro ba sems can gyi don byed cing phan 'dogs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:722: mchog ces pa rtogs pa'i don phul du phyin pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:723: dga' mgu rangs pa'i bsam pa can //
NK051(zhi)002:725: theg pa dgu'i rtse mo chos ya mtshan can 'di la /
NK051(zhi)002:728: yi rangs pa dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:729: bsam pa can ni mkhyen pa'i yon tan no //
NK051(zhi)002:730: khro bo lus kyi gzugs ldan pa //
NK051(zhi)002:732: khro bo zhes pa ni khro bo dang khro mo'i sku mdog phyag mtshan rnams bshad zin no //
NK051(zhi)002:734: khro bo ni theg pa 'og ma la khro /
NK051(zhi)002:735: lus kyi zhes pa ni 'pho 'gyur med pa'i lus so //
NK051(zhi)002:736: gzugs ldan pa zhes pa ni skye shi 'pho 'gyur med pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:737: sangs rgyas phrin las byed pa'i mgon //
NK051(zhi)002:739: sangs zhes pa ni nyon mongs pa sangs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:740: rgyas pa ni ye shes rgyas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:741: sangs pa ni ma rig pa sangs /
NK051(zhi)002:742: rgyas pa ni rig pa'i ye shes rgyas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:743: sangs pa ni bya btsal dang rtsol sgrub sangs /
NK051(zhi)002:744: rgyas pa ni byar med spros med chen por rgyas /
NK051(zhi)002:745: sangs pa ni grub mtha'i blos btags kyi chos rnams sangs /
NK051(zhi)002:746: rgyas pa ni byar med blo 'das kyi chos rgyas /
NK051(zhi)002:747: sangs pa ni spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa /
NK051(zhi)002:748: rgyas pa ni che ba'i bdag nyid yongs su rgyas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:750: sangs rgyas phrin las byed pa'i mgon //
NK051(zhi)002:752: theg pa rim pa dgur 'bru bkral te bshad na /
NK051(zhi)002:753: nyan thos kyis 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnams sangs /
NK051(zhi)002:754: zag pa med pa'i bde ba rgyas /
NK051(zhi)002:755: rang sangs rgyas ni rten 'brel bcu gnyis sangs /
NK051(zhi)002:756: rten 'brel lugs las ldog ste rnam par rig byed chen por rgyas /
NK051(zhi)002:757: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pas kun rdzob kyi bden pa sangs /
NK051(zhi)002:758: don dam pa'i bden pa rgyas /
NK051(zhi)002:759: sngags kri yas dri ma rnam pa gsum sangs /
NK051(zhi)002:760: dag pa chos nyid kyi don rgyas /
NK051(zhi)002:761: u pa yas snang ba'i 'khrul pa sangs /
NK051(zhi)002:763: yo gas skye 'gag rnam pa bzhi sangs /
NK051(zhi)002:764: rigs lnga'i lha'am yo ga'i lha sum cu rtsa gnyis su rgyas /
NK051(zhi)002:765: ma h+aa yo gas phung po lnga sangs /
NK051(zhi)002:767: a nu yo gas dug lnga sangs /
NK051(zhi)002:769: a ti yo gas snang srid kyi chos thams cad ma spangs la mi gnas pas sangs /
NK051(zhi)002:770: ma 'gags la mi dmigs pas rgyas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:771: spyi tis bya rtsol dang zhe 'dod rnams sangs /
NK051(zhi)002:772: byar med zhe 'dod med par rgyas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:773: phrin las ni don gong ma de rnams kyis 'gro ba sems can rnams kyi phrin las byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:775: yang na phrin las nii zhi ba rgyas pa dbang ba drag po'i phrin las dang bzhi'o //
NK051(zhi)002:776: byed pa ni sems can gyi don byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:778: sems can thams cad kyi mgon mdzad pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:779: lus btud rnams dang lhan cig tu //
NK051(zhi)002:781: lus btud zhes pa ston pa'i spyan sngar lus kyis phyag 'tshal /
NK051(zhi)002:784: rnams dang ni 'khor lag na rdo rje rnams dang
NK051(zhi)002:785: lhan cig tu phyag 'tshal pus btsugs thal mo sbyar
NK051(zhi)002:788: lus btud pa'i sgo nas ston pa la chos nyan no //
NK051(zhi)002:789: de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das //
NK051(zhi)002:791: de bzhin zhes pa ma nor ma bcos pa'i don to //
NK051(zhi)002:792: gshegs pa zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa /
NK051(zhi)002:795: sems can thams cad kyi don la gshegs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:796: bcom ldan 'das la 'bru lngas theg pa bcu tham par bshad de /
NK051(zhi)002:797: de la mtshan nyid sde gsum gyi bcom ldan 'das dang /
NK051(zhi)002:798: kri yog sde gsum gyi bcom ldan 'das dang /
NK051(zhi)002:799: bskyed rdzogs rnam gsum gyi bcom ldan 'das dang /
NK051(zhi)002:800: rdzogs pa chen po'i bcom ldan 'das dang /
NK051(zhi)002:801: spyi ti yo ga'i bcom ldan 'das dang lnga'am bcu tham par bshad par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:802: de la mtshan nyid sde gsum gyi bcom ldan 'das ni /
NK051(zhi)002:803: bcom pa ni bdud bzhi bcom /
NK051(zhi)002:804: ldan pa ni legs pa'i yon tan drug dang ldan /
NK051(zhi)002:805: 'das pa ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:806: kri yog sde gsum gyi bcom ldan 'das ni sgrib
NK051(zhi)002:807: pa rnam pa bzhi dang nyon mongs pa dang ldan
NK051(zhi)002:808: pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i dri ma rnams bcom /
NK051(zhi)002:809: khrus dang gtsang sbra dang ldan /
NK051(zhi)002:811: bskyed rdzogs gnyis kyi bcom ldan 'das ni gnyis te /
NK051(zhi)002:812: ma h+aa yo ga'i bcom ldan 'das dang /
NK051(zhi)002:813: a nu yo ga'i bcom ldan 'das so //
NK051(zhi)002:815: snang srid thams cad lha dang lha mo'i dkyil 'khor du bcom /
NK051(zhi)002:816: thabs snang ba la shes rab stong pa nyid de snang la rang bzhin med pa'i don dang ldan /
NK051(zhi)002:817: don dam par snang stong gnyis las 'das so //
NK051(zhi)002:818: a nu yo ga'i bcom ldan 'das ni /
NK051(zhi)002:822: nyon mongs pa'i rtog tshogs thams cad ni bcom /
NK051(zhi)002:823: dbyings dang ye shes gnyis dang ni ldan /
NK051(zhi)002:825: rdzogs pa chen po'i bcom ldan 'das ni /
NK051(zhi)002:826: snang srid 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad ma spangs la mi gnas par bcom /
NK051(zhi)002:827: ma 'gag la mi dmigs par ldan /
NK051(zhi)002:828: yod pa dang med pa las 'das so //
NK051(zhi)002:829: spyi ti yo ga'i bcom ldan 'das la gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:830: snang grags kyi chos thams cad rang grol rang snang chen por bcom /
NK051(zhi)002:831: gsal dag chen po dang ldan /
NK051(zhi)002:833: yang na rang bzhin skye ba med par bcom /
NK051(zhi)002:834: ngo bo 'od gsal ka dag chen po dang ldan /
NK051(zhi)002:836: yang na 'khrul snang thams cad 'od gsal bus bcom /
NK051(zhi)002:837: stong pa kun 'byung gis snying po ma'i klong du ldan /
NK051(zhi)002:839: yang na ka dag ma'i klong du bcom /
NK051(zhi)002:841: ma bu dbyer med ngang du 'das so //
NK051(zhi)002:842: yang na 'khrul pa'i rgyu rig stong ka dag tu bcom /
NK051(zhi)002:843: dbye ba med pa'i ye shes lhun grub chen por ldan /
NK051(zhi)002:844: blo byed pa po dmigs pa'i spyod yul las 'das so //
NK051(zhi)002:845: de rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das zhes gsungs so //
NK051(zhi)002:846: rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas //
NK051(zhi)002:848: rdzogs pa ni snang srid 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad spyi ti yo ga'i klong du rdzogs so //
NK051(zhi)002:849: sangs zhes pa ni ka dag chen po'i ngo bor sangs /
NK051(zhi)002:850: byar med blo 'das chen por rgyas /
NK051(zhi)002:852: phyag ces pa rtsol sgrub kyi las thams cad phyag pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:853: 'tshal nas zhes pa ston pa la mos pa dang gus pa'i sgo nas 'dud pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:854: thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni //
NK051(zhi)002:856: ston pa la 'khor zhu ba pos lus ngag yid gsum gus pa dang mos pa'i sgo nas /
NK051(zhi)002:858: pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsug /
NK051(zhi)002:859: sems dang ba'i sgo nas yid gdung bas phyag 'tshal ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:862: ston pa'i spyan sngar rgyud zhu ba'i sbyor ba dang ldan par gus pas 'dug pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:864: ston pa la rgyud zhu ba'i tshig 'di skad gsol ba ste ston pa la zhus pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:865: khyab bdag bdag la sman pa dang //
NK051(zhi)002:867: khyab zhes pa ni kun rdzob rgya che ba'i 'jam dpal lo //
NK051(zhi)002:868: bdag ces pa zab pa don dam gyi 'jam dpal lo //
NK051(zhi)002:869: bdag la zhes pa bdag gi don no //
NK051(zhi)002:870: sman pa ni bla ma'i gdams ngag gi gnad do //
NK051(zhi)002:871: bdag don bdag la thugs brtse'i phyir //
NK051(zhi)002:873: bdag ces pa ni rtog pa phul du gyur pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:874: don zhes pa gnyis su med pa yang dag pa'i don to //
NK051(zhi)002:875: bdag la zhes pa rtogs pa'i don gnad du chud pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:876: thugs brtse'i phyir zhes pa bdag gis rtogs pa de gzhan la yang de ltar ston pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:877: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba mngon rdzogs pa'i //
NK051(zhi)002:881: d+r+wa ba ni gzhi rtsal gnyis su med pa /
NK051(zhi)002:882: mngon zhees pa ni snying po'i don /
NK051(zhi)002:883: rdzogs zhes pa ni ma lus pa'i don to //
NK051(zhi)002:887: mngon rdzogs pa ka dag blo 'das so //
NK051(zhi)002:888: byang chub ci nas bdag thob mdzod //
NK051(zhi)002:890: byang zhes pa 'dus byas kyi chos byang /
NK051(zhi)002:891: chub ces pa byar med blo 'das kyi don chub pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:894: snyan brgyud kyi gdams pa de bdag gis rtogs par mdzod cig pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:895: nyon mongs pas ni sems dkrugs shing //
NK051(zhi)002:897: nyon mongs pas ni zhes pa rig pa ka dag gi don ma shes pas ma rig pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:900: yid 'gyu sems la chags sdang langs pas ming 'dogs
NK051(zhi)002:901: tha snyad kyi chos ni 'khrul sems las byung bas
NK051(zhi)002:902: byang chub sems chu rnyogs pa lta bur dkrugs pa'o
NK051(zhi)002:903: // mi shes 'dam du bying ba yi //
NK051(zhi)002:905: sems gsal zhing rig pa rno drag pas snying po
NK051(zhi)002:906: 'byed pa med pa'i don ma rtogs shing ma shes
NK051(zhi)002:909: 'khor ba'i 'dam ma rig pa'i sdug bsngal skyes pas
NK051(zhi)002:910: skye rga na 'chi 'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba'o
NK051(zhi)002:911: // sems can kun la sman pa dang //
NK051(zhi)002:913: sems can zhes pa sdug bsngal dang bcas pa'i sems can no //
NK051(zhi)002:914: kun zhes pa mang ba dang ma lus pa la bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:917: gdams ngag gi sman gyis sems can kun la sman par bya zhing phan gdag pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:918: bla med 'bras bu thob bya'i phyir //
NK051(zhi)002:920: bla med ni spyi ti yo ga'i theg pa 'di
NK051(zhi)002:921: bla na med pa gong na med pa gzhan las
NK051(zhi)002:922: khyad par du 'phags te kun gyi rjer gyur pa'o
NK051(zhi)002:925: nyan thos kyis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bya'i phyir dang /
NK051(zhi)002:926: rang rgyal gyis bse ru lta bu'i 'bras bu thob bya'i phyir dang /
NK051(zhi)002:927: byang chub sems dpas bcu gcig kun tu 'od kyi 'bras bu thob bya'i phyir dang /
NK051(zhi)002:928: sngags kri yas rigs gsum gyi 'bras bu thob bya'i phyir dang /
NK051(zhi)002:929: u pa yas rigs bzhi'i 'bras bu thob bya'i phyir dang /
NK051(zhi)002:930: yo gas rigs lnga'i 'bras bu thob bya'i phyir dang /
NK051(zhi)002:931: ma h+aas bcu drug yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen
NK051(zhi)002:932: gyi sa rdo rje 'dzin pa'i 'bras bu thob bya'i
NK051(zhi)002:933: phyir dang / a nu yo gas rdo rje 'chang chen po'i 'bras bu thob bya'i phyir dang /
NK051(zhi)002:934: a tis kun tu bzang po'i 'bras bu thob bya'i phyir dang /
NK051(zhi)002:935: spyi tis ye thog ka dag gi 'bras bu thob bya'i phyir te /
NK051(zhi)002:936: theg pa bcu po des bla na med pa'i 'bras bu thob pa'i phyir zhus pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:937: rdzoogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das //
NK051(zhi)002:939: rdzogs pa ni lhag ma med pa'i don to //
NK051(zhi)002:940: sangs pa ni non mongs pa sangs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:941: rgyas pa ni ye shes rgyas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:942: bcom pa ni mtshan ma'i chos rnams bcom pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:943: ldan pa ni snying po'i don dang ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:944: 'das pa ni blo yi chos las 'das pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:945: 'gro ba'i bla ma ston pa po //
NK051(zhi)002:947: 'gro ba zhes pa ni 'gro ba rigs drug /
NK051(zhi)002:948: bla ma zhes pa ni sems can rnams la thugs rjes skyob pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:949: ston pa po ni gsang bdag chen pos skye med
NK051(zhi)002:950: ka dag gi don 'gro ba sems can rnams la
NK051(zhi)002:951: ston pa'o // yang na de la yang 'bru lngar bshad de /
NK051(zhi)002:952: mtshan nyid sde gsum gyi 'gro ba'i bla ma ston pa ni bcom ldan 'das sh+aakya thub pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:953: kri yog sde gsum gyi 'gro ba'i bla ma ni ston pa rnam par snang mdzad do //
NK051(zhi)002:954: bskyed rdzogs gnyis kyi 'gro ba'i bla ma ni dpal rdo rje sems dapa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:955: rdzogs pa chen po'i 'gro ba'i bla ma'am ston pa ni bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:956: spyi ti'i 'gro ba'i bla ma'am ston pa ni ye thog ma ka dag gi sangs rgyas so //
NK051(zhi)002:958: bla ma ni ma h+aa gu ru dam pa rnams so //
NK051(zhi)002:959: ston pa ni slob dpon chen po dga' rab rdo rje ste /
NK051(zhi)002:960: sems can thams cad la chos ston pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:961: dam tshig chen po de nyid mkhyen //
NK051(zhi)002:963: dam tshig ni spyir sa ma ya 'bum sde ste /
NK051(zhi)002:964: tshig 'dis gsang sngags phyi nang gnyis kyi dam tshig bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:965: kri ya'i dam tshig ni sku gsung thugs kyi dam
NK051(zhi)002:966: tshig dang rdo rje slob dpon sngags dang phyag rgya
NK051(zhi)002:967: dang rdo rje dang dril bu rtag tu 'chang ba'o
NK051(zhi)002:968: // u pa ya'i dam tshig ni rtsa ba gsum gyi dam tshig dang /
NK051(zhi)002:969: yo ga'i dam tshig rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi bsrung /
NK051(zhi)002:970: ma h+aa yo ga'i dam tshig sa ma ya 'bum
NK051(zhi)002:971: sde'i nang nas dam tshig nyi shu brgyad bsrung zhing
NK051(zhi)002:972: mkhyen no // a nu yo ga'i dam tshig ni dmigs pa bzhi'i dam tshig bsrung /
NK051(zhi)002:973: rdzogs pa chen po'i dam tshig ni med pa dang
NK051(zhi)002:974: phyal ba dang gcig pu dang lhun gyis grub pa'i
NK051(zhi)002:975: dam tshig dang ldan cing mkhyen pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:976: de la spyi ti yo gas ni ka dag chen po'i don las mi 'da' bar dam tshig ste /
NK051(zhi)002:977: dam pa dang po'i sangs rgyas kyis dam tshig chen po'i de nyid mkhyen pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:978: dbang po bsam pa mkhyen mchog gis //
NK051(zhi)002:980: dbang po zhes pa ni mig la sogs pa lnga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:981: de yang dbang po rab 'bring tha ma gsum la phye bas dagu'o //
NK051(zhi)002:982: bsam pa zhes pa ni bsam pa'i khyad par te /
NK051(zhi)002:983: shes rab che chung rab 'bring tha ma gsum la dagu'o //
NK051(zhi)002:984: yang na dbang po'i ngo la snang ba sna tshogs par shar zhing snang ba la /
NK051(zhi)002:985: bsam pa'i zhes pa theg pa rim pa dgu la mthong stangs kyi dbang gis /
NK051(zhi)002:986: bsam pa'i khyad par dgu ste /
NK051(zhi)002:987: dbang po'i ngo la snang ba sna tshogs pa 'di la /
NK051(zhi)002:988: nyan thos pas rdul phra rab tu mthong /
NK051(zhi)002:989: rang rgyal bas rten 'brel du mthong /
NK051(zhi)002:990: dbu mas sgyu ma lta bur mthong /
NK051(zhi)002:991: sems tsam pas sems su mthong /
NK051(zhi)002:992: pha rol du phyin pas ston par mthong /
NK051(zhi)002:993: kri yas rigs gsum du mthong /
NK051(zhi)002:994: u pa yas rigs bzhi ru mthong /
NK051(zhi)002:995: yo gas rigs lnga ru mthong /
NK051(zhi)002:996: ma h+aa yo gas lha dang lha mo'i dkyil 'khor du mthong /
NK051(zhi)002:997: a nus dbyings dang ye shes su mthong /
NK051(zhi)002:998: a tis rang byung gi ye shes chen por mthong /
NK051(zhi)002:999: spyi tis ka dag chen por dbye bsal med par snang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1000: de rnams kyi bsam pa'i mthong tshul mkhyen pa ni
NK051(zhi)002:1001: 'phags pa 'jam dpal lam gsang bdag chen po ste
NK051(zhi)002:1002: mkhyen pa'i nang nas kyang mchog mkhyen pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1003: bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes sku //
NK051(zhi)002:1005: bcom ldan 'das zhes pa ni gong du rgyas par bshad zin /
NK051(zhi)002:1006: yang na snang srid 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid chen por bcom /
NK051(zhi)002:1007: ldan pa ni skye ba med pa'i don dang ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1008: 'das zhes pa tshig dang yi ge las 'das pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1009: ye zhes pa ye thog ma'i don /
NK051(zhi)002:1010: shes ni thog ma'i gnas lugs shes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1011: ye shes ma bu sku gnyis su med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1012: gtsug tor chen po tshig gi bdag /
NK051(zhi)002:1014: gtsug tor zhes pa ni spyi ti yo ga'i theg pa bstan no //
NK051(zhi)002:1015: yang na gtsug tor ni snying po'i don la gnas pa ka dag chen po'i don to //
NK051(zhi)002:1016: chen po ni gong na med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1017: tshig gi bdag ces pa 'phags pa 'jam dpal ni
NK051(zhi)002:1018: tshig de dag thams cad kyi mnga' bdag yin no
NK051(zhi)002:1019: // bdag ces pa ni gnyis su med par rang grol ba'i bdag go //
NK051(zhi)002:1020: ye shes sku ste rang byung ba //
NK051(zhi)002:1022: rdzogs pa chen po'i spyi ti yo ga'i don bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:1023: ye shes ni mi shes pa med pa ste chos nyid ka dag chen po'i don shes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1024: shes pa skye med ka dag byar med blo 'das su shes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1025: sku ste zhes pa ni snying po 'gyur ba med pa'i sku'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1026: rang byung zhes pa ni snying po ma'i klong nas yan lag rtsal dang zer byung ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1029: ba zhes pa ni snying po dang yan lag gnyis su med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1030: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' yi //
NK051(zhi)002:1032: 'jam dpal ces pa ni drug ste /
NK051(zhi)002:1034: bsgom pa lam gyi 'jam dpal dang /
NK051(zhi)002:1036: snying po don gyi 'jam dpal dang /
NK051(zhi)002:1037: gsang bdag chen po'i 'jam dpal dang /
NK051(zhi)002:1038: rang grol chen po'i 'jam dpal dang drug go //
NK051(zhi)002:1039: ye shes sems dpa' ni 'od gsal ngang mdangs kyi khye'u chung ngo //
NK051(zhi)002:1040: sems dpa' yang dag pa'i don la sems dpa' ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1041: yang na gtso bo gsum brtsegs pa'i thugs ka na gnas pa'i ye shes sems dapa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1042: ming ni yang dag brjod pa'i mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:1044: da res 'grel ba 'di'i lugs kyis ming la brjod du med pa /
NK051(zhi)002:1045: snying po'i gnas lugs de ming dang tshig dang yi ge dang brjod pa las 'das pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1046: yang dag ces pa ni snying po ka nas dag pa'i rang bzhin no //
NK051(zhi)002:1047: brjod pa ni don la brjod pa med kyang skye
NK051(zhi)002:1048: med ka dag gi don de dag tu bton nas
NK051(zhi)002:1050: mchog ces pa ni gtso bor gyur ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1051: da ni 'di nas mar gzhi dang /
NK051(zhi)002:1053: 'khrul pa rtsad nas bcad pa mdor bstan pa ni /
NK051(zhi)002:1054: don zab don ni rgya che zhing //
NK051(zhi)002:1055: don chen mtshungs med rab zhi ba //
NK051(zhi)002:1057: sangs rgyas dang sems can gyi gzhi mdor bstan pa ste /
NK051(zhi)002:1058: don zab ces pa snying po'i gnas lugs yin te /
NK051(zhi)002:1059: thog ma'i ming gang du yang ma thogs pa'i dus na /
NK051(zhi)002:1060: gzhi de sangs rgyas sems can du ma 'khrul bar /
NK051(zhi)002:1061: mnyam pa nyid mtsho la dar chags pa dang 'dra ste /
NK051(zhi)002:1062: 'bar 'bur dang mtho dman med pa mnyam kad de gnas so //
NK051(zhi)002:1063: de bzhin du gzhi'i rang bzhin kyang /
NK051(zhi)002:1071: sangs rgyas byang chub sku'i dngos gzhi med /
NK051(zhi)002:1072: sku lnga rigs lnga ye shes rnam lnga ste /
NK051(zhi)002:1073: snang stong yul sems gzung 'dzin med /
NK051(zhi)002:1074: dug lnga bde sdug zug rngu'i nad kyang med /
NK051(zhi)002:1076: dgra dang gnyen gyi chags sdang med /
NK051(zhi)002:1077: phyi nang dgag sgrub spong len med /
NK051(zhi)002:1078: bzang ngan blang dor dbye bsal med /
NK051(zhi)002:1079: kha dog phyogs mtshams bye brag med /
NK051(zhi)002:1080: ming med tshig med mtshon pa'i yul las 'das /
NK051(zhi)002:1081: smra med ming med brjod pa'i yul las 'das /
NK051(zhi)002:1082: de ni don zab pas gting dpag dka' ba /
NK051(zhi)002:1083: mi mngon mi snang gsal bar byed pa tsam du yang bstan du med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1084: rnam pa kun ldan gang gi yang mtshan ma can gyi rnam pa med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1085: dpe dang rtsis dang tshig dang yi ge las 'das so //
NK051(zhi)002:1086: gzhi de la tha snyad tsam du bstan na gdags gzhi rnam pa lnga ste /
NK051(zhi)002:1087: sngon thog ye gnas kyi gzhi dang /
NK051(zhi)002:1091: 'char gzhi dang rnam pa lnga ste //
NK051(zhi)002:1093: rgyud 'di nyid kyi khungs ston cing yid ches par bya ste /
NK051(zhi)002:1094: sngon thog ye gnas kyi gzhi gtan la dbab pa'i khungs ni /
NK051(zhi)002:1096: sangs rgyas thog ma tha ma med //
NK051(zhi)002:1097: thog ma med pa spros med bdag /
NK051(zhi)002:1102: g.yo gzhi ni sang sang dang seng seng dang zang zang zing zing gi rnam pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1103: g.yo mi g.yo las yid tsam g.yos /
NK051(zhi)002:1105: so so rang rig mi g.yo ba //
NK051(zhi)002:1108: rlung las 'gyu ba thal tsam long tsam mo //
NK051(zhi)002:1109: de la 'byung ba lnga gazhi'am ma'i tshul du gnas /
NK051(zhi)002:1110: rlung lnga yab kyi tshul du gnas /
NK051(zhi)002:1111: 'od lnga yum gyi tshul du shar ro //
NK051(zhi)002:1113: nam mkha' las rang byung ba /
NK051(zhi)002:1119: de las myong ba med pa'i yid phyags phyags sangs sangs par shar ro //
NK051(zhi)002:1121: nam mkha'i bdag po sna tshogs ston //
NK051(zhi)002:1122: 'od chen rnam par snang bar byed //
NK051(zhi)002:1127: nor bu rin po che dang /
NK051(zhi)002:1130: mtsho la dar chags pa rnams ni sangs rgyas dang sems can gyi gzhi gtan la phab pa'i dape'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1132: zhes pas de yan chad du gzhi gtan la phab pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1136: nam mkha' las byung rang byung ba //
NK051(zhi)002:1137: sna tshogs gzugs can yid las skyes //
NK051(zhi)002:1138: zhes gsungs pas na 'khrul lugs bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:1139: stong nyid las byung zhes pa ste /
NK051(zhi)002:1140: sngon thog ma ci yang med pa las ji zhig
NK051(zhi)002:1141: ltar du 'gyu mi 'gyu las myong ba med pa'i
NK051(zhi)002:1142: shes pa byung / de las rig pa /
NK051(zhi)002:1143: rig pa des skye med kyi don ma rig pas cir yang snang ba'i ngo bor 'khrul lo //
NK051(zhi)002:1144: med pa las byung zhes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1145: rig pa de phya sangs khyer bas stong pa las dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs su 'khrul lo //
NK051(zhi)002:1146: dngos po gshis kyi don de yid kyis mi shes shing ma rtogs pas /
NK051(zhi)002:1147: med pa las yod pa'i ngo bor 'khrul lo //
NK051(zhi)002:1148: rnam rig sna tshogs gzugs don can //
NK051(zhi)002:1150: 'od bzang 'bar ba zhes pas 'od kyis 'khrul pa'i gzhi byas /
NK051(zhi)002:1151: nyi ma 'char ka'i ces pa 'od la rtsal du 'khrul lo //
NK051(zhi)002:1152: sen mo'i 'od las zhes pa rtsal zer du 'khrul /
NK051(zhi)002:1156: skye med ka dag ma rtogs ma shes pas ma rig par 'khrul /
NK051(zhi)002:1157: de las stong pa gsal ba ma 'gag pa ngo
NK051(zhi)002:1158: ma shes pas yid 'khor lo gsum dang dug gsum
NK051(zhi)002:1159: du 'khrul / de la dang po'i rig pa 'khrul /
NK051(zhi)002:1162: de la rig pa'i 'char sgo dang /
NK051(zhi)002:1163: ma rig pa'i 'khrul sgo gnyis su 'khrul lo //
NK051(zhi)002:1164: rnam pa cir yang ma phyed dbye bsal rtsis gdab med pas /
NK051(zhi)002:1165: 'byed pa med pa'i gti mug ste /
NK051(zhi)002:1166: skye med snying po ma'i klong du gyur nas /
NK051(zhi)002:1167: kun tu bzang po la slob dpon med par rang
NK051(zhi)002:1168: gi rang bzhin de 'byed med du shes shing klong
NK051(zhi)002:1169: du gyur pas na sangs rgyas so //
NK051(zhi)002:1170: yid byed pa po las grol zhing blo ngo bo nyid las yongs su 'das so //
NK051(zhi)002:1171: de ni ye shes kyi 'char sgo'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1172: rtsal las gding rnyeng rtogs pa shar zhes pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:1174: ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs 'byed pas //
NK051(zhi)002:1175: srid pa'i d+r+wa ba 'joms pa po //
NK051(zhi)002:1176: mchog gi dang po sku gsum 'chang //
NK051(zhi)002:1177: skad cig gcig gis rdzogs sangs rgyas //
NK051(zhi)002:1178: ye shes mig gcig dri ma med //
NK051(zhi)002:1182: nyon mongs pas ni sems dkrugs shing //
NK051(zhi)002:1184: rtsa ba'i 'gong po nga bdag las dug lngas sems dkrugs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1185: der ma rig pas yang dag pa'i don ma rtogs /
NK051(zhi)002:1186: ma rig pas yid 'khor lo gsum du dang mun pa'i 'khor sgor 'khyams shing /
NK051(zhi)002:1187: 'khor ba'i 'dam du bying nas 'gro ba drug gi lus blangs so //
NK051(zhi)002:1189: sna tshogs gzugs can yid las skyes //
NK051(zhi)002:1191: de yang 'khrul pa'i rgyu rkyen rgyas par bshad na /
NK051(zhi)002:1192: 'khrul pa'i gzhi ni kun gazhi'am rlung yin no //
NK051(zhi)002:1195: 'khrul pa'i dus sems kyi len pa /
NK051(zhi)002:1196: 'khrul pa'i tshul rim gyis rim par phyi nang snod bcud du 'khrul /
NK051(zhi)002:1197: 'khrul pa'i 'bras bu spyir sems can thams cad sgos gzugs lnga las 'od gzugs /
NK051(zhi)002:1201: sha khrag gi gzugs dang lnga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1202: skye mched mu bzhi 'gro ba rigs drug /
NK051(zhi)002:1204: snang srid kyi sems can skye rga na 'chi'i chu bo bzhi /
NK051(zhi)002:1205: snod bcud sdug bsngal sna tshogs 'bum phrag sa ma
NK051(zhi)002:1206: ya 'bum sde bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad
NK051(zhi)002:1208: dper na smig sgyus chu ru 'khrul /
NK051(zhi)002:1210: thi gu las sbrul du 'khrul lo //
NK051(zhi)002:1211: sbur sa bal du btum pa'am /
NK051(zhi)002:1212: srin gyi kha chu dang 'dra ste rang las byung nas rang 'thums nas /
NK051(zhi)002:1213: sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong nas shi ba bzhin du /
NK051(zhi)002:1214: de bzhin du 'khrul pa yang 'gong po nga bdag ma sangs pas /
NK051(zhi)002:1217: sems gsal drag pas rang gnya' rang gi ma chog pas dug lnga dug gsum du song ste /
NK051(zhi)002:1218: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs sa ma ya 'bum sde nyams su myang ngo //
NK051(zhi)002:1219: rin po che'i rgyud nas kyang /
NK051(zhi)002:1220: med la yod bzung rgyu nyid kyis //
NK051(zhi)002:1221: rmi lam tshul du sdug bsngal myong //
NK051(zhi)002:1222: rigs drug skye 'gul de las byung //
NK051(zhi)002:1224: mtshungs med ces pas 'khrul pa rtsad nas gcod pa'i gdams ngag bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:1226: nyon mongs g.yul du gcig dpa' ba //
NK051(zhi)002:1227: mi shes dgra yi dregs pa 'joms //
NK051(zhi)002:1228: mtshon cha chen po 'bar ba yis //
NK051(zhi)002:1229: nyon mongs ma rig rtsad nas gcod //
NK051(zhi)002:1231: theg pa chen po sdug bsngal gcod //
NK051(zhi)002:1233: 'khrul pa rtsad nas gcod pa'i le'u /
NK051(zhi)002:1234: rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che //
NK051(zhi)002:1236: sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog ces bya ba
NK051(zhi)002:1237: yan chod kyis 'khrul pa rtsad nas gcod pa'i skabs
NK051(zhi)002:1238: bstan no // 'khrul pa rtsad nas bcad thabs la
NK051(zhi)002:1239: blo rab 'bring tha ma gsum du shes par bya
NK051(zhi)002:1240: ba la gdams ngag bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:1241: dbang po rab gcig la tshig gi gdams ngag bstan pas 'khrul pa rtsad nas bcad de 'ong ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1242: dpal ldan sangs rgyas pad+ma skyes //
NK051(zhi)002:1244: pad+ma 'dam nas skyes kyang 'dam gyi nyes pa la sogs pa'i skyon gyis ma gos te /
NK051(zhi)002:1245: mdog legs pa yid du 'ong ba shin tu yang ngo mtshar ba bzhin du /
NK051(zhi)002:1246: dpe de bzhin du dbang po rab gcig gis /
NK051(zhi)002:1247: shes pas srid 'byung skye gnas med //
NK051(zhi)002:1249: shes pa ni gzhi dngos med du shes /
NK051(zhi)002:1250: 'khrul pa skye med du ngo shes /
NK051(zhi)002:1251: 'khrul snang rab grol du ngo shes pas bcas bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1252: srid 'byung ni skye gnas bzhi'i mngal du mi 'gyur te /
NK051(zhi)002:1254: yang na shes pa ni gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:1255: gzhi skye med du ngo shes /
NK051(zhi)002:1256: rtsal ka dag tu ngo shes /
NK051(zhi)002:1257: 'khrul gzhi 'khrul pa dngos med dbyer med du ngo shes rtsad chod rtsis gdab med pa /
NK051(zhi)002:1259: so ma lhug pa gsal dag rab grol lo //
NK051(zhi)002:1260: med la kun 'byung ba ngang dwangs klong thim mo //
NK051(zhi)002:1261: byar med blo 'das snga ma nyid du ngo shes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1262: srid 'byung ni 'gro ba rigs drug skye ba rnam bzhi //
NK051(zhi)002:1263: sems can du 'byung skye ba thams cad srid pa nas 'byung ngo //
NK051(zhi)002:1264: skye ma thag tu rdo rje'i bdag /
NK051(zhi)002:1266: ka dag blo 'das kyi don rtogs pas /
NK051(zhi)002:1267: skye 'jig dang 'pho 'gyur gnas med pas rdo rje lta bu'i sku thob pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1268: lus med lus te lus kyi mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:1270: dper na ha la nag po'i dug /
NK051(zhi)002:1271: dug du ngo shes za mi byed //
NK051(zhi)002:1272: thabs ldan zos kyang sman du 'gyur //
NK051(zhi)002:1274: rtogs ldan mi chags mi 'ching grogs su 'gyur /
NK051(zhi)002:1276: dbang po rab kyis 'khrul pa rtsad nas bcad pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:1277: dbang po 'bring zhig la chos brgyad khri bzhi stong gi gdams ngag bstan no //
NK051(zhi)002:1278: dbang po tha ma zhig 'phrul pa skyes tshad thad kar gsal la rtogs lugs rgyud la bstan no //
NK051(zhi)002:1280: rdo rje ral gris ma lus gcod //
NK051(zhi)002:1282: dbang po tha ma 'khrul pa rtsad nas gcod pa'i thabs ni /
NK051(zhi)002:1283: phyi'i 'khrul pa rtsad nas bcad pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:1284: nang gi 'khrul pa rtsad nas bcad pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:1285: gsang ba'i 'khrul pa rtsad nas bcad pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1286: de la phyir khrul pa rtsad nas bcad pa ni /
NK051(zhi)002:1287: snang srid 'khor 'das yod med rtag chad rim pa la /
NK051(zhi)002:1288: ye nas rang bzhin rang so'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1289: de la snang ba la dgag sgrub mi bya ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:1290: dbye bsal mi bya ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:1292: spong len med pa'i snang ba rang sor bzhag ces gsungs so //
NK051(zhi)002:1296: rang so la gzung 'dzin med pas rang brlag go //
NK051(zhi)002:1297: nang gi 'khrul pa rtsad nas bcad pa ni /
NK051(zhi)002:1298: rig pa yod la myong ba med pa /
NK051(zhi)002:1299: yid gnyis la phyi nang gi gzung 'dzin med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1300: sems kyis ma spangs par gnas su dag ste /
NK051(zhi)002:1301: ming 'dogs dang zhen chags kyi rnam pa med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1302: stong las kun 'byung stong par grol //
NK051(zhi)002:1303: med las kun 'byung med par thim //
NK051(zhi)002:1304: ma bu rtsal du dbyer med 'dres //
NK051(zhi)002:1307: chu phran rgya mtshor thim pa 'dra //
NK051(zhi)002:1309: gsang ba'i 'khrul pa rtsad nas bcad pa ni /
NK051(zhi)002:1310: kun gzhi'i sems stong pa'i snying po de /
NK051(zhi)002:1312: skye ba med par rtsad bcad /
NK051(zhi)002:1313: 'gag pa med par rtsad ni bcad /
NK051(zhi)002:1314: gnyis su med par rtsad nas bcad /
NK051(zhi)002:1315: 'od gsal chen por rtsad nas bcad /
NK051(zhi)002:1316: ngang dwangs chen pos rtsad nas bcad /
NK051(zhi)002:1317: de ni gsang ba'i kun gzhi rtsad nas gcod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1319: rnam grol gsum la mkhas pa po //
NK051(zhi)002:1321: phyi yul gyi snang ba rang grol /
NK051(zhi)002:1322: bar yid kyi 'dzin pa rang grol /
NK051(zhi)002:1323: nang gi sems dngos med ka dag chen por rang grol lo //
NK051(zhi)002:1324: grol ba'i thar pa rnam grol lus //
NK051(zhi)002:1326: mtshungs med ces pas de yan chad kyis 'khrul pa rtsad nas bcad pa bstan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1327: rab zhi zhes pas 'khrul pa'i rtog tshogs brgyad khri bzhi stong rab tu zhi ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1328: phyi'i snang ba zhen med rang grol du zhi /
NK051(zhi)002:1329: rig pa rig med ka dag tu zhi /
NK051(zhi)002:1330: sems ka dag skye med blo 'das su rab tu zhi ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1331: thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba //
NK051(zhi)002:1333: thog ma zhes pa ni gnas lugs 'dug tshul gshis snying po ka dag la dge ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1334: bar ni rtsal zer yan lag bu'i chos can mtshan ma'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1337: rtsad nas gcod pa la rab tu dge ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1338: mthar dge zhes pa 'khrul pa ldog lugs dang /
NK051(zhi)002:1340: 'bras bu mthar phyin te dge ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1341: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs //
NK051(zhi)002:1343: sangs rgyas dang sems can dang gzhi'i gnas lugs te /
NK051(zhi)002:1344: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad dang /
NK051(zhi)002:1346: thams cad skyob la sogs pas gsungs so //
NK051(zhi)002:1349: ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas ni byams pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:1351: seng ge'i sgra la sogs pas kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro //
NK051(zhi)002:1352: da ltar byung bar rdzogs sangs rgyas //
NK051(zhi)002:1354: bcom ldan 'das sh+aakya thub pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:1357: slob dpon dga' rab rdo rjes kyang bar du dge
NK051(zhi)002:1358: ba 'khrul pa rtsad nas gcod cing grol ba'i thabs
NK051(zhi)002:1359: bstan pa'o // da ltar gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsung ngo //
NK051(zhi)002:1360: gzhi ji ltar gnas pa'i gnas lugs dang /
NK051(zhi)002:1361: bar du ji ltar 'khrul pa'i 'khrul lugs /
NK051(zhi)002:1362: 'khrul pa rtsad nas gcod pa'i bcad lugs /
NK051(zhi)002:1363: tha ma rtogs pa'i rtogs lugs so //
NK051(zhi)002:1365: don zab don ni rgya che zhing //
NK051(zhi)002:1366: don chen mtshungs med rab zhi ba //
NK051(zhi)002:1368: don zab ni gnas pa gzhi'i tshoms rgya che zhing ni 'khrul pa 'phrang gi tshoms /
NK051(zhi)002:1369: mtshungs med ces pa bye brag shan gyi tshoms /
NK051(zhi)002:1370: don chen zhes pa dbyer med pa'i tshoms dang bzhi'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1372: don zab don ni rgya che zhing //
NK051(zhi)002:1373: don chen mtshung med rab zhi ba //
NK051(zhi)002:1375: de la'ang 'bru lnga'am bcu tham pa bshad par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1376: don zab ces pa ni gsang sngags kyi theg pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1377: rgya che zhing zhes pa rgyu mtshan nyid kyi theg pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1378: mtshungs med ces pas rdzogs pa chen po bstan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1379: rab ces pa ni rdzogs chen thod rgal /
NK051(zhi)002:1382: spyi phud spyi ti yo ga'i theg pa bstan no //
NK051(zhi)002:1383: thog ma bar dang mtha' dge ba //
NK051(zhi)002:1385: don de ni thog ma dang /
NK051(zhi)002:1388: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs //
NK051(zhi)002:1390: da ltar byung ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas //
NK051(zhi)002:1392: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi
NK051(zhi)002:1393: sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang don chen po de rnams
NK051(zhi)002:1394: gsungs la / phyis byon pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro //
NK051(zhi)002:1395: yang dang yang du gsungs pa gang //
NK051(zhi)002:1397: gdams pa'i yang snying gsang chen 'di /
NK051(zhi)002:1398: skal ba dang ldan pa'i slob ma rnams la /
NK051(zhi)002:1399: yang dang yang du don de ma go ba'i bar du gsungs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1400: rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba las //
NK051(zhi)002:1402: rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba le'u khri drug stong gi nang nas /
NK051(zhi)002:1404: da ltar gyi skal ldan rnams dang /
NK051(zhi)002:1405: ma 'ongs pa'i skal ldan rnams la gsungs pa ni rgyud chen 'adi'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1406: yang na spyi ti'i lugs kyi rgyud chen po 'di skye ba med pa'i sgyu /
NK051(zhi)002:1408: d+r+wa ba ni snying po dang yan lag tu 'brel ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1409: las ni skal ldan gyi las te byar med blo 'das so //
NK051(zhi)002:1410: don de ston pa gang gis gsungs na /
NK051(zhi)002:1413: gsang sngags kyi ston pa ni bcom ldan 'das gsang bdag chen po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1414: rdo rje zhes pa ni snying po 'pho 'gyur med pa la bya /
NK051(zhi)002:1415: 'chang zhes pa ni ye shes rnam pa lnga'i don 'chang /
NK051(zhi)002:1417: rgya gar skad du man+t+ra zhes bya ba /
NK051(zhi)002:1418: bod skad du gsang sngags zhes bya ste /
NK051(zhi)002:1419: shes skyob ldan pa'i don gyis gsang sngags so //
NK051(zhi)002:1420: 'chang zhes pa skal ldan gyi skyes bu la skye
NK051(zhi)002:1421: med ka dag gi don de 'chang bas na 'chang
NK051(zhi)002:1422: zhes bya'o // dpag med rnams kyis dga' bzhin du //
NK051(zhi)002:1424: 'khor dpag tu med pa bsam kyis mi khyab pa rnams la /
NK051(zhi)002:1425: skye med ka dag gi gdams ngag dga' bzhin du gsungs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1426: glur blangs gang lags bshad du gsol //
NK051(zhi)002:1428: glur blangs ni le'u khri phrag drug khri drug stong
NK051(zhi)002:1429: gi zab mo lta spyod glu'i le'u ste lta sgom
NK051(zhi)002:1430: glur blangs pa'o // gang lags zhes pa zab mo'i
NK051(zhi)002:1431: le'u gang lags pa de bshad du gsol zhes pa
NK051(zhi)002:1432: ni bdag cag nyan pa'i 'khor rnams la bshad du
NK051(zhi)002:1433: glur blangs pa'o // gsol cig pa'o // mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas kun gyi //
NK051(zhi)002:1435: mgon po ni sems can mgon dang skyabs med pa la mgon dang skyabs mdzad pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1436: rdzogs pa ni spyi ti yo ga theg pa rim
NK051(zhi)002:1437: pa dgu'i lta sgom grub mtha' ma lus pa rdzogs
NK051(zhi)002:1438: pa'o // sangs pa ni bya btsal rtsol sgrub kyi chos rnams sangs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1439: rgyas pa ni snying po ka dag gi don rgyas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1440: kun gyi zhes pa ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1443: gsang ba ni sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1444: gsang ba zab mo'i don de bstan du mi btub pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1445: 'dzin pa zhes pa ni skal ldan gyi slob mas zab mo'i gdams ngag 'dzin pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1446: bdag 'gyur zhes pa bdag skye ba med par gyur cig pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:1447: yang na 'grel pa 'di'i lugs kyis smon lam gzhan nas gdab tu med de /
NK051(zhi)002:1448: gsang ba ni skye med ka dag /
NK051(zhi)002:1449: 'dzin ni zang ka rnal ma'i don de /
NK051(zhi)002:1450: ci nas ni blo 'das kyi gdams pa de ci nas kyang rtogs par bya dgos pas na /
NK051(zhi)002:1451: bdag dngos med blo 'das su rtogs par gyur cig ces /
NK051(zhi)002:1452: gzhan la yang de ltar ston pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1453: nges par 'byung gi bar du ni //
NK051(zhi)002:1455: nges pa ni gdams pa zab mo'i don /
NK051(zhi)002:1456: 'byung ba ni skal ldan gyi slob ma la /
NK051(zhi)002:1458: bar du 'di zhes pa bdag gis skye med ka dag ma rtogs kyi bar du'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1459: bdag gis bsam pa brtan pos bzung //
NK051(zhi)002:1461: bdag gis ni skal ldan gyis /
NK051(zhi)002:1462: bsam pa zhes pa zab mo'i chos la nges par sems pa'i bsam pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1464: skye med ka dag byar med blo 'das de /
NK051(zhi)002:1465: theg pa 'og ma'i dbang du mi gtong ste brtan por bzung ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1466: nyon mongs ma lus bsal ba dang //
NK051(zhi)002:1469: rgyu mtshan nyid kyis nyon mongs pa brgyad cu rtsa gnyis bsal ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1470: sngags kri yog gis nyon mongs pa drug cu rtsa gnyis bsal ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1471: sngags bskyed rdzogs kyis nyon mongs pa dgu bcu go brgyad bsal ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1472: a tis nyon mongs pa bargya'am nyi khri chig stong bsal ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1473: spyi ti yo gas ni nyon mongs pa sa ma
NK051(zhi)002:1474: ya 'bum sde bsam gyis mi khyab brjod kyis mi
NK051(zhi)002:1475: long pa thams cad ma lus lus pa med par
NK051(zhi)002:1476: ma spangs la mi gnas rang grol rang sangs so
NK051(zhi)002:1477: // mi shes ma lus spangs pa'i phyir //
NK051(zhi)002:1479: mi shes ni ma rig pa des skye med ka dag gi don mi shes /
NK051(zhi)002:1480: ma lus spangs pa'i phyir zhes pa /
NK051(zhi)002:1481: ma lus pa ni rig pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:1485: skyed byed kyi bag chags te /
NK051(zhi)002:1486: de la sogs pa de kho nyid la rmongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir zhes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1488: nyan thos kyis 'dod chags spangs pa /
NK051(zhi)002:1489: rang rgyal gyis nga rgyal spangs pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:1490: sems tsam gyis gzung 'dzin spangs pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:1491: dbu ma pas nyon mongs pa rnams spangs pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:1492: kri yog gis sgrib pa dang dri ma rnams spangs pa da /
NK051(zhi)002:1493: ma h+aas snang ba 'khrul par 'dzin pa spangs pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:1494: yang na dug lnga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa spangs pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:1495: a nus snang ba tha mal par 'dzin pa spangs pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:1496: a tis snang ba lha dang lha mor 'dzin pa spangs pa /
NK051(zhi)002:1497: rdzogs chen spyi ti yo gas rtsol sgrub zhen pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir ro //
NK051(zhi)002:1498: bsam pa'i khyad par ji bzhin du //
NK051(zhi)002:1501: sems can gyi bsam pa dang mos pa dang sbyar nas /
NK051(zhi)002:1502: dbang po rab 'bring tha ma gsum la re re la gsum gsum du phye bas dgu ste /
NK051(zhi)002:1503: dbang po tha ma bsam pa chung ba la mtshan nyid sde gsum bstan /
NK051(zhi)002:1504: bsam pa'i khyad par de bas blo 'bring po gsum la kri yog sde gsum bstan /
NK051(zhi)002:1505: de bas bsam pa'i khyad par che ba blo dbang
NK051(zhi)002:1506: po rab gsum la bskyed rdzogs gsum gyi theg pa
NK051(zhi)002:1507: bstan / de bas kyang bsam pa dang dbang po'i
NK051(zhi)002:1508: khyad par che ba la rdzogs pa chen po bstan
NK051(zhi)002:1509: bstan / / de thams cad las kyang bsam pa'i
NK051(zhi)002:1510: khyad par 'phags pa'i dbang po thod rgal ba la
NK051(zhi)002:1511: rdzogs chen spyi ti yo ga'i theg pa bstan no
NK051(zhi)002:1512: bstan / / // sems can rnams la bshad par 'tshal //
NK051(zhi)002:1514: blo rab 'bring tha ma gsum la gong bzhin du bshad par 'tshal ces so //
NK051(zhi)002:1515: yang na sems can rnams kyi don bya ba'i phyir bshad par 'tshal lo //
NK051(zhi)002:1516: gsang dbang lag na rdo rje yis //
NK051(zhi)002:1518: 'khor zhu ba po gsang ba'i bdag po lag na
NK051(zhi)002:1519: rdo rjes ston pa gsang bdag chen po la rgyud
NK051(zhi)002:1520: zhu ba'i mos pa dang bcas nas 'dud do //
NK051(zhi)002:1521: de bzhin gshegs la de skad du //
NK051(zhi)002:1523: de bzhin gshegs pa ni bcom ldan 'das la'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1524: de skad du ni 'khor rnams kyis gang du zhus pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1525: gsol nas thal mo sbyar byas te //
NK051(zhi)002:1527: ston pa la 'khor gyis zhus pa'i tshig gsol ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1528: thal mo sbyar te ni ston pa'i spyan sngar 'khor
NK051(zhi)002:1529: zhu ba pos thal mo sbyar pus mo g.yas pa'i
NK051(zhi)002:1530: lha nga sa la gtsugs nas /
NK051(zhi)002:1531: lus btud nas ni spyan sngar 'dug /
NK051(zhi)002:1533: 'khor phyag na rdo rje lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgo nas shin tu gus pas btud nas /
NK051(zhi)002:1534: ston pa'i spyan sngar sems gzhan du mi yengs par chos zhu zhing 'dug go //
NK051(zhi)002:1535: de yan chad kyis zhus pa'i skabs kyi 'grel pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1536: de nas bcom ldan sh+aakya thub //
