NK051(zhi)002:1538: bcom ldan 'das ni legs zhes gsol //
NK051(zhi)002:1539: zhes bya ba yan chad kyi tsigs bcad drug gis slar gsungs pa'i skabs bstan nas /
NK051(zhi)002:1540: de nas zhes pa ni zhus pa'i le'u 'das ma thag nas so //
NK051(zhi)002:1541: bcom ldan 'das ni gong du rgyas par bshad zin to //
NK051(zhi)002:1542: spyi ti'i lugs kyis bcom ldan sh+aakya thub ces pa /
NK051(zhi)002:1543: rang sangs rang grol chen por bcom /
NK051(zhi)002:1544: ldan ni skye med ka dag gi don dang ldan /
NK051(zhi)002:1545: sh+aakya zhes pa shes rab kyi sgo phye ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1546: sh+aakya thub pa ni skye med ka dag gi don de rkyen dbang du mi gtong bas thub pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1549: bdag nyid chen po sh+aakya thub pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1551: legs pa'i yon tan drug dang ldan /
NK051(zhi)002:1552: sh+aakya ni rgyal po sh+aakya'i rigs so //
NK051(zhi)002:1553: thub pa ni dka' thub dang sdom pa thub pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1554: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:1556: rdzogs pa'i zhes pa ni spang bya ma lus pa spangs la /
NK051(zhi)002:1557: thob bya ma lus pa'i don yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1558: sangs rgyas zhes pa nyon mongs pa thams cad sangs /
NK051(zhi)002:1559: ye shes thams cad yongs su rgyas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1564: de rnams las bsod nams ches che bas /
NK051(zhi)002:1565: rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog ni bcom ldan 'das sh+aakya thub pa yin no //
NK051(zhi)002:1566: nyid kyi zhal nas ljags bzang ba //
NK051(zhi)002:1568: nyid kyi zhal ni bcom ldan 'das sh+aakya thub pa seng ge'i skad gdangs lta bu'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1569: zhal nas ni ljags yod pa ste /
NK051(zhi)002:1570: ljags de ni shin tu yang bzang zhing ring ba
NK051(zhi)002:1571: dang bde ba dang tshangs pa dbyangs kyi 'brug sgra
NK051(zhi)002:1572: dang 'dra ba / tshems dung so 'khor ba g.yas su 'khyil ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1573: ring zhig yangs pa brkyangs mdzad de //
NK051(zhi)002:1575: ring zhing yangs pa ni rdzun spangs pa mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
NK051(zhi)002:1576: brkyang mdzad de ni zhal gyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar khyab pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1577: 'jig rten gsum po snang byed cing //
NK051(zhi)002:1579: 'jig rten gsum ni sa steng dang /
NK051(zhi)002:1585: snang byed ces pa bde bar gshegs pa'i 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs kyis /
NK051(zhi)002:1586: 'jig rten gsum gyi ma rig pa'i mun pa snang bar byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1587: bdud bzhi'i dgra rnams 'dul byed pa //
NK051(zhi)002:1589: bdud ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
NK051(zhi)002:1594: dgra rnams zhes pa nyon mongs pa'i dgras thar pa
NK051(zhi)002:1595: thob tu mi ster ba'i gegs byed pas de rnams
NK051(zhi)002:1597: theg pa rim pa dgu'i lta sgom spyod 'bras bzhis rang rang gi sgo nas 'dul bar byed /
NK051(zhi)002:1598: nyan thos pas dka' thub kyis 'dul /
NK051(zhi)002:1599: rang rgyal gyis rten 'brel lugs las bzlog ste 'dul /
NK051(zhi)002:1600: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pas sdom pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi sgo nas 'dul /
NK051(zhi)002:1601: kri yas khrus dang gtsang sbras 'dul /
NK051(zhi)002:1602: yo gas mngon par byang chub pa lngas 'dul /
NK051(zhi)002:1603: ma h+aas bsnyen sgrub rnam bzhi'i sgo nas dam tshig nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis 'dul /
NK051(zhi)002:1604: a nus dbyings dang ye shes kyi sgo nas dmigs pa bzhi'i dam tshig gis 'dul /
NK051(zhi)002:1605: a tis ma spangs la mi gnas pas 'dul /
NK051(zhi)002:1606: spyi ti yo gas bdud bzhi'i dgra rnams ma lus
NK051(zhi)002:1607: par ka dag rang sangs chen po'i klong du 'dul
NK051(zhi)002:1608: lo // yang na spyi ti'i 'grel pas ni /
NK051(zhi)002:1609: bdud bzhi ni theg pa 'og ma'i zhe 'dod blos btags kyi lta sgom spyod 'bras bzhi ste /
NK051(zhi)002:1610: dgra rnams 'dul ba ni theg pa'i rtsol sgrub yid smon dang bcas pa'i grub mtha' rnams so //
NK051(zhi)002:1611: de 'dul bar byed pa ni spyi ti yo ga ste /
NK051(zhi)002:1616: de bzhin 'og ma'i zhe 'dod kyi lta ba /
NK051(zhi)002:1617: bsam pa yid gzung gi sgom pa /
NK051(zhi)002:1619: re dogs kyi 'bras bu dang bzhi 'dul bar byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1620: sems can rnams kyi ngan song gsum //
NK051(zhi)002:1622: sems can ni nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1623: rnams kyi ni sdug bsngal rnams so //
NK051(zhi)002:1628: sbyong bar byed pa'i 'dzum bstan nas //
NK051(zhi)002:1632: byol song dang gsum gyi sdug bsngal sbyong ngo //
NK051(zhi)002:1633: thabs gang gis sbyong zhe na /
NK051(zhi)002:1634: stong pa dang gsal ba dang gnyis su med par rang grol bar sbyong ngo //
NK051(zhi)002:1637: ljags kyi 'od zer gyis gsungs gi sgrib pa sbyangs pa'i 'dzum bstan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1638: tshangs pa'i gsung ni snyan pa yis //
NK051(zhi)002:1640: tshangs pa'i gsung ni sgra che ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:1642: gdangs che ba ste skad cig gis stong gsum gyi stong dus gcig tu thos pa bzhin du /
NK051(zhi)002:1643: gling gzhan du yang dpag tu med par thos shing sgra sgrogs so //
NK051(zhi)002:1644: snyan pa yid ni gsung dbyangs kyi yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1645: 'jig rten gsum po kun bkang nas //
NK051(zhi)002:1650: de rnams gsung gi 'od zer gyis bkang nas chos bshad do //
NK051(zhi)002:1651: lag na rdo rje stobs po che //
NK051(zhi)002:1653: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje stobs po che
NK051(zhi)002:1654: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos dbang bskur
NK051(zhi)002:1656: yang na gdug pa can rnams tshar gcod cing gzhan zil gyis gnon pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1657: gsang dbang la ni slar gsungs pa //
NK051(zhi)002:1659: gsang ba ni bstan du med pa /
NK051(zhi)002:1660: dbang ni skye ba med pa ste /
NK051(zhi)002:1661: snying po de kho na nyid kyi don la dbang ba /
NK051(zhi)002:1662: slar gsungs pa 'khor rnams la gsungs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1663: snying rje che dang ldan gyur pas //
NK051(zhi)002:1665: snying rje chen po dang ldan pa ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal lo //
NK051(zhi)002:1666: gyur pa ni sems can thams cad bde ba la bkod pa'i don /
NK051(zhi)002:1667: khams gsum yongs su dag pa'i snying rjer gyur pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1668: 'gro la phan pa'i don du khyod //
NK051(zhi)002:1670: 'gro ba las dang nyon mongs pas gzir cing nyen pa rnams la /
NK051(zhi)002:1671: don du khyod ces pa don snying rje chen po'i
NK051(zhi)002:1672: sgo nas 'jam dpal nyid kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzod
NK051(zhi)002:1673: cig pa'o // ye shes lus can 'jam dpal gyi //
NK051(zhi)002:1675: ye shes ni mi shes pa med pa ste /
NK051(zhi)002:1676: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so //
NK051(zhi)002:1677: lus can zhes pa ni lus la bzhi ste /
NK051(zhi)002:1681: rnam par smin pa'i lus dang bzhi'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1682: yang na 'grel pa 'di'i gzhung gi lus bzhi ste /
NK051(zhi)002:1687: can ni ye shes kyi lus dang ldan te khyad par can no //
NK051(zhi)002:1689: 'jam pa ni zug rngu'i rnam rtog med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1690: dpal ni mkhyen pa'i ye shes so //
NK051(zhi)002:1691: ming brjod pa ni don che ba //
NK051(zhi)002:1700: brjod pa ni brjod du med pa'i don te /
NK051(zhi)002:1701: ngag tu bton nas 'khor rnams la brjod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1702: don che ba ni gong gi gdams pa gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:1703: dag par byed cing sdig sel ba //
NK051(zhi)002:1705: 'dis rgyud ston cing 'chang ba'i yon tan bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:1706: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi don yid la byas shing bton pas /
NK051(zhi)002:1707: dag pa ni sgrib pa rnam pa bzhi dag la /
NK051(zhi)002:1708: sdig sel ba ni mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa yang sel la /
NK051(zhi)002:1709: sgrib pa thams cad dag par byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1710: yang spyi ti yo ga'i gzhung gis /
NK051(zhi)002:1711: dag par byed pa ni dag pa'i don no //
NK051(zhi)002:1712: sdig pa sel ba ni zhe 'dod blos btags kyi chos sdig pa yin te /
NK051(zhi)002:1713: de sel bar byed pa ni byar med blo 'das kyi chos so /
NK051(zhi)002:1714: nga las nyan par brtson pa ni //
NK051(zhi)002:1716: 'khor lag na rdo rje khyod nga la nyan par byed na ni /
NK051(zhi)002:1717: dad pa dang mos pa'i sgo nas brtson 'grus skyed
NK051(zhi)002:1718: la yid gzhan du ma yengs par nyon cig ces
NK051(zhi)002:1719: pa'o // legs so dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
NK051(zhi)002:1721: dang po dad pa dang mos pa'i sgo nas zhugs nas /
NK051(zhi)002:1722: dang po go cha'i brtson 'grus kyis thos pa'i shes
NK051(zhi)002:1723: rab kyis phyi nang gi sgro 'dogs gcod pa de
NK051(zhi)002:1724: legs so dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang zhes pa ni
NK051(zhi)002:1725: / ston pa de 'khor la dgyes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1726: lag na rdo rje khyod legs so //
NK051(zhi)002:1728: bar du sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus kyis bsam pa'i shes rab kyis bsngo bgrang byed pa de legs so //
NK051(zhi)002:1729: gsang ba'i bdag po de phyir nges //
NK051(zhi)002:1731: ston pas 'khor rnams la bshad ces pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1732: khyod la legs par bstan par bya //
NK051(zhi)002:1734: khyod la ni phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams la /
NK051(zhi)002:1735: legs par zhes ni zab pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:1737: don mtshungs pa med pa ste ka dag skye ba
NK051(zhi)002:1738: med pa rang grol du bstan par bya zhes so
NK051(zhi)002:1739: // khyod ni rtse gcig yid kyi nyon //
NK051(zhi)002:1741: khyod ni 'khor phyag na rdo rje la bos pa /
NK051(zhi)002:1742: rtse gcig ni sems dang yid gzhan du ma byol ma yengs par nyon cig pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1743: bcom ldan de ni legs zhes gsol //
NK051(zhi)002:1745: bcom ldan 'das ni gong du rgyas par bshad zin to //
NK051(zhi)002:1746: legs zhes pa 'khor gyis khas blangs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1747: yang na bcom ldan 'das kyis gdams pa gsungs pa de legs so //
NK051(zhi)002:1748: de nas bcom ldan sh+aakya thub //
NK051(zhi)002:1750: rigs chen gtsug tor cher gzigs nas //
NK051(zhi)002:1751: bya ba yan chod kyis rigs drug la gzigs pa'i le'u bstan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1752: de nas zhes pa slar gsungs pa'i skabs bshad pa de nas so //
NK051(zhi)002:1753: bcom ldan 'das zhes pa rang bzhin skye ba med pa ru bcom /
NK051(zhi)002:1754: ldan zhes pa rol pa 'gag pa med par ldan /
NK051(zhi)002:1755: sh+aakya ces pa shes rab kyi kha phye ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1756: thub ces pa ka dag blo 'das kyi don thub
NK051(zhi)002:1757: cing so so'i skye bo'i rkyen khar mi gtong ba'o
NK051(zhi)002:1761: 'jig rten snang byed rigs chen dang //
NK051(zhi)002:1763: rdo rje'i rigs la gzigs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1764: phyag rgya chen po'i rigs mchog dang //
NK051(zhi)002:1766: byang sems rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1767: rigs chen gtsug tor cher gzigs nas //
NK051(zhi)002:1769: rin po che'i rigs la gzigs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1771: rigs gsum la ni rnam par gzigs yan chad du //
NK051(zhi)002:1772: gsang sngags phyi rgyud kyi theg pa gsum bstan /
NK051(zhi)002:1773: gsang sngags rigs chen thams cad dang //
NK051(zhi)002:1775: yo ga'i theg pa bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:1777: gsang ba ni chos zab pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1778: rigs chen ni rigs sngags pas /
NK051(zhi)002:1779: rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs /
NK051(zhi)002:1780: thams cad dang zhes pa ni yo ga'i lha sum cu rtsa lnga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1781: gsang sngags rig sngags 'chang ba'i rigs //
NK051(zhi)002:1783: u pa ya'i theg pa bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:1784: gsang ba ni shes skyob gnyis dang ldan pas gsang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1785: sngags ni snying rje dang shes rab tu ldan pas sngags so //
NK051(zhi)002:1786: rigs zhes pa ni rigs lnga'i lha'i rigs dkyil 'khor ro //
NK051(zhi)002:1787: 'chang zhes pa u pa yas kri ya'i spyod pa 'chang /
NK051(zhi)002:1788: yo ga'i lta ba 'chang bas zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1789: rigs zhes pa ni khro bo'i rigs so //
NK051(zhi)002:1790: rigs gsum la ni rnam par gzigs //
NK051(zhi)002:1792: kri ya'i theg pa bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:1793: rigs gsum phyag na rdo rje dang /
NK051(zhi)002:1795: spyan ras gzigs dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:1796: la ni rnam par gzigs ni /
NK051(zhi)002:1797: kri ya'i lta ba spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa /
NK051(zhi)002:1799: de rnams kyis sngags phyi pa thub pa'i rgyud gsum bstan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1800: da ni dkrugs nas ma bshad pa ni /
NK051(zhi)002:1801: phyag rgya chen po'i rigs mchog dang //
NK051(zhi)002:1803: ma h+aa yo ga'i theg pa bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:1804: phyag rgya ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
NK051(zhi)002:1806: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
NK051(zhi)002:1808: phyag rgya chen po dang bzhi'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1809: rigs mchog ces pa rang gi phung po lnga rgyal ba rigs lnga /
NK051(zhi)002:1810: khams dang skye mched lha dang lha mo'i dkyil 'khor /
NK051(zhi)002:1811: mchog ces pa rang sems lhar gyur pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1812: 'jig rten snang byed rigs chen dang //
NK051(zhi)002:1814: a nu yo ga'i theg pa bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:1815: 'jig rten zhes pa ni phyi snod kyi 'jig rten
NK051(zhi)002:1816: la sogs pa'i snang ba phyi'i yul thams cad chos
NK051(zhi)002:1817: kyi dbyings kyi snang ba ru 'dod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1818: byed ces pa ni nang nas rig pa ci skyes pa thams cad ye shes so //
NK051(zhi)002:1819: rigs chen zhes pa snying po dran pa tsam gyis rang gi sems nyid lha'i sku ru snang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1822: a ti yo ga'i theg pa bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:1823: 'jig rten zhes pa phyi snod 'jig pa la brten pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1824: nang gi sems can phung po ngan pa'i 'jig pa la brten te rgyu 'byung ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1826: 'jig rten 'og ma'i 'das pa'i rigs 'khrul snang du
NK051(zhi)002:1827: 'jig pa las 'das te chos nyid kyi snang ba'o
NK051(zhi)002:1828: // rig pa rang byung gi ye shes chen por 'dod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1830: gzugs su snang ba thams cad sku'i rigs /
NK051(zhi)002:1831: grags pa thams cad gsung gi rigs /
NK051(zhi)002:1832: dran rtog thams cad thugs kyi rigs yin pas na rigs zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1833: rigs chen gtsug tor cher gzigs nas //
NK051(zhi)002:1835: spyi ti yo ga'i theg pa bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:1836: rigs chen zhes pa ni spyi ti'i lugs kyi /
NK051(zhi)002:1838: byar med blo 'das chen po'i rigs so //
NK051(zhi)002:1839: gtsug ni theg pa rim pa dgu'i spyi'am gtsug spyi ti yo ga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1840: tor zhes pa theg pa'i blos btags kyi lta sgom rnams tor ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1841: cher gzigs nas ni zab mo'i chen po la gzigs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1842: yang na skye med ka dag chen po la gzigs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1843: de yan chad kyis rigs drug la gzigs pa 'i skabs bstan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1844: tshig gi bdag pos tshigs su bcad //
NK051(zhi)002:1846: ya te na mah yan chad kyis /
NK051(zhi)002:1847: sngags kyi sgo nas rigs bsdus dkyil 'khor la bstod pa bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:1848: tshig gi bdag po zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das sh+aakya thub pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1849: yang na kun tu bzang po'i gsang ba'i bdag po /
NK051(zhi)002:1850: tshigs su bcad pa ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi
NK051(zhi)002:1851: mtshan yang dag par bajoda pa 'di tshigs su bcad
NK051(zhi)002:1853: gsang sngags rgyal po drug ldan zhing //
NK051(zhi)002:1855: gsang sngags kyi rgyal po drug ni /
NK051(zhi)002:1856: wa gi shwa ri mum dang drug go //
NK051(zhi)002:1857: yang na spyi ti'i lugs kyis /
NK051(zhi)002:1858: gsang sngags kyi rgyal po drug ni /
NK051(zhi)002:1863: mkha' 'gro ma drug dang sum cu ste /
NK051(zhi)002:1864: man ngag drug tu shes par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1865: zab mo'i lta sgom drug ni /
NK051(zhi)002:1867: dam tshig phrin las 'bras bu dang drug go //
NK051(zhi)002:1868: gnyis su med par 'byung ba dang //
NK051(zhi)002:1870: spyi ti yo ga nas chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i don 'byung ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1871: yang na skal ba dang ldan pa rnams la zab mo'i gdams ngag lung ston pa 'byung ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1872: dang zhes pa phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pa la yang ston cig pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1873: mi skye'i chos can 'di gsungs pa //
NK051(zhi)002:1875: 'grel pa 'di'i lugs kyis spyi ti yo ga'i theg pa 'di'i ngos bzung bstan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1876: mi skye zhes pa skye med ka dag ste /
NK051(zhi)002:1877: dang po rgyu las ma skyes shing ma byung /
NK051(zhi)002:1878: bar du rkyen gyis ma bskyed /
NK051(zhi)002:1879: tha ma gnyen pos mi shigs /
NK051(zhi)002:1880: dus gsum du 'pho 'gyur med pa blos spyod yul las 'das shing grol lo //
NK051(zhi)002:1881: chos can zhes pa ni yan lag rtsal zer ngos bzung ba ste /
NK051(zhi)002:1882: snying po skye ba med pa la snang tshul tsam du 'di gsung ngo zhes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1883: da ni ka dag tshoms chen po bzhi las /
NK051(zhi)002:1884: gnas pa bzhi'i bka' tshoms bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:1885: sangs rgyas dang sems can gyi gzhi gtan la dbab pa 'di gsungs so //
NK051(zhi)002:1886: gzhi gtan la dbab pa la bye brag tu dbye na bzhi ste /
NK051(zhi)002:1887: a zhes pas sngon thog ye gnas kyi gzhi bstan to //
NK051(zhi)002:1889: i zhes pas g.yo gzhi bstan to //
NK051(zhi)002:1891: gzhi de bzhi la dpe bzhis bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:1892: ye gnas sngon thog gi gzhi'i dpe ni 'dus ma byas kyi nam mkha'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1894: khyab gzhi'i dpe ni 'o ma dang mar bzhin no //
NK051(zhi)002:1895: g.yo gzhi'i dpe ni nam langs pa'am chu zhu ba bzhin no //
NK051(zhi)002:1896: 'byung gzhi'i dpe ni rgyal po'i bang mdzod dam zhing
NK051(zhi)002:1897: sa dang nor bu rin po che lta bu'am sa
NK051(zhi)002:1898: gzhi lta bu'o // don zab don ces dang sbyar ro //
NK051(zhi)002:1899: u zhes pas rang bzhin gyi rlung bstan to //
NK051(zhi)002:1900: +au 'og mas g.yo ba'i rlung bstan to //
NK051(zhi)002:1901: e zhes pas 'byung ba'i rlung bstan to //
NK051(zhi)002:1902: ee 'og mas snying po 'od kyi gong bu bstan to //
NK051(zhi)002:1903: o zhes pas 'od zer bstan to //
NK051(zhi)002:1904: oo 'og mas rtsal dang 'od zer bstan to //
NK051(zhi)002:1905: yang na shes pa dang rig pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1906: am zhes pas shes pa skye med ka dag zhes rig pas yang dag pa'i don rig /
NK051(zhi)002:1909: snying po rtsal zer dbyer med pas ka dag skye ba med pa'i ngang du sangs rgyas so //
NK051(zhi)002:1910: ahzhesa pas sngun med pa'i klong du rtsal zer 'od gsal yan lag dwangs ma'i klong du thim pas /
NK051(zhi)002:1911: med pa las byung khyod la 'dud //
NK051(zhi)002:1912: ye shes mig gcig dri ma med //
NK051(zhi)002:1913: thig le chen po yi ge med //
NK051(zhi)002:1914: yan lag med pa'i rtsis las 'das //
NK051(zhi)002:1915: don gcig gnyis med chos kyi don //
NK051(zhi)002:1916: dper bya kun las 'das pa po //
NK051(zhi)002:1918: mchog gi dang po sku gsum 'chang //
NK051(zhi)002:1920: de ni kun tu bzang pos rtsol sgrub ma byas
NK051(zhi)002:1921: par rang gis shes nas bstan bya dang ston byed
NK051(zhi)002:1922: mtshon pa'i slob dpon med par sangs rgyas so //
NK051(zhi)002:1923: yang na a +aa la sogs pa dbyangs kyi yi
NK051(zhi)002:1924: ge bcu gnyis po 'di sangs rgyas kyi sa bcu
NK051(zhi)002:1926: a +aa zhes pas dang po rab tu dga' ba'i dang /
NK051(zhi)002:1927: gnyis pa dri ma med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1928: i +ai zhes pas gsum pa 'od 'phro ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:1931: lnga pa mngon du gyur pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:1933: e ee zhes pas bdun pa ring du song ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:1935: o oo zhes pas dgu pa legs pa'i blo gros /
NK051(zhi)002:1936: bcu pa chos kyi sprin gyi sa dang bcu'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1937: yang na a +aa la sogs pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi sa bcu gnyis dang bstun te /
NK051(zhi)002:1938: kun tu 'od kyi sa chen po //
NK051(zhi)002:1940: bdud rtsi'i sa ni gnyis pa ste //
NK051(zhi)002:1942: nam mkha'i 'od ni gsum pa ste //
NK051(zhi)002:1943: nam mkha'i bzhin du mtha' dbus med //
NK051(zhi)002:1944: rdo rje'i 'od ni bzhi pa ste //
NK051(zhi)002:1945: rdo rje lta bur rab tu grags //
NK051(zhi)002:1946: lnga pa rin chen 'od ces pa //
NK051(zhi)002:1947: rin chen lta bur dgos dgu 'byung //
NK051(zhi)002:1949: pad+ma bzhin du skyon ma gos //
NK051(zhi)002:1950: bdun pa las kyi 'od ces pa //
NK051(zhi)002:1951: sangs rgyas phrin las thams cad byed //
NK051(zhi)002:1952: brgyad pa dpe med 'od ces pa //
NK051(zhi)002:1953: de la dpe ni yod ma yin //
NK051(zhi)002:1954: dgu pa dpe ldan zhes bya ba //
NK051(zhi)002:1955: thams cad dpe yis so sor 'bigs //
NK051(zhi)002:1956: bcu pa shes rab 'od ces pa //
NK051(zhi)002:1957: sangs rgyas pa ni bla na med //
NK051(zhi)002:1958: bcu gcig thams cad mkhyen pa nyid //
NK051(zhi)002:1959: sa de nyid ni 'od gsal ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1960: bcu gnyis so sor rang rig pa //
NK051(zhi)002:1961: rnal 'byor shes rab yongs su rdzogs //
NK051(zhi)002:1962: de'i phyir na sa bcu gnyis ston to //
NK051(zhi)002:1963: a +aa la sogs pa sngags kyi 'go la phyungs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1964: s+thi to h+r+ai di ni skye med spyi ti'i yang snying /
NK051(zhi)002:1965: dz+ny+aa na ni ka dag gi ye shes /
NK051(zhi)002:1967: byar med blo 'das spyi ti yo ga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1968: ra ham zhes pa ni skye med ka dag gi gdams ngag go //
NK051(zhi)002:1969: bud+d+ho zhes pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1970: bud+d+h+aa n+aam zhes pa dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams
NK051(zhi)002:1971: cad kyi dgongs pa yang skye ba med pa zhes
NK051(zhi)002:1972: bya'o // t+r+ya d+h+wa zhes pa snying po skye ba med pa /
NK051(zhi)002:1973: bar+t+t+ai ni ka nas dag pa /
NK051(zhi)002:1974: n+aa ma zhes pa ni dngos med do //
NK051(zhi)002:1975: zhes pa ni ye shes rnam pa lnga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1976: badz+ra zhes pa skye 'jig med pa'i rdo rje /
NK051(zhi)002:1977: t+aik+sh+na ni bya btsal rtsol sgrub kyi chos thams cad 'joms pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1978: duhkhats+tshe da zhes pa shes rab kyi ral gri ste /
NK051(zhi)002:1979: phyi nang gsang ba gsum gyi spros pa yongs su gcod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1980: pradz+ny+aa zhes pa byar med blo 'das rtogs pa'i shes rab bo //
NK051(zhi)002:1981: dz+ny+aa na zhes pa ka dag chen po'i ye shes zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1982: m+aur+t+ta ye zhes pa rtogs pa'i ye shes chos sku'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1983: dz+ny+aa na ni ye gnas kyi ye shes so //
NK051(zhi)002:1985: yang na k+aa ya ni skye med ka dag dngos med zang ka'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1986: w+aa g+ai shwa ra ni gnyis med chen po ste gzhi skye ba med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:1987: a ra pa tsa n+aa ya te na mahni ngang dwangs gsal dag go //
NK051(zhi)002:1988: yang na w+aa ni snying po ma /
NK051(zhi)002:1989: gi ni yan lag ste bu /
NK051(zhi)002:1990: shwa ra ni ma bu dbyer med do //
NK051(zhi)002:1996: yang na chos 'di'i gzhung gis a ra pa tsa
NK051(zhi)002:1997: n+aa phyi nang gsang ba gsum gyi spros pa gcod
NK051(zhi)002:1998: pa'i 'khor lo yin zhes gsungs so //
NK051(zhi)002:1999: ya te na mahzhesa pa de yis skye med ka dag byar med blo 'das rtogs zhes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2000: de yan chad ni spyi ti'i gzhung ngo //
NK051(zhi)002:2001: yang rigs bsdus kyi dkyil 'khor bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:2002: s+thi to h+r+ai de spyi gtsug gam snying ga na gnas pa'i ye shes sems dapa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2003: dz+ny+aa na m+aur+t+ti ni de'i ye shes sems dapa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2004: ra ham bud+d+ho ni bdag po'am sangs rgyas so /
NK051(zhi)002:2005: bud+d+ha n+aam ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas so //
NK051(zhi)002:2006: t+r+ya d+h+wa bar+t+t+ai n+aa ma ni gzhi'i sangs rgyas gtso bo gsum brtsegs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2007: badz+ra tik+sh+na ni 'dod chags snang ba mtha' yas so //
NK051(zhi)002:2008: duhkhats+tshe da pradz+ny+aa ni zhe sdang rdo rje sems dapa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2009: dz+ny+aa na m+aur+t+ta ye ni gti mug rnam par snang mdzad do //
NK051(zhi)002:2010: dz+ny+aa na k+aa ya ni phrag dog don yod grub pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2011: w+aa g+ai shwa ra ni ngag gi dbang phyug go //
NK051(zhi)002:2012: yang na de rnams ye shes rnam pa lnga dang yang sbyar ro //
NK051(zhi)002:2014: a ra pa tsa n+aa shes rab kyi sems dpa' bcu drug gi mtshan no //
NK051(zhi)002:2015: ya te na mahgazhi tshugs cig pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2016: yang na lha mo brgyad dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2018: de rnams kyis sngags kyi sgo nas rigs bsdus kyi dkyil 'khor la bstod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2019: 'khrul pa 'phrang ni bka' tshoms bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:2022: dngos po rkyen snang gi 'khrul pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2023: med pa glo bur gyi 'khrul pa dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:2024: 'di ltar zhes pa spyi ti yo ga'i gdams ngag dngos bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:2025: 'di ka ltar ma spangs par rang grol lo //
NK051(zhi)002:2026: sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa rnam par dag pa'o /
NK051(zhi)002:2027: snang srid kyi chos thams cad 'od gsal ka dag chen por rang snang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2028: yang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes pa la 'bru lnga'am bcur bsnan te bshad na /
NK051(zhi)002:2029: nyan thos la sogs te theg pa dgu spyi ti yo ga dang bcur bshad de /
NK051(zhi)002:2030: de la nyan thos pa na re /
NK051(zhi)002:2031: 'di ltar zhes pa snang ba 'di rdul phra rab tu snang la /
NK051(zhi)002:2032: sangs pa ni rags par 'dzin pa'i dngos po sangs /
NK051(zhi)002:2033: rgyas pa ni yul sems gzung 'dzin med par rgyas la /
NK051(zhi)002:2034: bcom pa ni dgra bcom pa ste /
NK051(zhi)002:2035: nyon mongs 'dod chags dang zhe sdang bcom /
NK051(zhi)002:2036: dgra bcom pa'i don dang ldan /
NK051(zhi)002:2038: rang rgyal bas 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni /
NK051(zhi)002:2039: 'di ltar ni phyi rten cing 'brel ba bcu gnyis so //
NK051(zhi)002:2040: sangs pa ni rten 'brel lugs las bzlog ste /
NK051(zhi)002:2041: phyi'i snang ba gdos pa can du 'dzin pa sangs so //
NK051(zhi)002:2042: rgyas pa ni rnam par rig byed rgyas /
NK051(zhi)002:2043: bcom pa ni phung po'i bdud bcom /
NK051(zhi)002:2044: ldan pa ni ye shes zang ka ma bcu drug dang ldan /
NK051(zhi)002:2046: byang chub sems dpas 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni /
NK051(zhi)002:2047: 'di ltar snang ba 'di kun rdzob kyi snang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2048: sangs pa ni sgyu ma'i dpe brgyad kyis 'khrul pa'i
NK051(zhi)002:2049: snang ba sangs te snang la rang bzhin med par
NK051(zhi)002:2050: rgyas so // bcom pa ni bdud rnam pa bzhi bcom /
NK051(zhi)002:2051: ldan pa ni legs pa'i yon tan drug dang ldan /
NK051(zhi)002:2052: 'das pa ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2053: de ni mtshan nyid sde gsum du bshad pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2054: da ni kri yog sde gsum du bshad na gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:2055: kri ya'i 'di ltar snang ba ni rigs gsum du snang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2056: sangs pa ni sgrib pa dang dri ma sangs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2057: rgyas pa ni yang dag pa'i chos nyid kyi don rgyas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2058: bcom pa ni rnam par rtog pa bcom /
NK051(zhi)002:2059: ldan pa ni mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang ldan /
NK051(zhi)002:2060: 'das pa ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das /
NK051(zhi)002:2061: u pa ya ni snang ba 'di ltar 'dzin pa sangs dag pa chos nyid du rgyas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2063: skye ba med pa chos kyi sku rigs bzhi dang ldan /
NK051(zhi)002:2064: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das so //
NK051(zhi)002:2065: yo ga'i 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni /
NK051(zhi)002:2066: 'di ltar yo ga'i lha sum cu so gnyis sam lnga bcu nga gnyis so //
NK051(zhi)002:2067: sangs pa ni dngos po gdos can du 'dzin pa sangs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2068: rgyas pa ni skye 'gag med par rgyas /
NK051(zhi)002:2069: bcom pa ni nyon mongs pa bcom /
NK051(zhi)002:2070: ldan pa ni ye shes rnam pa lnga dang ldan la /
NK051(zhi)002:2071: 'das pa ni skye 'gag gnyis las 'das so //
NK051(zhi)002:2072: bskyed rdzogs rnam gsum gyi 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes pa /
NK051(zhi)002:2073: ma h+aa yo ga'i 'di ltar ni snang srid kyi
NK051(zhi)002:2074: chos thams cad lha dang lha mo'i dkyil 'khor du
NK051(zhi)002:2075: snang ngo // sangs pa ni rnam par 'khrul par 'dzin pa sangs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2076: rgyas pa ni rigs lngar rgyas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2077: bcom pa ni dug lnga bcom pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2078: ldan pa ni ye shes rnam pa lnga dang ldan /
NK051(zhi)002:2079: 'das pa ni snang stong gnyis las 'das pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2080: a nu yo ga'i 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni /
NK051(zhi)002:2081: 'di ltar snang ba thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings kyi snang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2082: sangs pa ni tha mal pa'i snang ba sangs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2083: rgyas pa ni ye shes chen por rgyas so //
NK051(zhi)002:2084: bcom pa ni phung po lngar 'dzin pa bcom /
NK051(zhi)002:2085: ldan pa ni rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dang ldan /
NK051(zhi)002:2086: 'das pa ni dbyings dang ye shes gnyis las 'das pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2087: a ti yo ga'i 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni /
NK051(zhi)002:2088: 'di ltar zhes pa chos nyid kyi snang ba rang shar ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2089: sangs pa ni ma spangs mi gnas par sangs /
NK051(zhi)002:2090: rgyas pa ni ma 'gag mi dmigs par rgyas /
NK051(zhi)002:2091: bcom pa ni snang srid dngos po'i chos thams cad rol pa 'gags pa med par bcom /
NK051(zhi)002:2092: ldan pa ni mtshan nyid gnyis su med par ldan /
NK051(zhi)002:2093: 'das pa ni blo ngo bo nyid las 'das so //
NK051(zhi)002:2094: theg pa dgu po de las khyad par 'phags pa'i
NK051(zhi)002:2095: spyi ti yo ga'i 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan
NK051(zhi)002:2096: 'das ni / 'di ltar ni chos rnal ma zang ka dang 'das pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2097: yang na 'di ltar sangs rgyas so //
NK051(zhi)002:2098: bya ba tsal rtsol sgrub sangs /
NK051(zhi)002:2099: byar med blo 'das chen por rgyas /
NK051(zhi)002:2103: de rnams theg pa rim pa dgu bshad pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2104: spyi ti'i 'grel pa ltar bshad na ni /
NK051(zhi)002:2105: 'di ltar sangs rgyas zhes pa gdams ngag bshad de //
NK051(zhi)002:2106: snying po ma dmigs skye ba med //
NK051(zhi)002:2107: rig pa myong med 'byed pa med //
NK051(zhi)002:2108: snang ba rang so dgag sgrub med //
NK051(zhi)002:2109: yid la byar med g.yo 'gul med //
NK051(zhi)002:2110: ngag la brjod med smra rgyu med //
NK051(zhi)002:2111: lus kyis byar med rtsol sgrub med //
NK051(zhi)002:2112: skye med ka dag blo las 'das //
NK051(zhi)002:2113: med drug bka' tshoms rnam gsum gyis //
NK051(zhi)002:2114: bya rtsol zhe 'dod ma byas par //
NK051(zhi)002:2115: 'di ka ltar du sangs rgyas so //
NK051(zhi)002:2116: yang na byang sems rdo rje'i sgo nas rdo rje
NK051(zhi)002:2117: dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i lha tshogs lnga bcu
NK051(zhi)002:2118: rtsa gnyis la / mtshon bya don dang mtshon byed tshig tu phye nas /
NK051(zhi)002:2119: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la bstod pa bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:2122: gzhi'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan dang dgongs pa tshig des bstan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2123: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas a las byung //
NK051(zhi)002:2125: thugs ka'i ye shes sems dpa'i mtshan bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:2126: a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:2127: don chen yi ge dam pa yin //
NK051(zhi)002:2129: thugs ka na gnas pa'i yi ge'i mtshan no //
NK051(zhi)002:2130: khong nas 'byung ba skye ba med //
NK051(zhi)002:2132: sat+wa ba ri ma ste rdo rje sems ma'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2133: don chen po ni skye ba med pa'i don /
NK051(zhi)002:2136: yin ni blo'i chos las 'das pa yin /
NK051(zhi)002:2137: snying po chos nyid ma'i khong nas so //
NK051(zhi)002:2138: 'byung gi 'od gsal zer rol pa sna tshogs so //
NK051(zhi)002:2139: skye ba ni da ci'i snying po a la thim pas /
NK051(zhi)002:2140: rig pa la skye 'gag med pas na /
NK051(zhi)002:2141: skye ba med ces bya ba yin /
NK051(zhi)002:2142: tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste //
NK051(zhi)002:2144: rat+na ba ri ma ste rin chen sems ma'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2145: brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:2147: d+harma ba ri ma ste chos kyi sems ma'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2148: tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed //
NK051(zhi)002:2150: karma ba ri ma ste las kyi sems ma'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2151: de ni nang gi lha mo'i mtshan bstan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2152: da ni rgyal ba rigs lnga'i mtshan bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:2153: mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che //
NK051(zhi)002:2154: zhes pa snang ba mtha' yas kyi mtshan bstan to //
NK051(zhi)002:2155: sems can thams cad dga' bar byed //
NK051(zhi)002:2156: ces pas phrin las kyi mdzad tshul bstan to //
NK051(zhi)002:2157: mchod pa chen po zhe sdang che //
NK051(zhi)002:2158: zhes pas sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa'i mtshan bstan to //
NK051(zhi)002:2159: mchod pa chen po gti mug che //
NK051(zhi)002:2160: zhes pas rnam par snang mdzad kyi mtshan bstan to //
NK051(zhi)002:2161: mchod pa chen po khro ba che //
NK051(zhi)002:2162: zhes pas don yod grub pa'i mtshan bstan to //
NK051(zhi)002:2163: mchod pa chen po chags pa che //
NK051(zhi)002:2164: zhes pas rin chen 'byung ldan gyi mtshan bstan to //
NK051(zhi)002:2165: de ni rigs lnga'i mtshan no //
NK051(zhi)002:2166: da ni shes rab kyi sems dpa' bcu drug gi mtshan bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:2167: 'dod pa chen po zhes pa rdo rje sems dapa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2168: bde ba che zhes pas rdo rje rgyal po'i mtshan bstan /
NK051(zhi)002:2169: dga' ba chen po zhes pas rdo rje chags pa'i mtshan bstan to //
NK051(zhi)002:2170: mgu ba che zhes pas rdo rje legs pa'i mtshan bstan /
NK051(zhi)002:2171: de ni shar gyi sems dpa' bzhi'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2173: gzugs che lus kyang che ba ste //
NK051(zhi)002:2175: kha dog che zhing lus bong che //
NK051(zhi)002:2176: ni rdo rje gzi brjid do //
NK051(zhi)002:2177: ming yang che zhing rgya che ba //
NK051(zhi)002:2178: zhes pas rdo rje rgyal mtshan no //
NK051(zhi)002:2179: dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa che //
NK051(zhi)002:2180: zhes pas rdo rje bzhad pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2182: yang dkyil 'khor la bsam gyis mi khyab kyang /
NK051(zhi)002:2184: bris pa rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor gnyis so //
NK051(zhi)002:2185: thabs kyi dkyil 'khor ni 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor bdun /
NK051(zhi)002:2186: chos nyid byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor ni /
NK051(zhi)002:2187: snying po 'pho 'gyur skye 'jig rgyu rkyen dang bral ba ni dkyil /
NK051(zhi)002:2188: rtsal zer 'od 'gags pa med pa ni 'khor /
NK051(zhi)002:2189: chen po mkha' ltar rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
NK051(zhi)002:2190: yang 'dus ma byas pa'i dkyil 'khor de byar med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2191: dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid de ltar yin no //
NK051(zhi)002:2192: yin ni nam mkha' ltar mtha' dang dbus med pas yangs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2193: nub kyi sems dpa' bzhi ni /
NK051(zhi)002:2194: shes rab mtshon chen 'chang ba ste //
NK051(zhi)002:2196: nyon mongs chen po'i lcags kyu mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:2197: ces pa rdo rje rnon po'i mtshan no //
NK051(zhi)002:2198: grags chen snyan grags chen po ste //
NK051(zhi)002:2199: zhes pa rdo rje 'khor lo'i mtshan no //
NK051(zhi)002:2200: snang ba chen po gsal ba che //
NK051(zhi)002:2201: ni rdo rje smra ba'i mtshan no //
NK051(zhi)002:2203: byang phyogs kyi sems dpa' bzhi'i mtshan ni /
NK051(zhi)002:2205: zhes pa rdo rje las so //
NK051(zhi)002:2206: sgyu 'phrul chen por don grub pa //
NK051(zhi)002:2207: zhes pa rdo rje srung ba'i mtshan no //
NK051(zhi)002:2208: sgyu 'phrul chen po dga' bas dga' //
NK051(zhi)002:2209: zhes pa rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi mtshan no //
NK051(zhi)002:2211: zhes pa rdo rje khu tshur can gyi mtshan no //
NK051(zhi)002:2212: de ni shes rab kyi sems dpa' bcu drug gi mtshan brjod cing ming bstan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2213: da ni mchod pa'i lha mo brgyad bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:2214: sbyin bdag chen po gtso bo ste //
NK051(zhi)002:2215: zhes pas lha mo sgeg mo'i mtshan no //
NK051(zhi)002:2216: tshul khrims chen po 'chang ba'i mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:2217: ces pa lha mo phreng ma'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2218: bzod chen 'chang ba brtan pa po //
NK051(zhi)002:2219: zhes pa lha mo dbyangs mkhan ma'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2220: brtson 'grus chen po brtul ba yin //
NK051(zhi)002:2221: ces pa lha mo gar mkhan ma'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2222: bsam gtan chen po'i ting 'dzin gnas //
NK051(zhi)002:2223: zhes pa lha mo me tog ma'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2224: shes rab chen po'i lus 'chang ba //
NK051(zhi)002:2225: zhes pa lha mo spos ma'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2226: stobs po che la thabs che ba //
NK051(zhi)002:2227: zhes pa lha mo dri chab ma'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2228: bsam pa'i khyad par ji bzhin du //
NK051(zhi)002:2229: zhes pa lha mo mar me ma'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2230: de ni lha mo brgyad do //
NK051(zhi)002:2231: thabs kyi sems dpa' bcu drug ni /
NK051(zhi)002:2232: shar gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bzhi ni /
NK051(zhi)002:2233: byams chen rang bzhin dpag tu med //
NK051(zhi)002:2234: ces pa byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i mtshan bstan no //
NK051(zhi)002:2235: snying rje chen po blo yi mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:2236: ces pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan no //
NK051(zhi)002:2237: shes rab chen po blo chen ldan //
NK051(zhi)002:2238: ces pa spos kyi glang po'i mtshan no //
NK051(zhi)002:2239: mkhas pa chen po thabs che ba //
NK051(zhi)002:2240: zhes pa ye shes tog gi mtshan no //
NK051(zhi)002:2241: lho'i 'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi byang chub sems dpa' bzhi ni /
NK051(zhi)002:2242: rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs dang ldan //
NK051(zhi)002:2243: ces pa byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong gi mtshan no //
NK051(zhi)002:2244: shugs chen mgyogs pa chen po ste //
NK051(zhi)002:2245: zhes pa byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyi mtshan no //
NK051(zhi)002:2246: rdzu 'phrul chen po cher grags pa //
NK051(zhi)002:2247: zhes pa blo gros mi zad pa'i mtshan no //
NK051(zhi)002:2248: stobs chen pha rol gnon pa po //
NK051(zhi)002:2249: zhes pa byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs pa'i mtshan no //
NK051(zhi)002:2250: nub kyi 'khor lo'i sems dpa' bzhi ni /
NK051(zhi)002:2251: srid pa'i ri bo chen po 'joms //
NK051(zhi)002:2252: zhes pa byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob kyi mtshan no //
NK051(zhi)002:2253: mkhregs shing rdo rje chen po 'chang //
NK051(zhi)002:2254: zhes pa byang chub sems dpa' ngan song kun 'dren no //
NK051(zhi)002:2255: drag po chen po drag shul che //
NK051(zhi)002:2256: zhes pa byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan ma lus pa nges par 'joms pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2258: zhes pa byang chub sems dpa' d+r+wa ba can gyi mtshan no //
NK051(zhi)002:2259: byang gi 'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi sems dpa' bzhi ni /
NK051(zhi)002:2260: mgon po rigs mchog chen po ste //
NK051(zhi)002:2261: zhes pa byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od gzhon nu'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2262: bla ma gsang sngags che ba'i mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:2263: ces pa byang chub sems dpa' 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2264: theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas //
NK051(zhi)002:2265: zhes pa byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi mtshan no //
NK051(zhi)002:2266: theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:2267: ces pa byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'i mtshan bstan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2268: de rnams ni thabs kyi sems dpa' bcu drug gi mtshon byed do //
NK051(zhi)002:2269: gong gi stobs po che la zhes pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2270: ye shes rgya mtsho zhes pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2271: 'og nas byung ba'i rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa
NK051(zhi)002:2272: che zhes pas rtsibs bzhi mtshon byed sgo ba bzhi'o
NK051(zhi)002:2273: // dug gsum gnas gyur pa las gtso bo sum brtsegs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2274: de rnams kyis rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po la /
NK051(zhi)002:2275: lha tshogs lnga bcu rtsa gcig gi sgo nas bstan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2276: lha tshogs su bstan pa de rnams 'grel pa 'dir dgos pa med do zhe na /
NK051(zhi)002:2277: gu ru'i zhal nas ma 'dres la yongs su gsal bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2278: chos kun dang mthun la kun las khyad par 'phags pa'i phyir dgos pa yod gsung ngo //
NK051(zhi)002:2279: da ni spyi ti yo ga las 'khrul pa 'phrang gi bka' tshoms su bshad cing 'bru gnyer ro //
NK051(zhi)002:2281: zhes pa 'di ka ltar bsgrub mi dgos pas chos nyid gsal dwangs chen por ro //
NK051(zhi)002:2282: sangs ni nyon mongs pa thams cad dus gcig tu sangs te /
NK051(zhi)002:2283: de la bya btsal dang zhe 'dod rtsol sgrub mi dgos pas /
NK051(zhi)002:2284: rang gi de nyid skye med ka dag tu rtogs pas na rgyas zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2285: bcom ldan 'das ni gong du rgyas par bshad zin to //
NK051(zhi)002:2286: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas a las 'byung //
NK051(zhi)002:2287: zhes pa 'di la tshig tu brjod pa dum bur bcad dgos te /
NK051(zhi)002:2288: rdzogs pa ni ma 'dres pa la yongs su rdzogs pa /
NK051(zhi)002:2289: ma spangs la mi gnas par sangs /
NK051(zhi)002:2290: rtsol sgrub dang bya rtsol ma byas par kun tu bzang po yar sangs rgyas so //
NK051(zhi)002:2291: a ni gong ma ltar bya btsal rtsol sgrub ma byas par sangs rgyas pa yin la /
NK051(zhi)002:2292: nga bdag ma rig pa'i dbang gis gong ltar ma rtogs pas 'khrul te /
NK051(zhi)002:2297: blo byed pa po 'khrul pa'i 'bras bu yin /
NK051(zhi)002:2298: ma rig pa dang bag chags rnams kyis chos nyid de mthong du mi ster ba yin no //
NK051(zhi)002:2299: pa zhes pa 'khrul pa'i dpe bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:2300: dung la ser po mthong ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2301: zla ba gnyis su mthong ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2302: nam mkha' la me tog mthong ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2303: smig rgyu chu ru mthong ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2304: smig sgyu'am srin gyi kha chu dang 'dra bar 'khrul lo //
NK051(zhi)002:2307: zhes pas a skye med ye shes cang med yin pa la /
NK051(zhi)002:2308: ci yang med pa la ci zhig rlung g.yo mi g.yo las bag tsam du g.yos te /
NK051(zhi)002:2310: rlung rang sa ma zin pas shes pa'i rnam pa
NK051(zhi)002:2311: phya sangs khyer te rtsal wal po cig byung ste
NK051(zhi)002:2312: / de skad shes pa phya sangs khyer /
NK051(zhi)002:2313: rig pa 'og rlung langs pas 'khrul pa'i rgyu byas /
NK051(zhi)002:2314: skye med ka dag ni ma rig /
NK051(zhi)002:2315: dngos med 'od gsal gyi don ni ma rtogs nas ma rig pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2316: yang dag pa'i don snying po skye ba med pa ma rig pas yid /
NK051(zhi)002:2317: 'khor lo gsum gyis mun pa'i 'khor sgor 'khyams /
NK051(zhi)002:2318: 'gro drug gi sdug bsngal nyams su myong zhing 'khor ba'i dngos por rig pas na rig pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2322: rig pa dang ma rig pa /
NK051(zhi)002:2324: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa /
NK051(zhi)002:2325: phyi dang nang dang snod bcud rnams /
NK051(zhi)002:2326: rtogs pa dang ma rtogs pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2327: bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2328: nga bdag phyogs ris dgra gnyen thams cad ni sems ngo ma shes shing 'khrul pa las byung ngo //
NK051(zhi)002:2329: rgyal po'i bang mdzod dam zhing sa lta bu /
NK051(zhi)002:2330: las thams cad de las byung bas na a las byung ste zhes gsungs so //
NK051(zhi)002:2331: a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:2332: ces pa a ni yi ge thams cad kyi mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:2333: yang na med la kun 'byung thim pa'am /
NK051(zhi)002:2334: stong nyid las byung ngang 'das te de nyid du grol ba'am /
NK051(zhi)002:2335: nam mkha' las byung 'byung sar thim pa' gdams ngag 'di'i gnad kyis /
NK051(zhi)002:2336: chu la chu bur rdol ba'am /
NK051(zhi)002:2338: yur chus rgya mtshor slebs pa bzhin du /
NK051(zhi)002:2339: gzhi stong pa dang dngos med las rtogs pa sna tshogs su shar yang /
NK051(zhi)002:2340: de nyid la rang du thim nas /
NK051(zhi)002:2342: tha ma yang a ru thim zhes skye med dngos med du grol bas na /
NK051(zhi)002:2343: a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:2345: 'khrul pa'i rgyu rig pa log ste /
NK051(zhi)002:2346: rnam pa ci yang mi 'byed gti mug chen po ste /
NK051(zhi)002:2347: 'byed pa med pa'i gti mug chos kyi sku zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2348: yang na yi ge thams cad kyi mchog ni a yin pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2350: sna tshogs gzugs can yid las skyes //
NK051(zhi)002:2352: 'khrul pa'i dus dran pa yin te /
NK051(zhi)002:2353: rnam rig sna tshogs gzugs don can //
NK051(zhi)002:2357: stong pa nyid dga' 'dod chags blo //
NK051(zhi)002:2359: de rnams kyis ni brgyud pa rim 'khrul gyi 'khrul pa /
NK051(zhi)002:2361: zla ba gnyis su snang ba ltar ram /
NK051(zhi)002:2362: smig rgyu la chu ru 'khrul pa lta bur 'khrul lo //
NK051(zhi)002:2363: don chen yi ge dam pa yin //
NK051(zhi)002:2365: don chen po ni skye ba med pa'i don /
NK051(zhi)002:2368: yin zhes pa blo'i chos las 'das pa yin no //
NK051(zhi)002:2369: khong nas 'byung ba skye ba med //
NK051(zhi)002:2371: khong nas byung ni snying po chos nyid ma'i khong nas so //
NK051(zhi)002:2372: 'byung ba ni 'od gsal rtsal zer rol pa sna tshogs so //
NK051(zhi)002:2373: skye med ces pa yan lag rtsal zer rol pa
NK051(zhi)002:2374: gzhan du ma zhugs shing ma chags pas slar snying
NK051(zhi)002:2375: po ma la thim pas na /
NK051(zhi)002:2377: rig pa la skye rgyu dang myong med de sangs nas /
NK051(zhi)002:2379: tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste //
NK051(zhi)002:2381: skye med ka dag la tshig tu brjod pa med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2382: spangs pa ni tha snyad rtog pa'i tshig gi tshogs rnams spangs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2383: brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:2385: don mtshon cing brjod du med pa'i mchog tu gyur pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2386: tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed //
NK051(zhi)002:2388: tshig kun ni tshig tshogs thams cad do //
NK051(zhi)002:2389: yang dag pa'i don la brjod du med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2390: gsal bar byed ni don thams cad khong nas gsal bar byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2391: mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2395: mchod pa chen po khro ba che //
NK051(zhi)002:2396: zhes pa rnam pa lnga ni /
NK051(zhi)002:2397: de ni dug lnga ma spangs la gnas su dag
NK051(zhi)002:2398: cing rang grol pas na ye don gyi sangs rgyas
NK051(zhi)002:2399: yin te / ma bcos ma bslad ma bsgyur ma skyes ma bsgrubs te /
NK051(zhi)002:2400: ye don gyi sangs rgyas rnam pa lnga ni /
NK051(zhi)002:2401: lam ma nor ba'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ste /
NK051(zhi)002:2402: 'dod chags ma spangs gnas su dag pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2403: zhe sdang rang grol ba'i sangs rgyas dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2404: gti mug rang sangs 'od gsal 'byed pa med pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2405: ser snas ma bcings ma grol ba'i sangs rgyas dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2406: phrag dog ma bsgyur gnas su dag pa'i sangs rgyas rnam pa lnga ste /
NK051(zhi)002:2407: ye dag ye grol ye sangs ye 'das kyi sangs rgyas dang lnga zhes bya ste /
NK051(zhi)002:2408: de ni sems can thams cad la gnas pas /
NK051(zhi)002:2409: de rnams kyi don rtogs na 'gro ba kun kyang
NK051(zhi)002:2410: ma spangs la gnas su dag pa'i sangs rgyas zhes
NK051(zhi)002:2412: mchog gi dang po sku gsum 'chang //
NK051(zhi)002:2413: sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can //
NK051(zhi)002:2415: sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la gnas pa'i dug
NK051(zhi)002:2416: gsum dang dug lnga ngang 'das rang grol ma spangs
NK051(zhi)002:2418: lam ma nor ba gsum lam lnga ste /
NK051(zhi)002:2419: yang dag nges pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lam lnga yin no //
NK051(zhi)002:2421: med pa glo bur gyi 'khrul pa ste /
NK051(zhi)002:2422: gzhi la 'khrul pa med kyang rnam par rtog pa'i blos bzung bas /
NK051(zhi)002:2424: skye ba rtsal la sogs pa nyon mongs brgyad khri
NK051(zhi)002:2425: bzhi stong thams cad med pa la yod par 'dzin
NK051(zhi)002:2426: / mi rtag pa la rtag par 'dzin /
NK051(zhi)002:2428: kun rdzob la don dam du bzung bas na /
NK051(zhi)002:2429: sems can thams cad thag pa la sbrul du 'khrul pa bzhin du 'khrul lo //
NK051(zhi)002:2430: dper na rmi lam nor rdzas bzhin //
NK051(zhi)002:2431: med bzhin snang ba bden par bzung //
NK051(zhi)002:2432: med la yod bzung rgyu nyid kyis //
NK051(zhi)002:2433: rmi lam tshul du sdug bsngal myong //
NK051(zhi)002:2435: de rnams ni med pa glo bur gyi 'khrul pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2436: da ni yi ge'i 'bru bshad de /
NK051(zhi)002:2437: mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che //
NK051(zhi)002:2439: mchod pa chen po zhes pa theg pa'i rim pa
NK051(zhi)002:2440: dgu la mchod pa 'bul lugs mi 'dra ba dgu
NK051(zhi)002:2441: yod de / de rang sa bshad pas mi langs
NK051(zhi)002:2442: pas rang rang gi dkyus na zhib par yod do
NK051(zhi)002:2443: yod de / // theg pa dgu'i rtse spyi ti'i rtse rgyal /
NK051(zhi)002:2444: mchod bstod 'o dod mkhan gyi phyags shing /
NK051(zhi)002:2445: dbyangs mkhan rdzas mchod sangs rgyas lto bo che /
NK051(zhi)002:2446: yid smon rtsol sgrub mkhan gyi phus 'debs /
NK051(zhi)002:2447: rtsol zhing sgrub mi dgos par khyad par 'phags pa'i mchod pa chen po 'di gsungs so //
NK051(zhi)002:2448: mchod pa zhes pa snang srid 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad gzung 'dzin chags sdang med par /
NK051(zhi)002:2449: dngos po rtag chad yod med ril po ma lus lus pa med pa mchod par 'bul lo //
NK051(zhi)002:2450: chen po ni yid dam dran rig myong tshor med par gsal dag yin pas na chen po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2452: 'dod pa ni skye med kyi don /
NK051(zhi)002:2454: che ba ni gzhan gyi 'gran zla med pas na che ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2455: de gnyis ka 'dod pa dang chags pa'i blo las yongs su grol zhing 'das so //
NK051(zhi)002:2456: sems can thams cad dga' bar byed //
NK051(zhi)002:2458: mchod pa 'bul mkhan gyi gang zag /
NK051(zhi)002:2460: da lta 'bul ba'i lha'am sangs rgyas don dam pa la mi dmigs pas /
NK051(zhi)002:2461: khams gsum yongs su dag pa'am ma spangs gnas su
NK051(zhi)002:2462: dag cing 'dzin pa thams cad yongs su grol bas
NK051(zhi)002:2463: na / sems can thams cad dga' bar byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2464: mchod pa chen po zhe sdang che //
NK051(zhi)002:2466: mchod pa ni yul dang yul can du ma dmigs te /
NK051(zhi)002:2467: ma phul yongs la khyab pa'i mchod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2468: zhe sdang ni lta ba log cing grub mtha' ngan pa la zhe sdang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2469: che ba ni spyi ti ste 'gran zla med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2470: nyon mongs kun gyi dgra che ba //
NK051(zhi)002:2473: de'i dgra ni bla ma dam pa'i gdams pa rtogs pa khong du chud pas /
NK051(zhi)002:2474: de yis nyon mongs pa'i dgra thams cad 'joms pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2475: mchod pa chen po gti mug che //
NK051(zhi)002:2477: mchod pa sna tshogs pa ni snang srid thams cad ma chags shing mi gnas te /
NK051(zhi)002:2478: bya btsal rtsol sgrub las 'das pa'i mchod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2479: chen po ni dbye bsal med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2480: gti mug ni gang la'ang 'byed pa med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2481: che ba ni snying po chos kyi sku'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2482: gti mug blo ste gti mug sel //
NK051(zhi)002:2484: chos thams cad la rnam pa cir yang mi 'byed pa'i gti mug ste /
NK051(zhi)002:2485: blo de ni gting gsal ngang dag go //
NK051(zhi)002:2486: rang byung 'od gsal chen po des //
NK051(zhi)002:2487: ma rig pas ma shes shing mun pa'i smag rum du chud pa rnams kyi gti mug dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2488: sems can ma rtogs pa rnams kyi ma rig pa sel ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2489: mchod pa chen po khro ba che //
NK051(zhi)002:2491: mchod pa ni ma phul bar kun la khyab pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2492: chen po ni 'dzin chags med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2493: khro ba ni tha mal pa'i zhe sdang can la khro ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2494: che ba ni spyi ti yo ga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2495: mchod pa chen po chags pa che //
NK051(zhi)002:2497: mchod pa ni sna tshogs blos thongs pa'i mchod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2498: chags pa ni 'od gsal chen po'i bde ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2499: che zhes pa ye shes chen po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2500: chags pa thams cad sel bar byed //
NK051(zhi)002:2502: chags pa ni 'khor ba la chags pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2503: de sel bar byed pa ni skye med ka dag gi gdams ngag go //
NK051(zhi)002:2504: 'dod pa chen po bde ba che //
NK051(zhi)002:2506: 'dod pa ni yang dag pa'i don /
NK051(zhi)002:2507: chen po ni skye med ka dag /
NK051(zhi)002:2508: bde ba chen po ni 'od gsal ngang 'das so //
NK051(zhi)002:2509: dga' ba chen po mgu ba che //
NK051(zhi)002:2511: dga' ba ni skye med ka dag de rtogs pas dga' ba'i //
NK051(zhi)002:2512: mgu ba ni byar med blo 'das rtogs pa la mgu ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2513: gzugs che lus kyang che ba ste //
NK051(zhi)002:2515: skye med ka dag de gzugs che ste /
NK051(zhi)002:2516: blos spyod yul du ma gyur pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2517: ming med blo 'das de ni mig la sogs pa'i
NK051(zhi)002:2518: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad kyi yul du ma
NK051(zhi)002:2520: rin po che snang byed las kyang /
NK051(zhi)002:2521: rnam sems yul du ma gyur la dmigs dang bral ces gsungs so //
NK051(zhi)002:2524: kha dog che zhing lus bong che //
NK051(zhi)002:2526: kha dog ni 'od kha dog rnam pa lnga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2528: lus bong che zhes pa 'od kyi gzi brjid kun
NK051(zhi)002:2529: tu 'phro zhing slar 'od kyi nang du thim ste
NK051(zhi)002:2531: ming yang che zhing rgya che ba /
NK051(zhi)002:2533: ming che ba ni mtshon du mi btub pa ste brjod pa las 'das pa /
NK051(zhi)002:2534: yang che zhes pa snying po skye ba med pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2535: thabs rgya che ba'i 'jam dpal lo //
NK051(zhi)002:2536: dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa yin //
NK051(zhi)002:2538: dkyil 'khor la bsam gyis mi khyab kyang /
NK051(zhi)002:2539: rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2540: thabs rgya che ba dang bris pa rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor dang gnyis so //
NK051(zhi)002:2543: chos nyid byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor ni /
NK051(zhi)002:2544: snying po 'pho 'gyur dang skye 'jig rgyu rkyen dang bral ba ni dkyil /
NK051(zhi)002:2545: rtsal zer 'od gsal 'gag pa med pa ni 'khor ro //
NK051(zhi)002:2546: chen po ni mkha' ste rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
NK051(zhi)002:2547: yangs pa ni 'dus ma byas kyi dkyil 'khor te byar med blo 'das so //
NK051(zhi)002:2548: yin ni dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid de ltar yin pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2549: yang na nam mkha' ltar mtha' dbus med pas yangs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2550: shes rab mtshon chen 'chang ba ste //
NK051(zhi)002:2552: shes rab ni chos thams cad kyi de nyid shes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2553: mtshon chen ni shes rab kyis mtshon gyis nyon mongs pa thams cad dus gcig tu gcod pas na //
NK051(zhi)002:2555: nyon mongs lcags kyu che ba'i mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:2558: lcags kyu ni nyon mongs 'khor ba'i 'dam na gnas pa rnams thugs rje'i lcags kyus 'dren pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2559: che ba'i mchog ni de'i gong na lcags kyu gzhan med pas na che ba'i mchog go //
NK051(zhi)002:2560: grags chen snyan grags chen po ste //
NK051(zhi)002:2562: grags chen ni theg pa thams cad las rgyud 'di grags so //
NK051(zhi)002:2563: snyan grags chen po ni spyi ti yo ga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2564: snang ba chen po gsal ba che //
NK051(zhi)002:2566: snang ba ni rang snang ste /
NK051(zhi)002:2567: de rang sar grol bas gsal ba che'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2568: yang na snang ba ni rdzogs pa chen po'i snang ba ste /
NK051(zhi)002:2570: gsal ba ni sgo lnga yul lnga la ma zhugs shing ma zhen /
NK051(zhi)002:2571: yid gnyis phyi nang gzung 'dzin med na /
NK051(zhi)002:2572: ye shes zang thal chen po ste gsal dang 'od gsal chen po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2576: sngon byung gi mkhas pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2578: gdung 'tshob kyi mkhas pa dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:2579: de gsum gyi gdung 'tshob pa pad+ma 'byung gnas yin te /
NK051(zhi)002:2580: spyi ti gu ru pad+mas gsang sngags kyi don chos
NK051(zhi)002:2581: bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med pa mkhyen cing
NK051(zhi)002:2582: / sgom sgrub rnam gsum la mkhas par grags /
NK051(zhi)002:2583: de'i nang nas gsang ba sgyu 'phrul brgya brgyad cu rtsa gnyis pa la sogs te /
NK051(zhi)002:2584: sgyu 'phrul gyi chos chen po ma lus pa thams cad pad+mas 'chang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2585: sgyu 'phrul chen po don grub pa //
NK051(zhi)002:2587: sgyu 'phrul gyi don bsnyen sgrub rnam pa gsum po
NK051(zhi)002:2588: de slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis bsgrubs pas tshe
NK051(zhi)002:2590: phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2591: rig 'dzin brgyad la sogs te lhun gyis grub pa'i rig 'dzin chen po'i don grub pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2592: sgyu 'phrul chen po dga' bas dga' //
NK051(zhi)002:2596: d+r+wa ba thabs dang shes rab tu 'brel ba /
NK051(zhi)002:2597: cho ga'i yan lag lnga gsum bco lnga bsnyen sgrub rnam pa bzhi dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2599: ta na ga na gnyis kyi sgo nas thabs dang
NK051(zhi)002:2600: shes rab gnyis su med pa'i don grub pas phyag
NK051(zhi)002:2601: rgya chen po'i dngos grub grub pas /
NK051(zhi)002:2602: de la dga' bas dga' zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2603: yang na spyi ti'i lugs kyis /
NK051(zhi)002:2606: chen po ni ma bu dbyer med do //
NK051(zhi)002:2608: snying po dang yan lag 'phrad pas snying po klong nas shar bas dga' bas daga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2613: chen po ni gdams ngag ste /
NK051(zhi)002:2614: 'khor 'das gnyis su med par rtogs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2615: mig 'phrul can ces pa sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos
NK051(zhi)002:2616: rgyal po'i spyan sngar sgyu ma'i mig 'phrul sna tshogs
NK051(zhi)002:2617: pa sprul ste / kho'i bu mo rgyal po la bcol nas /
NK051(zhi)002:2618: sum cu rtsa gsum lha dang lha ma yin gyi
NK051(zhi)002:2619: yul na 'khrug pa 'thab pas bdag gis de'i gan
NK051(zhi)002:2621: bdag gi bu mo 'di gar yang ma btang zhig byas nas phyin pa ltar ro //
NK051(zhi)002:2622: der cung zhig lon tsa na /
NK051(zhi)002:2624: de nas nam mkha' nas go rnams lhung nas byung /
NK051(zhi)002:2625: de nas sgyu ma mkhan rang gi mgo bo bcad nas byung /
NK051(zhi)002:2628: der rgyal pos ro de bsregs pas /
NK051(zhi)002:2629: kho'i bu mo yang me la mchongs te tshig go //
NK051(zhi)002:2630: der ro bsregs zin pa tsam na sgyu ma mkhan
NK051(zhi)002:2631: byung ste da bdag gi bu mo bcol ba de
NK051(zhi)002:2633: der gong gi lo rgyus brjod cing bden par bzung
NK051(zhi)002:2634: yang sgyu ma mkhan rang yin pa dang bden pa'i
NK051(zhi)002:2636: mig 'phrul yin la rdzun nam bslu brid yin no //
NK051(zhi)002:2637: dpe de bzhin du 'khrul snang 'khor ba'i chos rnams ni mi bden rdzun pa yin te /
NK051(zhi)002:2638: mig 'phrul lam 'khrul pa rdzun par rig par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2639: mig 'phrul ni rta bong bur btang ba'am /
NK051(zhi)002:2641: mig tu bcug nas khar 'ong ba'am /
NK051(zhi)002:2642: khar bcug pas mig tu 'ongs pa lta bu'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2643: sbyin bdag chen po gtso bo ste //
NK051(zhi)002:2645: sbyin bdag chen po ni rgyal po shu lo gar
NK051(zhi)002:2646: pas yan lag gi dang po mgo bo sbyin par
NK051(zhi)002:2648: gtso bo de ni snang srid yongs su grol te sbyin pa'i gtso bo'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2649: tshul khrims chen po 'chang ba'i mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:2652: dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2653: sems can don byed pa'i tshul khrims dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2654: bslab pa'i tshul khrims dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:2655: chen po zhes pa skye med ka dag gi tshul khrims chen po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2656: 'chang ba ni skal ldan gyis byar med blo 'das su 'chang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2657: bzod chen 'chang ba brtan pa po //
NK051(zhi)002:2659: bzod pa ni khro ba dang yul ngan pa rnams la bzod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2660: chen po ni zhe sdang rang grol te rgol ba ngan pa tshar gcod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2661: brtan pa ni skye med ka dag gi don brtan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2662: brtson 'grus chen po brtul ba yin //
NK051(zhi)002:2664: brtson 'grus chen po ni yang dag pa'i don la brtson pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2665: brtul ba ni nyon mongs pa'i rtog pa thams cad brtul ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2666: bsam gtan chen po'i ting 'dzin gnas //
NK051(zhi)002:2668: bsam gtan ni mi dmigs pa'i bsam gtan rtog med chen po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2669: ting 'dzin gnas zhes bya ba rtsol ba med pa'i dgongs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2670: shes rab chen po'i lus 'chang ba //
NK051(zhi)002:2672: shes rab chen po ni gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:2673: thos pa dang bsam pa dang sgom pa dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:2674: lus ni ye shes kyi lus 'chang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2675: stobs po che la thabs che ba //
NK051(zhi)002:2677: snang srid thams cad dus gcig sangs rgyas par mkhyen pa de bzhin du stobs che ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2678: thabs che ba ni rgyu sems can la 'bras bu sangs rgyas par mkhyen pa de thabs che ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2679: thabs kyi rgyal po byar med blo yi ngang la gnas //
NK051(zhi)002:2681: smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho ste //
NK051(zhi)002:2683: smon lam gyi bsam du med cing blo byed pa po stor ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2684: ye shes ni ka dag gi ye shes so //
NK051(zhi)002:2691: byams chen rang bzhin dpag tu med //
NK051(zhi)002:2693: byams chen ni bu gcig pa'i ma bzhin du sems
NK051(zhi)002:2694: can thams cad phyogs ris med pa'i byams pa kun
NK051(zhi)002:2695: la khyab pa'o // rang bzhin ni skye med /
NK051(zhi)002:2696: dpag tu med ces pa blo 'das de la yon tan dpag tu med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2697: snying rje chen po blo yi mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:2700: phyogs ris med pa'i snying rje /
NK051(zhi)002:2701: kun la khyab pa'i snying rje /
NK051(zhi)002:2702: cir mi 'byed kyi snying rje dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:2703: blo yi chos las grol bas blo yi mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:2705: shes rab chen po blo chen ldan //
NK051(zhi)002:2707: shes rab ni dbye ba med pa'i shes rab bo //
NK051(zhi)002:2708: blo chen ldan ces pa ni blo chen po 'di dang ldan na spyi ti'i gdams ngag shong pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2709: ldan pa ni gdams ngag dang ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2710: mkhas pa chen po thabs che ba //
NK051(zhi)002:2712: mkhas pa chen po ni gsang bdag chen po ste /
NK051(zhi)002:2713: skye med ka dag la mkhas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2714: chen po ni gzhan las khyad par 'phags pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2715: thabs che ba zhes pa thabs kyi rgyal po bya btsal rtsol sgrub dang bral ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2716: rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs dang ldan //
NK051(zhi)002:2718: rdzu 'phrul ni thabs ci dang cis 'dul ba'i rdzu 'phrul mnga' ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2719: stobs dang ldan pa ni lta ba zab mo rtogs pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2720: shugs chen mgyogs pa chen po ste //
NK051(zhi)002:2722: shugs ni rang bzhin gyi shugs /
NK051(zhi)002:2723: chen po ni don rtogs pa /
NK051(zhi)002:2724: mgyogs pa ni rang bzhin gyi don spyod pa la mgyogs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2725: chen po ni spyi ti yo ga'i rnal 'byor ro //
NK051(zhi)002:2726: rdzu 'phrul chen por cher grags pa //
NK051(zhi)002:2729: stod nas me 'bar ba'i rdzu 'phrul sogs 'khor ma dad pa dad par bya ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2730: dad pa smin par byed pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2731: smin pa grol bar byed pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2732: chen po ni spyi ti yo ga'i don rtogs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2733: cher grags pa ni 'jam dpal ni theg pa kun la cher grags pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2734: stobs chen pha rol gnon pa po //
NK051(zhi)002:2736: spyi ti yo ga rtogs pa'i stobs kyis /
NK051(zhi)002:2737: spyi ti yo ga man chod nyan thos yan chad kyi theg pa zil gyis gnon pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2738: srid pa'i ri bo chen po 'joms //
NK051(zhi)002:2740: srid pa zhes pa sems can thams cad du srid pa /
NK051(zhi)002:2741: ri bo zhes nga rgyal gyi ri bo /
NK051(zhi)002:2742: chen po ni nyon mongs pa thams cad de /
NK051(zhi)002:2743: thams cad 'joms pa ni skye med ka dag gi gdams ngag go //
NK051(zhi)002:2744: mkhregs shing rdo rje chen po 'chang //
NK051(zhi)002:2746: mkhregs pa ni skye ba med pa'i don de mkhregs shing /
NK051(zhi)002:2747: rdo rje zhes pa rdo rje lta bu dus gsum du 'pho 'gyur med par gnas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2748: chen po ni de'i gong na gzhan med pas chen po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2749: 'chang zhes pa ni de rnal 'byor pas 'chang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2750: drag po chen po drag shul che //
NK051(zhi)002:2752: drag po ni khro bo chen po /
NK051(zhi)002:2753: drag shul che ba ni skye med ka dag byar med blo 'das so //
NK051(zhi)002:2756: 'jigs chen ni khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed do //
NK051(zhi)002:2757: yang na 'jigs chen ni nyon mongs pa rnam pa lnga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2758: 'jigs par byed pa po ni ye shes lnga'am chos sku longs sku sprul sku la sogs pa'i sku'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2759: mgon po rigs mchog chen po ste //
NK051(zhi)002:2761: mgon po ni bcom ldan 'das te /
NK051(zhi)002:2762: sems can rnams kyi mgon dang skyabs mdzad pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2763: rigs mchog chen po ni skye med snying po chig chod la bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2764: bla ma gsang sngags che ba'i mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:2766: bla ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas /
NK051(zhi)002:2767: ma ni de skyed par byed pa'i rgyu'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2768: yang na bla ma ni sems can nyon mongs pas
NK051(zhi)002:2769: mnar zhing 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'khyams shing chud pa
NK051(zhi)002:2770: rnams la thugs rjes skyob pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2771: gsang ba ni blo yi yul du ma gyur pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2772: sngags ni yang dag pa'i don la sngags so //
NK051(zhi)002:2773: che ba ni spyi ti yo ga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2774: mchog ni gong na med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2775: theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas //
NK051(zhi)002:2777: theg pa ni gsang sngags kyi theg pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2778: tshul la gnas pa ni theg pa brgyad do //
NK051(zhi)002:2779: yang na theg pa la rnam pa bzhi /
NK051(zhi)002:2780: theg pa'i ngo bo dang gcig /
NK051(zhi)002:2781: theg pa'i dbye ba dang gnyis /
NK051(zhi)002:2782: theg pa'i nges tshig dang gsum /
NK051(zhi)002:2783: theg pa'i rnam grangs dang bzhi'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2785: dbye ba ni theg pa dagu'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2786: nges tshig ni 'gro ba theg pa 'dir 'gro bas na theg pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2787: 'degs pa dang theg pa byed pas na theg pa'i nges tshig /
NK051(zhi)002:2788: theg pa'i khyad par ni shes rab dang snying rje ste /
NK051(zhi)002:2789: shes rab dang snying rje che na theg pa chen po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2790: snying rje shes rab chung na theg pa chung ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2791: theg pa'i rnam grangs ni brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo //
NK051(zhi)002:2792: theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:2794: theg pa chen po ni bskyed rdzogs rnam gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:2795: tshul ni kri yog sde gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:2796: gyi ni mtshan nyid sde gsum ste theg pa dgur phye ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2797: mchog ni rdzogs chen spyi ti yo ga'i theg pa
NK051(zhi)002:2798: de yan chod kyis 'grel pa 'di'i lugs kyis 'khrul
NK051(zhi)002:2799: pa 'phrang gi bka' tshoms kyi skabs bstan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2800: gong du smras pa ni lha tshogs kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2801: ma 'dres pa la yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i
NK051(zhi)002:2802: phyir bshad pa las zlos pa ni ma yin no
NK051(zhi)002:2803: // rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor la chos
NK051(zhi)002:2804: kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi sgo nas bstod pa
NK051(zhi)002:2805: // dang / skabs 'dis kyang tshig 'dres mar yod kyang 'khrul pa gzhi cher bstan to //
NK051(zhi)002:2806: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che //
NK051(zhi)002:2808: 'di la 'bru lnga'am bcu tham par bshad do //
NK051(zhi)002:2810: mtshan nyid sde gsum du bshad pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2811: kri yog sde gsum du bshad pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2812: bskyed rdzogs gnyis su bshad pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2813: rdzogs chen ltar bshad pa dang bzhi /
NK051(zhi)002:2814: spyi ti'i rnam par snang mdzad du bshad pa dang lnga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2815: de la mtshan nyid sde gsum gyi sangs rgyas ni bcom ldan 'das yin no //
NK051(zhi)002:2816: kri yog sde gsum gyi sangs rgyas ni dpal rnam par snang mdzad do //
NK051(zhi)002:2817: bskyed rdzogs gnyis kyi sangs rgyas ni dpal rdo rje sems dapa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2818: rdzogs pa chen po'i sangs rgyas ni dpal kun tu bzang po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2819: de rnams las spyi ti'i sangs rgyas ni sngon thog gi spyi phud kyi sangs rgyas so //
NK051(zhi)002:2821: blos btags mos pa'i chos dang rtsol sgrub sangs /
NK051(zhi)002:2822: blo 'das byar med chen por rgyas /
NK051(zhi)002:2823: rnam pa ni yul gyi rnam pa /
NK051(zhi)002:2824: snang mdzad ni ngang 'das gsal dag rang grol te /
NK051(zhi)002:2825: chos nyid zang thal gsal dag chen po'i snang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2826: mdzad pa ni don dam pa des sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2827: che ba ni rnam pa lnga ste /
NK051(zhi)002:2828: rten med kyi lta ba che ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2829: rtog med kyi sgom pa che ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2830: zhen med kyi spyod pa che ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2831: 'da' med kyi dam tshig che ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2832: re med rang gnas sku gsum lhun grub kyi 'bras bu che ba dang lnga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2837: rnam pa ni chos yul chos nyid rnam pa /
NK051(zhi)002:2838: snang ba ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams rnam par dag pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2839: mdzad pa ni skal ldan gyi don mdzad pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2840: che ba ni rnam pa lnga ste /
NK051(zhi)002:2841: bdag nyid chen por sangs rgyas pa'i che ba la sogs pa lnga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2842: a nu yo ga ltar bshad na /
NK051(zhi)002:2843: phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams sangs /
NK051(zhi)002:2844: ma bskyed yongs su rdzogs te /
NK051(zhi)002:2845: rigs lnga bde bar gshegs par sangs rgyas /
NK051(zhi)002:2846: rnam pa ni phyi'i yul sna tshogs kyi rnam pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2847: snang ba ni yul de snang ba rang bzhin med de dbyings kyi snang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2848: mdzad pa ni nang nas rig pa ci skyes pa ye shes te /
NK051(zhi)002:2849: dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa /
NK051(zhi)002:2851: sa chu spyan dang m+aa ma ki //
NK051(zhi)002:2852: me rlung gos dkar dam tshig sgrol //
NK051(zhi)002:2853: nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbyings phyug ma //
NK051(zhi)002:2854: srid gsum ye nas rnam par dag /
NK051(zhi)002:2855: ces pas che ba'i ye shes rnam pa lnga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2856: ma h+aa yo ga ltar bshad na /
NK051(zhi)002:2857: sangs pa ni dug lnga las sangs /
NK051(zhi)002:2858: rgyas pa ye shes lngar rgyas /
NK051(zhi)002:2859: rnam pa snang srid 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad do //
NK051(zhi)002:2860: snang ba ni lha dang lha mo'i dkyil 'khor du snang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2861: mdzad pa ni thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med par mdzad pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2862: che ba ni snang stong gnyis las 'das pas che ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2863: phyi rgyud kri yog sde gsum ltar bshad na //
NK051(zhi)002:2865: nyon mongs pa'i dri ma sangs /
NK051(zhi)002:2866: dag pa chos nyid du rgyas /
NK051(zhi)002:2868: snang ba ni rigs gsum lhar snang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2869: mdzad pa khrus dang gtsang sbra gtsor mdzad /
NK051(zhi)002:2870: che ba ni mgon po gsum gyis che ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2871: u pa ya ltar na rigs bzhi'i sangs rgyas so //
NK051(zhi)002:2872: rnam par ni lha'i rnam pa /
NK051(zhi)002:2873: snang ba ni dag pa'i snang ba /
NK051(zhi)002:2874: mdzad pa ni phrin las bzhi mdzad /
NK051(zhi)002:2875: che ba ni dag pa chos nyid kyis che ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2876: yo ga'i lugs ltar na sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad de /
NK051(zhi)002:2877: rnam par ni phyi'i yul rnams so //
NK051(zhi)002:2878: snang ba ni yo ga'i lha tshogs sum cu so gnyis su snang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2879: mdzad pa ni phrin las rnam pa bzhi mdzad /
NK051(zhi)002:2880: skye 'gag gnyis su med pas na che ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2881: mtshan nyid sde gsum ltar bshad na /
NK051(zhi)002:2883: sangs rgyas ni dgra bcom pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2884: rnam par snang ni phyi'i yul rdul phra rab tu snang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2885: mdzad pa ni dka' thub dang brtul zhugs mdzad /
NK051(zhi)002:2886: che ba ni 'phags pa dgra bcom pa che ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2887: rang rgyal ltar du bshad na /
NK051(zhi)002:2888: sangs rgyas ni rang sangs rgyas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2889: rnam par ni phyi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bcu gnyis kyi rnam pa /
NK051(zhi)002:2890: snang ba ni rten 'brel lugs su bzlog pa ste /
NK051(zhi)002:2891: yul gyi rnam pa med de stong par snang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2892: mdzad pa ni rang don gyi sgo nas gzhan don shas 'ga' yang mdzad pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2893: che ba ni rang sangs rgyas kyi dge 'dun bse ru ltar nyag gcig tu gnas pas che ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2894: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ltar bshad na /
NK051(zhi)002:2895: sangs pa ni spang bya ma lus pa sangs la /
NK051(zhi)002:2896: rgyas pa ni thob bya ma lus pa thams cad rgyas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2897: rnam par ni yul gyi rnam pa thams cad sgyu ma lta bu'i dpe brgyad kyi rnam pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2898: snang ba ni rang bzhin med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2899: mdzad pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi
NK051(zhi)002:2900: sgo nas 'gro ba sems can thams cad kyi don
NK051(zhi)002:2901: mdzad pa'o // che ba ni bcu gcig kun tu 'od kyi sa thob pas che ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2902: de rnams ni theg pa bcu tham par bshad cing 'bru mnan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2903: yang na sangs pa ni sgrib pa rnam pa gnyis spangs pas sangs /
NK051(zhi)002:2904: rgyas pa yon tan phun sum tshogs pa ste che ba'i bdag nyid yongs su rgyas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2905: rnam par snang ni sku'i rnam pa snang ba ni
NK051(zhi)002:2906: 'od kha dog lngar snang ba la rang bzhin med
NK051(zhi)002:2907: pa'o // mdzad pa ni phrin las bzhir mdzad pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2908: yang na rnam pa ni chos thams cad sems kyi snang ba'i mtshan nyid yin te /
NK051(zhi)002:2909: theg pa dgu dang brgyad khri bzhi stong thams cad
NK051(zhi)002:2910: rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi ngo bor snang srid
NK051(zhi)002:2911: kyi chos thams cad du snang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2912: mdzad pa ni rtsol sgrub med pa'i don mdzad /
NK051(zhi)002:2913: che ba ni rnam pa lngar shes par bya ste /
NK051(zhi)002:2914: snying po ming med che ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2915: skye med ka dag che ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2916: dngos med zang ka che ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2917: byar med rtsol bral che ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2918: sgrub med blo 'das che ba dang rnam pa lnga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2919: thub pa chen po thub chen ldan //
NK051(zhi)002:2921: thub chen zhes pa yang 'bru bcur bshad de /
NK051(zhi)002:2922: nyan thos kyi dka' thub kyi sdom pa thub /
NK051(zhi)002:2923: de la sogs pa theg pa rim pa dgu rang
NK051(zhi)002:2924: rang gi dam tshig dang sdom pa rnams thub pa'o
NK051(zhi)002:2925: // spyi ti yo gas ka dag skye ba med pa'i don thub pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2926: thub pa chen po ni rang byung gi ye shes
NK051(zhi)002:2927: kyis nga bdag ma rig dug lnga dug gsum la
NK051(zhi)002:2928: sogs te nyon mongs pa thams cad thub pa yin
NK051(zhi)002:2929: no // thub chen ni byar med blo 'das skye med ka dag gi dgongs pas thub pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2930: ldan pa ni de gsal dag chen por ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2931: gsang sngags tshul chen las byung ba //
NK051(zhi)002:2933: 'bru bcur tshig yo la bshad dgos te /
NK051(zhi)002:2934: gsang ba ni zab pa'i don te bstan du mi btub pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2935: sngags ni yang dag pa'i don no //
NK051(zhi)002:2936: gsang sngags nas gdams ngag thams cad 'byung bas na byung zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2937: gsang sngags tshul chen bdag nyid can //
NK051(zhi)002:2942: bdag nyid ces pa blo byed pa po las 'das pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2943: can zhes pa rtogs pa can no //
NK051(zhi)002:2944: pha rol phyin bcu thob pa ste //
NK051(zhi)002:2946: byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu ste //
NK051(zhi)002:2947: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2948: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2949: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2950: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2951: thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2952: smon lam gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2953: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2954: ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2955: stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:2956: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bcu ste /
NK051(zhi)002:2957: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa spyod cing de'i don gyis yang dag pa'i don thob pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2958: da rdzogs pa chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa ston te /
NK051(zhi)002:2959: pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas //
NK051(zhi)002:2961: dang po kho nar lus ngag yid gsum gyi bya
NK051(zhi)002:2962: ba btang nas zab mo'i chos la brtson pa ni
NK051(zhi)002:2963: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2964: de nas yul rdzas dang 'khor dang longs spyod la
NK051(zhi)002:2965: ma chags pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o
NK051(zhi)002:2966: // bsam med rtog med g.yo 'gul med pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2967: bag chags dang nyon mongs pa'i dri ma ka nas
NK051(zhi)002:2968: dag pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o
NK051(zhi)002:2969: // thabs kyi rgyal po byar med pas thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2970: smon pa'i sangs rgyas rang las rnyed pas smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2971: zab mo dngos med kyi don la bzod tshugs pas na bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2972: stong pa kun 'byung gnyis med zang thal du rtogs pas ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2973: skye med klong du mngon sum du sangs rgyas pa ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2974: chos de dag thams cad la rang byung ngang 'das /
NK051(zhi)002:2975: rig pa thol byung 'byung sar thim /
NK051(zhi)002:2976: snang ba rang grol zhen pa med /
NK051(zhi)002:2977: sems can thams cad ye sangs rgyas par rtogs na 'khrul pa dang nor ba'i sa med pas /
NK051(zhi)002:2978: shes rab rgyal po 'byed pa med par rtogs pas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2979: dgongs pa chen po bcu la gnas pas na /
NK051(zhi)002:2980: pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas //
NK051(zhi)002:2982: pha rol phyin bcu dag pa ste //
NK051(zhi)002:2984: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu po de ma bsgrub par ye nas grub pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:2985: sbyin pa ma btang rang grol lo //
NK051(zhi)002:2986: brtson 'grus ma byas bya rtsol dag /
NK051(zhi)002:2987: bsam gtan ma bsgom 'dzin rtog grol //
NK051(zhi)002:2988: tshul khrims ma bsrung sgrib gnyis dag /
NK051(zhi)002:2989: smon lam ma btab rang la grub /
NK051(zhi)002:2990: bzod pa ma bsgom rang rgyud thul /
NK051(zhi)002:2991: thabs kyi rgyal po byar med ngang la gnas /
NK051(zhi)002:2992: ye shes rgyal po skye med ka dag shes /
NK051(zhi)002:2993: shes rab rgyal po 'byed pa med pas 'dzin /
NK051(zhi)002:2994: gnas lugs de la gnod byed bdud med pas //
NK051(zhi)002:2995: rang sa bcu ru yongs su ye dag go //
NK051(zhi)002:2996: pha rol phyin pa bcu yi tshul //
NK051(zhi)002:2998: byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:2999: sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus //
NK051(zhi)002:3000: bsam gtan dang ni shes rab thabs //
NK051(zhi)002:3001: smon lam stobs dang ye shes te //
NK051(zhi)002:3004: de la sbyin pa la gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:3006: zang zing gi sbyin pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3007: chos kyi sbyin pa dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:3009: nyes spyod sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3010: dge ba chos sdud kyi tshul khrims dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3011: sems can don byed kyi tshul khrims dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:3013: sdug bsngal dang du len pa'i bzod pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3014: gzhan gyis gnod pa ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3015: chos la nges par sems pa'i bzod pa dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:3019: yongs su mthar phyin pa'i brtson 'grus dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:3021: nyes pa spong ba'i bsam gtan dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3022: rnam par gnas pa tsam gyi bsam gtan dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3023: rab 'byor ba'i bsam gtan dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:3025: thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3026: bsam pa las byung ba'i shes rab dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3027: sgom pa las byung ba'i shes rab dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:3029: rang gi skyon spong ba'i thabs dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3030: sems can 'jug par byed pa'i thabs dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3031: myur du mngon par byang chub byed pa'i thabs dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:3033: rang gi tshogs dang 'brel ba can gyi smon lam dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3034: sems can gyi don la rjes su 'brel ba'i smon lam dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3035: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba'i smon lam dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:3037: las las zlog par byed pa'i stobs dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3038: nyon mongs pa spong ba'i stobs dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3039: bdud dang pha rol gyi sde rab tu zlog par byed pa'i stobs dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:3041: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3042: rnam par mi rtog pa mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa'i ye shes dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3043: thabs thams cad khong du chud pa'i ye shes dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:3045: pha rol phyin pa bcu la gsum gsum du phye bas sum cur shes par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3046: mgon po sa bcu'i dbang phyug ste //
NK051(zhi)002:3048: mgon po zhes pas gsang ba'i bdag po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3049: yang na sems can nyon mongs pas gdung ba rnams kyi mgon dang skyabs mdzad pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3050: sa bcu zhes pa ni spyi ti yo ga'i lugs kyis gzhan du bgrod du med de /
NK051(zhi)002:3051: 'o na yang ma rtogs pa la re zhig tsam du bgrang na /
NK051(zhi)002:3052: ye nas gnas pa'i sa dang gcig /
NK051(zhi)002:3053: rang dag chen po'i sa dang gnyis /
NK051(zhi)002:3054: ye sbyangs ye gnas chen po'i sa dang gsum /
NK051(zhi)002:3055: ye bgrod chen po'i sa dang bzhi /
NK051(zhi)002:3056: rang byung chen po'i sa dang lnga /
NK051(zhi)002:3057: ngang 'das chen po'i sa dang drug /
NK051(zhi)002:3058: 'od gsal chen po'i sa dang bdun /
NK051(zhi)002:3059: gsal dag chen po'i sa dang brgyad /
NK051(zhi)002:3060: rang sangs chen po'i sa dang dgu /
NK051(zhi)002:3061: rang grol chen po'i sa dang bcu'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3062: dbang ni skye med kyi don la dbang /
NK051(zhi)002:3063: phyug ni ka dag chen po'i don la phyug go //
NK051(zhi)002:3064: des na skyon med nyid du bshad /
NK051(zhi)002:3065: de ni spyi ti yo ga'i dbang phyug go //
NK051(zhi)002:3066: sa bcu la ni gnas pa po //
NK051(zhi)002:3068: pha rol tu phyin bcu'i sa bcu bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:3069: sa dang po rab tu dga' ba'i sa /
NK051(zhi)002:3070: gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i sa /
