NK051(zhi)002:3073: lnga pa sbyang dka' ba'i sa /
NK051(zhi)002:3074: drug pa mngon du gyur pa'i sa /
NK051(zhi)002:3075: bdun pa ring du song ba'i sa /
NK051(zhi)002:3076: brgyad pa mi g.yo ba'i sa /
NK051(zhi)002:3077: dgu pa legs pa'i blo gros kyi sa /
NK051(zhi)002:3078: bcu pa chos kyi sprin gyi sa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3080: sa bcu la ni gnas pa po //
NK051(zhi)002:3082: shes bcu rnam dag bdag nyid can //
NK051(zhi)002:3084: spyi ti'i gzhung gis shes rgyud don la med kyang slob ma la mtshon na /
NK051(zhi)002:3085: ye med du shes pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3086: dus med du shes pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3087: thog ma med par shes pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3088: skye med du shes pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3089: ka dag tu shes pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3090: dngos med du shes pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3092: zang ka ru shes pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3093: ming med du shes pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3094: tha ma med par shes pa dang bcu'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3095: rnam pa ni phyi'i yul gyi rnam pa /
NK051(zhi)002:3096: dag pa ni gsal dag rang grol du dag pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3097: bdag nyid can ces pa ni /
NK051(zhi)002:3098: rnal 'byor pa skal ba dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid de /
NK051(zhi)002:3099: rtogs pa'i bdag nyid dam bla ma'i gdams pa'i gnad
NK051(zhi)002:3100: blo'i gting du go nas sems dang chos su 'dres
NK051(zhi)002:3102: shes bcu rnam dag 'chang ba po //
NK051(zhi)002:3104: shes bcu ni gong du bshad zin /
NK051(zhi)002:3105: rnam dag ces pa snang srid kyi chos thams cad
NK051(zhi)002:3106: la gsal dag rang grol du rnam par dag pa'o
NK051(zhi)002:3107: // 'chang ba ni skal ldan gyi rnal 'byor pas 'chang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3108: rnam pa bcu po don bcu'i don //
NK051(zhi)002:3117: ma rig pa'i rnam pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3120: 'khrul tshul gzugs lnga'i rnam pa dang bcu'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3121: don bcu'i don ces pa 'khrul pa'i don bcu po de la /
NK051(zhi)002:3122: 'khrul pa ldog pa'i don bcus rtsad nas gcod cing ldog pas na don bcu'i don ces gsungs so //
NK051(zhi)002:3123: yang na pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i lugs kyi
NK051(zhi)002:3124: shes bcu rnam dag ces pa ni shes pa'i rnam
NK051(zhi)002:3125: grangs bcu ste / chos shes pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3126: rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3127: pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3133: zag pa zad pa shes pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3134: mi skye ba shes pa dang bcu'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3136: gzugs rnam par dag pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3137: tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3138: 'du shes rnam par dag pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3139: 'du byed rnam par dag pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3140: reg pa rnam par dag pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3141: srid pa rnam par dag pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3142: len pa rnam par dag pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3143: ming dang gzugs rnam par dag pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3144: skye mched drug rnam par dag pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3145: des na rnam dag ces pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3146: 'chang zhes pa rnal 'byor pas pha rol tu phyin pa'i don zab mo 'chang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3148: rnam pa bcu po don bcu'i don //
NK051(zhi)002:3150: mtshan gyi gzhung du bshad na /
NK051(zhi)002:3151: rnam bcu zhes pa 'di ltar ste /
NK051(zhi)002:3152: gcig pur 'dzin pa'i rnam pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3159: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang bar 'dzin pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3161: ma grol ba grol bar 'dzin pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3162: don ni rnam pa bcu zhes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3163: don bcu zhes pa ni 'di lta ste /
NK051(zhi)002:3164: rtsa ba'i de nyid kho na nyid dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3165: mtshan nyid kyi de kho na nyid dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3166: phyin ci ma log pa'i de kho na nyid dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3167: 'bras bu'i de kho na nyid dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3168: rags pa'i de kho na nyid dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3169: phra ba'i de kho na nyid dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3170: grags pa'i de kho na nyid dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3171: rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul gyi de kho na nyid dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3172: bsdus pa'i de kho na nyid dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3173: dbye ba'i de kho na nyid dang bcu ste /
NK051(zhi)002:3174: rnam pa bcu po de ltar bdag tu 'dzin pa ni yin te /
NK051(zhi)002:3175: de'i gnyen por don bcur rig par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3176: don bcu'i don dang sbyar ro //
NK051(zhi)002:3177: thub dbang stobs bcu khyab pa'i bdag /
NK051(zhi)002:3179: thub pa ni nyon mongs pa dang rnam par rtog
NK051(zhi)002:3180: pa ka dag blo 'das kyi dgongs pas thub pa'o
NK051(zhi)002:3181: // gdul rgyu gang thub na 'gong po nga bdag mun pa'i smag rum can thub pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3188: bya ba btang ba'i stobs dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3189: snyan rgyud man ngag gi stobs dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3192: spyod 'bras mngon du 'gyur pa'i stobs dang bcu'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3194: bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs rjes kun la ma khyab pa med cing /
NK051(zhi)002:3195: sems can yongs la khyab pas na /
NK051(zhi)002:3197: kun gyi don ni ma lus byed //
NK051(zhi)002:3199: kun ni 'gro ba sems can rnams so //
NK051(zhi)002:3200: de rnams kyis byang chub thob par bya ba'i don ma lus pa thabs sna tshogs byed pa ni /
NK051(zhi)002:3201: blo che chung ltar theg pa che chung gi sgo
NK051(zhi)002:3202: nas thabs sna tshogs kyis 'gro ba ma lus pa'i
NK051(zhi)002:3203: don byed pa'o // rnam bcu dbang ldan che ba po //
NK051(zhi)002:3205: de la rnam bcu ni gong du bshad zin /
NK051(zhi)002:3207: skye ba khyad par can la dbang ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3208: skal ldan bla ma'i gdams ngag khyad par can la dbang dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3209: snying po don gyi bcud la dbang ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3210: byar med blo 'das la dbang ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3211: 'bras bu'i chos la dbang ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3212: 'dus ma byas kyi chos la dbang ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3213: gtad so dang bral ba rten med phyal ba'i lta ba la dbang ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3214: bsgom bya sgom byed las 'das pa bsam du med pa'i don la dbang ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3215: bya rtsol dgag sgrub dang bral te byar med zhen med kyi don la dbang ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3216: re med rang gnas kyi don la dbang ba dang bcu'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3217: ldan pa ni snying po skye ba med pa ldan /
NK051(zhi)002:3223: ka dag blo las 'das pas che ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3224: po zhes pa theg pa'i rgyal po spyi ti yo ga nyid theg pa gzhan las 'phags pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3225: thog ma med pa spros med bdag /
NK051(zhi)002:3227: 'khor ba spyi btsan la thog ma dang tha ma gnyis ka med /
NK051(zhi)002:3230: rkyen bla ma'i gdams ngag rtogs nas sangs rgyas pa la tha ma yod de /
NK051(zhi)002:3236: tshig dang yi ge thams cad las 'das shing grol lo //
NK051(zhi)002:3237: bdag ni mtshon pa'i tshig dang ming las 'das te /
NK051(zhi)002:3239: de bzhin nyid bdag dag pa'i bdag /
NK051(zhi)002:3241: de bzhin snying po gzhi ma bcos pa nyid chos nyid /
NK051(zhi)002:3243: dag pa'i bdag ces pa ka dag zang ka ma'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3244: bden par smra zhing tshig mi 'gyur //
NK051(zhi)002:3246: snying po chos nyid skye ba med pa ma bcos pa'i don de ni bden pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3247: de smra ba ni slob dpon dga' rab rdo rje'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3248: yang na skye ba med par smra ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3250: mi 'gyur ba ni byar med blo 'das de dus dang rnam pa thams cad du mi 'gyur ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3251: ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed //
NK051(zhi)002:3253: bla ma'i gdams ngag ji skad smras pa de bzhin
NK051(zhi)002:3254: byed ces pa skal ldan gyi slob mas byed pa'o
NK051(zhi)002:3255: // gnyis med gnyis su med par ston //
NK051(zhi)002:3258: med pa ni yul sems gnyis su med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3259: yang na gnyis med ni ma bu dbyer med de /
NK051(zhi)002:3260: snying po dang yan lag gnyis su med do //
NK051(zhi)002:3261: gnyis su med pa'i don ston pa po ni gsang ba'i bdag po'am bcom ldan 'das te /
NK051(zhi)002:3262: skal bar ldan pa la ston pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3263: yang gnyis med gnyis su med ces pa /
NK051(zhi)002:3270: gnyis su med par ston pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3271: kun tu bzang po'am slob dpon dga' rab rdo rje lta bu'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3272: yang dag mtha' la rnam par gnas //
NK051(zhi)002:3274: yang dag ces pa ka dag gi ye shes /
NK051(zhi)002:3275: mtha' zhes pa mtha' gnyis la mi gnas te mtha' thams cad dang bral ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3276: rnam par gnas zhes pa ni skal ldan gyi rnal
NK051(zhi)002:3277: 'byor pa rtogs pa'i klong na dus thams cad du
NK051(zhi)002:3278: gnas pa'o // bdag med seng ge'i sgra dang ldan //
NK051(zhi)002:3280: bdag med ni mu stegs kyi bdag lta bu med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3281: yang na mtshan nyid med cing dngos po'i bdag lta bu med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3282: seng ge'i sgra dang ldan ces pas dpe bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:3283: seng ge'i skad bton pas gcan gzan gzhan gyis skad 'don mi nus pa ltar /
NK051(zhi)002:3284: theg pa'i rgyal po spyi ti yo ga'i skad bton pas /
NK051(zhi)002:3285: theg pa a ti man chod kyis skad 'don mi nus so //
NK051(zhi)002:3286: mu stegs ri dwags ngan 'jigs byed //
NK051(zhi)002:3288: mu stegs pa'i bdag dkar la 'tsher /
NK051(zhi)002:3290: tshad ni mthe bong ngam nyungs 'bru tsam ste /
NK051(zhi)002:3291: skye med ka dag bdag nyid chen por rtogs pa yis /
NK051(zhi)002:3292: mu stegs kyi ri dwags ngan pa thams cad ngar 'jigs par byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3293: kun tu 'gro ba'i don yod stobs //
NK051(zhi)002:3295: kun tu ni 'khor 'das snang srid dngos po'i chos ma lus pa la bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3297: don yod pa ni 'jam dpal lo //
NK051(zhi)002:3298: stobs dang ldan pa ni gsang ba'i bdag po ste /
NK051(zhi)002:3299: de rnams 'dul ba'i stobs dang ldan pa ni phyag na rdo rje'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3300: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid ltar mgyogs //
NK051(zhi)002:3302: de bzhin ni stong pa nyid kyi don /
NK051(zhi)002:3303: gshegs pa ni ma nor bar gshegs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3305: bde bar gshegs pa'i yid ni thugs rjes khyab pa'i yid de kun la mgyogs par khyab pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3306: rgyal ba dgra rgyal rnam par rgyal //
NK051(zhi)002:3308: rgyal ba ni nyon mongs pa lnga las rgyal /
NK051(zhi)002:3309: dgra rgyal zhes pa dgra ni dug lnga'i dgra las rgyal ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3310: rnam par rgyal zhes pa gzung 'dzin gyi rnam rtog thams cad las rgyal ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3311: 'khor lo sgyur ba stobs po che //
NK051(zhi)002:3313: 'khor lo zhes pa 'grel pa 'di'i gzhung gis /
NK051(zhi)002:3315: phyi'i spros pa gcod pa'i 'khor lo lnga /
NK051(zhi)002:3316: nang gi spros pa gcod pa'i 'khor lo lnga /
NK051(zhi)002:3317: gsang ba'i spros pa gcod pa'i 'khor lo lnga /
NK051(zhi)002:3318: yang gsang gi spros pa gcod pa'i 'khor lo lnga /
NK051(zhi)002:3319: de kho na nyid kyis spros pa gcod pa'i 'khor lo dang rnam pa lnga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3321: theg pa gzhan gyi zhe 'dod dang bcas pa'i lta ba sgyur /
NK051(zhi)002:3322: dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i yid btson bzung gi sgom pa sgyur /
NK051(zhi)002:3323: bya rtsol dang bcas pa'i tho co'i spyod pa sgyur /
NK051(zhi)002:3324: rtsol sgrub dang bcas pa'i phrin las sgyur /
NK051(zhi)002:3325: re dogs yid smon dang bcas pa'i 'bras bu sgyur ba dang lnga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3326: stobs po che zhes pa snang srid 'khor 'das /
NK051(zhi)002:3327: chos theg pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gi rtsol sgrub bya rtsol zhe 'dod thams cad ni /
NK051(zhi)002:3328: ka dag 'od gsal chen po'i ngang du /
NK051(zhi)002:3329: bya rgyu'i chos thams cad blo las 'das shing /
NK051(zhi)002:3330: sems can thams cad bya rtsol med par sangs rgyas pas na /
NK051(zhi)002:3331: stobs kyi nang nas kyang shin tu yang stobs che ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3332: tshogs kyi slob dpon tshogs kyi mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:3334: tshogs zhes pa phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa 'khor rnams kyi tshogs so //
NK051(zhi)002:3335: de rnams kyi slob dpon ni bcom ldan 'das gsang bdag chen po yin no //
NK051(zhi)002:3336: tshogs kyi mchog ni 'jam dpal lo //
NK051(zhi)002:3337: tshogs rje tshogs bdag dbang dang ldan //
NK051(zhi)002:3339: tshogs rje zhes pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
NK051(zhi)002:3340: tshogs bdag ni phyag na rdo rje'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3341: dbang dang ldan pa ni gsang ba'i bdag po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3342: mthu chen gces par 'dzin pa ste //
NK051(zhi)002:3346: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mthu dang gnyis so //
NK051(zhi)002:3347: de la 'jig rten pa'i mthu ni /
NK051(zhi)002:3348: rgyu dug lnga'i sgo nas zhe sdang 'ba' zhig gis
NK051(zhi)002:3349: dgra dang sems can 'ba' zhig gi srog bcad kyang
NK051(zhi)002:3350: / dgra thul ba dang mthu zin pa mi 'ong ste /
NK051(zhi)002:3351: thar pa dang byang chub mi thob /
NK051(zhi)002:3352: pha rol tu ngan song gsum du skye bar 'gyur /
NK051(zhi)002:3353: de'i phyir 'jig rten zhe sdang gi mthu yis ci bya /
NK051(zhi)002:3355: ma shi'i bar du bya dgos /
NK051(zhi)002:3356: mthu la thug pa med ces gsungs so //
NK051(zhi)002:3357: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mthu ni mthu che zhes pa /
NK051(zhi)002:3358: mthu chen po yin pas te skye med ka dag rtogs pa'i mthu yis /
NK051(zhi)002:3359: 'khor ba'i rtsa ba thar pa thob tu mi ster
NK051(zhi)002:3360: ba'i dgra bo nga bdag dug lnga dug gsum la
NK051(zhi)002:3361: sogs te / nyon mongs pa'i dgra thams cad dus gcig tu gsod pas /
NK051(zhi)002:3362: mthu chen po dang ldan pa yin no //
NK051(zhi)002:3363: gces par zhes pa ni skal ldan la gces pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3364: 'dzin pa ni skal ldan des bla ma'i gdams ngag rnams gces par 'dzin pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3365: tshul chen gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
NK051(zhi)002:3367: tshul chen ni 'grel pa 'di shin tu yang tshul chen po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3368: gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog ces pa ni theg pa
NK051(zhi)002:3369: gzhan gyi lta sgom gyi dring la mi brten pa'o
NK051(zhi)002:3370: // tshig rje tshig bdag smra mkhas pa //
NK051(zhi)002:3373: tshig bdag ni bcom ldan 'das sh+aakya thub pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3374: smra mkhas pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung yan lag drug cu'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3375: tshig la dbang ba tshig mtha' yas //
NK051(zhi)002:3377: tshig pa dbang ba ni sh+aakya thub pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3378: tshig mtha' yas pa ni mkhyen pa'i mnga' bdag 'jam dpal dang phyag na rdo rje'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3379: tshig bden pa dang bden par smra //
NK051(zhi)002:3381: tshig bden pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung ngo //
NK051(zhi)002:3382: bden par smra pa po ni 'jam dpal dang phyag na rdo rje'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3383: bden pa bzhi ni ston pa po //
NK051(zhi)002:3385: 'di la 'bru dagu'am bcur shes par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3386: tshig 'dis nyan thos kyi bden pa bzhi bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:3387: sdug bsngal gyi bden pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3391: de bzhin du rang rgyal gyi rigs byed bzhi /
NK051(zhi)002:3392: byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa gnyis /
NK051(zhi)002:3395: yo ga'i cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi /
NK051(zhi)002:3396: ma h+aa yo ga'i phyag rgya bzhi /
NK051(zhi)002:3397: a nu yo ga'i ye shes rnam pa lnga /
NK051(zhi)002:3398: a ti yo ga'i gtan tshigs chen po bzhi ste de ni bden pa bzhi'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3399: spyi ti'i bden pa bzhi ni /
NK051(zhi)002:3401: ston pa ni gsang bdag chen po'am /
NK051(zhi)002:3402: slob dpon dga' rab rdo rje'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3403: phyir mi ldog pa phyir mi 'ong //
NK051(zhi)002:3405: phyir mi ldog pa ni byang chub sems dapa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3406: phyir mi 'ong ba ni nyan thos so //
NK051(zhi)002:3408: phyir mi ldog pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' //
NK051(zhi)002:3409: phyir mi 'ong ba ni chos sku kun tu bzang po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3410: 'dren pa rang rgyal bse ru'i tshul //
NK051(zhi)002:3412: rang rgyal ba'i theg pa bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:3413: 'dren pa ni 'khor ba'i 'dam nang nas 'dren pa /
NK051(zhi)002:3414: rang rgyal ni slob dpon med par phung por gzhig 'grel byas pas don rtogs pas rang rgyal lo //
NK051(zhi)002:3415: bse ru'i tshul zhes pa ni dpe yis bstan pa yin te /
NK051(zhi)002:3416: bse ru nyag gcig tu gnas pa bzhin du rang
NK051(zhi)002:3417: rgyal kyang ne tsho ltar du khyus lding pa dang
NK051(zhi)002:3418: / bse ru ltar gcig tu gnas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3419: nges 'byung sna tshogs las byung ba //
NK051(zhi)002:3421: nges 'byung zhes pa spyi ti yo ga'i theg pa nas /
NK051(zhi)002:3422: sna tshogs zhes pa skye med ka dag la sogs
NK051(zhi)002:3423: pa'i gdams ngag zab mo sna tshogs pa 'byung ba'o
NK051(zhi)002:3424: // 'byung ba chen po rgyu gcig po //
NK051(zhi)002:3426: 'byung ba sa chu me rlung dang bzhi'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3428: rgyu gcig pa ni stong pa'am /
NK051(zhi)002:3429: yang na skye med ka dag tu gcig pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3430: dge slong dgra bcom zag pa zad //
NK051(zhi)002:3432: dge slong zhes pa ni bzhi ste /
NK051(zhi)002:3433: mi dge ba'i dge slong dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3436: don dam pa'i dge slong dang bzhi'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3437: dgra bcom zhes pa ni nyon mongs pa'i dgra bcom pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3442: lta ba'i zag pa dang bzhi'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3443: zad pa ni bag chags rnams zad pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3444: 'dod chags bral bas dbang po thul //
NK051(zhi)002:3446: 'dod chags bral zhes pa ni nyon mongs pa dgu bcu rtsa brgyad kyi 'dod chags dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3447: tha mal pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bas /
NK051(zhi)002:3448: sgom pa'i lam gyi nyon mongs pa'i dbang po thul ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3449: bde ba rnyed pas 'jigs med thob //
NK051(zhi)002:3451: bde ba ni yang dag pa'i bde ba rnyed pa
NK051(zhi)002:3452: ste skye med ka dag gi dgongs pa rtogs pas
NK051(zhi)002:3453: 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa med pa de thob pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3454: bsil bar gyur pas rnyog pa med //
NK051(zhi)002:3456: bsil ba zhes pa ni nyon mongs pa'i tshad pas gdung zhing shin tu nyams thag pa rnams la /
NK051(zhi)002:3457: bla ma dam pa'i gdams ngag gis bsil phab par gyur te /
NK051(zhi)002:3458: nyon mongs pa dug lnga dug gsum gyi rnyog pa med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3459: rig pa dang ni rkang par ldan //
NK051(zhi)002:3461: rig pa ni shes rab la /
NK051(zhi)002:3463: ldan zhes pa thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med par ldan /
NK051(zhi)002:3464: de gang la ldan na rgyud 'di nyams su len pa'i rnal 'byor pa la ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3465: bde gshegs 'jig rten rig pa'i mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:3468: ma nor bar gshegs pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3470: phyir mi ldog par gshegs pa dang gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:3471: 'jig rten ni snod 'jig pa la brten pa'i sems can rnams so //
NK051(zhi)002:3472: rig pa'i mchog ni de'i don bya bar rig ste /
NK051(zhi)002:3473: rig cing rtogs pas na rig pa'i mchog ces gsungs so //
NK051(zhi)002:3477: bdag ces pa nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyis
NK051(zhi)002:3478: kha nang du bltas nas kun gzhi la nga bdag
NK051(zhi)002:3479: tu bzung ba / bdag gir mi 'dzin ces pa /
NK051(zhi)002:3480: yid kyi rnam par shes pas kha phyir bltas nas /
NK051(zhi)002:3481: sgo lnga'i rjes su 'brang ste phyi gzung ba'i yul rnam pa lnga la /
NK051(zhi)002:3482: ngar mi 'dzin ces pa gdams ngag yin te /
NK051(zhi)002:3483: yul sems gnyis su mi 'dzin te dgag sgrub spong
NK051(zhi)002:3484: len dgra gnyen phyogs ris bzang ngan dbye bsal de
NK051(zhi)002:3485: dag la gnyis su med de /
NK051(zhi)002:3486: ngar mi 'dzin ni thams cad dang bral ba'i gdams ngag go //
NK051(zhi)002:3487: mi len mi 'dor mnyam pa'i rgyal por gnas //
NK051(zhi)002:3489: bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la gnas //
NK051(zhi)002:3491: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dbu ma pa'i 'dod gzhung ngam lta ba bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:3492: de la bden pa gnyis ni /
NK051(zhi)002:3493: kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3499: rnam pa bden par 'dod pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3500: rnam pa brdzun par 'dod pa gnyis so //
NK051(zhi)002:3501: rnam pa ni snang ba'i rnam pa sems su bden par 'dod pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3502: rnam pa ni med pa yin te mi bden par 'dod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3503: theg pa chen po dbu ma pas don dam dang kun rdzob kyi bden pa gnyis su 'dod de /
NK051(zhi)002:3504: de la kun rdzob kyi bden pa la gnyis /
NK051(zhi)002:3505: yang dag pa'i kun rdzob dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3507: yang dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi chos bzhi dang ldan te /
NK051(zhi)002:3511: don byed nus pa dang bzhi'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3512: log pa'i kun rdzob la yang bzhi ste /
NK051(zhi)002:3516: rus sbal gyi spu dang bzhi'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3517: de ni snang yang mi snang la don byed kyang mi nus so //
NK051(zhi)002:3518: yang dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi snang yang snang la don byed kyang nus pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3519: don dam pa'i bden pa la gnyis te /
NK051(zhi)002:3520: rnam grangs kyi don dam pa'i bden pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3521: rnam grangs ma yin pa'i don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3522: de la rnam grangs kyi bden pa ni spros pa'i mtha' brgyad dang bral ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3523: rnam grangs ma yin pa'i don dam pa'i bden pa ni stong pa bco brgyad do //
NK051(zhi)002:3524: don dam pa stong pa bco brgyad rang la yang mi gnas te /
NK051(zhi)002:3525: mtha' gang la yang mi gnas so //
NK051(zhi)002:3526: tshul la gnas zhes pa mtshan nyid sde gsum gyi theg pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3527: 'khor ba'i pha rol mthar son pa //
NK051(zhi)002:3529: 'khor ba zhes pa las dang nyon mongs pa'i 'khor ba la song yang /
NK051(zhi)002:3530: pha rol mthar son pa zhes pa /
NK051(zhi)002:3531: skye ba med pa'i gdams ngag gis /
NK051(zhi)002:3532: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar son par byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3533: bya ba byas pa skam sar gnas //
NK051(zhi)002:3535: sngar bya ba byas zin pas da bya rtsol mi dgos te /
NK051(zhi)002:3536: ka dag chen po'i skam sar gnas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3537: ye shes 'ba' zhig las byung ba //
NK051(zhi)002:3539: ye ni ka dag gi ye shes /
NK051(zhi)002:3540: 'ba' zhig ni gzhan gyi sel med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3541: las byung ba ni rtogs pa'i shes rab las don dam pa'i bden pa 'byung ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3542: shes rab mtshon chas rnam 'joms pa //
NK051(zhi)002:3544: shes rab kyi chos thams cad gtan la 'bebs pa'i shes rab bo //
NK051(zhi)002:3545: mtshon chas zhes pa gcod par byed pa'i mtshon mang po'i nang nas /
NK051(zhi)002:3546: phyi nang gi sgro 'dogs gcod pa de ni mtshon
NK051(zhi)002:3547: thams cad las khyad par du gyur pa'i mtshon cha'o
NK051(zhi)002:3549: nyon mongs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gi rtog tshogs rnams 'joms pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3550: dam chos chos rgyal gsal bar ldan //
NK051(zhi)002:3552: dam chos zhes pa yang dag pa'i gdams ngag go //
NK051(zhi)002:3553: chos rgyal ni rgyu'i chos las rgyal ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3554: gsal bar ldan ces pa ka dag 'od gsal gyi don de gsal bar rang la ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3555: 'jig rten snang bar byed pa'i mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:3557: 'jig rten ni 'jig pa la rten pa'i sems can rnams /
NK051(zhi)002:3558: snang bar byed pa'i mchog ni skye med ka dag
NK051(zhi)002:3559: gi gdams ngag 'od gsal ngang dwangs chen po yin
NK051(zhi)002:3561: chos kyi dbang phyug chos kyi rgyal //
NK051(zhi)002:3563: chos kyi zhes pa a nu man chod kyi chos te dge bcu'i don no //
NK051(zhi)002:3564: dbang phyug ces pa snying po skye ba med pa la dbang /
NK051(zhi)002:3565: 'bras bu'i chos kyis phyug las pas na dbang phyug go //
NK051(zhi)002:3566: chos kyi rgyal ni a ti man chod theg pa dgu'i chos las rgyal ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3567: spyi ti yo gas theg pa gzhan las khyad par
NK051(zhi)002:3568: du 'phags shing chos sde brgyad khri bzhi stong gi
NK051(zhi)002:3570: chos gzhan gyi grub mtha' las rgyal bas na chos kyi rgyal zhes gsungs so //
NK051(zhi)002:3571: legs pa'i lam ni ston pa po //
NK051(zhi)002:3573: a nu man chod kyi lam de ni bya rtsol zhe 'dod kyi lam ste /
NK051(zhi)002:3575: legs pa'i lam zhes pa rtsol sgrub las 'das pa spyi ti yo ga'i theg pa ste /
NK051(zhi)002:3576: ma nor yang dag nges pa'i lam ston pa po
NK051(zhi)002:3577: de gang gis bstan na gsang bdag chen pos bstan
NK051(zhi)002:3578: pa'o // gang ston na skye med ka dag gi dgongs pa ston no //
NK051(zhi)002:3580: skal ldan rnams la sman par bya ba'i phyir bstan no //
NK051(zhi)002:3581: don grub bsam pa 'grub pa ste //
NK051(zhi)002:3583: skye med ka dag gi gdams ngag gis snying po skye med chos sku'i don grub pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3584: bsam pa yongs su 'grub pa ni bsam pa rnams
NK051(zhi)002:3585: kyi nang nas kyang rgyu 'bras las 'das pa'i chos
NK051(zhi)002:3586: yang dag pa la sems pa'i bsam pa 'grub pa'o
NK051(zhi)002:3587: // skye ba med cing dmigs pa'i spyod yul las 'das pa'i bsam pa yis /
NK051(zhi)002:3588: grub ces pa thog ma med pa'i dus nas rang
NK051(zhi)002:3589: la rang chas su yod pa'i don de grub pas
NK051(zhi)002:3591: kun tu rtog pa thams cad spangs //
NK051(zhi)002:3593: rtog pa thams cad ma spangs gnas su dag /
NK051(zhi)002:3594: mtshan ma thams cad rang sar grol bas spangs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3595: rnam par mi rtog dbyings mi zad //
NK051(zhi)002:3597: rnam par mi rtog pa ni snying po mnyam pa nyid do //
NK051(zhi)002:3598: dbyings mi zad ces pas chos kyi dbyings la zad pa dang 'phel ba dang 'grib pa med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3599: chos dbyings dam pa zad mi shes //
NK051(zhi)002:3601: chos zhes pa 'dus ma byas pa /
NK051(zhi)002:3602: dbyings zhes pa zab cing cha phra ba brtag par bka' ba brjod pa'i yul las 'das pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3603: dam pa ni ma nor ba ye nas skye ba med pa ka dag chen po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3604: zad mi shes pa ni chos kyi dbyings la zad pa dang 'phel ba med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3605: bsod nams ldan pa bsod nams tshogs //
NK051(zhi)002:3607: bsod nams dang ldan pa ni spyi ti yo ga dang 'phrad cing spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3608: ldan pa ni bsod nams rnams kyi nang nas kyang bsod nams chen po'i skal pa dang ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3609: bsod nams zhes pa ni 'bras bu chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te /
NK051(zhi)002:3610: tshogs rnams ma bsags ye nas rdzogs //
NK051(zhi)002:3612: ye shes ye shes khyad par che //
NK051(zhi)002:3614: ye shes kyi khyad par la gsum mam bcur shes par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3615: gsum ni bskyed rdzogs gsum la ye shes kyi khyad par gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:3616: ma h+aas thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med par 'dod pa'i ye shes /
NK051(zhi)002:3617: a nu dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med par 'dod pa'i ye shes /
NK051(zhi)002:3618: a ti rig pa rang byung du 'dod pa'i ye
NK051(zhi)002:3619: shes dang gsum ni shin tu yang khyad par che
NK051(zhi)002:3620: ba'o // ma h+aas ni rtsol bas ye shes sgrub /
NK051(zhi)002:3621: a nu ni ra ru bzhin gnyis su bzung nas ye shes gcig tu 'dod /
NK051(zhi)002:3622: a ti rig pa 'gyur zhing ldog pa la ye shes 'gyur ldog med par 'dod de /
NK051(zhi)002:3623: zhe 'dod zhugs pa'i blo de yis //
NK051(zhi)002:3624: ye shes rmi lam na yang mi myong ngo //
NK051(zhi)002:3626: bskyed rdzogs gsum las spyi ti yo gas khyad par
NK051(zhi)002:3627: 'phags pa'i ye shes la khyad par bcus bstan te
NK051(zhi)002:3628: / sngon med dmigs med chen po'i ye shes dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3629: ye dag ngang dwangs chen po'i ye shes dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3630: ye thog ma gzhi'i ye shes dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3631: ye skye med snying po'i ye shes dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3632: ye dag ka dag chen po'i ye shes dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3633: bdag med dngos med chen po'i ye shes dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3634: ye gdangs rang sar thim pa'i ye shes dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3635: ye sangs rang brlag chen po'i ye shes dang //
NK051(zhi)002:3636: ye grol rang grol chen po'i ye shes dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3637: ye zin byar med chen po'i ye shes dang bcu ste /
NK051(zhi)002:3638: a ti man chod nyan thos yan chod las ye shes kyi khyad par bcus 'phags so //
NK051(zhi)002:3639: dgu las 'phags pa'i ye shes che //
NK051(zhi)002:3641: ye shes ldan pa yod med shes //
NK051(zhi)002:3643: spyi ti yo ga'i yin te /
NK051(zhi)002:3644: ye shes dang nam ldan tsa na ye shes yod par smra mi shes so //
NK051(zhi)002:3646: ye shes ni skye ba med cing blo'i chos las 'das pa /
NK051(zhi)002:3647: yod med gang du yang bstan du mi btub pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3649: ye shes ka dag ma bu ldan /
NK051(zhi)002:3650: yod med gnyis su med de /
NK051(zhi)002:3651: dbyer med shes zhes pa blo las 'das par shes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3652: tshogs gnyis tshogs ni bsags pa po //
NK051(zhi)002:3655: rgyu bsod nams kyi tshogs dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3656: 'bras bu ye shes kyi tshogs so //
NK051(zhi)002:3658: tshogs gnyis ma bsags yongs su rdzogs //
NK051(zhi)002:3660: rtag pa kun rgyal rnal 'byor can //
NK051(zhi)002:3662: rtag pa ni snying po'i don /
NK051(zhi)002:3663: kun rgyal ni nyon mongs pa'i dgra kun las rgyal /
NK051(zhi)002:3664: rnal 'byor can ces pa byar med blo 'das kyi rnal 'byor can no //
NK051(zhi)002:3665: bsam gtan bsam bya blo ldan mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:3667: bsam gtan ni bsam du med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3668: bsam bya ni bsgom bya'i yul gzhan na med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3669: blo ldan ni shes rab zab mo'i blo dang ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3670: mchog ni byar med blo 'das kyi mchog go //
NK051(zhi)002:3671: so so rang rig mi g.yo ba //
NK051(zhi)002:3674: snang ba yul gyi bye brag so so cir snang yang yid la ma zhugs shing /
NK051(zhi)002:3675: rang gi rig pa mi g.yo ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3676: mchog gi dang po sku gsum 'chang //
NK051(zhi)002:3678: mchog gi dang po zhes pa thog ma'i dus so //
NK051(zhi)002:3679: rang bzhin ngo bo thugs rje gsum du bzhugs so //
NK051(zhi)002:3680: sku gsum 'chang zhes pa skal ldan gyis chos sku
NK051(zhi)002:3681: dang longs sku dang sprul sku dang gsum ka 'chang
NK051(zhi)002:3682: ba'o // sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can //
NK051(zhi)002:3684: sangs rgyas ni spangs pa dang che ba'i yon tan thams cad yongs su rgyas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3685: sku lnga'i zhes pa chos sku dang longs sku dang sprul sku dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3686: sku gsum dbyer med dang bzhi /
NK051(zhi)002:3687: don dam bde ba chen po'i sku dang lnga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3688: bdag nyid can zhes pa ye nas sku lnga'i ngo bo'am rtogs pa'i bdag nyid can du bzhugs so //
NK051(zhi)002:3689: khyab bdag ye shes lnga yi bdag /
NK051(zhi)002:3691: khyab pa ni sems can gyi mtshan nyid kun la khyab pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3692: bdag ces pa rang grol te de dag gi bdag go //
NK051(zhi)002:3693: yang na khyab pa ni kun rdzob rgya che ba'i 'jam dpal /
NK051(zhi)002:3694: bdag ni zab pa don dam gyi 'jam dpal /
NK051(zhi)002:3695: ye shes ni zab pa dang rgya che ba dang gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
NK051(zhi)002:3696: lnga yi bdag ces pa ye shes rnam pa lnga ste /
NK051(zhi)002:3697: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3698: me long lta bu'i ye shes dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3699: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3700: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3701: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes dang rnam pa lnga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3702: sangs rgyas lnga bdag cod pan can //
NK051(zhi)002:3704: sangs rgyas ni mi bskyod pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3708: rnam par snang mdzad dang lnga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3709: lnga bdag ces pa rnam par snang mdzad kun tu zhal lo //
NK051(zhi)002:3710: cod pan can ni dbu skra'i cod pan no //
NK051(zhi)002:3711: spyan lnga chags pa med pa 'chang //
NK051(zhi)002:3718: ye shes kyi spyan dang lnga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3719: spyan lnga po de gang la yang chags pa med
NK051(zhi)002:3720: par 'chang zhes pa skal ldan gcig la 'bras bu
NK051(zhi)002:3722: sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa po //
NK051(zhi)002:3724: sangs pa ni blos btags bya rtsol gyi chos sangs la /
NK051(zhi)002:3725: rgyas zhes pa byar med ka dag gi don rgyas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3726: thams cad skyed pa po zhes pa ni skye med
NK051(zhi)002:3727: ka dag byar med blo 'das kyi gdams pa des
NK051(zhi)002:3728: / zhe 'dod med par so sor rtog pa'i rnam par shar bas /
NK051(zhi)002:3729: sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa po //
NK051(zhi)002:3731: sangs rgyas sras po dam pa'i mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:3733: sangs pa ni spangs bya ma lus pa sangs /
NK051(zhi)002:3734: rgyas pa ni thob bya ye shes rgyas /
NK051(zhi)002:3735: sras po ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdung brgyud 'dzin pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3736: dam pa'i ni mi bslu zhing bden pa skye ba med pa'i don no //
NK051(zhi)002:3737: mchog ni 'bras bu thams cad mngon du gyur pas mchog go //
NK051(zhi)002:3738: shes pas srid 'byung skye gnas med //
NK051(zhi)002:3740: gdams pa rmad kyi man ngag bstan te //
NK051(zhi)002:3742: shes pas ma bu dbyer med gcig tu bstan /
NK051(zhi)002:3743: at+ma sri ti a +aah de yin /
NK051(zhi)002:3760: thob rgyu bdog gam mi bdog /
NK051(zhi)002:3761: gsang ba'i bdag po la zhus pas /
NK051(zhi)002:3763: nam mkha' a dang rdo rje nor bu bzhin //
NK051(zhi)002:3764: skal ldan shes rab can gyi thugs la chongs //
NK051(zhi)002:3765: de ltar shes na srid pa'i skye gnas thams cad 'byung //
NK051(zhi)002:3766: phyis ni 'khor zhing skye ba'i gnas med do //
NK051(zhi)002:3768: chos las 'byung ba srid pa sel //
NK051(zhi)002:3770: chos theg pa zab mo'i gdams ngag gi gnad phyungs pas na /
NK051(zhi)002:3771: srid pa'i skye gnas thams cad sel ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3772: gcig pu sra mkhregs rdo rje'i bdag /
NK051(zhi)002:3774: gcig pu ni snying po thig le nyag gcig /
NK051(zhi)002:3775: sra mkhregs ni skye med ka dag /
NK051(zhi)002:3776: rdo rje ni skye 'jigs med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3777: skyes ma thag tu 'gro ba'i bdag /
NK051(zhi)002:3779: dngos med blo 'das rtogs ma thag tu rtogs pa'i byin rlabs nam mkha' ltar khyab pas /
NK051(zhi)002:3780: sprul sku 'gro ba'i don byed pa'i bdag go //
NK051(zhi)002:3781: nam mkha' las byung rang byung ba //
NK051(zhi)002:3783: dper na nam mkha' stong pa phyogs med nas /
NK051(zhi)002:3791: bu yug sna tshogs pa 'byung ba bzhin du /
NK051(zhi)002:3792: chos nyid kyi nam mkha' kun gzhi mkha' klong stong pa las /
NK051(zhi)002:3802: rang bzhin ngo bo thugs rje dang gsum /
NK051(zhi)002:3812: thams cad ma lus ji snyed pa //
NK051(zhi)002:3813: sems nyid stong pa'i klong nas 'byung //
NK051(zhi)002:3814: stong las kun 'byung stong par grol //
NK051(zhi)002:3815: stong nyid las byung khyod la 'dud //
NK051(zhi)002:3817: ji ltar byung yang gzhi la g.yo ba med //
NK051(zhi)002:3818: de ni rgya che ba dang sbyar ro //
NK051(zhi)002:3819: shes rab ye shes me bo che //
NK051(zhi)002:3821: shes rab ni rig pa rig med ngang 'das rang grol du shes so //
NK051(zhi)002:3822: ye shes ni ka dag gi ye shes so //
NK051(zhi)002:3823: me bo che zhes pa shes rab chen po yongs su 'bar ba'i me ste /
NK051(zhi)002:3824: des zhe sdang la sogs te nyon mongs pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad bsreg pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3825: 'od chen rnam par snang bar byed //
NK051(zhi)002:3827: 'od chen ni ka dag 'od gsal chen po'i 'od do //
NK051(zhi)002:3828: rnam par snang ba ni dngos po sna tshogs pa'i
NK051(zhi)002:3829: chos thams cad snang bar byed pa ngang 'das rang
NK051(zhi)002:3834: ye shes snang ba lam me ba //
NK051(zhi)002:3836: ye shes ni mi shes pa med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3837: snang ba ni gzung 'dzin med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3838: lam me ba zhes pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
NK051(zhi)002:3839: 'gro ba'i mar me ye shes sgron //
NK051(zhi)002:3842: mar me ni gti mug ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba /
NK051(zhi)002:3843: ye shes sgron ni skye med 'od gsal byar med blo 'das kyi sgron ma'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3844: gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal ba //
NK051(zhi)002:3846: gzi brjid ni spyi ti yo ga ste gzhan zil gyis gnon pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3848: 'od gsal ba zhes pa rang byung 'od gsal chen
NK051(zhi)002:3849: po yis ma rig pa'i sgrib g.yogs bag chags kyi
NK051(zhi)002:3850: mun nag thams cad 'joms shing sel ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3851: sngags mchog mnga' bdag rig sngags rgyal //
NK051(zhi)002:3853: sngags mchog ces pa bskyed rdzogs rnam gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:3854: mnga' bdag ni kri yog rnam gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:3858: de dgu las spyi ti yo ga rgyal bas na rgyal zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3859: gsang sngags rgyal po don chen byed //
NK051(zhi)002:3863: rgyal po ni nyon mongs pa las rgyal ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3864: don chen byed ni 'gro ba sems can rnams la skye med ka dag chen po'i don byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3865: gtsug tor chen po rmad byung gtsug /
NK051(zhi)002:3867: gtsug tor ni ye shes kyi gtsug /
NK051(zhi)002:3868: gtsug ni skye med snying pa'i don //
NK051(zhi)002:3869: tor ni theg pa'i lta sgom gtor /
NK051(zhi)002:3870: rmad byung gi chos chen po rmad du byung /
NK051(zhi)002:3871: lta ba chen po rmad du byung /
NK051(zhi)002:3872: 'bras bu chen po rmad du byung /
NK051(zhi)002:3873: gtsug ces pa theg pa thams cad kyi spyi'i gtsug
NK051(zhi)002:3874: ni rtse phud dgu rtse spyi ti yo ga'i theg
NK051(zhi)002:3875: pa'o // nam mkha'i bdag po sna tshogs ston //
NK051(zhi)002:3879: bdag po ni gnyis su med pa yin /
NK051(zhi)002:3881: nam mkha' stong pa la cho 'phrul sna tshogs su ston no //
NK051(zhi)002:3882: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku yi mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:3884: nam mkha'i mtshan nyid shes pa ste /
NK051(zhi)002:3885: sangs pa ni nam mkha'i cho 'phrul rnams rang byung rang dwangs rang sangs so //
NK051(zhi)002:3886: rgyas pa ni chos nyid nam mkhar rgyas /
NK051(zhi)002:3887: kun gyi nang nas skye med ka dag sku yi mchog go //
NK051(zhi)002:3888: 'gro kun dga' ba'i mig dang ldan //
NK051(zhi)002:3890: 'gro ba rigs drug gi sems can thams cad dga' ba ni yang dag pa'i gdams ngag go //
NK051(zhi)002:3891: mig dang ldan pa ni ye shes kyi mig dang ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3892: sna tshogs gzugs can yid las skyes //
NK051(zhi)002:3894: gong du 'khrul pa'i rkyen du bshad pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3896: sna tshogs gzugs can thams cad ni /
NK051(zhi)002:3900: sna tshogs kyi gzugs thams cad ni nyon mongs pa can gyi yid las skyes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3901: yang na sna tshogs gzugs cad yid las skyes pa po zhes pa /
NK051(zhi)002:3903: sna tshogs gzugs can thams cad la chos bshad cing sems can thams cad kyis sems bskyed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3904: yang na sna tshogs gzugs can thams cad ma rig dang nga bdag gis rgyu byas so //
NK051(zhi)002:3906: yid kyis dug lnga gsum gyi rta byas nas /
NK051(zhi)002:3907: khams gsum 'gro drug gi gzugs thams cad de bskyed cing /
NK051(zhi)002:3908: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa las skyes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3909: drang srong che dgus mchod cing brjod //
NK051(zhi)002:3911: drang pa ni snying po 'gyur ba med cing /
NK051(zhi)002:3912: theg pa'i lta sgom srung ba'i drang srong zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3914: che ba rnam pa dgu ste /
NK051(zhi)002:3915: snying po ye nas che ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3916: chos nyid ye nas che ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3917: skye med ye nas che ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3918: ka dag ye nas che ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3919: dngos med ye nas che ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3920: zang ka ye nas che ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3921: gshis ye nas che ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3922: gnas lugs ye nas che ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:3923: blo 'das ye nas che ba dang dagu'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3924: spyi ti'i lugs kyis snying po skye ba med par yid la mchod cing /
NK051(zhi)002:3928: kri ya'i theg pa bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:3932: phyag na rdo rje dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:3933: 'chang ba ni kri ya'i rnal 'byor pas rigs gsum 'chang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3934: gsang ba ni skal med la'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3935: sngags ni kri ya'i theg pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3936: dam tshig chen po gsang sngags 'dzin //
NK051(zhi)002:3938: dam tshig ces pas rtsa ba gsum dang yan lag lnga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3939: sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi bcad //
NK051(zhi)002:3941: chen po ni don dam pa snying po skye ba med par rtogs pa las mi 'da' la /
NK051(zhi)002:3942: kun rdzob tu sems can thams cad smin par byed pa las mi 'ada'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3943: gsang sngags zhes pa gsang ba ni zab cing cha phra ba /
NK051(zhi)002:3944: sngags ni yon tan gyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3945: gtso bo dkon mchog gsum 'dzin pa //
NK051(zhi)002:3947: gtso bo ni spyi ti yo ga ste snying po'i gshis so //
NK051(zhi)002:3948: dkon zhes pa theg pa dgu rtse'am bcu'i rtse rgyal
NK051(zhi)002:3949: 'di snod kyi 'jig rten khams dzam bu'i gling tsam
NK051(zhi)002:3951: mchog ces pa shin tu dkon pa'i theg pa'i rtse phud 'di /
NK051(zhi)002:3952: su 'chang skal ldan las can bsod nams mchog go //
NK051(zhi)002:3954: theg pa'i rtse rgyal gyi gdams ngag ni gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:3958: de gsum gyi rnal 'byor skal ba dang ldan pas 'dzin pas na 'dzin pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3959: theg pa mchog gsum ston pa po //
NK051(zhi)002:3962: theg pa ni spyi ti yo ga ste theg pa'i rtse rgyal lo //
NK051(zhi)002:3964: bskyed pa ma h+aa yo ga /
NK051(zhi)002:3966: rdzogs pa chen po a ti yo ga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3967: ston pa po zhes pa slob dpon dga' rab rdo rje dang 'jam dpal bshes gnyen ston pa po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3969: theg pa mchog gsum ston pa po //
NK051(zhi)002:3971: theg pa rim pa dgu 'bru mnan te /
NK051(zhi)002:3972: theg pa zhes pa mtshan nyid sde gsum gyi theg pa gsum zhes kri yog sde gsum /
NK051(zhi)002:3973: mchog ces pa rgyud lung man ngag gsum /
NK051(zhi)002:3974: ston pa po ni gsang bdag chen pos spyi ti yo ga'i theg pa ston pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3976: theg pa ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal mtshan brjod 'di
NK051(zhi)002:3977: theg pa'i chos thams cad kyi gazhi'am sa gzhi lta
NK051(zhi)002:3978: bu yin no // mchog gsum zhes pa 'jam dpal gyi rgyud 'di nas /
NK051(zhi)002:3981: don mtshungs pa med pa ston pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3982: don yod zhags pa rnam par rgyal //
NK051(zhi)002:3984: don yod pa ni snying po don ka dag go //
NK051(zhi)002:3985: zhags pa ni thugs rje'i zhags pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3986: rnam par rgyal zhes pa nyon mongs pa rnam pa sna tshogs las rgyal ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3987: 'dzin pa chen po rdo rje zhags //
NK051(zhi)002:3990: thugs rjes lcags kyus khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can rnams 'dzin pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3991: chen po ni theg pa chen po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3992: rdo rje ni 'gyur ba med pa /
NK051(zhi)002:3993: zhags pa ni ma rung 'ching bar byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3994: rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che //
NK051(zhi)002:3996: rdo rje ni 'dus ma byas pa /
NK051(zhi)002:3997: lcags kyu ni 'gugs par byed pa /
NK051(zhi)002:3998: zhags pa zhes pa ni dbang du sdud par byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:3999: che ba ni spyi ti yo ga'i theg pa 'dir
NK051(zhi)002:4000: 'jam dpal gyis gsal bar bshad pa 'di shin tu
NK051(zhi)002:4002: de yan chod kyis tshig 'dres mar yod kyang /
NK051(zhi)002:4003: ngos bzung na 'khrul pa 'phrang gi bka' tshoms bstan pa'i skabs te /
NK051(zhi)002:4004: don rgya che ba dang sbyar ro //
NK051(zhi)002:4005: rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor la /
NK051(zhi)002:4006: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi sgo nas bstod pa'i skabs bstan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4009: rdo rje zhes pa ni gnyis te /
NK051(zhi)002:4010: don dam 'gyur ba med pa'i rdo rje dang /
NK051(zhi)002:4011: kun rdzob rgya che ba'i rdo rje'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4012: don dam 'gyur ba med pa'i rdo rjee ni snying
NK051(zhi)002:4013: po skye ba med cing 'od gsal ka nas dag
NK051(zhi)002:4014: ste / blo'i chos thams cad las grol zhing yongs su 'das so //
NK051(zhi)002:4015: rdo ni skye ba med pa /
NK051(zhi)002:4016: rje ni ka nas dag pa'i ye shes so //
NK051(zhi)002:4017: don dam pa'i rdo rje ni sgra brjod pa las 'das shing mtshon du med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4018: kun rdzob rgya che ba'i rdo rje la rnam pa lnga ste /
NK051(zhi)002:4019: btags pa ming gi rdo rje /
NK051(zhi)002:4020: blugs pa lugs kyi rdo rje /
NK051(zhi)002:4021: bris pa rdul tshon gyi rdo rje /
NK051(zhi)002:4023: phyag mtshan rtags kyi rdo rje dang rnam pa lnga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4025: ces pa 'khrul pa'i snang ba thams cad 'joms par byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4026: khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug 'jigs //
NK051(zhi)002:4028: khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud nas gsungs so //
NK051(zhi)002:4029: khro bo zhes pa ni bzhi ste /
NK051(zhi)002:4033: de kho na nyid kyi khro bo dang bzhi'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4034: de la phyi'i khro bo gshin rje gshed po ste /
NK051(zhi)002:4035: zhal gsum phyag drug g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal lo //
NK051(zhi)002:4036: dur khrod chas dang sbrul dang glang chen ko rlon zhing chen g.yang gzhis brgyan /
NK051(zhi)002:4037: zhabs bzhi g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang gar thabs kyis ma tram pad nyi'i gdan stengs dang /
NK051(zhi)002:4040: nang gi khro bo ni nyon mongs pa dug rnam pa lnga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4041: gsang ba'i khro bo ni ye shes rnam pa lnga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4042: de kho na nyid kyi khro bo ni sku lnga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4043: rgyal po ni nyon mongs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong las rgyal ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4044: gdong drug ni khro bo'i mtshan bstan /
NK051(zhi)002:4046: khro bo gdong drug po des phyi ru dgra dang bgegs la 'jigs /
NK051(zhi)002:4047: nang du nyon mongs pa lnga la 'jigs /
NK051(zhi)002:4048: gsang ba 'gong po nga bdag 'jigs par byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4049: mig drug lag drug stobs dang ldan //
NK051(zhi)002:4051: khro bo chen po de la /
NK051(zhi)002:4053: lag drug phyag mtshan drug go //
NK051(zhi)002:4054: stobs dang ldan ces pa gzhan zil gyis gnon pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4055: yang na spyi ti yo ga'i 'grel pa'i gzhung gis /
NK051(zhi)002:4056: khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug 'jigs pa /
NK051(zhi)002:4057: khro bo zhes pa ngang khro /
NK051(zhi)002:4059: mdzad pa dang bcas pas khro ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4060: ngang khro ni skye med yin te /
NK051(zhi)002:4062: shugs khro ni ka dag rnal ma ste /
NK051(zhi)002:4063: bcas bcos dang yid smon gyi chos la khro /
NK051(zhi)002:4064: mdzad pa dang bcas nas khro ba ni bya btsal rtsol grub kyi chos thams cad la khro ste /
NK051(zhi)002:4065: byar med blo 'das rtogs te 'khrul pa rtsad nas bcad do //
NK051(zhi)002:4066: rgyal zhes pa 'khrul snang 'khor ba'i chos las rgyal /
NK051(zhi)002:4068: lta ba gza' gtad med pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:4069: bsgom pa dmigs pa med pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:4070: spyod pa bya rtsol med pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:4071: phrin las rtsol du med pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:4072: dam tshig bsrung du med pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:4073: 'bras bu bsgrub tu med pa dang drug la gdong drug ces bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4074: 'jigs bya ba blos btags kyi lta ba la sogs pa rnams 'jigs par byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4075: mig drug ye shes zang thal gyi mig drug /
NK051(zhi)002:4076: lag drug ni gsang ba'i chos drug /
NK051(zhi)002:4077: stobs dang ldan ces pa theg pa dgu'i lta sgom
NK051(zhi)002:4078: spyod 'bras zil gyis gnon pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'o
NK051(zhi)002:4079: // keng rus mche ba gtsig pa po //
NK051(zhi)002:4081: keng rus zhes bya ba ka dag /
NK051(zhi)002:4083: gtsigs pa po ni byar med blo 'das so //
NK051(zhi)002:4084: ha la ha la gdong brgyad pa /
NK051(zhi)002:4086: ha la ha la zhes pa skye med ka dag ste /
NK051(zhi)002:4087: 'khrul pa rtsad chod la bya ba thongs zhes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4088: gdong brgya pa zhes pa khro bo la gdong brgya
NK051(zhi)002:4089: pa yod par 'dod de rdo rje rtse mo'i rgyud
NK051(zhi)002:4090: las gsungs so // yang na yon tan gyi snang tshul brgya yod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4091: gshin rje gshed po bgegs kyi rgyal //
NK051(zhi)002:4096: gsang ba'i gshin rje dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:4097: de la phyi'i gshin rje ni /
NK051(zhi)002:4098: gshin khams gsum gyi sems can /
NK051(zhi)002:4099: rje de'i srog 'phrog pa'i mi ma yin /
NK051(zhi)002:4102: de'i gshed po ni a ba glang mgo can no //
NK051(zhi)002:4103: nang gi gshin rje gshed ni /
NK051(zhi)002:4106: de'i gshed po ni rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas so //
NK051(zhi)002:4107: gsang ba'i gshin rje gshed ni /
NK051(zhi)002:4108: gshin ni 'dus byas kyi phung po lnga /
NK051(zhi)002:4109: rje ni kun btags kyi phung po lnga la rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas kyis rgyas btab pas na rje'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4110: de'i gshed po ni lta bsgom spyod 'bras so //
NK051(zhi)002:4111: bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu las rgyal bas na rgyal zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4112: rdo rje shugs can 'jigs byed pa //
NK051(zhi)002:4114: rdo rjee ni 'gyur ba med pa'i rdo rje'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4115: shugs ni skye med ka dag rtogs pa'i shugs can no //
NK051(zhi)002:4116: 'jigs par byed pa ni snod kyi 'jig rten gyi 'khrul snang thams cad 'jigs par byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4117: de ni dam tshig chen po'i rgyud dang /
NK051(zhi)002:4118: dpal zla gsang thig le'i rgyud las btus so //
NK051(zhi)002:4119: rdo rje grags pa rdo rje'i snying //
NK051(zhi)002:4121: rdo rje ni dbyer mi phyed pa'i rdo rje /
NK051(zhi)002:4122: grags pa rdo rje'i snying ni theg pa'i yang snying ngo //
NK051(zhi)002:4123: dpal rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las gsungs so //
NK051(zhi)002:4124: sgyu 'phrul rdo rje gsus po che //
NK051(zhi)002:4128: rdo rje snying po dang yan lag gnyis dbyer med pa'i rdo rje'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4129: gsus po che zhes pa chos sde brgyad khri bzhi stong 'byung zhing 'ongs pas na gsus po che'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4130: rdo rje las skyes rdo rje'i bdag /
NK051(zhi)002:4132: rdo rje ni skye ba med pa'i rdo rje /
NK051(zhi)002:4133: las skyes ni stong pa las kun 'byung 'od gsal skyes /
NK051(zhi)002:4134: rdo rje ni dbyer med mi phyed pa /
NK051(zhi)002:4135: bdag ni gtso bo'i don no //
NK051(zhi)002:4136: dpal 'byung po 'dul byed kyi rgyud nas gsungs so //
NK051(zhi)002:4137: rdo rje snying po mkha' 'dra ba //
NK051(zhi)002:4139: rdo rje gzhan zil gyis gnon pas rdo rje /
NK051(zhi)002:4140: snying po ni yang snying ngam nying khu'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4141: mkha' 'dra ba ni stong nyid 'od gsal phyogs med de nyid do //
NK051(zhi)002:4142: dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud nas btus pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4143: mi g.yo ral pa gcig gis bsgyings //
NK051(zhi)002:4145: mi g.yo ba ni bdud dang bgegs dang rnam par rtog pa'i dbang du sems mi g.yo ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4146: ral pa gcig gis zhes pa ni chos thams cad thig le nyag gcig tu 'dus pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4147: bsgyings pa ni ye shes gcig tu bsgyings pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4148: dpal sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i rgyud nas gsungs so //
NK051(zhi)002:4149: glang chen ko rlon gos su gyon //
NK051(zhi)002:4151: glang chen ni rdzogs pa chen po'i spyod pa la nyam nga ba dang bag tsha ba med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4152: yang na gti mug 'joms pa'i rtags su glang chen
NK051(zhi)002:4153: ko rlon gyis gos dang dur khrod chas brgyad do
NK051(zhi)002:4154: // gos su gyon pa ni byams pa dang snying rje'i gos gyon pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4155: drag cing h+aa h+aa zhes sgrogs pa //
NK051(zhi)002:4157: drag pa ni gdams ngag thog dang 'dra ba ste drag pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4158: h+aa h+aa zhes pa ni khro bo'i skad do //
NK051(zhi)002:4159: zhes sgrogs pa ni khro bo chen pos sgrogs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4160: h+ai h+ai zhes sgrogs 'jigs par byed //
NK051(zhi)002:4162: khro bo de rnams kyi skad ni h+ai h+ai zhes kyang sgra sgrogs par byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4163: gad mo chen po gad rgyangs can //
NK051(zhi)002:4165: gad mo che ni 'od gsal chen po'i don la dgod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4166: chen po ni theg pa chen po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4167: gad rgyangs ni theg pa brgyad la sgrogs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4168: rdo rje gad mo cher sgrogs pa //
NK051(zhi)002:4170: rdo rje ni 'joms par byed pa'i rdo rjee /
NK051(zhi)002:4171: gad mo ni bde ba chen po'i chos nyid la dgyes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4172: cher sgrogs pa ni dgyes pa'i ngo mtshar che ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4173: rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
NK051(zhi)002:4175: 'di yo ga'i theg pa lha'i ngos bzung ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4177: sems dpa' sems dpa' che ni yo ga'i sems dpa' bcu drug go //
NK051(zhi)002:4178: che zhes pa rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas te /
NK051(zhi)002:4179: 'khor sems dpa' bcu drug gis bskor bas che ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4180: rdo rje rgyal po bde ba che //
NK051(zhi)002:4182: rdo rje ni chos nyid kyi rdo rje /
NK051(zhi)002:4183: rgyal po ni dug lnga las rgyal lo //
NK051(zhi)002:4184: bde ba chen po ni chos nyid 'od gsal chen po'i bde ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4185: rdo rje drag po dga' ba che //
NK051(zhi)002:4187: rdo rjee ni skye ba med pa'i rdo rje /
NK051(zhi)002:4188: drag po ni nyon mongs pa rnams 'joms pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4189: dga' ba che ni gnyis su med pa'i don la dga' ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4190: rdo rje h'u ste h'u zhes sgrogs //
NK051(zhi)002:4192: rdo rje skye 'jig med pa'i rdo rje /
NK051(zhi)002:4193: h'u ste ni thugs mi g.yo ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4194: h'u zhes sgrogs pa ni thugs kyi dgongs pa zab
NK051(zhi)002:4195: mo rtogs shing 'chang ba des 'gro ba la yang
NK051(zhi)002:4197: mtshon du rdo rje'i mda' thogs pa //
NK051(zhi)002:4199: mtshon rnams kyi nang nas gzhan 'joms par byed pa'i rdo rje'i mda' des /
NK051(zhi)002:4200: nyon mongs pa'i 'gong po nga bdag la brdeg pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4201: thogs pa ni 'jam dpal gyi phyag g.yas pa'i phyag mtshan no //
NK051(zhi)002:4202: rdo rje ral gri ma lus gcod //
NK051(zhi)002:4204: rdo rje ni 'du 'bral med pa'i chos nyid kyi rdo rje /
NK051(zhi)002:4205: ral gri ni nyon mongs pa gcod par byed pa /
NK051(zhi)002:4206: ma lus pa ni shes rab kyi ral gri des
NK051(zhi)002:4207: nyon mongs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong mtshan ma'i rtog
NK051(zhi)002:4208: pa ma lus pa rtsad nas gcod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4209: rdo rje kun 'chang rdo rje can //
NK051(zhi)002:4211: rdo rjee ni ka dag chen po'i rdo rje /
NK051(zhi)002:4212: kun 'chang zhes pa skal ldan gyi rnal 'byor pa
NK051(zhi)002:4213: la zab mo'i don gdams ngag thams cad 'chang ba'o
NK051(zhi)002:4214: // rdo rjee can zhes pa ni dngos po med pa'i rdo rje'i don no //
NK051(zhi)002:4215: rdo rjee gcig pu g.yul sel ba //
NK051(zhi)002:4217: rdo rje ni snying po skye ba med pa'i yang snying ngo //
NK051(zhi)002:4218: de gcig pus mi shes shing rmongs pa'i 'khor ba'i g.yul ngo thams cad sel ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4219: rdo rje 'bar ba mig mi bzad //
NK051(zhi)002:4221: rdo rje ni ka dag chen po'i rdo rje /
NK051(zhi)002:4222: 'bar ba ni ye shes kyi 'od 'bar ba /
NK051(zhi)002:4223: mig mi bzad ces pa shes rab ye shes kyi spyan te /
NK051(zhi)002:4224: gsal dag zang thal chen por mthong ba'i mig go //
NK051(zhi)002:4225: skra yang rdo rjee 'bar ba ste /
NK051(zhi)002:4227: rdo rje don gong du bshad do //
NK051(zhi)002:4228: rdo rje'i skra ni 'gyur ba med pa'i rtags so //
NK051(zhi)002:4229: 'bar ba ni rdo rje la gzhan 'joms par byed pa'i 'od 'bar ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4232: rdo rje ni ka dag chen po'i rdo rjee /
NK051(zhi)002:4233: des gzhan gyi lta sgom gtan la 'bebs pas na 'bebs zhes gsungs so //
NK051(zhi)002:4234: 'bebs pa che zhes pa spyi ti yo ga'i theg pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4235: mig brgya pa ste rdo rje'i mig /
NK051(zhi)002:4237: 'khrul pa rtsad gcod pa'i man ngag dngos bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:4238: mig brgya pa ste rdo rje'i mig /
NK051(zhi)002:4240: snang srid dngos po'i chos thams cad ma lus lus
NK051(zhi)002:4241: pa med par gsal dag zang thal 'od gsal chen
NK051(zhi)002:4242: po dus gsum 'pho 'gyur med par gzigs pas rdo
NK051(zhi)002:4244: lus ni rdo rje'i ba spu can //
NK051(zhi)002:4246: lus thams cad kyang rdo rje'i spus gtams te /
NK051(zhi)002:4247: 'gyur ba med cing skye 'jigs med pa'i rtags so //
NK051(zhi)002:4248: rdo rje'i spu ni gcig pu'i lus //
NK051(zhi)002:4250: rdo rje ni dbyer med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4251: spu ni ye shes kyi spu'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4252: gcig spu'i lus ni skye med 'gyur med kyi lus so //
NK051(zhi)002:4253: sen mo skyes pa rdo rje'i rtse //
NK051(zhi)002:4255: 'gyur ba med pa'i rdo rje lags te /
NK051(zhi)002:4256: lus thams cad rdo rjes gtams /
NK051(zhi)002:4257: sen mo yan chod rdo rjer gyur pa ni chos nyid mi 'gyur ba'i brda' bstan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4258: rdo rje snying po lpags pa mkhregs //
NK051(zhi)002:4260: rdo rjee ni stong pa nyid kyi rdo rje /
NK051(zhi)002:4261: snying po ni bcud du gyur pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4262: lpags pa ni sra zhing mkhregs pa dang ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4263: rdo rje phreng thogs dpal dang ldan //
NK051(zhi)002:4265: rdo rje ni rgyu rkyen med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4266: phreng thogs ni chos nyid ka dag de rkyen khar mi gtong zhing rang gi rgyud la 'dzin pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4267: dpal dang ldan ces pa skal ba dang ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4268: rdo rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste //
NK051(zhi)002:4270: rdo rje ni dgag sgrub med pa'i rdo rje'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4271: rgyan ni rdo rje'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa
NK051(zhi)002:4272: ste chos nyid 'gyur ba med pas gnyis su med
NK051(zhi)002:4274: gang rgyangs h+aa h+aa nges par sgrogs //
NK051(zhi)002:4276: gad rgyangs ni khro bo'i gad rgyangs so //
NK051(zhi)002:4277: ji ltar sgrogs na khro bo de rnams kyi zhal nas h+aa h+aa zhes pa'i sgra sgrogs so //
NK051(zhi)002:4278: yi ge drug pa rdo rje'i sgra //
NK051(zhi)002:4280: 'grel pa bar pa nas bshad pa ni /
NK051(zhi)002:4281: rdo rje'i gdan la sangs rgyas phyir na bdud 'dul
NK051(zhi)002:4282: ba'i phyir gshin rje gshed pos yi ge drug pa'i
NK051(zhi)002:4283: sgra bsgrags so // yi ge drug gang zhe na /
NK051(zhi)002:4286: yang na da res spyi ti yo ga'i 'grel pa ltar bshad na /
NK051(zhi)002:4287: yi ge drug pa rdo rje'i sgra //
NK051(zhi)002:4289: de la yi ge drug po de /
NK051(zhi)002:4294: sgra drug dang sum cu tham pa ste /
NK051(zhi)002:4295: de la yi ge drug ni /
NK051(zhi)002:4304: ma ning gi yi ge dang /
NK051(zhi)002:4305: snang ldan gyi yi ge dang /
NK051(zhi)002:4306: snang mi ldan gyi yi ge dang /
NK051(zhi)002:4307: kas ma shi'i yi ge dang drug go //
NK051(zhi)002:4308: 'jam dpal gyi yang snying drug ni /
NK051(zhi)002:4309: w+aa gi shwa ri mum drug go //
NK051(zhi)002:4316: chos kyi brda dang drug go //
NK051(zhi)002:4322: s+w+aa ni yon tan gyi brda /
NK051(zhi)002:4323: h+aa ni dgyes pa'i brda dang drug go //
NK051(zhi)002:4330: med pa'i sgra dang drug go //
NK051(zhi)002:4331: rdo rje'i sgra zhes pa sgra drug tu bshad na /
NK051(zhi)002:4332: de la snang ba'i sgra ni /
NK051(zhi)002:4333: snang srid kyi sems can skye 'gro gzugs kyis bsdus
NK051(zhi)002:4334: pa thams cad la rang rang gi skad dang sgra
NK051(zhi)002:4335: rang chas su yod pa ni snang ba'i sgra'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4337: nam mkha' stong pa las 'brug dang thog gi sgra ni stong pa'i sgra'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4339: rnga bo che dang zangs dung dang cha lang dang dril bu dang dung slogs pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:4340: brdung zhing bus shing dkrol ba la sogs pa ni byas pa'i sgra'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4341: ma byas pa'i sgra ni chu sgra dang rlung sgra
NK051(zhi)002:4342: dang me sgra la sogs pa 'byung ba lnga la
NK051(zhi)002:4343: sgra rang chas su yod pa ni ma byas pa
NK051(zhi)002:4344: 'byung ba'i sgra'o // yod pa'i sgra ni gzugs can
NK051(zhi)002:4345: gyi dngos po la sgra sna tshogs 'byung ba ni
NK051(zhi)002:4346: 'byung ba'i sgra'o // yod pa'i sgra'o // med pa'i
NK051(zhi)002:4347: sgra ni gzugs kyi dngos po ci yang med pa
NK051(zhi)002:4348: la stong pa'i sgra 'byung ba ni dper na brag
NK051(zhi)002:4350: stong pa la 'ur 'ur tog tshal sgra chems pa'i sgra 'byung ba ni med pa'i sgra'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4351: yang na sgra khyad par 'phags pa ni /
NK051(zhi)002:4352: don dam pa chos nyid kyi sgra'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4353: yang na yi ge drug ni /
NK051(zhi)002:4354: a kha zha sod h'u 'a dang drug go //
NK051(zhi)002:4355: a ni skye med ka dag la /
NK051(zhi)002:4356: kha ni rig pa 'gag med 'od gsal chen por shar /
NK051(zhi)002:4357: nga ni nga bdag ma rig dbang gis chos nyid don ma rtogs /
NK051(zhi)002:4358: nga las dug lnga'i dgra langs /
NK051(zhi)002:4360: zha zhes pa spyi ti yo ga'i skye med ka dag gdams ngag gis /
NK051(zhi)002:4361: nga bdag dug gsum rang bzhin snying po sku gsung thugs /
NK051(zhi)002:4362: nyon mongs pa rang bzhin 'khrul pa byung sar thim /
NK051(zhi)002:4363: sgo lnga yul lnga mtshan ma rang sar thim /
NK051(zhi)002:4364: ma rig 'khrul sgo bcad pas 'khor ba'i 'dam nas thar /
NK051(zhi)002:4365: sod nyon mongs zhi bas 'gro drug g.yang sa bcad ces gsungs so //
NK051(zhi)002:4366: h+aum ni chos can mtshan ma'i bye brag chos nyid dbyings su bsdud /
NK051(zhi)002:4367: 'a ni skye med chos nyid klong du thim /
NK051(zhi)002:4368: yig ge drug pas chos rnams gtan la 'bebs /
NK051(zhi)002:4370: rdo rje ni gong du bshad zin no //
NK051(zhi)002:4371: yang rdo skye ba med pa /
NK051(zhi)002:4373: sgra ni skye 'gag gnyis su med pa chos kyi sgra'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4374: 'jam dbyangs chen po'i sgra che ba //
NK051(zhi)002:4376: 'jam pa ni zug rngu med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4377: dbyangs kyi lta ba la phyogs dang ris med pas yangs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4378: chen po ni gzhan las khyad du 'phags pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4379: sgra che ba ni spyi ti yo ga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4380: 'jig rten gsum na sgra gcig pa //
NK051(zhi)002:4383: sa steng sa 'og sa bla dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:4384: de gsum na sgra gcig yod pa ni 'adi'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4385: sgra de gsod par byed pa ni skye med ka dag byar med blo 'das so //
NK051(zhi)002:4386: nam mkha'i mtha' klas sgra sgrogs pa //
NK051(zhi)002:4388: chos nyid nam mkha' rgyu rkyen skye 'jig mtha' dbus phyogs ris med pa'i nam mkha' nas /
NK051(zhi)002:4389: rtsal dang rol pa dang snang tshul dang mtshan ma sna tshogs kyi sgra sgrogs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4394: nam mkha'i mtha' klas zhes pas dpes bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:4395: dper na nam mkha'i klong dkyil nas /
NK051(zhi)002:4396: 'brug sgra thog glog nyi zla gza' skar dang /
NK051(zhi)002:4397: sprin dang khu rlangs tsha ser dang /
NK051(zhi)002:4398: de la sogs pa'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs rnams yang nam mkha'i klong nas byung /
NK051(zhi)002:4399: sangs kyang nam mkha' rang la sangs /
NK051(zhi)002:4400: nam mkha'i ngang nas byung zhing thim /
NK051(zhi)002:4401: thim yang nam mkha' nyid du thim /
NK051(zhi)002:4402: grol yang de nyid rang du grol /
NK051(zhi)002:4403: sprin dang khu rlangs char ser thog glog nam mkha'i ngang du 'das so //
NK051(zhi)002:4404: nam mkha' dang nam mkha'i cho 'phrul gnyis dbyer med par 'dres so //
NK051(zhi)002:4405: sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:4407: sgra ni 'brug dang sgra dang thog la sogs pa'i cho 'phrul rnams so //
NK051(zhi)002:4408: ldan zhes pa 'khrul pa rtsad nas bcad pa'i gdams ngag la /
NK051(zhi)002:4409: snying po ma'i klong nas rtsal zer bu rnams shar /
NK051(zhi)002:4410: rang byung ngang dwangs snying po'i klong na thim /
NK051(zhi)002:4411: gang gi 'khrul lugs 'khrul snang thams cad kun /
NK051(zhi)002:4412: rang byung ngang 'das skye med ka dag ma'i dbyings su thim mo //
NK051(zhi)002:4413: rnams kyi mchog ni skabs rnams kyi nang nas /
NK051(zhi)002:4414: 'khrul pa rtsad gcod pa'i mchog ni rdo rje 'bar ba'i le'u'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4415: rdo rje ral gris ma lus gcod //
NK051(zhi)002:4417: 'khrul gzhi 'khrul pa 'khrul snang 'khor ba'i chos thams
NK051(zhi)002:4418: cad rtsad nas gcod pas na rnams kyi mchog ces
NK051(zhi)002:4419: gsungs so // de yan chod don chen mtshungs med ces pa dang sbyar ro //
NK051(zhi)002:4420: skabs de ni me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi
NK051(zhi)002:4421: sgo nas rdo rje sems dpa'i 'khor la bstod pa
NK051(zhi)002:4422: dang / bye brag shan gyi bka' tshom bstan pa'i skabs so //
NK051(zhi)002:4423: yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid //
NK051(zhi)002:4425: ye shes me lce 'od rab gsal //
NK051(zhi)002:4426: zhes bya ba yan chod kyis tshig 'grel pa ma gzhi phra'o khra brtag bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:4427: don rgya che ba dang sbyar ro //
NK051(zhi)002:4428: yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid //
NK051(zhi)002:4430: 'bru lnga'am bcu tham par bshad de /
NK051(zhi)002:4431: bdag med ces pa mtshan nyid sde gsum bstan /
NK051(zhi)002:4432: de bzhin ces pas kri yog sde gsum gyi theg pa bstan /
NK051(zhi)002:4433: yang dag ces pas bskyed rdzogs rnam pa gsum gyi theg pa bstan /
NK051(zhi)002:4434: nyid ces pas rdzogs chen spyi ti yo ga'i theg pa bstan /
NK051(zhi)002:4435: de las spyi ti'i 'grel pa las /
NK051(zhi)002:4436: yang dag ni ka dag gi ye shes so //
NK051(zhi)002:4437: bdag med ces pa skye ba med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4438: de bzhin nyid ces pa ni byar med blo 'das so //
NK051(zhi)002:4439: yang dag mtha' ste yi ge med //
NK051(zhi)002:4441: yang dag ni snying po ma lus pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4442: mtha' ste ni chos nyid mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so //
NK051(zhi)002:4443: don de la yi ges mtshon du med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4444: stong nyid smra ba'i khyu mchog ste //
NK051(zhi)002:4446: stong nyid ni chos nyid do //
NK051(zhi)002:4447: smra ba'i khyu mchog ni gsang ba'i bdag po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4448: zab cing rgya che'i sgra sgrogs pa //
NK051(zhi)002:4450: zab pa ni yang dag pa'i don ming med blo 'das chen po ste bstan du med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4451: rgya che ba ni thabs rgya che ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4452: sgra sgrogs pa zhes pa ni /
NK051(zhi)002:4455: don mtshungs pa med pa'i sgra bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag pos sgrogs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4456: chos kyi dung ste sgra chen ldan //
NK051(zhi)002:4458: chos kyi dung ste zhes pa /
NK051(zhi)002:4459: theg pa dgu rtse mi dang lha'i yul du 'byung ba'i dus na /
NK051(zhi)002:4460: sgra chen ldan ni rnam pa sna tshogs te /
NK051(zhi)002:4463: gling bu la sogs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen
NK051(zhi)002:4464: po'i rna ba rnams su thos pas sgra che ba
NK051(zhi)002:4465: dang ldan no // chos kyi gan+di sgra bo che //
NK051(zhi)002:4467: btsun pa chos ston bza' khar gan+di brdungs pas /
NK051(zhi)002:4468: btsun pa yo 'bod mi dgos par 'ongs pa ltar /
NK051(zhi)002:4469: sngon bcom ldan 'das bya rgod phung po'i ri la
NK051(zhi)002:4470: chos gsungs pa'i dus su chos kyi gan+di'am rnga bo
NK051(zhi)002:4471: che brdungs pas / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
NK051(zhi)002:4472: 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus par sgra chen pos
NK051(zhi)002:4473: che brdungs pas / khyab / kun gyis thos pas na sgra bo che zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4474: mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa po //
NK051(zhi)002:4476: 'khor ba'i chos gang la yang mi gnas te /
NK051(zhi)002:4477: dngos po snang srid kyi chos la yang mi gnas pas mya ngan las 'das te /
NK051(zhi)002:4478: thar pa dang bde ba thob pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4479: phyogs bcu'i chos kyi rnga bo che //
NK051(zhi)002:4481: phyogs bcu'i chos zhes pa phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi
NK051(zhi)002:4482: chos thams cad na yod pa'i chos thams cad kyi
NK051(zhi)002:4483: rnga bo che lta bu ni /
NK051(zhi)002:4484: rdzogs chen thod rgal spyi ti yo ga'i theg pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4485: gzugs med gzugs bzang dam pa ste //
NK051(zhi)002:4487: gzugs med pa ni chos sku'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4488: gzugs bzang pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4489: dam pa ste d+harma ka ya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4490: sna tshogs gzugs can sprul pa'i sku'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4491: sna tshogs gzugs can yid las skyes //
NK051(zhi)002:4493: yid la 'gyu zhing kun tu 'tshol ba'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa ste /
NK051(zhi)002:4494: yid gnyis las sems can thams cad skyes zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4495: gzugs rnams thams cad snang ba'i dpal //
NK051(zhi)002:4497: gang du 'khrul pa bstan pa'i lung drangs ste /
NK051(zhi)002:4498: yid dang dngos po rkyen snang gi 'khrul pa gzugs kyi bye brag bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:4500: sems can ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i gzugs bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:4501: 'gro ba rigs drug skye ba rnam bzhi /
NK051(zhi)002:4505: gzugs can gyi sems can ma lus pa la bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4507: gang gi gzugs can gyi sems can thams cad kyi
NK051(zhi)002:4508: mgon dpal ni bcom ldan 'das sh+aakya thub pa yin
NK051(zhi)002:4509: no // gzugs brnyan ma lus 'chang ba po //
NK051(zhi)002:4511: gzugs ni mi 'dra ba rnam pa sna tshogs la /
NK051(zhi)002:4512: ma rtogs pa'i dus na nyon mongs pa can gyi yid 'chang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4513: rtogs pa'i dus na rang byung gi ye shes 'chang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4514: tshugs pa med cing che bar grags //
NK051(zhi)002:4516: tshugs pa med ces pa skye med ka dag gi
NK051(zhi)002:4517: dgongs pa de la nyon mongs pa'i bdud gang gis
NK051(zhi)002:4519: che bar grags pa ni snying po'i don chen po la spyi ti yo gar grags so //
NK051(zhi)002:4520: khams gsum dbang phyug chen po ste //
NK051(zhi)002:4525: gzugs med pa'i khams dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:4526: dbang ni skye ba med pa la dbang la /
NK051(zhi)002:4527: phyug ni rtog pa'i ye shes kyis phyug go //
NK051(zhi)002:4528: chen po ni spyi ti yo ga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4529: 'phags lam shin tu mtho la gnas //
NK051(zhi)002:4531: 'phags lam zhes pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad do //
NK051(zhi)002:4532: shin tu zhes pa ni zab mo'i gdams ngag go //
NK051(zhi)002:4534: 'phags pa'i lam la theg pa 'di matho'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4535: dar ba chen po chos kyi tog /
NK051(zhi)002:4537: dar ba ni lnga brgya dus kyi tha ma la zab mo'i chos dar ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4538: chen po ni rdzogs pa chen po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4539: chos kyi tog ces pa ni rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo dang 'dra ste /
NK051(zhi)002:4540: chos thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan ni rdzogs pa chen po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4541: gong rgyal spyi ti yo ga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4542: 'jig rten gsum na gzhon lus gcig /
NK051(zhi)002:4544: steng lha dang bar mi dang 'og klu'i 'jig rten dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:4545: gzhon lus dang ldan pa ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal yin te /
NK051(zhi)002:4546: byis pa lo brgyad lon pa'i cha byad du bzhugs so //
NK051(zhi)002:4547: gnas brtan rgan po skye rgu'i bdag /
NK051(zhi)002:4549: gnas brtan ni sems can thams cad kyi gazhi'am kun gzhi yin no //
NK051(zhi)002:4550: rgan po ni kun gzhi 'dus ma byas pa'i chos nyid kyi stong ra chen po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4552: skye rgu ni 'gro ba rigs drug gi sems can
NK051(zhi)002:4553: du skye ba'i ma'am gnas brtan lta bu ni kun
NK051(zhi)002:4554: gzhi'i rnam par shes pa yin no //
NK051(zhi)002:4555: yang na gnas brtan ni nyan thos /
NK051(zhi)002:4556: rgan po ni rang sangs rgyas /
NK051(zhi)002:4557: skye rgu'i bdag po ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4558: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba //
NK051(zhi)002:4560: bcom ldan 'das la mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis /
NK051(zhi)002:4561: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4562: zhib tu ni mtshan dpe las shes par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4563: sdug gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes //
NK051(zhi)002:4566: 'jig rten gsum po na mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba ni bcom ldan 'das sh+aakya thub pa ste /
NK051(zhi)002:4567: sku blta bas mi ngoms pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4568: 'jig rten shes legs slob dpon te //
NK051(zhi)002:4570: 'jig rten gyi sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams la
NK051(zhi)002:4571: shes pa dang legs par slob pa ni bcom ldan
NK051(zhi)002:4572: 'das sam slob dpon dga' rab rdo rje lta bu'o
NK051(zhi)002:4575: 'jig rten gyi slob dpon bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig
NK051(zhi)002:4576: rten mi rnams la sdug bsngal dang nyon mongs pas
NK051(zhi)002:4578: der gzod 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams kyis chos
NK051(zhi)002:4579: go bas sdug bsngal gyis mi 'jigs pas na 'jigs
NK051(zhi)002:4581: mgon skyob 'jig rten yid bcugs pa //
NK051(zhi)002:4583: sems can mgon dang skyabs med pa rnams la mgon skyabs mdzad pa ni bcom ldan 'das so //
NK051(zhi)002:4584: yid gcugs zhes pa 'jig rten gyi sems can sdug bsngal zhing nyon mongs pa rnams la /
NK051(zhi)002:4585: bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs rjes yid bcugs shing gdungs nas 'gro ba rnams 'dul ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4586: skyabs dang skyob pa bla na med //
NK051(zhi)002:4588: skyabs ni sems can rnams kyi skyabs mdzad pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4589: skyob pa ni ston pa'i thugs rjes skyob pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4590: bla na med pa ni gsang ba'i bdag po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4591: nam mkha'i mtha' la longs spyod pa //
NK051(zhi)002:4593: nam mkha' ni 'dus ma byas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4594: mtha' la longs spyod pa zhes pa /
NK051(zhi)002:4595: mtha' dang dbus mi mnga' ste /
NK051(zhi)002:4596: dbye bsal med pa'i dgongs pa bstan no //
NK051(zhi)002:4598: lta ba nam mkha' la longs spyod /
NK051(zhi)002:4599: sgom pa nyi zla la longs spyod /
NK051(zhi)002:4600: spyod pa me tog dang bung ba la longs spyod /
NK051(zhi)002:4601: 'bras bu ni ri rgyal lhun po lta bu la longs spyod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4602: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mtsho //
NK051(zhi)002:4604: thams cad ni ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams la bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4606: ji snyed pa mkhyen pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:4607: ji lta ba mkhyen pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:4608: mchog mkhyen pa ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4610: ston pa gsang ba'i bdag pos theg pa'i chos thams cad mkhyen pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4612: ye shes ni mi shes pa med pa ste /
NK051(zhi)002:4613: skye med ka dag gi ye shes so //
NK051(zhi)002:4614: mtsho zhes pa chos rgya mtsho lta bu shes pas /
NK051(zhi)002:4615: dgongs pa rgya mtsho lta bu la longs spyod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4616: yang na rgya mtsho lta bu phyes te bshad na /
NK051(zhi)002:4628: sems nyid la lta ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:4633: rtogs pa'i thabs rgya mtsho dang /
NK051(zhi)002:4634: mngon du gyur pa rgya mtsho dang /
NK051(zhi)002:4635: yongs su grub pa rgya mtsho dang /
NK051(zhi)002:4636: de nyid grol ba man ngag rgya mtsho dang /
NK051(zhi)002:4637: 'bras bu sku gsum rang gnas chig chod rgya mtsho dang 'dra'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4638: ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs 'byed pa //
NK051(zhi)002:4643: ma rig pa zhes pa de rang yin te /
NK051(zhi)002:4644: rig pa des skye med ka dag gi don ma rig pas na ma rig pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4647: bu rig pa rtsal dang yan lag /
NK051(zhi)002:4648: bu des snying po ye nas gnas pa'i don ma shes /
NK051(zhi)002:4649: ma rig pas na der ma rig pa zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4650: sgo nga ni srid pa'i sgo nga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4652: mngal nas srid pa'i sgo nga dang /
NK051(zhi)002:4653: drod gsher las srid pa'i sgo nga dang /
NK051(zhi)002:4654: bardzusa te srid pa'i sgo nga dang /
NK051(zhi)002:4655: sgo nga las skyes pa'i srid pa ste /
NK051(zhi)002:4656: de bzhi las gang skyes pa ni shes par bya go sla'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4658: 'gyur ba med pa rin po che'i sbubs dang /
NK051(zhi)002:4660: rnam rtog bag chags sha khrag gi sbubs dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:4661: de gsum la gdams ngag gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:4662: 'byed pa zhes pas gdams ngag bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:4664: ma rig pa'i sbubs gnyis gnyis su 'byed do //
NK051(zhi)002:4665: de ka la yar sangs rgyas /
NK051(zhi)002:4666: mar sems can gyi 'khrul pa'i dpe mtshams zhes bya
NK051(zhi)002:4667: ste sangs rgyas dang sems can gnyis kyi spyi sa'o
NK051(zhi)002:4668: // srid pa'i d+r+wa ba 'joms pa po //
NK051(zhi)002:4670: srid pa'i skye gnas d+r+wa ba dag 'dra ba'i rgyar 'thums pas na /
NK051(zhi)002:4671: ma rig pa'i 'khrul sgor tshud de /
NK051(zhi)002:4672: khams gsum sdug bsngal zad med du myong ngo //
NK051(zhi)002:4673: 'o na da cis lan byas pas /
NK051(zhi)002:4674: nyon mongs pas ni sems dkrugs pas //
NK051(zhi)002:4677: 'gong po bdag ma thul bas sems can rnams ngan
NK051(zhi)002:4678: song rgyud gsum du bying zhing khams gsum 'khor bar
NK051(zhi)002:4679: 'khyams so // srid pa'i d+r+wa ba 'joms pa po //
NK051(zhi)002:4681: ye shes kyi 'char sgo brtan te /
NK051(zhi)002:4682: rig pa tho cho mkhan rig rigs sangs sangs phya phya ban bun po des /
NK051(zhi)002:4683: ka dag ma shes gnas pa'i don ma rig pas srid pa'i d+r+wa bar tshud cing 'thum pa la /
NK051(zhi)002:4684: 'byed pa zhes pas bla ma'i gdams ngag bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:4685: 'byed pa med pa'i gti mug chen po gang ba dbye bsal med pa'i dgongs pa des /
NK051(zhi)002:4686: rig rig sangs sangs phya phya bun bun po'i rtsad bcad pas /
NK051(zhi)002:4687: ris med ka dag chen por rtogs pas na /
NK051(zhi)002:4689: nyon mongs ma lus zhi byed pa //
NK051(zhi)002:4691: nyon mongs pa ni sems can /
NK051(zhi)002:4694: sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs skye med ka dag chen po rtogs pas zhi bar byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4695: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin //
NK051(zhi)002:4697: 'khor ba ni sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho ste /
NK051(zhi)002:4698: de las pha rol tu phyin par byed pa /
NK051(zhi)002:4699: gru pa ni bla ma'i gdams ngag 'di lta bu ste /
NK051(zhi)002:4706: dngos med dran med shes na 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal
NK051(zhi)002:4707: srid pa'i 'dod chags kyi rgya mtsho chen po las
NK051(zhi)002:4708: sgrol ba'i gru pa chen po ste /
NK051(zhi)002:4709: cang med dngos med dwangs sang nge //
NK051(zhi)002:4710: tha snyad mtshon pa'i yul las 'das //
NK051(zhi)002:4711: blo yi chos rnams kun las grol //
NK051(zhi)002:4713: ye shes dbang bskur cod pan can //
NK051(zhi)002:4715: ye shes ni ka dag gi ye shes /
NK051(zhi)002:4716: dbang bskur ni skye med ka dag gi dbang bskur /
NK051(zhi)002:4717: cod pan ni dbu'i cod pan can no //
NK051(zhi)002:4718: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan du thogs //
NK051(zhi)002:4720: rdzogs pa ni lhag ma ma lus pa'i don no //
NK051(zhi)002:4721: sangs pa ni nyon mongs pa sangs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4722: rgyas pa ni ye shes chen po rgyas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4723: rgyan du thogs pa ni snang srid kyi chos thams cad rol pa'i rgyan du shar bas so //
NK051(zhi)002:4724: sdug bsngal gsum gyi sdug bsngal zhi //
NK051(zhi)002:4727: sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dang /
NK051(zhi)002:4729: mtshan ma'i sdug bsngal dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:4730: yang na sdug bsngal gsum ni /
NK051(zhi)002:4731: lus na tsha'i sdug bsngal dang /
NK051(zhi)002:4732: sems zhe 'dod kyi sdug bsngal dang /
NK051(zhi)002:4733: snang ba phyogs ris kyi sdug bsngal dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:4734: sdug bsngal zhi zhes pa lus ngag yid gsum gyi bya ba btang bas /
NK051(zhi)002:4735: gzung 'dzin dang zhe 'dod med pas sdug bsngal zhi zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4736: gsum sel mtha' yas grol gsum thob //
NK051(zhi)002:4738: gang gi sdug bsngal gsum sel ba la zer ba yin te /
NK051(zhi)002:4739: de la bla ma'i gdams ngag gnad kyi man ngag bco brgyad khrigs kyi man ngag bstan no //
NK051(zhi)002:4740: yang na 'khrul lugs gsum sel zhes pa 'khrul pa'i gcad lugs gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:4741: mtha' yas zhes pa nyon mongs rnam rtog 'khrul snang mtha' yas so //
NK051(zhi)002:4742: grol gsum zhes pa grol lugs gsum gyi gdams ngag bstan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4743: sgrib pa kun las nges par grol //
NK051(zhi)002:4745: sgrib pa ni thar pa thob tu mi ster ba'i sgrib pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4746: kun las nges par grol zhes pa ni /
NK051(zhi)002:4747: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:4750: bag chags kyi sgrib pa rnams so //
NK051(zhi)002:4751: sgrib pa kun las skye med ka dag gi gdams ngag shes pas nges par grol lo //
NK051(zhi)002:4752: mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid la gnas //
NK051(zhi)002:4754: mkha' ni phyogs ris dang go skabs med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4755: mnyam pa ni phyogs ris gzung 'dzin dgag sgrub spong
NK051(zhi)002:4756: len dgra gnyen chags sdang gi dbye bsal med par
NK051(zhi)002:4757: mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4758: nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das //
NK051(zhi)002:4760: nyon mongs pa ni rnam pa lnga /
NK051(zhi)002:4761: dri ma ni gzung 'dzin gyi dri ma /
NK051(zhi)002:4762: kun ni rnam rtog bsam gyis mi khyab pa /
NK051(zhi)002:4763: kun las 'das ni skal ldan gcig gis skye med
NK051(zhi)002:4764: ka dag gi gdams ngag shes na nyon mongs pa
NK051(zhi)002:4766: dus gsum dus med rtogs pa po //
NK051(zhi)002:4768: dus gsum ni 'das pa dang da lta dang ma 'ongs pa dang gsum /
NK051(zhi)002:4770: rtog pa chig chod de dus gsum mi rtsi snga phyi med par rtogs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4771: sems can kun gyi gtso bo che //
NK051(zhi)002:4773: sems can thams cad kyi gtso bo'am slob dpon du gyur pa ni bcom ldan 'das sh+aakya thub pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4774: yon tan thod can rnams kyi thod //
NK051(zhi)002:4776: yon tan ni 'jig rten pa'i yon tan zag pa dang bcas pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:4777: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yon tan zag pa med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4778: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa kun gyis
NK051(zhi)002:4779: mngon par 'gro bar bya ba la sogs pa kun
NK051(zhi)002:4780: gyi yon tan thod de gtsug gi nor bu lta
NK051(zhi)002:4781: bu'o // lus kun las ni rnam par grol //
NK051(zhi)002:4788: sha khrag gi lus rnams las grol lo //
NK051(zhi)002:4789: nam mkha'i lam la rab gnas pa //
NK051(zhi)002:4791: nam ni skye ba med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4793: lam ni nye lam drang lam mi 'gyur chos nyid 'od gsal chen po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4794: rab gnas pa ni skal ldan gyi rnal 'byor de dgongs pa nam mkha' lta bu la gnas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4795: yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang //
NK051(zhi)002:4797: dper na yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bu yod na /
NK051(zhi)002:4798: zhe 'dod mi dgos par dgos 'dod ma lus pa shugs las 'byung ba bzhin du /
NK051(zhi)002:4799: dpe de bzhin du las dang skal bar ldan pa'i rnal 'byor chen po la /
NK051(zhi)002:4800: skye med ka dag gi don rtogs pas sems nyid
NK051(zhi)002:4801: kyi nor bu rin po che rang gi rgyud la
NK051(zhi)002:4802: bcangs nas / de la ched du rtsol sgrub dang
NK051(zhi)002:4803: zhe 'dod mi dgos par sems nyid yid bzhin gyi
NK051(zhi)002:4804: nor bu rin po che las dgos 'dod ma lus
NK051(zhi)002:4805: pa thams cad ngang ngam shugs las 'byung ngo //
NK051(zhi)002:4806: khyab bdag rin chen kun gyi mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:4808: khyab pa ni snying po'i gnas lugs kyis sems can
NK051(zhi)002:4809: thams cad la til la mar gyis khyab pa bzhin
NK051(zhi)002:4811: bdag ni snying po'i don de bdag gis rtogs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4812: rin chen kun gyi mchog ces pa /
NK051(zhi)002:4813: rin po che sna lnga'i nang nas skye med ka
NK051(zhi)002:4814: dag rtogs pa de ni nor bu kun gyi mchog
NK051(zhi)002:4815: tu gyur pa'o // dpag bsam shing chen rgyas pa ste //
NK051(zhi)002:4817: dpag bsam gyi shing ni theg pa bcu'i dper bstan te /
