NK051(zhi)002:4818: shing chen po rtsa ba klu la zug pa /
NK051(zhi)002:4819: lcug ma mi'i yul du skyes /
NK051(zhi)002:4821: me tog 'bras bu lha dang lha ma yin gyi yul du skyes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4823: blo chung ba la mtshan nyid sde gsum bstan /
NK051(zhi)002:4824: blo 'bring po la kri yog sde gsum bstan /
NK051(zhi)002:4825: blo rab la bskyed rdzogs rnam gsum bstan /
NK051(zhi)002:4826: shing de'i 'bras bu sum cu rtsa gsum dga' ldan lha'i yul du smin pa bzhin du /
NK051(zhi)002:4827: theg pa dgu'i dgu rtse a ti'i gong rgyal spyi
NK051(zhi)002:4828: ti yo ga'i theg pa ni dbang po rab kyis
NK051(zhi)002:4830: yang na dpag bsam shing 'dod pa 'byung ba /
NK051(zhi)002:4831: shing chen ni skal ba can la yid la ji ltar 'dod pa'i gdams ngag 'byung ngo //
NK051(zhi)002:4832: rgyas pa ni rtogs pa'i shes rab rgyas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4833: bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:4835: shes bya bum 'jug gi gdams ngag bdog ste gsang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4836: yang na bum pa ni snying po 'od kyi bum pa /
NK051(zhi)002:4837: bzang po ni ka dag 'od gsal chen po'i bum pa /
NK051(zhi)002:4838: che ba'i mchog ni mkha' dbyings dag pa'i bum pa ste /
NK051(zhi)002:4839: de blo'i spyod yul du ma gyur pas na che ba'i mchog ces gsungs so //
NK051(zhi)002:4840: byed pa sems can kun don byed //
NK051(zhi)002:4842: gong gi shes bya bum 'jug gi gdams ngag 'gro
NK051(zhi)002:4843: drug g.yang sa gcod pa'i sems can thams cad kyi
NK051(zhi)002:4844: don 'jam dpal lam bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzad pa'o
NK051(zhi)002:4845: // phan 'dogs sems can mnyes gshin pa //
NK051(zhi)002:4847: phan 'dogs pa ni gdams ngag gis skal ldan la phan 'dogs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4848: sems can la mnyes gshin mdzad pa ni 'jam dpal nyid do //
NK051(zhi)002:4849: bzang ngan shes shing dus shes la //
NK051(zhi)002:4851: bzang ba ni dge ba bcu'i don bsgrub par shes pa /
NK051(zhi)002:4852: ngan pa ni mi dge ba bcu'i skyon spangs par shes pa /
NK051(zhi)002:4853: dus shes pa 'di ni 'jug pa'i dus so //
NK051(zhi)002:4855: 'di ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i dus so //
NK051(zhi)002:4857: 'di ni mya ngan 'das pa'i dus so //
NK051(zhi)002:4858: 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i dus zhes shes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4859: khyab bdag dam shes dam tshig ldan //
NK051(zhi)002:4861: khyab ni sems can thams cad la snying po'i gnas lugs kyis khyab pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4862: bdag ni snang tshul te rang grol bar shes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4863: dam tshig shes pa skye med ka dag gi dam tshig shes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4865: dam tshig chen po dang ldan pa ni slob dpon dga' rab rdo rje'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4866: yang na snying po 'pho 'gyur med pa de rtogs
NK051(zhi)002:4867: pa'i don las mi 'da' ba na dam tshig dang
NK051(zhi)002:4868: ldan pa'o // dus shes sems can dbang po shes //
NK051(zhi)002:4870: snyan rgyud kyi gdams pas dgrol dgos te /
NK051(zhi)002:4871: bco brgyad khrigs kyi man ngag go //
NK051(zhi)002:4873: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi dus dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:4876: yid 'das pa'i rjes su mi 'gro bar shes /
NK051(zhi)002:4877: ma 'ongs pa'i sngon mi bsu bar shes /
NK051(zhi)002:4878: da ltar yid 'khrul pa'i rkyen khar mi gtong bar shes pa dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:4879: sems can dbang po shes zhes pa //
NK051(zhi)002:4880: sems can gyi dbang po ni lnga ste /
NK051(zhi)002:4885: lus kyi dbang po dang lnga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4886: shes zhes pa ni sgo lnga'i dbang po lnga /
NK051(zhi)002:4888: yid las 'gyus kyang gdams ngag gis ming 'dogs dang
NK051(zhi)002:4889: gzung 'dzin dang chags zhen med par 'khrul pa rang
NK051(zhi)002:4890: chod rang sangs snang ba rang grol bar shes pa'o
NK051(zhi)002:4891: // rnam grol gsum la mkhas pa po //
NK051(zhi)002:4893: rnam pa zhes pa ni gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:4895: bar yid rig sems kyi 'khrul pa'i rnam pa /
NK051(zhi)002:4896: nang gzhi rtsa kun gzhi'i rnam pa dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:4897: grol zhes pa ni gdams ngag gi grol lugs bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:4898: de la grol lugs gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:4899: phyi snod kyi 'jig rten thams cad la /
NK051(zhi)002:4900: yul sems gzung 'dzin dgag sgrub spong len dbye bsal med par rang grol lo //
NK051(zhi)002:4901: yid rig sems 'khrul pa rtsad nas bcad cing grol lugs ni /
NK051(zhi)002:4903: rig pa rang byung rang sar grol /
NK051(zhi)002:4904: sems kyi 'khrul pa rang sar grol /
NK051(zhi)002:4905: rig pa 'gyu ba chags sdang kun las grol /
NK051(zhi)002:4906: nang rtsa ba'i grol lugs ni /
NK051(zhi)002:4911: sngon byung gi mkhas pa ni gsang bdag chen po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4912: de'i mjug gi mkhas pa ni dga' rab rdo rje'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4913: de'i gdung gsob kyi mkhas pa ni gu ru pad+ma 'byung gnas so //
NK051(zhi)002:4914: yon tan ldan zhing yon tan shes //
NK051(zhi)002:4916: chos nyid yon tan dang ldan pa ni gsang bdag chen po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4917: yon tan shes pa ni bcom ldan 'das so //
NK051(zhi)002:4918: yon tan zad mi shes pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen cing shes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4919: chos shes bkra shis bkra shis 'byung //
NK051(zhi)002:4921: chos skye med ka dag gi dgongs pa shes na bkra shis pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4922: bkra shis 'og mas ni chos thams cad la bkra shis pa ni spyi ti yo ga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4923: 'byung ni chos dang yon tan dang gdams ngag zad
NK051(zhi)002:4924: mi shes pa'i yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa
NK051(zhi)002:4925: 'byung ba'o // bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa //
NK051(zhi)002:4927: bkra shis kun gyi nang nas skye med ka dag
NK051(zhi)002:4928: gi don 'di rtogs na shin tu yang bkra shis
NK051(zhi)002:4929: pa'o // grags pa bkra shis snyan grags dge /
NK051(zhi)002:4931: grags pa ni theg pa'i rim pa dgur grags pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4932: bkra shis ni theg pa rim pa dgu las 'phags
NK051(zhi)002:4933: pa'i spyi ti yo ga shes na bkra shis pa'o
NK051(zhi)002:4934: // snyan grags dge ni phun sum tshogs pa thams
NK051(zhi)002:4935: cad kyi nang nas kyang snyan cing grags la dge
NK051(zhi)002:4936: ba ni spyi ti yo ga'i gdams ngag zab mo
NK051(zhi)002:4937: // rnams so // dbugs 'byin chen po dga' ston che //
NK051(zhi)002:4939: skye ba med pa'i gdams ngag zab mo 'di rtogs na /
NK051(zhi)002:4940: nyon mongs pas gdung ba pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4941: chen po ni gdams ngag go //
NK051(zhi)002:4943: dga' ba'i ston mo ka dag 'od gsal gyi don rtogs shing /
NK051(zhi)002:4944: skal ldan gzhan la yang de ltar chos kyi ston mo ston na dga' ston che ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4945: dga' chen rol mo chen po ste //
NK051(zhi)002:4947: dga' ba ni thig le chen po'i don rtogs na dga' ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4948: rol mo ni zab mo'i chos 'di yid du 'ong zhing ngo mtshar che ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4949: chen po ni spyi ti yo ga'i theg pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4950: bkur sti rim gro phun sum tshogs //
NK051(zhi)002:4952: theg pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gi nang nas /
NK051(zhi)002:4953: zab mo'i chos spyi ti yo ga 'di la /
NK051(zhi)002:4956: phun sum tshogs pa'i sgo nas mchod pa'i gnas su bya zhing bkur ba dang rim gro bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4957: yang na bla ma la yang phun sum tshogs pa'i sgo nas bkur bar bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4958: mchog tu dga' ba grags bdag dpal //
NK051(zhi)002:4960: bla ma dang dkon mchog la mchod pa dang mos pa byas pas /
NK051(zhi)002:4961: de rnams kyi skyabs dang mgon byed par bstan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4962: mchog tu dga' ba zhes pa /
NK051(zhi)002:4963: 'jig rten pa rnams kyi mchog tu dga' ba ni
NK051(zhi)002:4964: dkon mchog gsum dang bla ma dam pa rnams lags
NK051(zhi)002:4965: so // grags bdag ni bla ma dang dkon mchog la mchod pa bya bar grags so //
NK051(zhi)002:4966: dpal zhes pa bdag gis bla ma dang dkon mchog la mchod pas /
NK051(zhi)002:4967: dkon mchog dang bla mas bdag la mgon dang dpal du gyur pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4968: mchog ldan mchog sbyin gtso bo ste //
NK051(zhi)002:4970: mchog ni yon tan gyi mchog dang ldan pa /
NK051(zhi)002:4971: mchog sbyin ni yon tan mchog de slob ma la gtong /
NK051(zhi)002:4972: gtso bo ni dkon mchog dang bla ma'o //
NK051(zhi)002:4973: skyabs kyi dam pa skyabs su 'os //
NK051(zhi)002:4975: skyabs kyi dam pa ni bla ma dam pa rnams so //
NK051(zhi)002:4976: skyabs su 'os ni dkon mchog gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:4977: 'jig rten dgra ste rab kyi mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:4979: 'jig rten gyi dgra ni bdud dang rgol ba ngan pa rnams so //
NK051(zhi)002:4980: dgra de sel ba'i mchog rje btsun 'jam dpal lo //
NK051(zhi)002:4981: 'jigs pa ma lus sel ba po //
NK051(zhi)002:4983: 'jigs pa ma lus ni mtsho dang /
NK051(zhi)002:4998: dgra la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa ma lus pa sel ba ni rje btsun 'jam dpal lo //
NK051(zhi)002:4999: gtsug phud phud bu lcang lo can //
NK051(zhi)002:5001: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi dbu la gtsug phud yod pas byis pa gzhon nu ma lta bu /
NK051(zhi)002:5002: lcang lo can ni dbu skra de yang 'dril la ring zhing mtshams med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5003: ral pa mun dza cod pan thogs //
NK051(zhi)002:5005: spyi gtsug na ral pa gcig yod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5006: cod pan ni rgyan dang ldan pas nyi ma la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis so //
NK051(zhi)002:5007: gdong lnga gtsug phud lnga dang ldan //
NK051(zhi)002:5009: gdong lnga zhes pa gzhi'i sangs rgyas de la zhal lnga phyag brgyad du bzhugs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5010: dbu la gtsug phud lnga yod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5011: gtso bo gsum brtsegs pa'i sgrub thabs 'dis zin te 'dir ma smos so //
NK051(zhi)002:5012: zur phud lnga pa me tog thod //
NK051(zhi)002:5014: 'jam dpal la nor bu rin chen lnga'i zur phud lnga yod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5015: me tog thod ni dbu la bcings pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5016: mgo zlum brtul zhugs chen po pa //
NK051(zhi)002:5018: mgo zlum ni sh+aakya thub pa /
NK051(zhi)002:5019: brtul ni nyon mong pa rnams brtul /
NK051(zhi)002:5020: zhugs ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam du zhugs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5021: 'gro don chen po mdzad pas che ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5022: tshangs par spyod pa brtul zhugs mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:5024: tshangs par spyod pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis /
NK051(zhi)002:5025: spyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis /
NK051(zhi)002:5027: kha zas la sogs pa la spyod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5028: brtul zhugs mchog ni khyim nas khyim med par dge slong dang dge tshul gyis skye ba brtul /
NK051(zhi)002:5029: yang dag mya ngan las 'das pa'i don mchog la zhugs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5030: dka' thub mthar phyin dka' thub che //
NK051(zhi)002:5032: dka' thub ces pa bcom ldan 'das kyis zas dkar gsum bza' ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:5033: 'dul khrims nyis brgya lnga bcu thub pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5034: mthar phyin pa ni ma nyams pa ste bcom ldan 'das so //
NK051(zhi)002:5035: dka' thub che zhes pa bcom ldan 'das chu bo
NK051(zhi)002:5036: nee rany+dza na'i 'gram du dka' thub tu bzhugs te
NK051(zhi)002:5037: / lo drug tu til bre phyed gsol ba'i dka' thub drag po mthar phyin par mdzad do //
NK051(zhi)002:5038: gtsang gnas dam pa go'u tam //
NK051(zhi)002:5040: gtsang ma'i gnas ni bya rgod phung po'i ri'am rdo rje gdan lta bu'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5041: yang na gtsang gnas ni 'dul khrims 'chal ba dang
NK051(zhi)002:5042: nyon mongs pa'i dri mas ma gos pas na gtsang
NK051(zhi)002:5043: ma'i gnas so // go'u tam zhes pa bshad lugs gnyis te /
NK051(zhi)002:5044: go'u ta ma ni rgyal po sh+aakya'i rigs so //
NK051(zhi)002:5047: khyed kyi dka' thub dang 'dul khrims sdom pa gtsang ma'i gnas de yang /
NK051(zhi)002:5048: skye med ka nas dag pa'i don ma rtogs na go'u tam ma yin no //
NK051(zhi)002:5049: don med rtsal med brtul zhugs can //
NK051(zhi)002:5050: rtog pa'i nad des thar pa med //
NK051(zhi)002:5052: bram ze tshangs pa tshangs pa shes //
NK051(zhi)002:5054: bram ze ni gtsang bar gnas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5055: tshangs pa ni dka' thub thub pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:5056: tshangs par spyod pa'i 'dul khrims la gnas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5057: tshangs pa shes zhes pa bram ze'i rigs byed ces bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5058: mya ngan 'das pa tshangs pa thob //
NK051(zhi)002:5060: mya ngan 'das zhes pa 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las 'das pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5061: 'od srung gis bya ba ma byas pas /
NK051(zhi)002:5062: kun dga' bos dgra bcom pa'i dri mas tshangs pas tshangs pa thob pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5063: grol ba'i thar pa rnam grol lus //
NK051(zhi)002:5065: spyi ti yo ga'i grol lugs bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:5066: grol ba ni bya btsal dang rtsol sgrub las grol /
NK051(zhi)002:5067: thar pa ni theg pa brgyad kyi zhe 'dod las thar /
NK051(zhi)002:5068: rnam grol ni lta sgom spyod 'bras kyi rnam pa las kyang grol lo //
NK051(zhi)002:5069: lus ni 'gyur ba med pa'i lus so //
NK051(zhi)002:5070: rnam grol zhi ba zhi ba nyid //
NK051(zhi)002:5072: blos btags ma lus pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs las grol /
NK051(zhi)002:5073: nyon mongs pa thams cad rang zhi bas na zhi ba chen po nyid do //
NK051(zhi)002:5076: mya ngan 'das zhi ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa /
NK051(zhi)002:5077: mya ngan 'das zhes pa byed pa'i chos las 'das pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5078: legs par mya ngan 'das dang nye //
NK051(zhi)002:5081: legs par mya ngan 'das pa ni bya rtsol dang
NK051(zhi)002:5082: blo'i chos las 'das pa skye med ka dag gi
NK051(zhi)002:5084: bde sdug sel ba mthar gyur pa //
NK051(zhi)002:5086: bde ba ni don dam pa'i bde ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5087: sdug pa ni khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad sdug bsngal zhing nyon mongs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5088: skye med rtogs na sel ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5089: mthar gyur pa ni byar med blo 'das su gyur pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5090: chags bral lus las 'das pa po //
NK051(zhi)002:5092: chags pa dang zhen pa thams cad dang bral na /
NK051(zhi)002:5093: lus dang yul dang 'khor dang sdug bsngal las 'das pas /
NK051(zhi)002:5094: lus mi len te skye ba'i lus med pas na 'das pa po zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5095: thub pa med pa dpe med pa //
NK051(zhi)002:5097: thub pa med pa ni skye med ka dag gi gdams ngag ste gang gis kyang mi thub cing /
NK051(zhi)002:5099: mi mngon mi snang gsal byed min //
NK051(zhi)002:5101: skye med blo 'das ming mtha' bral ste /
NK051(zhi)002:5102: mi mngon zhes pa ye med gting med dngos gzhi med /
NK051(zhi)002:5103: mi snang zhes pa kha dog dang dbyibs su mi snang /
NK051(zhi)002:5104: gsal byed min zhes pa skye ba med pa'i don
NK051(zhi)002:5105: de gsal bar byed pa tsam du yang bstan du
NK051(zhi)002:5106: med do // mi 'gyur kun 'gro khyab pa po //
NK051(zhi)002:5108: mi 'gyur ni dus gsum 'pho 'gyur med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5109: kun 'gro khyab pa po zhes pa ni sems nyid kyi snying po de /
NK051(zhi)002:5112: skye 'gro sems can thams cad la til la mar gyis khyab pa bzhin du gnas so //
NK051(zhi)002:5113: phra zhing zag med sa bon bral //
NK051(zhi)002:5115: phra ba ni don zab mo cha phra ba //
NK051(zhi)002:5116: zag med ni snying po ka dag go //
NK051(zhi)002:5117: sa bon bral ni dngos med la sa bon tsam
NK051(zhi)002:5118: du yang mtshon du med cing rgyu 'bras su 'dzin
NK051(zhi)002:5120: rdul med rdul bral dri ma med //
NK051(zhi)002:5122: snying po ka nas dag pa la nyon mongs pa'i rdul dang dri ma med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5123: nyes pa spangs pa skyon med pa //
NK051(zhi)002:5125: snyi nga po skye ba med pa la nyes pa'i
NK051(zhi)002:5126: skyon thams cad ma spangs gnas su dag pas na
NK051(zhi)002:5128: shin tu sad pa sad pa'i bdag /
NK051(zhi)002:5130: sad pa la sad lugs kyi gdams ngag dgu ste /
NK051(zhi)002:5131: sngon gyi las sad pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:5133: rkyen gyi mthus sad pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:5134: smon lam gyi stobs sad pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:5135: ma rig pa'i gnyid sad pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:5136: snyam byed kyi bag chags sad pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:5137: sgrib g.yogs kyi mun pa sad pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:5138: shes rab kyi rgyus las sad pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:5139: rtogs pa klong nas sad pa dang dgu ste /
NK051(zhi)002:5140: de dag gi bdag ni skye med ka dag rtogs pa'i bdag nyid do //
NK051(zhi)002:5141: des ma rig pa bag chags sgrib g.yogs thams cad
NK051(zhi)002:5142: dus gcig tu sad cing sangs pas na sad pa'i
NK051(zhi)002:5143: bdag go // kun shes kun rig dam pa po //
NK051(zhi)002:5145: bskal pa thog ma med pa nas bsags pa'i ma
NK051(zhi)002:5146: rig pa thams cad dus gcig tu sangs pa ni
NK051(zhi)002:5147: kun shes te chos rnams ma lus par shes pa'o
NK051(zhi)002:5148: // kun rig ste theg pa kun gyi don rig /
NK051(zhi)002:5149: dam pa ni bcom ldan 'das sam rje btsun 'jam dpal lam bla ma dam pa rnams so //
NK051(zhi)002:5150: rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid 'das //
NK051(zhi)002:5152: dngos po'i gnas lugs de rnam par shes pa tshogs brgyad kyi spyod yul las 'das so //
NK051(zhi)002:5153: rin po che'i rgyud nas kyang /
NK051(zhi)002:5154: rnam shes yul du ma gyur snying po can //
NK051(zhi)002:5155: tshogs brgyad yul du ma gyur dmigs dang bral //
NK051(zhi)002:5157: de ni dngos med zang ka yin /
NK051(zhi)002:5158: de ni skye med ka dag yin zhes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5159: ye shes gnyis med tshul 'chang ba //
NK051(zhi)002:5161: ye shes ni skye med 'od gsal gyi ye shes so //
NK051(zhi)002:5162: gnyis med ni spong len dang phyogs ris med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5163: tshul 'chang ba ni skal ldan gyi rnal 'byor pas 'chang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5164: rnam par rtog med lhun gyis grub //
NK051(zhi)002:5166: 'dis rdzogs pa chen po'i theg pa bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:5167: rnam pa ni sna tshogs dngos po snang srid kyi chos thams cad do //
NK051(zhi)002:5168: de rnams gang la yang rnam rtog dang /
NK051(zhi)002:5169: chags sdang dang nyon mongs pa mi skye na /
NK051(zhi)002:5170: skye med ka dag rtogs pas snying po 'pho 'gyur med pa lhun gyis grub bo //
NK051(zhi)002:5171: dus gsum sangs rgyas las byed pa //
NK051(zhi)002:5173: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas ni /
NK051(zhi)002:5174: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad dang /
NK051(zhi)002:5175: da ltar gyi sangs rgyas sh+aakya thub pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:5176: ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:5177: de gsum gyis sems can thams cad ma rtogs pa rtogs par byed pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:5178: ma grol ba grol bar byed pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:5179: thar pa ma thob pa thob par byed pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:5180: mya ngan las mi 'da' ba 'da' bar byed pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:5181: sangs ma rgyas pa rnams rgyas par byed pa'i las ni /
NK051(zhi)002:5182: sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa rnam par dag pas /
NK051(zhi)002:5183: sems can gyi sgrib pa nyon mongs pa sbyong ba'i las mdzad pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5184: sangs rgyas thog ma tha ma med //
NK051(zhi)002:5187: ye ji bzhin pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
NK051(zhi)002:5188: gzhi lhun grub kyi sangs rgyas dang /
NK051(zhi)002:5189: rtogs pa mngon gyur gyis sangs rgyas dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:5190: gzhi lhun grub kyi sangs rgyas la thog ma dang tha ma dang gnyis ka med do //
NK051(zhi)002:5191: rtogs pa mngon gyur gyi sangs rgyas la thog ma bar med tha ma yod do //
NK051(zhi)002:5192: ye ji bzhin pa'i sangs rgyas ni thog ma'i sangs rgyas 'od mi 'gyur ba zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5193: sangs pa ni bag chags dang sgrib g.yogs sangs /
NK051(zhi)002:5194: rgyas pa ni chos nyid ye shes rgyas /
NK051(zhi)002:5195: thog ma ni gzhi'i bzhugs tshul lo //
NK051(zhi)002:5196: tha ma ni 'khor ba'i sems can gyi snang tshul lo //
NK051(zhi)002:5197: med ces pa de gnyis ka gzhi la dbyer med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5198: dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med pa //
NK051(zhi)002:5200: snying po skye med ka dag gi sangs rgyas de la /
NK051(zhi)002:5201: dang po rgyu 'di las byung bya ba'am /
NK051(zhi)002:5202: bar du rkyen gyis bskyed pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:5203: tha ma gnyen pos 'jig tu med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5204: ye shes mig gcig dri ma med //
NK051(zhi)002:5206: ye shes ni mi shes pa med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5207: mig ni sgrib med 'od gsal chen po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5208: gcig ni thig le nyag gcig go //
NK051(zhi)002:5209: dri ma ni nyon mongs pa'i dri ma'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5210: rtsol sgrub kyi chos kyis ma gos te /
NK051(zhi)002:5211: gzhi ka nas dag pas rnam rtog gi dri ma med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5212: ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs //
NK051(zhi)002:5215: lus 'di ni ye shes kyi lus te bar dor
NK051(zhi)002:5216: sgrib g.yogs med pa gsal ba zang thal chen po'o
NK051(zhi)002:5217: // de bzhin ni snying po ma nor ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5218: gshegs pa ni rtogs pas gshegs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5219: tshig gi dbang phyug smra ba che //
NK051(zhi)002:5221: tshig gi dbang phyug ni bcom ldan 'das sh+aakya thub pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5222: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong smra ba che ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5223: smra ba'i skyes mchog smra ba'i rgyal //
NK051(zhi)002:5225: smra ba'i skye mchog ni gsang bdag chen po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5226: smra ba'i rgyal po ni rdzogs pa chen po'i don skye ba med pa ste /
NK051(zhi)002:5227: chos smra ba rnams kyi nang nas kyang rgyal po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5228: smra ba'i dam pa mchog gi gnas //
NK051(zhi)002:5230: slob dpon dga' rab rdo rje yin te /
NK051(zhi)002:5231: de ni chos smra ba rnams kyi dpon nam bla ma dam pa ste mchog gi gnas yin no //
NK051(zhi)002:5232: de yi phyag dang zhabs tog bkur sti'i gnas yin no //
NK051(zhi)002:5233: smra ba'i seng ge tshugs pa med //
NK051(zhi)002:5235: smra ba'i seng ge dang mtshungs pa ni slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen lags te /
NK051(zhi)002:5236: des chos gang gsungs na theg pa thams cad kyi rtse rgyal spyi ti yo gar smra ste /
NK051(zhi)002:5237: de la mu stegs dang rgol ba ngan pa thams cad kyis tshugs pa med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5238: kun tu lta bas mchog tu dga' //
NK051(zhi)002:5240: kun tu zhes pa ni ma lus pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5241: lta ba ni zhe 'dod dang gza' gtad dang bral ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5242: mchog tu dga' ba ni skye med ka dag gi don la dga' ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5243: gzi brjid phung po lta na sdug /
NK051(zhi)002:5245: gzi brjid ni don zab mo rtogs pa'i gzi brjid /
NK051(zhi)002:5246: phung po ni 'od gsal gyi phung po //
NK051(zhi)002:5247: lta na sdug ces pa ye shes 'bar ba'i 'od
NK051(zhi)002:5248: de ni lta na sdug pa yid du 'ong ba'o
NK051(zhi)002:5251: thugs ka na gnas pa'i 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i mtshan 'dir bzung ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5253: bzang ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i snying po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5254: 'bar ba ni rtog pa'i rtsal rab tu 'bar ba ste /
NK051(zhi)002:5255: nyon mongs pa rnam par 'joms shing tshar gcod par byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5256: dpal gyi be'u ni ye shes kyi dpal be'u zhes bya ste /
NK051(zhi)002:5257: skye med 'od gsal rin chen gsal ba'i khye'u zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5258: ye shes sems dpa'i mtshan no //
NK051(zhi)002:5263: 'od 'bar ba ni nyon mongs pa ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5264: snang ba po ni ye shes gsal dag gi snang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5265: sman pa che mchog gtso bo ste //
NK051(zhi)002:5269: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sman pa gnyis so //
NK051(zhi)002:5271: nad rigs mi mthun pa brgyad khri bzhi stong la /
NK051(zhi)002:5272: sman rigs mi mthun pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gis 'joms par byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5273: de yang nad rigs mi gcig pa sa ma ya 'bum sde bsdus pas /
NK051(zhi)002:5278: de bzhi yang tsha grang gnyis su 'dus /
NK051(zhi)002:5279: bcos lugs bsam gyis mi khyab kyang /
NK051(zhi)002:5280: bsdus pas bcos lugs kyang bzhir 'chos /
NK051(zhi)002:5281: de las bsdus pas tsha grang gnyis su 'chos /
NK051(zhi)002:5282: sman kyang drod sman bsil sman gnyis te /
NK051(zhi)002:5283: sman yang de bzhin du btang ngo //
NK051(zhi)002:5284: dpe de bzhin du 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sman pa la yang gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:5285: sngon byung gi sman pa gsang bdag chen po dang /
NK051(zhi)002:5286: de'i rjes 'jug gi sman pa gu ru dga' rab rdo rje dang /
NK051(zhi)002:5287: de'i gdung 'tshob kyi sman pa slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:5288: gtso bo ni bcom ldan 'das sam 'phags pa 'jam dpal lo //
NK051(zhi)002:5289: sdug gu 'jig rten gsum gyi mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:5291: 'jig rten gsum gyi sems can rnams na bar bstan /
NK051(zhi)002:5292: nad do cog gi dgra che ba //
NK051(zhi)002:5294: 'gro drug gi sems can dug lnga dug gsum gyi nad bstan /
NK051(zhi)002:5295: sman rnams ma lus ljon pa'i shing //
NK051(zhi)002:5298: zug rngu 'byin pa bla na med //
NK051(zhi)002:5302: gsum zhes pa khams gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:5305: gzugs med pa'i khams dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:5307: sa steng sa 'og sa bla dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:5308: de gsum na gnas pa'i sems can nyon mongs pas
NK051(zhi)002:5309: gdungs shing shin tu nyam thag pa'i sems can nad
NK051(zhi)002:5310: pa rnams la / sman pa che mchog ces pas /
NK051(zhi)002:5311: sman pa gsang bdag chen po'am /
NK051(zhi)002:5312: gu ru dga' rab rdo rjes khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad la rtsa legs par bltas pas /
NK051(zhi)002:5313: nyon mongs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gi nad kyis
NK051(zhi)002:5314: na zhing sdug bsngal gyi phung po sa ma ya
NK051(zhi)002:5315: 'bum sder bcas pa 'dod chags kyi rgya mtshor byings
NK051(zhi)002:5317: nyon mongs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dug lnga dug gsum du 'dus /
NK051(zhi)002:5318: gu rus rtsa gtan la phab ste gzigs pas /
NK051(zhi)002:5319: nad do cog gi dgra che ba //
NK051(zhi)002:5321: nad la gsum mam lnga ste /
NK051(zhi)002:5327: de la nad kyi gzhi ni kun gazhi'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5328: nad kyi rgyu ni ma rig pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5329: nad kyi rkyen ni rlung dang yid 'gyu ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5330: nad ldang ba'i dus ni nga bdag langs pa na'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5331: nad kyi 'bras bu ni ngan song gsum mam 'jig
NK051(zhi)002:5332: rten gsum mam 'gro drug gi sems can thams cad
NK051(zhi)002:5333: do // sman rnams ma lus ljon pa'i shing //
NK051(zhi)002:5335: nad rnams gso bar byed pa'i sman bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:5341: sman btang nas sos pa'i 'bras bu dang lnga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5342: de la sman gyi gzhi de chos nyid dang dad pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5343: sman gyi rgyu ni snying po rang byung gi ye shes rang la yod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5344: sman gyi rkyen ni rang gi shes rab dang bla
NK051(zhi)002:5345: ma'i gdams ngag skye med ka dag dngos med zang
NK051(zhi)002:5346: ka'o // sman btang ba'i dus ni dad pa dang
NK051(zhi)002:5347: shes rab skyes shing 'khor bar skyug log pa'i dus
NK051(zhi)002:5348: ka'o // so // sman btang ba'i 'bras bu ni
NK051(zhi)002:5349: sku gsum mam yang na sku lnga ye shes lnga'o
NK051(zhi)002:5350: ka'o // so // // zug rngu 'byin pa bla na med //
NK051(zhi)002:5352: nad bcos pa dang gso ba dang nad 'don pa'i thabs bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:5353: smra ba'i gtso bo gsang bdag chen po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5354: khams gsum gyi sems can nyon mongs pa dug lnga
NK051(zhi)002:5355: dug gsum gyis gdungs pa'i nad bcos shing phyir dbyung
NK051(zhi)002:5356: ba'i thabs ni nad kyi gzhi chos nyid ming med
NK051(zhi)002:5358: nad kyi rgyu ma rig pa de sman rig med ka dag gis 'byin no //
NK051(zhi)002:5359: skye med 'od gsal ngang 'das kyis nad kyi rkyen rlung yid 'gyu ba'i nad 'byin /
NK051(zhi)002:5360: spros gcod rang grol gyis nad ldang ba'i rkyen dus nga bdag 'byin no //
NK051(zhi)002:5361: nad kyi 'bras bu dug gsum mam ngan song rnam pa gsum la /
NK051(zhi)002:5362: stong pa gsal ba 'gag pa med pa ste /
NK051(zhi)002:5363: rang bzhin ngo bo thugs rje gsum /
NK051(zhi)002:5364: sku gsum gyi sman gyis nad kyi 'bras bu 'byin pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5365: sman rnams ma lus ljon pa'i shing //
NK051(zhi)002:5367: sman ma lus pa skye ba'i shing yin te /
NK051(zhi)002:5371: sman gyi rgyal po ga bur la sogs te sman
NK051(zhi)002:5372: ma lus pa rnams skye ba'i shing ni dpag bsam
NK051(zhi)002:5374: zug rngu'i nad 'byin pa bla na med pa ni /
NK051(zhi)002:5375: nad phyin pa'i 'bras bu chos sku longs sku sprul sku dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:5376: sdug gu 'phags pa 'jam dpal yid du 'ong ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5377: mchog gi sman pa'i mchog ni gsang bdag chen po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5378: sman gyi mchog ni skye med ka dag byar med blo 'das so //
NK051(zhi)002:5379: nad thon cing phyin pa'i tshad ni sku gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:5380: de tsho yo gcig tu bsdus nas bstan pa ni nad kyi gzhi kun gzhi /
NK051(zhi)002:5381: nad kyi rgyu ma rig pa /
NK051(zhi)002:5383: nad kyi gcong dug lnga dug gsum /
NK051(zhi)002:5384: nad ldan par byed pa'i dgra ni /
NK051(zhi)002:5385: dug lnga la sogs te nyon mongs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo //
NK051(zhi)002:5386: zhe 'dod gzung 'dzin dgag sgrub spong len /
NK051(zhi)002:5387: phyi snang yul sems snang bzung zhen chags sdang la sogs nad ldan pa'i rkyen no //
NK051(zhi)002:5388: de la sman ji ltar btang ba'i thabs ni /
NK051(zhi)002:5389: nyon mongs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gi nad la /
NK051(zhi)002:5390: chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi sman gtong /
NK051(zhi)002:5391: nad kyi gcong dug lnga dug gsum la sku gsung thugs ye shes lnga'i sman gtong /
NK051(zhi)002:5392: nad ldan pa'i dgra nyon mongs pa dug lnga la sogs pa la /
NK051(zhi)002:5393: sku lnga la sogs thabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sman gtong /
NK051(zhi)002:5394: rtogs pa'i mchog ni chos thams cad las 'das shing blo byed pa po las grol ba /
NK051(zhi)002:5395: bya med blo 'das dngos med zang ka'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5396: nad phyin pa'i 'bras bu ni sangs rgyas nyag gcig go //
NK051(zhi)002:5397: dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can //
NK051(zhi)002:5400: rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad do //
NK051(zhi)002:5402: dkyil 'khor chen po bdun bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:5403: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /
NK051(zhi)002:5404: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
NK051(zhi)002:5405: rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
NK051(zhi)002:5406: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dang /
NK051(zhi)002:5407: snang ba mtha' yas kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
NK051(zhi)002:5408: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor dang /
NK051(zhi)002:5409: don yod grub pa'i dkyil 'khor dang bdun no //
NK051(zhi)002:5410: dkyil nyes pa snying po 'pho 'gyur med pa /
NK051(zhi)002:5411: 'khor ces pa 'od gsal 'gag pa med pa'i 'khor ro //
NK051(zhi)002:5412: can ni rtogs pa'i bdag nyid can no //
NK051(zhi)002:5413: phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthar thug par //
NK051(zhi)002:5415: phyogs bcu ni 'jig rten gyi khams so //
NK051(zhi)002:5416: nam mkha' ni mtha' dbus med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5417: thug pa ni zab mo'i man ngag mthar thug pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5418: chos kyi rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs //
NK051(zhi)002:5420: chos kyi ni byar med blo 'das so //
NK051(zhi)002:5421: rgyal ni bya rtsol las rgyal ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5422: mtshan ni rtog pa med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5423: legs par 'dzugs pa ni skye med kyi bstan pa 'dzugs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5424: 'gro na gdugs gcig yangs pa ste //
NK051(zhi)002:5426: las dang nyon mongs pa dug lnga dug gsum gyis
NK051(zhi)002:5427: khams gsum du 'khor zhing 'gro drug gi lus blangs
NK051(zhi)002:5428: nas / sdug bsngal gyi tshad pas gdungs shing nyam thag pa rnams la /
NK051(zhi)002:5429: bla ma'i gdams ngag gdugs dang 'dra ba'i bsil grib
NK051(zhi)002:5430: kyis nyon mongs pa'i tshad pa'i sdug bsngal sel lo
NK051(zhi)002:5431: // gcig ni spyi ti yo ga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5432: yangs pa ni lta ba go yangs phyogs ris dang gza' gtad med /
NK051(zhi)002:5433: bsgom pa go yangs dmigs gtad med /
NK051(zhi)002:5434: 'bras bu go yangs re dogs med /
NK051(zhi)002:5435: theg pa thams cad las 'phags pa spyi ti yo ga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5436: byams dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can //
NK051(zhi)002:5438: byams pa ni bde ba dang 'phrad par byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5439: snying rje ni sdug bsngal dang bral bar byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5440: dkyil ni snying po skye ba med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5441: 'khor ni yan lag 'gag pa med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5442: can ni snying po dang yan lag gnyis su med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5443: dpal ldan pad+ma gar gyi bdag /
NK051(zhi)002:5445: dpal ni bdag gi dpal lo //
NK051(zhi)002:5446: ldan pa ni thugs rje dang ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5447: pad+ma ni nyes pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5448: gar gyi bdag gi rten 'brel zab mo'i don rtogs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5449: khyab bdag chen po'i rin chen gdugs //
NK051(zhi)002:5451: khyab bdag ni thugs rjes 'gro ba kun la khyab pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5452: chen po ni rdzogs chen no //
NK051(zhi)002:5454: gdugs ni nyon mongs pa'i tsha ba 'joms pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5455: sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid che //
NK051(zhi)002:5457: sangs pa ni nyon mongs pa sangs /
NK051(zhi)002:5458: rgyas pa ni ye shes chen po rgyas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5459: gzi brjid ni ye shes 'od 'phro ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5460: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku 'chang ba //
NK051(zhi)002:5463: byar med kyi don rgyas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5464: kun gyi sku 'chang ba ni rang byung gi ye shes kyi sku 'chang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5465: sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che //
NK051(zhi)002:5467: nyon mongs sangs la rtogs pa'i chos nyid rgyas /
NK051(zhi)002:5468: rnal 'byor ni rtogs pa'i don la 'byor ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5469: sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa gcig /
NK051(zhi)002:5471: spyi ti yo ga'i theg pa dngos rang bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:5472: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad la skye med ka dag gi bstan pa gcig las med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5473: rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal //
NK051(zhi)002:5475: rdo rje ni 'gyur ba med pa /
NK051(zhi)002:5477: dbang ni skye med ka dag gi dbang bskur bas rtogs pa ye shes kyi dpal 'byor ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5478: rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug ste //
NK051(zhi)002:5480: rin po che ni sems nyid kyi rin po che'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5481: kun bdag ni sems nyid de sems la gnas pas na bdag go //
NK051(zhi)002:5482: dbang phyug ces pa dbang ni zab mo'i chos la dbang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5483: phyug pa ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po
NK051(zhi)002:5484: che zhes pa de skal ldan la ye nas yod
NK051(zhi)002:5485: pa la / bla ma'i gdams ngag gi rtogs pas
NK051(zhi)002:5486: skye med ka dag la dbang zhing rtogs pa'i ye
NK051(zhi)002:5487: pa la / shes phyug pa'o // 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag /
NK051(zhi)002:5489: 'jig rten na phyug pa ni stong 'khor los sgyur
NK051(zhi)002:5490: ba'i rgyal po shu ste gar pa lta bu ste
NK051(zhi)002:5491: / de 'jig rten na yo byad la dbang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5492: rin po che sna bdun gyi nor ni phyug /
NK051(zhi)002:5493: 'khor 'das kun dbang por ma gyur pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5494: rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi rje //
NK051(zhi)002:5496: 'pho 'gyur med cing dbyer med pa'i rdo rje 'chang ba ste /
NK051(zhi)002:5497: de rnal 'byor kun gyi rje yin no //
NK051(zhi)002:5498: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba //
NK051(zhi)002:5500: sangs rgyas ni gong du rgyas par bshad do //
NK051(zhi)002:5501: skye med ka dag dngos med blo 'das rtogs pa de /
NK051(zhi)002:5502: kun gyi nang na thugs che ba thugs dgongs che ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5503: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas //
NK051(zhi)002:5505: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs g.yo rtsol dang rtsis gdab med de /
NK051(zhi)002:5506: mnyam pa'i thugs nyid la gnas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5507: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba //
NK051(zhi)002:5509: sangs rgyas ni spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5510: snying po chos kyi skus kun la khyab pas na sku che ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5511: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin //
NK051(zhi)002:5513: sangs pa ni zhe 'dod dang bcas pa'i lta sgom rnams sangs /
NK051(zhi)002:5514: rgyas pa ni bltar med sgom med byar med rgyas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5515: gsung ni dri ma med de tshangs pa'i dbyangs lta bu'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5516: gsung yang yin ces pa sgra skad thams cad sangs rgyas kyi gsung yang yin no //
NK051(zhi)002:5517: rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che //
NK051(zhi)002:5519: rdo rje ni 'dus ma byas pa /
NK051(zhi)002:5520: nyi ma ni mun pa sel ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5521: snang ba ni ye shes 'od gsal gyi snang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5522: rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od //
NK051(zhi)002:5524: rdo rje ni skye 'jig med pa'i rdo rje'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5525: zla ba ni ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5526: dri med 'od ces pa nyon mongs pa'i dri mas ma gos la /
NK051(zhi)002:5527: dug lnga med pas 'od gsal chen po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5528: chags bral la sogs chags pa che //
NK051(zhi)002:5530: chags bral ni theg pa chung ngu mtshan nyid sde gsum gyi theg pa bstan la /
NK051(zhi)002:5531: chags pa che ni chags pa mi spang lam du
NK051(zhi)002:5532: khyer ba thabs shes rab bzung du 'brel ba ste
NK051(zhi)002:5533: / ta na ga na'i sgo nas gnyis med thig ler sbyor bas na chags pa che'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5534: yang na srid pa'i 'dod chags dang bral /
NK051(zhi)002:5535: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes skye med ka dag
NK051(zhi)002:5536: gi don la mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis chags pa
NK051(zhi)002:5537: che zhes pa'o // kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od //
NK051(zhi)002:5539: 'khrul pa rtsad gcod pa'i gdams ngag bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:5540: rin chen rnam dag 'od gsal gyi lha gang ni
NK051(zhi)002:5541: dngos med kun dngos 'od 'bar rin chen spros gcod
NK051(zhi)002:5543: de la rin po che'i 'od kha dog 'bar zhing 'phro ba /
NK051(zhi)002:5544: kha dog ces pa ni 'od kyi kha dog lnga ste /
NK051(zhi)002:5545: nyon mongs pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pa'i rtags su 'od dkar po dang /
NK051(zhi)002:5546: yon tan ma 'gags par 'char ba'i phyir 'od ser po dang /
NK051(zhi)002:5547: chos nyid rgya ma chad pa'i phyir dmar po dang /
NK051(zhi)002:5548: phrin las thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i phyir 'od ljang gu dang /
NK051(zhi)002:5549: chos nyid mi 'gyur ba'i phyir 'od mthing ga dang lnga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5550: de la sogs pa'i 'od rnam pa sna tshogs pas sems can smin par byed cing /
NK051(zhi)002:5551: nyon mongs pa zhi bar byed pa'i 'od 'bar zhing rab tu 'phro ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5552: rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas //
NK051(zhi)002:5554: rdo rje ni dbyer med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5556: krung ni g.yo ba med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5557: rdzogs pa ni blos brtag tu med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5558: sangs pa dang rgyas pa ni bdag nyid phun sum tshogs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5561: sangs pa ni blos btags kyi chos sangs /
NK051(zhi)002:5562: rgyas pa ni dbyer med blo 'das kyi chos rgyas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5563: 'gro ba rigs drug tu sems kyis 'dzin /
NK051(zhi)002:5564: chos 'di 'gro ba'i rgyud grol bar byed pa'i don du 'dzin pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5565: dpal ldan sangs rgyas pad+ma skyes //
NK051(zhi)002:5567: sems nyid kyi don rtogs pas na dpal skye ba
NK051(zhi)002:5568: med pa'i don rgyud la ldan pas na ldan pa'o
NK051(zhi)002:5569: // sangs pa ni skyon med pa de ka dag chen por rgyas /
NK051(zhi)002:5570: pad+ma 'dam na gnas kyang 'dam gyi skyon gyis ma gos pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5571: dpe de bzhin du skye med ka dag chen po de 'khor ba'i 'dam na gnas kyang /
NK051(zhi)002:5572: nyon mongs pa drug gi skyon dang dri mas ma gos pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5573: 'od gsal ngang dwangs kyi khye'u chung rang snang gi
NK051(zhi)002:5574: ye shes rtogs pa sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa skyes
NK051(zhi)002:5575: zhes bya'o // kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa //
NK051(zhi)002:5577: kun mkhyen pa ni bcom ldan 'das so //
NK051(zhi)002:5578: ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa ni ngang dwangs gsal ba'i khye'u chung ngo //
NK051(zhi)002:5581: rgyal po ni spyi ti yo ga'i theg pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5582: theg pa dgu'i lta sgom las rgyal lo /
NK051(zhi)002:5585: sna tshogs ni yon tan sna tshogs 'chang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5586: yang na rgyal po sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs 'chang ni sgyu ma sna tshogs su ston pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5587: che ba sangs rgyas rigs sngags 'chang //
NK051(zhi)002:5589: che ba ni skye med ka dag go //
NK051(zhi)002:5590: sangs pa ni ma rig pa sangs la ye shes rgyas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5592: rig sngags dang gzungs sngags dang /
NK051(zhi)002:5594: rdo rje rnon po ral gri che //
NK051(zhi)002:5596: rdo rje rnon po ni gzhan 'big cing 'joms par byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5597: yang na rdo rje rnon pos ngar 'dzin ma rig dug gsum gsod par byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5598: ral gri che zhes pa las kyi phyag rgya bzhi'i
NK051(zhi)002:5599: rtags su phyag g.yas pa bzhi na ral gri bsnams
NK051(zhi)002:5600: pa'o // des skye rga na 'chi bzhi'i chu bo chen po bzhi gcod par byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5601: yi ge mchog ste rnam par dag /
NK051(zhi)002:5603: yi ge'i mchog ni a yig no //
NK051(zhi)002:5604: a de ni skye med ka dag gi don te /
NK051(zhi)002:5605: skye ba'i cho 'phrul nyon mongs pa thams cad dag pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5606: theg pa chen po sdug bsngal gcod //
NK051(zhi)002:5608: theg pa chen po ni spyi ti yo ga'i theg pa ste /
NK051(zhi)002:5609: des 'khrul pa'i sdug bsngal ma lus pa rtsad nas gcod do //
NK051(zhi)002:5610: mtshon cha chen po rdo rje chos //
NK051(zhi)002:5612: mtshon cha ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad gcod pa /
NK051(zhi)002:5613: rdo rje ni 'gyur ba med de skye 'jig med pa'i don to //
NK051(zhi)002:5614: chos ni skye ba med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5615: rdo rje zab mo dzi na dzika /
NK051(zhi)002:5617: rdo rje gnyis su med pa'i ye shes /
NK051(zhi)002:5618: zab mo ni skye med ka dag go //
NK051(zhi)002:5619: skye med ka dag de rtogs par dka' bas na dzi na dzika ces bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5620: rdo rje blo gros don bzhin rig /
NK051(zhi)002:5622: rdo rje ni gzung 'dzin dang bral ba'i rdo rje /
NK051(zhi)002:5623: blo gros ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5624: don bzhin ni dngos med sna tshogs dngos gzhi med /
NK051(zhi)002:5625: rig ni skal ldan gyi rnal 'byor pa rig pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5626: pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs pa //
NK051(zhi)002:5628: pha rol ni 'khor ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5629: phyin pa ni mya ngan 'das pa'i skam sar gnas /
NK051(zhi)002:5630: kun rdzogs ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams dbye bsal med par mchod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5631: sa rnams kun gyi rgyan dang ldan //
NK051(zhi)002:5633: sangs rgyas kyi sa bcu'am bcu drug la sogs pa'i sa rnams kyis /
NK051(zhi)002:5634: rgyan ni kun tu bzang po 'byed pa med pa'i sa dang ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5635: rnam par dag pa bdag med chos //
NK051(zhi)002:5637: nyon mongs pa rnam par dag pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5638: bdag med chos zhes pa gnyis su med pa ye shes kyi stobs su gyur pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5639: yang dag ye shes zla 'od bzang //
NK051(zhi)002:5641: yang dag pa'i ye shes ni skye med ka dag gi dgongs pa la /
NK051(zhi)002:5642: rnam par rtog pa ma rig pa'i mun pa sel
NK051(zhi)002:5643: ba ni dper na tshes bco lnga'i zla ba'i 'od
NK051(zhi)002:5644: bzang zhing gsal ba lta bu'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5645: brtson chen sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba ste //
NK051(zhi)002:5647: brtson pa chen po theg pa chen po'i chos sgor 'jug pa la brtson pa /
NK051(zhi)002:5650: d+r+wa ba ni ma bu dbyer med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5651: rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:5653: rgyud kun gyi bdag po'am rtsa bar gyur cing /
NK051(zhi)002:5654: rgyud kun gyi sa bon 'di nas zin pas na bdag po'i mchog ces gsungs so //
NK051(zhi)002:5655: yang na rgyud la bsam gyis mi khyab brjod kyis mi lang yang bzhir 'du ste /
NK051(zhi)002:5658: bla na med pa'i rgyud dang /
NK051(zhi)002:5659: snying po gong na med pa'i don gyi rgyud do //
NK051(zhi)002:5660: yang na bya ba'i rgyud kri ya /
NK051(zhi)002:5661: spyod pa'i rgyud u pa ya /
NK051(zhi)002:5663: yang na zhe sdang lam du khyer ba pha'i rgyud /
NK051(zhi)002:5664: 'dod chags lam du khyer ba ma'i rgyud /
NK051(zhi)002:5665: gti mug lam du khyer ba snying po gong na med pa dgu rtse spyi ti'i rgyud rnams so //
NK051(zhi)002:5666: yang na gsang ba sgyu 'phrul thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'i rgyud /
NK051(zhi)002:5667: a nu yo ga dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i rgyud /
NK051(zhi)002:5668: rdzogs pa chen po ma spangs la rang grol ye sangs rgyas pa'i rgyud dang /
NK051(zhi)002:5669: theg pa dgu'i rtse chos la la zlas pa'i rgyud do //
NK051(zhi)002:5670: de'i phyir na rgyud kyi mnga' bdag lta bu ni
NK051(zhi)002:5671: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod
NK051(zhi)002:5672: pa rin po che zhes pa lta bu'i rgyud 'di
NK051(zhi)002:5673: yin no // 'di ni gsal ba nyi zla'i rgyud /
NK051(zhi)002:5676: dgos 'dod 'byung ba nor bu rin po che'i rgyud do //
NK051(zhi)002:5677: rdo rje gdan ni ma lus ldan //
NK051(zhi)002:5679: snying po 'gyur ba med pa'i don bstan no //
NK051(zhi)002:5680: don 'gyur ba med pa'i dgongs pa de rnal 'byor pa la ldan no //
NK051(zhi)002:5681: ye shes sku rnams ma lus 'chang //
NK051(zhi)002:5683: ye shes ni skye med ka dag tu shes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5684: sku'i rnam pa grangs med pa yang yod pa /
NK051(zhi)002:5686: sku rnams ma lus pa rnal 'byor pas 'chang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5687: kun tu bzang po blo gros bzang //
NK051(zhi)002:5689: 'di ni chos sku'i ston pa gong du bstan pa /
NK051(zhi)002:5690: 'bru bshad na kun ni snang srid 'khor 'das /
NK051(zhi)002:5692: bzang po ni 'pho 'gyur med pa'i dgongs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5693: blo gros bzang ste skye med ka dag gi dgongs pa dang ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5696: 'byung ba sa'i snying po ni gser ro //
NK051(zhi)002:5697: de 'gyur ba med pa bzhin du sems can thams cad la snying pos khyab pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5698: yang na 'byung ba sa gzhi ni snang srid 'khor
NK051(zhi)002:5699: 'das skye 'gul sems can bde sdug bzang ngan la
NK051(zhi)002:5700: sogs pa thams cad kyi gzhi sa'i snying pos 'dzin
NK051(zhi)002:5702: dam pa'i chos kyi bca' gzhi dpe dang sbyar ro //
NK051(zhi)002:5703: sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che //
NK051(zhi)002:5705: sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po'am yang snying bcud 'dus
NK051(zhi)002:5706: pa'i gdams ngag ni skye med ka dag dngos med
NK051(zhi)002:5708: chos thams cad kyi snying po gcig tu 'dus pa dang sbyar ro //
NK051(zhi)002:5711: 'khor lo rnam pa bdun du bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:5712: lus la gnas pa rtsa'i 'khor lo /
NK051(zhi)002:5713: bkod pa byang chub sems kyi 'khor lo /
NK051(zhi)002:5715: thugs ka shes rab kyi 'khor lo /
NK051(zhi)002:5716: gsang ba thabs dang shes rab kyi 'khor lo /
NK051(zhi)002:5717: spyi bo bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo /
NK051(zhi)002:5718: lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo dang bdun no //
NK051(zhi)002:5719: 'khor lo de rnams la rtsibs su yod pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:5720: rtsa'i grangs su yod pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:5723: gtan la phabs nas gang 'byung ba ni gzhan du shes par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5724: sna tshogs 'chang ba ni 'khor lo de rnams rnal 'byor pas 'chang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5725: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:5727: spyi ti yo ga'i gdams ngag bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:5728: dngos po ni gzhi'i gnas lugs so //
NK051(zhi)002:5729: rang bzhin ni rgyu rkyen dang 'pho 'gyur med pa'i rang bzhin no //
NK051(zhi)002:5730: mchog ni snying po lhun gyis grub pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5731: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin //
NK051(zhi)002:5733: dngos po ni skye med ka dag gi dngos po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5734: de'i don 'dzin pa ni rnal 'byor pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5735: skye med chos de sna tshogs ston //
NK051(zhi)002:5737: chos nyid snying po skye ba med pa gnad du chud cing dngos med blo 'das su gyur na /
NK051(zhi)002:5738: skye med rtogs pa'i gnad dang dgongs pa chos sna tshogs ston nus pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5740: kun gyi rang bzhin gcig shes na //
NK051(zhi)002:5741: kun la dbang bsgyur thob pa yin //
NK051(zhi)002:5742: ye dbang chen po rdzogs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5744: chos sku ngo bo nyid 'chang ba //
NK051(zhi)002:5746: chos kun ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched
NK051(zhi)002:5747: kyis bsdus pa'i chos ma lus pa'i ngo bo chos
NK051(zhi)002:5748: nyid don dam pa gcig ma shes na /
NK051(zhi)002:5749: gzhan tha snyad kyi chos ci tsam shes kyang mi phan no //
NK051(zhi)002:5750: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid chen po de
NK051(zhi)002:5751: ni gsang bdag chen pos kyang mtshon du mi nus
NK051(zhi)002:5752: so // ming tsam las 'di zhes bstan par ni
NK051(zhi)002:5753: rdo rje sems dpas kyang mtshon du med ces gsungs
NK051(zhi)002:5754: so // so // re zhig ma rtogs pa slob ma'i blo la mtshon nas bstan na /
NK051(zhi)002:5755: at+ma d+harma dz+ny+aa na d+ha tu b+h+yo ya d+hi ta +aam a /
NK051(zhi)002:5757: chos thams cad ni nam mkha' lta bu'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5758: nam mkha' ni ji lta bu zhe na /
NK051(zhi)002:5759: nam mkha' ni mtha' dang dbus med de phyogs dang ris med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5760: nam mkha' bstan tu btub bam zhe na /
NK051(zhi)002:5761: chos nyid nam mkha' bstan du mi btub ste /
NK051(zhi)002:5762: mtshon brjod thams cad las 'das so //
NK051(zhi)002:5763: de bzhin du chos nyid ngo bo nyid dang /
NK051(zhi)002:5765: phyogs ris dang nga bdag thams cad las 'das /
NK051(zhi)002:5774: skal ldan skyes bu chen po nges /
NK051(zhi)002:5775: 'on kyang de ltar ma rtogs pa de la /
NK051(zhi)002:5776: re zhig tu chos kun gzhi ngo bo nyid snying
NK051(zhi)002:5777: po yang dag pa'i gdams ngag tshig gsum bstan te
NK051(zhi)002:5781: 'chang ba ni skal ldan gyis de ltar rtogs shing
NK051(zhi)002:5782: rgyud la zhen pa med pa'i tshul gyis 'chang ngo
NK051(zhi)002:5783: // shes rab chen pos skad cig la /
NK051(zhi)002:5785: shes rab chen po'i tshad ni thugs rgya mtsho lta
NK051(zhi)002:5786: bu la dgongs pa nam mkha' lta bu'i klong nas
NK051(zhi)002:5787: / ye shes chen po nyi zla lta bu shar
NK051(zhi)002:5788: nas blo ma rig pa'i sgrib g.yogs kyi mun pa
NK051(zhi)002:5789: thams cad dus gcig tu sangs pas /
NK051(zhi)002:5790: shes rab chen po mtshon gyi rgyal po ral gri
NK051(zhi)002:5791: dang 'dra pas phyi nang snod bcud snang srid 'khor
NK051(zhi)002:5792: 'das yod med rtag chad kyi chos thams cad sgro
NK051(zhi)002:5794: chos kun khong du chud pa 'chang //
NK051(zhi)002:5796: chos thams cad ma lus lus pa med par rtogs nas khong du chud cing /
NK051(zhi)002:5797: sbyangs pa'i 'phro can skal ldan gyis thams cad mkhyen cing thugs su chud do //
NK051(zhi)002:5798: chos kun mngon par rtogs pa ste //
NK051(zhi)002:5800: chos kun ni chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo //
NK051(zhi)002:5801: chos de rnams mngon par rtogs shing thugs su chud pa ni bcom ldan 'das so //
NK051(zhi)002:5802: thub pa blo mchog 'byung po sel //
NK051(zhi)002:5804: thub pa ni 'gong po nga bdag thub pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5805: yang na dug lnga dug gsum la sogs te nyon mongs pa ma lus pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5806: blo mchog skye med ka dag rtogs pa'i blo dang ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5807: 'byung po sel ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs nyon mongs pa'i dgra rnams sel ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5808: mi g.yo rab tu dang ba'i bdag /
NK051(zhi)002:5810: blo 'bring gi rnal 'byor pa'i dgongs nyams bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:5811: mi g.yo ba ni yid gar yang mi g.yo ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5812: rab tu yang yid rig sems kyi rnam pa de yul gang la yang mi g.yo ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5813: dang ba'i zhes pa ma nyams te /
NK051(zhi)002:5814: gsal la dwangs pa dngos gzhi ci yang med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5819: bun long gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid /
NK051(zhi)002:5820: gza' gtad dang bral ba rig pa yul 'dzin med par grol /
NK051(zhi)002:5821: sems kyi chags sdang myong grol /
NK051(zhi)002:5822: rig med gsal dwangs kyi dgongs pa ste /
NK051(zhi)002:5823: blo'i chos thams cad las yongs su 'das so //
NK051(zhi)002:5824: bdag ces pa ni rnal 'byor pa don rtogs pa'i skal ldan no //
NK051(zhi)002:5825: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub 'chang //
NK051(zhi)002:5827: gang ltar rtogs pa de la /
NK051(zhi)002:5828: sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i thugs dgongs yongs su rdzogs te /
NK051(zhi)002:5830: byar med blo 'das chen po'i don rgyas so //
NK051(zhi)002:5831: byang ba ni blo'i chos byang /
NK051(zhi)002:5832: chub pa ni blo 'das chen po'i dgongs pa yongs su chub pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5834: sangs rgyas kun gyi mngon sum pa //
NK051(zhi)002:5836: spyi ti'i gzhung gis mngon sum du sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa chos sku gcer mthong du bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:5837: 'di ka ltar rtsol sgrub bya mi dgos par sangs /
NK051(zhi)002:5838: gzhan nas btsal zhing sgrub mi dgos par rgyas /
NK051(zhi)002:5839: mngon sum pa zhes pa 'di ka ltar dbang po lngas mngon sum du snang ba'i yul lnga la /
NK051(zhi)002:5840: rig pa yod med sems kyi dran rtog blo dang
NK051(zhi)002:5841: shes pa gzung 'dzin du ma skyes na gsal dag
NK051(zhi)002:5842: zang ka chen po'i dgongs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5843: rgyal rigs yid dran sems gzhan du gyur pa yang /
NK051(zhi)002:5844: rang byung rang brlag rang zhi rang sangs rang grol lo //
NK051(zhi)002:5845: rig sems yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni //
NK051(zhi)002:5846: snang srid cir snang sna tshogs chos rnams la //
NK051(zhi)002:5847: der 'dzin rig med gzung 'dzin blo las grol //
NK051(zhi)002:5848: mi 'gyu mi 'jug mi sems mi spyod na //
NK051(zhi)002:5849: mi len mi 'dor mi spong mnyams pa'i rgyal por gnas //
NK051(zhi)002:5850: der 'dzin bya rtsol blo yi chos las grol //
NK051(zhi)002:5851: de ltar shes na sangs rgyas cer gyis mthong //
NK051(zhi)002:5852: mthong ba'i dus na ngos bzung med //
NK051(zhi)002:5853: med pa de ka mthong ba yin //
NK051(zhi)002:5856: nga la blta bar 'dod pa rnams //
NK051(zhi)002:5857: blta bar ma byed de bzhin nyid la zhog /
NK051(zhi)002:5858: ma bltas bzhag pas de bzhin nyid dang mjal //
NK051(zhi)002:5859: sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa de la 'dus //
NK051(zhi)002:5861: dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis kyang nga mi mthong //
NK051(zhi)002:5862: ma mthong ba de mthong ba'i dam pa yin //
NK051(zhi)002:5864: yang rdzogs pa chen po ltar bshad na /
NK051(zhi)002:5865: mngon sum du snang ba thams cad ni sku /
NK051(zhi)002:5866: sgra skad thams cad ni gsung /
NK051(zhi)002:5867: dran rtog thams cad ni thugs so //
NK051(zhi)002:5868: sku gsung thugs su 'dus pas na mngon sum pa zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5873: me lce ni shes rab ye shes kyi me lces
NK051(zhi)002:5874: zhe sdang gi me 'bar ba 'joms shing nyon mongs
NK051(zhi)002:5875: pa thams cad bsreg par byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5876: 'od 'bar zhes pa rtogs pa'i ye shes brjod kyis mi lang ba'i rtsal 'od rab tu 'bar bas /
NK051(zhi)002:5877: nyon mongs ma rig mun pa'i smag rum bsal nas /
NK051(zhi)002:5878: snang gsal ye shes 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgyas par rab tu grags so //
NK051(zhi)002:5879: de yan chod tshigs bcad bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi sgo nas /
NK051(zhi)002:5880: snang ba mtha' yas kyi dkyil 'khor la bstod pa'i skabs so //
NK051(zhi)002:5881: spyir tshig khra bo khra rtags 'dres mar yod pas don rgya che ba dang sbyar zhing bshad do //
NK051(zhi)002:5882: 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste //
NK051(zhi)002:5884: 'di la yang 'bru lnga'am bcu tham pas 'chad de /
NK051(zhi)002:5885: 'dod pa zhes pa nyan thos pas bdag med par 'dod //
NK051(zhi)002:5886: rang rgyal pas rnam par rig byed du 'dod /
NK051(zhi)002:5887: sems tsam pas gzung 'dzin gnyis med du 'dod /
NK051(zhi)002:5888: dbu ma pas bden pa dbyer med du 'dod /
NK051(zhi)002:5889: kri yas rigs gsum mgon por 'dod /
NK051(zhi)002:5890: u pa yas dag pa chos nyid du 'dod /
NK051(zhi)002:5891: yo gas rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas su 'dod //
NK051(zhi)002:5892: ma h+aas snang stong gnyis med du 'dod /
NK051(zhi)002:5893: a nus dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med du 'dod /
NK051(zhi)002:5894: a tis rang shar rang grol bar 'dod /
NK051(zhi)002:5895: spyi tis snang ba rang grol chen por 'dod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5896: don grub ces pas theg pa rim pa dgu la
NK051(zhi)002:5897: rang rang gi 'dod pa'i lta ba las grub pa'i
NK051(zhi)002:5899: nyan thos kyis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu 'grub /
NK051(zhi)002:5900: rang rgyal gyis bse ru ltar nyag gcig gi don 'grub /
NK051(zhi)002:5901: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pas kun tu 'od kyi sangs rgyas 'grub /
NK051(zhi)002:5902: kri yas rigs gsum gyi sangs rgyas 'grub /
NK051(zhi)002:5903: u pa yas rigs bzhi'i sangs rgyas 'grub /
NK051(zhi)002:5904: yo gas de nyid sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
NK051(zhi)002:5905: stug po bkod pa'i sangs rgyas 'grub /
NK051(zhi)002:5906: ma h+aas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sangs rgyas 'grub /
NK051(zhi)002:5907: a nu yo gas rdo rje 'chang gi sangs rgyas 'grub /
NK051(zhi)002:5908: a ti yo gas kun tu bzang po'i sangs rgyas 'grub /
NK051(zhi)002:5909: spyi ti yo gas sgrub pa'i 'bras bu mi 'dod de /
NK051(zhi)002:5910: ye nas don rtogs ka dag rnal ma'i sangs rgyas 'grub /
NK051(zhi)002:5911: theg pa bcus 'dod pa'i don gyi 'bras bu 'grub pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5912: tshig kun bshad pas ma lang skabs mgor bshad cing dkrol /
NK051(zhi)002:5913: de ltar shes rab can gyis tshig kun bshad par bya /
NK051(zhi)002:5914: 'dod pa ni skye med ka dag 'dod /
NK051(zhi)002:5915: grub pa ni snying po 'pho 'gyur med pas grub pas na /
NK051(zhi)002:5916: 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste //
NK051(zhi)002:5918: ngan song thams cad rnam sbyong ba //
NK051(zhi)002:5920: ngan song ni dmyal ba yi dwags byol song gsum
NK051(zhi)002:5921: gyi sdug bsngal rnam par byang bar mdzad cing sgrib
NK051(zhi)002:5922: pa thams cad sbyong ba po ni 'phags pa 'jam
NK051(zhi)002:5923: dpal lo // mgon po sems can kun gyi mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:5925: mgon po ni sems can rnams kyi mgon te bcom ldan 'das so //
NK051(zhi)002:5926: sems can gyi don byed pa'i mchog ni rje btsun 'phags pa 'jam dpal lo //
NK051(zhi)002:5927: sems can thams cad rab grol byed //
NK051(zhi)002:5929: sems can thams cad ni sdug bsngal gyis gdungs shing nyon mongs pa rnams so //
NK051(zhi)002:5930: 'dod chags kyi rgya mtsho chen por chud pas /
NK051(zhi)002:5931: bcom ldan 'das ni sdug bsngal chu bo bzhi las sgrol bar byed pa'i gru lta bu'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5932: nyon mongs g.yul du gcig dpa' ba //
NK051(zhi)002:5934: nyon mongs pa ni dug lnga /
NK051(zhi)002:5935: g.yul du zhes pa ting nge 'dzin las su rung ba dgra'i g.yul ngo ru /
NK051(zhi)002:5936: gcig dpa' ba zhes pa skye med ka dag gi dgongs pa la dpa' ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5937: mi shes dgra yi dregs pa 'joms //
NK051(zhi)002:5939: mi shes pa ni ma rig pas yang dag pa'i don mi shes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5940: dgra ni lta ba log pa dug lnga nga rgyal
NK051(zhi)002:5941: gyi dgra'i dregs pa de nyid rje btsun 'jam dpal
NK051(zhi)002:5942: gyis 'joms pa'o // dpal ldan blo ldan sgeg par ldan //
NK051(zhi)002:5944: dpal ldan ni ngan song gsum gyi 'jigs pa skyob pas na dpal dang ldan /
NK051(zhi)002:5945: blo ldan ni rtogs pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5946: sgeg par ldan pa ni byar med blo 'das kyi don dang ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5947: brtan po mi sdug gzugs 'chang ba //
NK051(zhi)002:5949: gdul bya khro bo la dga' ba la khro bo'i
NK051(zhi)002:5950: gzugs mi sdug pa sku mdog nag por bstan pa'o
NK051(zhi)002:5951: // yang na brtan po ni snying po 'gyur ba med par gnas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5952: gzugs ni rtsal lam snang tshul ma 'gags pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5953: lag pa brgya po kun bskyod cing //
NK051(zhi)002:5955: khro bo chen po de rkang lag dang brtul zhugs spyod pa'i gar thabs bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:5956: khro bo de la dbu brgya /
NK051(zhi)002:5959: rkang pa bargya'am bzhi'am drug gam bcu gnyis su sprul
NK051(zhi)002:5960: nas kun tu bskyod par mdzad cing gar mdzad do
NK051(zhi)002:5961: // gom pa'i stabs kyis gar byed pa //
NK051(zhi)002:5963: khro bo chen po de'i zhabs kyi gom pa g.yas pa brkyang /
NK051(zhi)002:5967: zhabs bgrad pa'i tshul gyis stobs dang ldan pa'i gar mdzad do //
NK051(zhi)002:5968: dpal ldan lag pa brgyas gang la //
NK051(zhi)002:5970: stobs dang ldan gar dang 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dpal dang ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5971: lag pa brgyas gang la zhes pa /
NK051(zhi)002:5977: g.yo ba'i tshul gyis gar mdzad do //
NK051(zhi)002:5978: gar de gnas gang du byed pa ni /
NK051(zhi)002:5979: nam mkha' khyab par gar byed pa //
NK051(zhi)002:5982: nam mkha' mtha' dang dbus dang phyogs mtshams med pa na gar mdzad do //
NK051(zhi)002:5983: sa yi dkyil 'khor bzhi yi khyon //
NK051(zhi)002:5985: 'dis rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:5986: 'phags pa 'jam dpal la dkyil 'khor chen po bdun du bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:5987: de la rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la /
NK051(zhi)002:5988: dang po sa blangs pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:5991: sa'i lha mo brtan ma la mchod bstod dang /
NK051(zhi)002:5992: sta gon gyi cho ga dang lnga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5993: thig gdab pa la pra ta ka ra ma man ngag gi thig las shes par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5994: tshon bkye ba dang bri ba ni gsang ldan man ngag tu shes par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5995: dkyil 'khor bdun gang bzhengs pa yang sgrub thabs bzhin du shes par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:5998: sems nyid kyi dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba dang gsum las /
NK051(zhi)002:5999: de ni rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor yin no //
NK051(zhi)002:6001: dkyil chos kyi dbyings yin no //
NK051(zhi)002:6004: dkyil snying po mi 'gyur ba yin /
NK051(zhi)002:6006: rkang pa ya gcig mthil gyis gnon //
NK051(zhi)002:6009: sa gzhi chung ngu ma song bar /
NK051(zhi)002:6010: rdzu 'phrul gyis de ltar ston cing mnan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6011: rkang mtheb sen mo'i khyon gyis kyang //
NK051(zhi)002:6013: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang mtheb sen mo'i khyon tsam gyis kyang ngo //
NK051(zhi)002:6014: tshangs pa'i yul sa rtse nas gnon //
NK051(zhi)002:6016: bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs skyes pas
NK051(zhi)002:6017: tshangs pa'i yul sa bsam gtan dang po'i yul man
NK051(zhi)002:6018: chad kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis mnan par bstan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6019: don gcig gnyis med dam pa'i don //
NK051(zhi)002:6021: yo ga'i don gdams ngag bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:6022: don gcig ni snying po med pa /
NK051(zhi)002:6023: gnyis med ni rtsis gdab med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6024: dam pa'i don ni ka dag blo 'das so //
NK051(zhi)002:6025: dam pa'i don ni 'jigs pa med //
NK051(zhi)002:6027: dam pa ni chos nyid do //
NK051(zhi)002:6029: 'jigs pa med pa ni nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6030: rnam rig sna tshogs gzugs don can //
NK051(zhi)002:6032: sems tsam rnam bden pa'i lta ba ste /
NK051(zhi)002:6033: rnam pa'i grangs ji snyed yod tshad du shes pa'i
NK051(zhi)002:6034: grangs kyang de snyed du 'dod pa'i sems tsam dang
NK051(zhi)002:6035: / rnam par shes pa tshogs brgyad du 'dod pa'i sems tsam dang /
NK051(zhi)002:6036: tshogs gcig tu 'dod pa'i sems tsam dang /
NK051(zhi)002:6037: rnam par shes pa dang yul gyi rnam pa gnyis sgo nga gshags pa ltar du 'dod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6038: rgyal ba'i sras dag khams gsum po 'di ni sems tsam mo //
NK051(zhi)002:6040: yul rnam par rig pa thams cad sems su bden par 'dod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6041: yang na rnam pa ni yul du snang ba'i dkar dmar sna tshogs su snang ba rnams so //
NK051(zhi)002:6042: rig pa ni rang rig rang gsal te /
NK051(zhi)002:6043: gsal ba la 'dzin pa med pa rtog pa med
NK051(zhi)002:6044: pa mar me rlung gis ma bskyod pa lta bur
NK051(zhi)002:6045: 'dod pa'o // yul rnam pa sna tshogs pa sems nyid kyi cha yin pas na /
NK051(zhi)002:6046: thams cad sems su bden par 'dod pa rnam bden no //
NK051(zhi)002:6048: phyi rol gyi yul rnam pa sna tshogs 'di 'khrul
NK051(zhi)002:6049: pa yin cing mi rtag bslu ba yin pa'i phyir
NK051(zhi)002:6051: yul du snang ba 'khrul pa ste //
NK051(zhi)002:6052: sems ni rang rig rang gsal lo //
NK051(zhi)002:6053: de phyir gzung ba'i yul rnams grub //
NK051(zhi)002:6055: rnam ni phyi rol gyi rnam pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6057: de ni yang dag dngos ma yin //
NK051(zhi)002:6060: rnam zhes pa phyi'i yul gyi rnam pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6061: rig ces pa skad cig ma snga ma rgyu /
NK051(zhi)002:6064: sna tshogs zhes pa dkar dmar rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rnam par snang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6065: gzugs don can ces pa yang dag pa'i kun rdzob
NK051(zhi)002:6066: gzugs snang la don byed nus pa gzugs don can
NK051(zhi)002:6067: ces gsungs so // rnam shes sna tshogs rgyud dang ldan //
NK051(zhi)002:6069: rnam par shes pa tshogs brgyad du 'dod pa'i sems tsam mo //
NK051(zhi)002:6070: rnam shes ni tshogs drug gam brgyad do //
NK051(zhi)002:6071: sna tshogs ni nyon mongs pa sna tshogs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6072: rgyud dang ldan pa ni sems can sna tshogs kyi rgyud dang /
NK051(zhi)002:6073: rnam shes brgyad dang ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6074: dngos don ma lus rnams la dga' //
NK051(zhi)002:6076: dngos don ni gnas lugs so //
NK051(zhi)002:6077: ma lus rnams la dga' zhes pa don zab mo'i gdams ngag rnams la skal ldan de dga' ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6078: stong pa nyid dga' 'dod chags blo //
NK051(zhi)002:6080: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pha rol tu phyin
NK051(zhi)002:6081: pa'i lugs kyis chos thams cad stong pa bco brgyad
NK051(zhi)002:6082: du 'dod de / de yang dag par na stong
NK051(zhi)002:6083: pa de la sems dga' zhing yid chags kyang 'dod
NK051(zhi)002:6085: de ni don dam pa ma yin no //
NK051(zhi)002:6087: srid pa'i 'dod chags sogs spangs pa //
NK051(zhi)002:6090: mngal nas srid pa'i 'dod chags dang /
NK051(zhi)002:6091: drod gsher las srid pa'i 'dod chags dang /
NK051(zhi)002:6092: sgo nga las srid pa'i 'dod chags dang /
NK051(zhi)002:6093: bardzusa te srid pa'i 'dod chags dang /
NK051(zhi)002:6094: de bzhi las grol zhing tha mal pa'i 'dod chags spangs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6095: srid gsum dga' ba chen po ste //
NK051(zhi)002:6097: tha mal pa'i 'dod chags dang nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas ni /
NK051(zhi)002:6098: skyes bu dam pa de mkhas pa dang btsun pa
NK051(zhi)002:6099: dang ldan pas srid pa gsum nas bkur sti bya
NK051(zhi)002:6101: srid gsum gyi mi rnams rang la shin tu yang dga' ba skyes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6102: sprin dkar dag pa bzhin du dkar //
NK051(zhi)002:6104: rnam par snang mdzad gtso bo mdzad pa'i dus su /
NK051(zhi)002:6105: ye shes sems dpa'i sku mdog bstan no //
NK051(zhi)002:6106: sprin dkar zhes pa nyon mongs pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pa'i dpe bstan no //
NK051(zhi)002:6107: dag pa ni skye med ka dag mtshon pa'i dape'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6108: bzhin ni rnal ma'am gshis so //
NK051(zhi)002:6109: dkar ni ka dag la dri ma med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6112: 'od bzang po ni ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6113: ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od ces pa ni de la sprin rdul med pas shin tu dkar po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6114: nyi ma 'char kha'i dkyil ltar mdzes //
NK051(zhi)002:6116: ye shes kyi 'od gnas lugs bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:6117: 'od zer de dkar la dwangs pa /
NK051(zhi)002:6118: gsal la mun pa med pa'i shin tu dkar la
NK051(zhi)002:6119: gsal ba nyi ma 'char kha'i zer bzhin du bsam
NK051(zhi)002:6121: dkyil ltar zhes pa snying po'i don de lta bu dang mi 'bral ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6122: yang na 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i sku mdog nyi ma 'char kha'i zer lta bur bstan no //
NK051(zhi)002:6123: sen mo'i 'od ni shas cher dmar ba'i mdog go //
NK051(zhi)002:6124: yang na sku mdog snang ba mtha' yas kyi dus su shas cher dmar bar bzhugs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6125: cod pan bzang po mthon ka'i rtse //
NK051(zhi)002:6127: cod pan ni dbu la bcings pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6128: mthon ka'i rtse zhes pa sku thon nas rtse rgyal du gnas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6129: skra mchog mthon ka chen po 'chang //
NK051(zhi)002:6131: 'jam dpal gyi dbu skra ni skra'i mchog yin no //
NK051(zhi)002:6132: mthon ka ni nor bu'i 'od do //
NK051(zhi)002:6133: chen po ni gzhan las khyad par du gyur pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6134: nor bu chen po 'od chags dpal //
NK051(zhi)002:6136: nor bu chen po ni sems nyid kyi nor bu'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6137: de la ye shes kyi 'od chags pas 'gro ba rnams kyi dpal du gyur pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6138: sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan dang ldan //
NK051(zhi)002:6140: sangs pa ni nyon mongs pa sangs /
NK051(zhi)002:6141: rgyas pa ni ye shes rgyas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6142: sprul pa ni 'gro ba'i don mdzad /
NK051(zhi)002:6148: mgur chu la sogs pa'i rgyan rnams so //
NK051(zhi)002:6149: 'jig rten khams brgya kun bskyod pa //
NK051(zhi)002:6151: sa dang po rab tu dga' ba'i byang chub sems
NK051(zhi)002:6152: dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i don la bskyod pa'o
NK051(zhi)002:6153: // rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i stobs dang ldan //
NK051(zhi)002:6156: sems can ma dad pa dad par byed pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang /
NK051(zhi)002:6157: dad pa smin par byed pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang /
NK051(zhi)002:6158: smin pa sgrol bar byed pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:6159: rkang pa ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6161: smad nas chu 'brub pa la sogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul mdzad do //
NK051(zhi)002:6162: stobs dang ldan pa ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i stobs dang ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6163: de nyid dran pa chen po 'chang //
NK051(zhi)002:6165: de nyid dran pa ni snying po skye ba med pa'i don dran pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6166: chen po 'chang ba ni byar med blo 'das kyi don 'chang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6167: dran pa bzhi po ting 'dzin rgyal //
NK051(zhi)002:6169: ka dag tshom chen po bzhi'i don dran pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6170: yang na bar do'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pas nyon mongs pa las rgyal ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6171: byang chub yan lag me tog spos //
NK051(zhi)002:6175: gnyis su med pas yan lag /
NK051(zhi)002:6176: chos zab mo 'di me tog dang 'dra ste yid du 'ong /
NK051(zhi)002:6177: spos dang 'dra ste dri zhim pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6178: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mtsho //
NK051(zhi)002:6180: de bzhin ni snying po'i don /
NK051(zhi)002:6181: gshegs pa ni ma nor bar gshegs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6182: yon tan ni zad mi shes te //
NK051(zhi)002:6183: mkhyen pa'i mchog tu gyur pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6184: mtsho ni dgongs pa rgya mtsho dang 'dra ba g.yo 'gul med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6185: lam gyi yan lag brgyad tshul rig /
NK051(zhi)002:6187: mtshan sngags don rnam par gzigs pa'i gzhung gis chos spyod kyi rim pa brgyad du bstan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6189: lam gyi nang nas nye lam 'di //
NK051(zhi)002:6190: de la bgrod du yod ma yin //
NK051(zhi)002:6191: ces brgyad ni nyams kyi 'char lugs brgyad do //
NK051(zhi)002:6192: rig pa ni rang gi shes rab kyis rig pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6193: yang dag sangs rgyas lam rig pa //
NK051(zhi)002:6195: yang dag ni ma rig pa med pa ste snying po skye ba med pa'i don /
NK051(zhi)002:6196: sangs pa ni ma 'gag par rang snang ba rang grol du sangs /
NK051(zhi)002:6197: rgyas pa ni ma dmigs pa la mi gnas par rgyas so //
NK051(zhi)002:6198: lam rig pa zhes pa lam ni bgrod du med pa'i lam du rig par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6199: yang na gzhan gyis ma bstan par bag chags dang
NK051(zhi)002:6200: las sad nas rang gis chos nyid rig pa ma
NK051(zhi)002:6201: 'gag pa'o // sems can kun la shas cher chags //
NK051(zhi)002:6203: sems can gyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed
NK051(zhi)002:6204: kyang don dam du bden pa gnyis las ma 'das
NK051(zhi)002:6205: par bstan no // nam mkha' lta bur chags pa med //
NK051(zhi)002:6207: don dam pa'i chos snying po ka dag gi ye
NK051(zhi)002:6208: shes de la nam mkha' lta bur mtha' dang phyogs
NK051(zhi)002:6209: dang ris su chad pa'i gnas ye nas med pa'o
NK051(zhi)002:6210: // sems can kun gyi yid la 'jug /
NK051(zhi)002:6212: sems can kun la yang dag pa'i snying pos khyab nas yod pa ni yid la 'jug go //
NK051(zhi)002:6213: de go bzlog ste yid la mi 'jug na mi rtogs pas so //
NK051(zhi)002:6214: sems can kun gyi yid ltar mgyogs //
NK051(zhi)002:6217: sems can kun gyi yid ni lus kyi gnas 'di
NK051(zhi)002:6218: las ma 'phags par yid de shin tu myur la
NK051(zhi)002:6219: mgyogs te / res rgya gar yul du slebs /
NK051(zhi)002:6220: res hor gyi yul du slebs /
NK051(zhi)002:6221: res gru gu'i yul du slebs /
NK051(zhi)002:6222: res rgya nag por slebs pas na /
NK051(zhi)002:6223: yid ltar mgyogs zhes gsungs so //
NK051(zhi)002:6224: sems can kun gyi dbang don shes //
NK051(zhi)002:6226: sems can gyi dbang po rno ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:6227: rtul ba rnams kyi don shes pa ni sh+aakya thub pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6228: sems can kun gyi yid 'phrog pa //
NK051(zhi)002:6230: skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston pa'i sgo nas /
NK051(zhi)002:6231: 'jam dpal gyis sems can gyi yid gzhan du 'jug tu mi ster bar /
NK051(zhi)002:6232: 'khrul pa'i yid 'phrog nas chos nyid rtogs pa'i don la bkod do //
NK051(zhi)002:6233: phung po lnga don de nyid shes //
NK051(zhi)002:6235: de la phung po lnga ni /
NK051(zhi)002:6240: rnam par shes pa'i phung po dang lnga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6241: de nyid shes zhes pa phung po lnga po de rgyal ba rigs lngar shes par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6242: rnam dag phung po lnga 'chang ba //
NK051(zhi)002:6244: tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /
NK051(zhi)002:6245: ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /
NK051(zhi)002:6246: shes rab kyi phung po dang /
NK051(zhi)002:6247: rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /
NK051(zhi)002:6248: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dang lnga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6250: mig gi rnam par shes pa /
NK051(zhi)002:6251: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa /
NK051(zhi)002:6254: lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang lnga la /
NK051(zhi)002:6256: de bzhin sgra dri ro reg de lnga la ma zhugs na rnam par dag ces bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6258: ye shes zang thal chen po lnga 'chang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6259: de sus 'chang na skal ldan gyi rnal 'byor pa
NK051(zhi)002:6260: de la ma 'gags par gsal ba'i don 'chang ba'o
NK051(zhi)002:6261: // nges 'byung kun gyi mtha' la gnas //
NK051(zhi)002:6263: nges pa'i gdams ngag zab mo de spyi ti yo ga nas 'byung ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6264: spros pa'i mtha' kun la mi gnas rang sar grol bar gnas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6265: nges par 'byung ba kun la mkhas //
NK051(zhi)002:6267: nges pa ni skye med de /
NK051(zhi)002:6268: 'byung ba ni snying po ma'i klong nas gdams ngag zab mo kun 'byung ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6269: mkhas pa ni skye med ka dag gi don dgongs pa la mkhas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6270: nges 'byung kun gyi lam la gnas //
NK051(zhi)002:6272: skye med chos kyi dbyings nas /
NK051(zhi)002:6273: nges pa'i bka' zab mo 'byung bas na /
NK051(zhi)002:6274: lam ma nor ba skye med ka dag gi dgongs pa la gnas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6275: nges par 'byung ba kun ston pa //
NK051(zhi)002:6277: nges pa ni snying po skye ba med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6278: 'byung ba ni ka dag byar med blo las 'das pa'i gdams ngag 'byung /
NK051(zhi)002:6279: de kun rdo rje 'chang chen pos ston pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6280: yan lag bcu gnyis srid rtsa bton //
NK051(zhi)002:6282: rang rgyal ba'i lta ba bstan pa ste /
NK051(zhi)002:6283: yan lag bcu gnyis ni 'khor ba lugs las ldog pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:6285: srid rtsa zhes pa 'khor ba srid pa'i rtsa ba ni ma rig pa yin no //
NK051(zhi)002:6286: dper na dang po sa bon las myu gu /
NK051(zhi)002:6292: de las rnyid pa dang skam pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6293: de bzhin du srid pa thams cad kyi rgyu nga bdag ma rig pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6295: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa /
NK051(zhi)002:6296: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs /
NK051(zhi)002:6297: de'i rkyen gyis skye mched drug /
NK051(zhi)002:6298: skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa /
NK051(zhi)002:6299: reg pa'i rkyen gyis sred pa /
NK051(zhi)002:6300: sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa /
NK051(zhi)002:6301: len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa /
NK051(zhi)002:6302: srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba /
NK051(zhi)002:6303: skye ba'i rkyen gyis rgas pa /
NK051(zhi)002:6304: rgas pa'i rkyen gyis na ba /
NK051(zhi)002:6306: 'chi ba'i rkyen gyis mya ngan dang ngu 'bod smre sngags 'don pa ste /
NK051(zhi)002:6307: srid pa'i sems can thams cad kyi rtsa ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6308: dag pa rnam pa bcu gnyis 'chang //
NK051(zhi)002:6310: 'khor ba lugs nas ldog pa bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:6311: 'khor ba'i rtsa ba dang po rgyu ma rig pa
NK051(zhi)002:6312: ldog pas 'du byed log pa rnam par shes pa
NK051(zhi)002:6313: log / de bzhin du ngu 'bod dang smre sngags 'don pa yan chod du ldog pa ste /
NK051(zhi)002:6314: dag pa bcu gnyis 'chang zhes pas /
NK051(zhi)002:6315: rang rgyal ba'i lta ba bstan no //
NK051(zhi)002:6316: bden bzhi'i tshul gyis rnam pa can //
NK051(zhi)002:6318: 'phags pa nyan thos kyi bden pa bzhi bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:6321: lam rgyud la bsten byar bden /
NK051(zhi)002:6322: 'gog pa mngon du bya bar bden no /
NK051(zhi)002:6323: nyan thos kyi bden pa bzhi'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6324: spyi ti yo ga bka' tshoms chen po bzhi bden pa chen po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6325: shes pa brgyad po rtogs pa 'chang //
NK051(zhi)002:6327: shes pa'i rnam grangs ni brgyad de /
NK051(zhi)002:6335: ma skye ba shes pa dang brgyad do //
NK051(zhi)002:6336: de rnams rtogs shing rgyud la 'chang bas de skad ces bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6337: bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis ldan //
NK051(zhi)002:6339: nyan thos kyi bden pa bzhi re re la yang bzhi bzhir phye ste /
NK051(zhi)002:6340: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi 'khor lo lan gsum gsum du bskor ba ni 'di lta ste /
NK051(zhi)002:6341: sdug bsngal gyi bden pa la gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:6345: kun 'byung gi bden pa la gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:6349: 'gog pa'i bden pa la gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:6353: lam gyi bden pa la gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:6357: de ltar sems can gyi skabs ji lta ba bzhin
NK051(zhi)002:6358: du bden pa bcu gnyis kyi chos kyi 'khor lo
NK051(zhi)002:6359: bskor ro // de nyid rnam pa bcu drug rig /
NK051(zhi)002:6361: bden pa bzhi re re la bzhi bzhi ye shes bcu drug tu phye ste bshad pas /
NK051(zhi)002:6362: nyon mongs brgyad cu rtsa drug spong ba nas /
NK051(zhi)002:6363: de nyid rnam pa bcu drug rig ces pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6364: rnam pa nyi shus byang chub pa //
NK051(zhi)002:6366: rnam pa ni phung po lnga'i rnam pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6367: nyi shu ni so sor kun tu rtog pa'i rnam
NK051(zhi)002:6368: par yang dag par byang chub tu mngon par mdzad
NK051(zhi)002:6369: pa ni rnam pa nyi shu 'di lta ste /
NK051(zhi)002:6375: tshor ba la bdag mi gnas /
NK051(zhi)002:6377: bdag tshor ba dang mi ldan /
NK051(zhi)002:6386: rnam par shes pa bdag ma yin /
NK051(zhi)002:6387: rnam par shes pa la bdag med /
NK051(zhi)002:6388: bdag rnam par shes pa dang mi ldan /
NK051(zhi)002:6389: rnam par shes pa bdag dang mi ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6390: de rnams ni rnam par shes pa nyi shu so sor kun tu rtogs pa'i ye shes so //
NK051(zhi)002:6391: byang chub ni sdug bsngal sna tshogs pa byang /
NK051(zhi)002:6392: bde ba chen po chub ste mya ngan 'das pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6393: de rnams ni rgyu mtshan nyid ltar du bshad pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6394: yang na rnam pa nyi shu zhes pa spyi ti yo ga'i snyan brgyud kyi gdams pa bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:6395: skor lugs gsum du bca' gzhi bstan /
NK051(zhi)002:6396: snang lugs gsum du bstan nas ngos kyang bzung /
NK051(zhi)002:6397: spros pa spros grol spros med gsum du gtan la dbab /
NK051(zhi)002:6398: 'gags chen gsum du grol lugs bstan /
NK051(zhi)002:6399: klong chen gsum du grol ba'i 'bras bu bstan /
NK051(zhi)002:6400: dbyings chen gsum du la bzla bstan /
NK051(zhi)002:6401: de rnams la ni bco brgyad de /
NK051(zhi)002:6402: thog ma gzhi'i rnam pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:6403: tha ma 'khrul pa rtsad gcod pa'i rnam pa ste /
NK051(zhi)002:6404: skal ldan shes rab can gyis ni de ltar rnam pa nyi shur shes par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6405: pa zhes pa snyan brgyud gdams par ltos /
NK051(zhi)002:6406: rnam par sangs rgyas kun rig mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:6408: rdzogs pa chen po'i lta ba bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:6409: snang srid kyi rnam pa 'di ka ltar du sangs
NK051(zhi)002:6410: rgyas kyi dgongs pa rang byung gi ye shes kyis
NK051(zhi)002:6411: rig pas na / kun rig mchog ces bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6412: sangs rgyas kun gyi sprul pa'i sku //
NK051(zhi)002:6414: sprul skus 'dzam bu gling dpag tu med par 'gro ba'i don byed par bstan no //
NK051(zhi)002:6415: sangs pa ni spang bya ma lus pa'i don sangs /
NK051(zhi)002:6416: rgyas pa ni shes bya ma lus pa'i don rgyas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6417: kun gyi ni sangs rgyas kun gyi sprul pa bcom
NK051(zhi)002:6418: ldan 'das kyis sems can gyi don mdzad pas na
NK051(zhi)002:6420: bye ba dpag med 'gyed pa po //
NK051(zhi)002:6422: gdul bya ci dang cis 'dul ba la /
NK051(zhi)002:6423: thabs ci dang cis 'dul ba ni sh+aakya thub pa ste /
NK051(zhi)002:6424: gdul bya'i sems kyi rgyud grol zhing smin par byed
NK051(zhi)002:6425: pa'i thabs bye ba sa ya dpag tu med pa
NK051(zhi)002:6426: 'gyed pa'o // skad cig thams cad mngon par rtogs //
NK051(zhi)002:6428: skad cig gis ni skad cig ma bcu drug go //
NK051(zhi)002:6429: yang na skad cig dus gcig gi skad cig gcig
NK051(zhi)002:6430: gi gnas kyis chos thams cad ni mngon par rtogs
NK051(zhi)002:6431: pa'o // sems kyi skad cig don kun rig /
NK051(zhi)002:6433: sems kyi khyad par ces pa yang dag pa'i chos
NK051(zhi)002:6434: nyid byang chub kyi sems kyi skad cig ma gcig
NK051(zhi)002:6435: la / rang dad pa dang shes rab ldan pa la /
NK051(zhi)002:6436: bla ma'i gdams ngag thog ma rin po che'am bdud
NK051(zhi)002:6437: rtsi dang 'dra ba'i gdams ngag zab mo bla mas
NK051(zhi)002:6438: gnang / bdag gis rtogs pa'i chos nyid kyi don ma lus pa kun rig pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6439: theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis //
NK051(zhi)002:6441: theg pa ni sna tshogs pa sa ya 'bum sde'am brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo //
NK051(zhi)002:6442: de tsho'i nang nas 'di thabs tshul che ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6443: 'gro ba'i don la rtogs pa po //
NK051(zhi)002:6445: 'gro ba ni sems can rnams la nyon mongs pa sa ya 'bum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:6446: rtsa ba dug rnam pa lnga las gyes pa'i nyon mongs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong la /
NK051(zhi)002:6447: sems kyis chos nyid rtogs par bya ba'i phyir chos
NK051(zhi)002:6448: kyi sgo mo brgyad khri bzhi stong bka' stsal to
NK051(zhi)002:6449: // theg pa gsum gyi nges 'byung la //
NK051(zhi)002:6451: 'dis theg pa rim pa dgu'i khungs bstan te /
