NK051(zhi)002:6452: spyi sdom gsum re re la phrag gsum du phye bas dagu'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6453: gdul bya sems can gyi blo rab 'bring tha ma
NK051(zhi)002:6454: gsum re re la gsum gsum du phye bas dgu
NK051(zhi)002:6455: ste go sla bas ma smos so //
NK051(zhi)002:6456: tha ma gsum la mtshan nyid sde gsum bstan /
NK051(zhi)002:6457: 'bring po gsum la yo ga sde gsum bstan /
NK051(zhi)002:6458: rab kyi gsum la bskyed rdzogs rnam gsum bstan /
NK051(zhi)002:6459: gang zag dbang po'i khyad par la /
NK051(zhi)002:6460: rin po che snang byed las /
NK051(zhi)002:6461: sems khyad theg pa rim pa dgu //
NK051(zhi)002:6462: mi mthun lta spyod so sor bshad //
NK051(zhi)002:6464: dbang po yang rab thod rgal ba //
NK051(zhi)002:6465: theg pa gcig gis 'bras bur gnas //
NK051(zhi)002:6467: spyi ti yo ga'i theg pa bstan /
NK051(zhi)002:6468: de yang sgron ma 'bar ba'i rgyud las /
NK051(zhi)002:6469: snying po theg gcig sgron ma 'dis //
NK051(zhi)002:6470: kun btags rim dgu la bazla'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6473: khyod kyi spyi ti yo ga bya ba gang na yod /
NK051(zhi)002:6475: chos gzhan dang yang mi mthun pas min no zer nas blos btags sam rdzun yin zer na /
NK051(zhi)002:6476: de la phar bzlog ste 'di skad bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6477: nga'i chos de chos min na khyod kyi chos de ye rang min bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6479: ci'i phyir min par cis shes zer na /
NK051(zhi)002:6482: theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis //
NK051(zhi)002:6483: 'gro ba'i don la rtogs pa po //
NK051(zhi)002:6485: bcom ldan 'das kyis theg pa sna tshogs su gsungs pas /
NK051(zhi)002:6487: khyod kyi theg pa'i chos kyang min no //
NK051(zhi)002:6489: theg pa sna tshogs su gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
NK051(zhi)002:6492: khyod kyi theg pa min no zer na /
NK051(zhi)002:6494: theg pa sna tshogs su gsungs pa'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)002:6495: khyod kyi yin na nga'i yang yin /
NK051(zhi)002:6496: theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis zhes pa'i khongs su nga'i de ma shong ngam /
NK051(zhi)002:6497: chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri bzhi stong yang yod na /
NK051(zhi)002:6498: rgyu'i khar theg pa gcig po de ma shong ngam /
NK051(zhi)002:6499: 'on te spyi ti yo ga gcig pu ma shong ngam /
NK051(zhi)002:6500: brgyad khri bzhi stong yang yod na /
NK051(zhi)002:6501: theg pa gcig po de ma 'dus sam /
NK051(zhi)002:6502: yang ngam med dam zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6504: 'o na khungs drongs dang zer na /
NK051(zhi)002:6507: theg pa gsum gyis nges 'byung la //
NK051(zhi)002:6508: theg pa gcig gis 'bras bur gnas //
NK051(zhi)002:6509: zhes gsungs pas kyang khyod kyis theg pa dgu po bas kyang /
NK051(zhi)002:6510: nga'i 'di shin tu zab la ngo mtshar che ste /
NK051(zhi)002:6511: khyod kyi theg pa gsum po'am dgu'i nges pa'i gdams
NK051(zhi)002:6512: ngag yang dag pa'i dgongs pa de nga'i spyi ti
NK051(zhi)002:6513: yo ga'i theg pa na yod pa yin no //
NK051(zhi)002:6515: yin par cis shes zer na /
NK051(zhi)002:6516: yang 'di skad du rgyud 'di nyid kyis shes te /
NK051(zhi)002:6517: theg pa gsum gyis nges 'byung la //
NK051(zhi)002:6518: theg pa gcig gis 'bras bur gnas //
NK051(zhi)002:6520: theg pa gsum gyi nges 'byung gi man ngag la /
NK051(zhi)002:6521: nga'i spyi ti'i theg pa yod par rgyud 'di nyid rang gis zin cing yid ches pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6522: khyod kyis theg pa gsum la bya btsal rtsol sgrub
NK051(zhi)002:6523: byas kyang tshi chad rtogs pa'i nad las yang dag
NK051(zhi)002:6524: pa'i 'bras bu med do zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6525: de ni rang gi khyad dang /
NK051(zhi)002:6527: theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas //
NK051(zhi)002:6529: theg pa dgu rtse spyi ti yo ga 'di rtsol
NK051(zhi)002:6530: sgrub dang bya rtsol mi dgos par tshig gcig gi
NK051(zhi)002:6531: gnad shes na 'bras bu chen por gnas zhes gsungs
NK051(zhi)002:6532: so // nyon mongs khams rnams dag pa'i bdag /
NK051(zhi)002:6534: skye med ka dag byar med blo 'das gcig gi dgongs pa shes na /
NK051(zhi)002:6535: nyon mongs pa'i khams rnams thams cad dus gcig tu ma spangs par gnas su dag go //
NK051(zhi)002:6536: las kyi khams rnams zad byed pa //
NK051(zhi)002:6538: las mi dge ba'i las sdig pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:6540: lung du ma bstan pa'i las so //
NK051(zhi)002:6541: de thams cad skye med ka dag rtogs na zad par byed do //
NK051(zhi)002:6542: chu bo rgya mtsho kun las brgal //
NK051(zhi)002:6544: chu bo chen po bzhi ste /
NK051(zhi)002:6548: ma rig pa'i chu bo dang bzhi /
NK051(zhi)002:6553: 'chi ba'i chu bo dang bzhi las brgal zhing /
NK051(zhi)002:6554: nyon mongs pa dang sdug bsngal thams cad las brgal zhing thar ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6555: sbyor ba'i dgon pa las byung ba //
NK051(zhi)002:6557: sbyor ba'i zhes pa ma bu dbyer med du sbyor ba ste /
NK051(zhi)002:6558: snying po ma 'pho 'gyur med pa'i klong du /
NK051(zhi)002:6559: rig pa bu skye 'gag med par 'od gsal ngang dwangs snying po'i klong du thim par sbyor ro //
NK051(zhi)002:6560: dgon pa ni yid g.yo 'gul gyi rjes su mi 'gro bar /
NK051(zhi)002:6561: bya rtsol dang zhe 'dod las 'das shing /
NK051(zhi)002:6562: snying po 'pho 'gyur med pa'i dgon par gnas so //
NK051(zhi)002:6563: las byung ba zhes pa ni don de ltar gnas
NK051(zhi)002:6564: nas rtogs pa'i shes rab las rang byung gi ye
NK051(zhi)002:6565: shes byung ba'o // nyon mongs nye ba'i kun nyon mongs //
NK051(zhi)002:6567: nyon mongs pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa lnga /
NK051(zhi)002:6568: yang na nyon mongs pa ma rig pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:6571: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa ni /
NK051(zhi)002:6574: 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa ni 'khor ba las nyon mongs pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6575: bag chags bcas pa gtan spangs pa //
NK051(zhi)002:6577: spyi ti'i gdams ngag dngos bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:6578: chos 'di'i gzhung gi sku rjen par bstan pa yin te /
NK051(zhi)002:6579: bag chags dang nyon mongs dug lnga las sogs rnams ma spangs ka nas dag /
NK051(zhi)002:6581: sems nyid ye sangs rgyas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6582: yang na bag chags bcas zhes pa rnal 'byor pa dang bcas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6583: pa zhes pa chos nyid rtogs pa'i khyad par gyis bag chags dang bcas nas grol ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6584: gtan spangs zhes pa snying po la bag chags ka nas dag pas na gtan spangs so //
NK051(zhi)002:6585: yang na don dam pa rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa la /
NK051(zhi)002:6586: bag chags dang bcas pa rang dwangs rang sangs rang grol te /
NK051(zhi)002:6587: nyon mongs pa thams cad ma spangs la mi gnas pas na gtan spangs zhes bya ste /
NK051(zhi)002:6588: ye dag chen po 'od gsal 'khor ba dong sprugs /
NK051(zhi)002:6589: skye med snying po la bag chags ka nas dag cing /
NK051(zhi)002:6590: ched du gang skyon du bltas nas ma spangs /
NK051(zhi)002:6591: yon tan du bltas nas ma bsgrub par /
NK051(zhi)002:6592: ngang 'das dwangs sangs cir snang cir srid thams cad rang grol bar gtan spangs zhes gsungs so //
NK051(zhi)002:6593: snying rje chen po shes rab thabs //
NK051(zhi)002:6596: phyogs mtshams 'dzin pa'i snying rje dang /
NK051(zhi)002:6597: kun la khyab pa'i snying rje dang /
NK051(zhi)002:6598: cir mi 'dzin gyi snying rje dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:6599: chen po ni rdzogs pa chen po snying rje dang /
NK051(zhi)002:6600: shes rab ni skye med ka dag gi don rtogs pa /
NK051(zhi)002:6601: thabs ni 'gro ba sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6602: don yod 'gro ba'i don byed pa //
NK051(zhi)002:6604: don yod pa ni snying po'i don no //
NK051(zhi)002:6605: 'od gsal chen po 'gro ba'i don byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6606: 'du shes kun gyi don spangs shing //
NK051(zhi)002:6608: 'du shes ni sems can gyi 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /
NK051(zhi)002:6609: rnam par shes pa'i don spangs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6610: rnam shes don ni 'gag par byed //
NK051(zhi)002:6612: ka dag 'od gsal rtogs pa'i mthus /
NK051(zhi)002:6613: gzugs med pa'i khams skye mched mu bzhir skye ba'i rnam shes dang don rnams 'gag par byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6614: sems can kun yid yul dang ldan //
NK051(zhi)002:6616: sems can zhes pa ni ngan rtog dang bcas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6617: kun yid yul dang ldan ces pa nyon mongs pa'i yid dang ldan /
NK051(zhi)002:6618: yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6619: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs rig pa //
NK051(zhi)002:6621: sangs pa ni byas pa'i chos rnams sangs /
NK051(zhi)002:6622: rgyas pa ni byar med spros dang bral ba'i don rgyas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6623: thug rig pa ni yang dag pa'i thugs kyi dgongs pa skye ba med par rig pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6624: sems can kun gyi yid la gnas //
NK051(zhi)002:6626: sems can kun gyi yid la snying po skye ba med pas khyab pas na gnas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6627: de dag sems dang mthun par 'jug /
NK051(zhi)002:6629: sems can thams cad kyi sems mnyam pa nyid /
NK051(zhi)002:6630: rgyal ba dang 'gro ba kun la sems dang mthun par 'jug pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6631: sems can kun yid tshim par byed //
NK051(zhi)002:6633: sems can thams cad kyi yid skye med ka dag gi dgongs pas tshim pa'am dga' bar byas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6634: sems can kun gyi yid dga' ba //
NK051(zhi)002:6636: sems can de dag thams cad ni bla ma'i gdams
NK051(zhi)002:6637: ngag gis snying po skye med ka dag blo 'das
NK051(zhi)002:6639: dngos med rnal ma rang grol sangs rgyas /
NK051(zhi)002:6640: lus med lus te skye ba med pas da gzod
NK051(zhi)002:6641: re smon gyi sangs rgyas rang ma grub pas yid
NK051(zhi)002:6642: dga' ba'o // grub pa mthar phyin 'khrul pa med //
NK051(zhi)002:6644: 'khrul pa rtsad nas chod cing 'khrul snang log nas 'bras bu yongs su grub pa bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:6645: grub pa zhes pa theg pa rim pa dgu la
NK051(zhi)002:6646: 'bras bu grub lugs mi 'dra ba dgu thob cing
NK051(zhi)002:6647: / mthar phyin pa'i 'khrul pa med pas bstan pa la dgu ste /
NK051(zhi)002:6648: theg pa rim pa dgu la don drug gi sgo nas sgrub cing grub nas /
NK051(zhi)002:6649: 'khrul pa rtsad chod cing 'bras bu mthar phyin pa ni dgu ste /
NK051(zhi)002:6650: 'phags pa nyan thos kyis dang po 'jug pa'i sgo /
NK051(zhi)002:6655: sgrub pa'i thabs kyi sgo nas bsgrub pas /
NK051(zhi)002:6656: grub pa mthar phyin pa'i 'bras bu ni dgra bcom pa'i sangs rgyas thob pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6657: de bzhin du dang po 'jug sgo la sogs te /
NK051(zhi)002:6658: don drug grub mtha' ma grub pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6659: 'bras bu ni kun la de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6660: rang rgyal ba'i grub pa'i 'bras bu ni /
NK051(zhi)002:6661: bse ru lta ba'i nyag gcig tu gnas pa'i sangs rgyas thob /
NK051(zhi)002:6662: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi sgo nas bsgrub pas /
NK051(zhi)002:6663: grub pa'i 'bras bu bcu gcig kun tu 'od kyi sangs rgyas thob /
NK051(zhi)002:6664: kri yas dag pa gsum gyi sgo nas bsgrub pas /
NK051(zhi)002:6665: rig gsum mgon po'i 'bras bu thob /
NK051(zhi)002:6666: u pa yas khrus dang gtsang sbra'i sgo nas bsgrubs pas /
NK051(zhi)002:6667: grub pa'i 'bras bu rigs bzhi'i 'bras bu thob /
NK051(zhi)002:6668: yo gas cho 'phrul bzhi dang mngon par byang chub pa lnga'i sgo nas bsgrub pas /
NK051(zhi)002:6669: grub pa'i 'bras bu rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas grub pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6670: gsang sngags nang pa thabs kyi rgyud ma h+aa yo gas /
NK051(zhi)002:6676: sgrub pa'i thabs dang drug gi sgo nas bsgrub pas /
NK051(zhi)002:6677: ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum bsnyen sgrub bzhi'i sgo
NK051(zhi)002:6678: nas grub pa mthar phyin pa'i 'bras bu ni rdo
NK051(zhi)002:6680: a nus dbyings dang ye shes kyi sgo nas bsgrub pas /
NK051(zhi)002:6681: grub pa'i 'bras bu rdo rje 'chang chen po ste longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6682: a ti yo gas rtsol sgrub med pa'i sgo nas bsgrub pas /
NK051(zhi)002:6683: ye sangs rgyas pa'i 'bras bu thob /
NK051(zhi)002:6684: de ltar theg pa dgus grub pa mthar phyin pa'i 'bras bu thob /
NK051(zhi)002:6685: de rnams las spyi ti yo gas khyad par 'phags te /
NK051(zhi)002:6687: de ltar theg pa rim pa dgu po yis /
NK051(zhi)002:6688: zhe 'dod rtsol sgrub yid smon 'bras bu de //
NK051(zhi)002:6691: yang dag 'bras bu ma yin no //
NK051(zhi)002:6692: de la nga yi spyi ti yo ga ni //
NK051(zhi)002:6693: de rnams kun las gong brgal khyad 'phags te //
NK051(zhi)002:6694: gting mtha' yas pa'i klong dkyil nas //
NK051(zhi)002:6695: mu mtha' grol ba'i don rtogs pas //
NK051(zhi)002:6696: skye med ka dag dgongs pa /
NK051(zhi)002:6697: gdod ma ye ji bzhin pa'i snying po de kho na nyid kyi 'bras bu grub /
NK051(zhi)002:6698: ye nas rang gnas rtogs shing grub pa las /
NK051(zhi)002:6699: zhe 'dod re dogs rtsol sgrub 'bras bu ma yin no //
NK051(zhi)002:6701: spyi tis theg pa dgu'i sun bton pa /
NK051(zhi)002:6702: gong ltar theg pa rim pa dgu pos /
NK051(zhi)002:6704: thob byed kyi mkhan po gnyis /
NK051(zhi)002:6705: yul dang yul can gnyis rtsol sgrub re dogs mkhan /
NK051(zhi)002:6706: sangs rgyas sgrub 'dod 'khor ba'i gting du lhung //
NK051(zhi)002:6709: a nu man chod theg pa de //
NK051(zhi)002:6710: rdzun lung lam du zhugs pa ste //
NK051(zhi)002:6711: ngal ba don med yin par nges //
NK051(zhi)002:6714: sangs rgyas med pas sangs rgyas ming yang med //
NK051(zhi)002:6715: sgrub med rtsol sgrub snga ma de nyid do //
NK051(zhi)002:6717: nor ba thams cad rnam par spangs //
NK051(zhi)002:6719: skye med ka dag gi dgongs pa shes na /
NK051(zhi)002:6721: bya rtsol thams cad rnam par spangs so //
NK051(zhi)002:6722: don gsum the tshom med pa'i blo //
NK051(zhi)002:6724: 'jam dpal gyi dgongs pa yang dag pa'i khungs bzung ba ni gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:6725: don zab don ni rgya che ba //
NK051(zhi)002:6726: don chen mtshungs med rab zhi ba //
NK051(zhi)002:6728: bka' tshoms chen po gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:6729: 'di la the tshom dang yid gnyis ma zhugs na don yongs su grub pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6730: yang na don yongs gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)002:6733: 'bras bu blo las 'das pa'i don dang gsum las /
NK051(zhi)002:6734: the tshom med pa'i blos nges par rtogs la chongs shig pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6735: kun don yon tan gsum gyi bdag /
NK051(zhi)002:6737: de ni yon tan kun gyi mchog tu gyur cing /
NK051(zhi)002:6738: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan
NK051(zhi)002:6739: gyi bcud 'dus pa de dag skal ldan gyis rtogs
NK051(zhi)002:6740: shing 'chang ba'o // phung po lnga don dus gsum du //
NK051(zhi)002:6742: de la phung po lnga ni /
NK051(zhi)002:6747: rnam par shes pa'i phung po dang lnga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6749: 'das pa dang da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:6750: du zhes pa ni phyi chos kyi dbyings te snang
NK051(zhi)002:6751: la rang bzhin med pa me long gi bzhin lta
NK051(zhi)002:6752: bu'o // skad cig thams cad bye brag phyed //
NK051(zhi)002:6754: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gsum las da lta'i skad cig ma'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6755: thams cad bye brag ces pa /
NK051(zhi)002:6756: yid 'gyu lugs kyi bye brag phyed de /
NK051(zhi)002:6757: phyi snang ba yul gyi grol lugs dang /
NK051(zhi)002:6758: bar yid rig sems kyi grol lugs dang /
NK051(zhi)002:6759: nang kun gzhi chos nyid du grol ba dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:6761: de la rig yid sems blo ngang dwangs rang sangs su shes pa /
NK051(zhi)002:6762: snang ba rang snang rang grol du shes pa dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:6763: yang na sems sam dran rig yid kyi 'gyu ba de /
NK051(zhi)002:6766: da lta'i shes pa rkyen khar ma shor bas bye brag phyed ces bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6767: skad cig gcig gis rdzogs sangs rgyas //
NK051(zhi)002:6769: don gong ma de ltar nyams su blangs shing /
NK051(zhi)002:6770: tshig gcig gi gdams ngag cang med cir snang snang sar grol /
NK051(zhi)002:6771: de rtogs skad cig gcig gis ni //
NK051(zhi)002:6772: stong las kun 'byung stong par grol //
NK051(zhi)002:6773: skye med ka dag rdzogs sangs rgyas //
NK051(zhi)002:6775: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'chang //
NK051(zhi)002:6777: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te skye med ka dag byar med blo 'das so //
NK051(zhi)002:6778: de sus 'chang na rnal 'byor pa shes rab can gyis 'chang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6779: lus med lus te lus kyi mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:6784: da phyin lus mi len 'gro drug tu mi 'khor te lus mi len par bstan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6785: lus med ces pa skye med ka dag ste chos sku'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6786: lus te zhes pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6787: lus kyi mchog ces pa ni chos sku'i yon tan brtsis te de ni lus kyi mchog go //
NK051(zhi)002:6788: lus kyi mtha' ni rtogs pa po //
NK051(zhi)002:6790: sprul pa'i skus 'gro drug tu skye ba'i gnas med de /
NK051(zhi)002:6791: phyis skye mi srid pas lus kyi mtha' ni med pa rang yin pas /
NK051(zhi)002:6792: ma chags mi skye skye ba mi len pas mtha' med par rtogs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6793: gzugs rnams sna tshogs kun tu ston //
NK051(zhi)002:6795: 'dul ba ci dang cis 'dul ba la /
NK051(zhi)002:6796: sprul sku sh+aakya thub pa 'gro ba'i don bya bar bstan no //
NK051(zhi)002:6797: nor bu chen po rin chen tog /
NK051(zhi)002:6799: nor bu ni dgos 'dod 'byung bas na nor bu'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6800: chen po ni sems nyid kyi nor bu chen po ste /
NK051(zhi)002:6801: rtogs na dgos 'dod ma lus pa 'byung ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6802: rin chen tog ces pa rin po che'i tog rgyal
NK051(zhi)002:6803: mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te mchod pa phul
NK051(zhi)002:6804: na / ched du bsgrub mi dgos par dgos 'dod rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'byung ngo //
NK051(zhi)002:6805: dpe de bzhin du theg pa dgu'i spyi ti yo ga 'di 'chang zhing rtogs pas /
NK051(zhi)002:6806: rtsol sgrub bya mi dgos par theg phran ma lus pa shes shing rtogs par 'gyur ro //
NK051(zhi)002:6807: theg pa thams cad kyi nang nas spyi ti yo
NK051(zhi)002:6808: ga ni rin po che'i tog lta bu yin no
NK051(zhi)002:6809: // 'dod pa'i don grub ces pa nas rin chen
NK051(zhi)002:6810: tog ces pa yan chod kyis mnyam pa nyid kyi
NK051(zhi)002:6811: ye shes kyi sgo nas rin chen 'byung ldan gyi
NK051(zhi)002:6813: 'khrul pa log pa'i 'bras bu rang la ye nas lhun gyis grub par bstan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6814: 'bras bu mi 'gyur ba'i gding gis zin lugs dang /
NK051(zhi)002:6815: rtogs pa'i khyad par bstan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6816: sangs rgyas kun gyis rtogs bya ba //
NK051(zhi)002:6819: theg pa dgu'i rtogs par bya ba'i lta ba bstan pa ni /
NK051(zhi)002:6820: nyan thos kyis yul sems gnyis med du rtogs /
NK051(zhi)002:6821: rang rgyal gyis rnam par rig byed dang rig byed ma yin par rtogs /
NK051(zhi)002:6822: sems tsam gyis gzung 'dzin gnyis med du rtogs //
NK051(zhi)002:6823: dbu ma pas bden pa dbyer med du rtogs /
NK051(zhi)002:6824: byang chub sems dpas stong pa bco brgyad rtogs te spros pa'i mtha' brgyad dang bral bar rtogs /
NK051(zhi)002:6825: kri yas rigs gsum lhar rtogs /
NK051(zhi)002:6826: u pa yas dag pa chos nyid du rtogs /
NK051(zhi)002:6827: yo gas skye 'gag med par rtogs /
NK051(zhi)002:6828: gsang sngags ma h+aas snang stong dbyer med du rtogs /
NK051(zhi)002:6829: rdzogs pa a nus dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med par rtogs /
NK051(zhi)002:6830: rdzogs pa chen pos snang stong chos kyi skur rtogs /
NK051(zhi)002:6831: de las spyi ti khyad par 'phags te /
NK051(zhi)002:6832: snang ba rang grol ka dag chen por rtogs /
NK051(zhi)002:6833: cir snang cir srid rang sar sangs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6834: sangs rgyas zhes pas nyan thos kyi theg pa bstan /
NK051(zhi)002:6835: kun gyis rtogs bya ba zhes pas rang rgyal ba'i theg pa bstan no //
NK051(zhi)002:6836: sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med //
NK051(zhi)002:6838: sangs rgyas byang chub ces pas byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa bstan /
NK051(zhi)002:6839: bla na med ces pas kri yog sde gsum gyi theg pa bstan no //
NK051(zhi)002:6840: gsang sngags las byung yi ge med //
NK051(zhi)002:6842: gsang sngags zhes pas bskyed rdzogs gnyis kyi theg pa bstan /
NK051(zhi)002:6843: las byung zhes pas a ti yo ga'i theg pa bstan no //
NK051(zhi)002:6844: de ltar rtogs byed theg pa'i rnam grangs bstan nas /
NK051(zhi)002:6845: rtogs bya don gyi ngo bo bstan pa la /
NK051(zhi)002:6846: sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med //
NK051(zhi)002:6848: bya rtsol sangs la byar med blo 'das rgyas /
NK051(zhi)002:6849: de phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6850: byang chub ces pa ni byang skye ba med pa ste chos sku'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6851: chub 'od gsal chen po ste longs sku'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6852: bla na med pa ni dngos med zang ka ma'i
NK051(zhi)002:6853: gdams ngag de gang gi yang bla na med pa'o
NK051(zhi)002:6854: // gsang sngags las byung yi ge med //
NK051(zhi)002:6856: gsang ba ni blo'i spyod yul du ma gyur pa ste shes brjod las 'das pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6857: sngags ni yon tan gyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6858: las byung ni zab mo'i gdams ngag tu byung ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6859: yi ge med ni snying po skye ba med pa
NK051(zhi)002:6860: la yi ges mtshon cing tshig gis brjod du med
NK051(zhi)002:6861: pa'o // gsang sngags chen po rigs gsum pa //
NK051(zhi)002:6864: sngags ni man+t+ra zhes pa shes skyob gnyis dang ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6868: thugs kyi rigs dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:6869: gsang sngags don kun skyed pa po //
NK051(zhi)002:6871: gsang sngags ni yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa la bya /
NK051(zhi)002:6872: don kun ni +aahmh'u gsum gyis gsang sngags spyod pa'i
NK051(zhi)002:6873: rnal 'byor pa kun gyi lus ngag yid gsum sku
NK051(zhi)002:6876: gsang sngags don kun skyed pa po ni /
NK051(zhi)002:6877: kun gzhi'i snying po chos nyid mkha' dbyings ma'i klong nas /
NK051(zhi)002:6878: rol pa rtsal dang yan lag las zab mo'i gdams ngag kun skyed cing 'byung ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6879: thig le chen po yi ge med //
NK051(zhi)002:6883: chen po ni snying po yi ge med pa ni blo las 'das pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6884: stong pa chen po yi ge lnga //
NK051(zhi)002:6886: chos stong pa nyid kyi klong na rang gsal du yi ge lnga yod de /
NK051(zhi)002:6888: de'i phyir yi ge lnga zhes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6889: yang na spyi ti yo ga'i gzhung gis /
NK051(zhi)002:6890: phyi'i spros pa gcod pa sde lnga /
NK051(zhi)002:6891: nang gi spros pa gcod pa sde lnga /
NK051(zhi)002:6892: gsang ba'i spros pa gcod pa sde lnga /
NK051(zhi)002:6893: de kho na nyid kyi spros pa gcod pa sde lnga /
NK051(zhi)002:6894: stong pa'i klong nas rig pa'i snang tshul lngar shar yang /
NK051(zhi)002:6895: de'i spros pa gcod pa sde lnga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6896: thig le stong pa yi ge brgya //
NK051(zhi)002:6898: thig le chen po ni rtog pa'i klong nas yi ge brgya lta bur yang snang ngo //
NK051(zhi)002:6899: rnam pa kun ldan rnam pa med //
NK051(zhi)002:6901: snying po ni gnas lugs de la rtsal dang rol pa'i sgo nas rnam pa kun dang ldan la /
NK051(zhi)002:6902: chos nyid kyi gzhi la dngos po'am rnam pa med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6903: bcu drug phyed phyed thig le can //
NK051(zhi)002:6905: bcu drug ni mgrin pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo na rtsa bcu drug go //
NK051(zhi)002:6906: phyed phyed ni pad+ma dang rdo rje bsrubs phyed phyed gcig shor gnyis mnyam ste /
NK051(zhi)002:6907: rdo rje'i rtse na bde ba gnas pa byang chub sems kyi thig le can ces gsungs so //
NK051(zhi)002:6908: de rnams sngags ma rgyud ltar bshad pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6909: spyi ti'i 'grel pa ltar du bshad na /
NK051(zhi)002:6910: bka' tshoms chen po bzhir bshad de /
NK051(zhi)002:6911: gnas pa gzhi'i bka' tshoms bzhi /
NK051(zhi)002:6913: bye brag shan gyi bka' tshoms la gsum ste bcu tham pa /
NK051(zhi)002:6914: dbyer med kyi bka' tshoms la bzhi ste bcu bzhi /
NK051(zhi)002:6915: ye shes kyi 'char sgo dang ma rig pa'i 'khrul sgo gnyis te bcu drug go //
NK051(zhi)002:6917: thog ma bzhi ma'i gnad de yar phyed /
NK051(zhi)002:6918: tha ma rtsal zer yan lag bu'i gnad de mar phyed /
NK051(zhi)002:6919: thig le snying po gsang ba'i yang snying ngo //
NK051(zhi)002:6920: can zhes pa ka dag chen po'i thig le'i rang bzhin /
NK051(zhi)002:6921: byar med dngos med blo 'das de nyid do zhes gsungs so //
NK051(zhi)002:6922: yan lag med pa'i rtsis las 'das //
NK051(zhi)002:6924: snying po skye ba med cing ka nas dag pa de la /
NK051(zhi)002:6925: yan lag gi rnam pa'am rnam par rtog pa'i rtsis las 'das so //
NK051(zhi)002:6926: spyi ti'i gzhung gis snying po'am thig le'i rang bzhin la /
NK051(zhi)002:6927: yan lag gi shes pa rnam par rtog pa'i rtsis las 'das pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6928: bsam gtan bzhi pa'i rtse mo can //
NK051(zhi)002:6933: dga' bral gyi shes pa dang bzhi'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6934: de tsho ni bsam gtan bzhi'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6935: rtse mo ni dus kyi sna rtse dang /
NK051(zhi)002:6938: can zhes pa ni phyag rgya bzhi'i dgongs pa can no //
NK051(zhi)002:6939: yang na bsam gtan bzhi ni bar ma do bzhi'i bsam gtan no //
NK051(zhi)002:6940: de bzhi'i rtse mo ni spyi ti ste gza' gtad dang bral ba'i lta ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6941: bsam gtan yan lag kun shes shing //
NK051(zhi)002:6944: bsam du med pa'i bsam gtan goms shing rtogs na /
NK051(zhi)002:6945: dmigs pa'i bsam gtan gyi yan lag kun shes par 'gyur ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6946: ting 'dzin rigs dang rgyud rig pa //
NK051(zhi)002:6948: ting 'dzin ni mi dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin mi g.yo ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6949: rigs pa ni sems kyi dmigs pa can no //
NK051(zhi)002:6950: rgyud rig pa ni rang gi rgyud rig cing grol ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6951: ting 'dzin lus can lus kyi mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:6954: 'di ni ting nge 'dzin gyi lus so //
NK051(zhi)002:6955: sha khrag gi lus las 'das pas na lus kyi mchog ces pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6956: longs spyod rdzogs sku kun gyi rgyal //
NK051(zhi)002:6958: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dpal rnam par snang mdzad la /
NK051(zhi)002:6959: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu /
NK051(zhi)002:6960: mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pas na kun gyi rgyal zhes pa ste /
NK051(zhi)002:6962: sprul pa'i sku ste sku yi mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:6964: sprul pa'i sku ni sh+aakya thub pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6965: sku yi mchog ni 'jig rten las khyad par du 'phags pas na sku yi mchog ces pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6966: sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyud 'chang ba //
NK051(zhi)002:6968: sangs rgyas sprul pa sna tshogs pa'i rgyud dang thabs 'chang ba ni sh+aakya thub pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6969: phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed //
NK051(zhi)002:6971: bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i 'dzam bu gling bye ba phrag brgyar /
NK051(zhi)002:6972: sems can 'dul ba'i sprul pa sna tshogs pa 'gyed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6973: ji bzhin 'gro ba'i don byed pa //
NK051(zhi)002:6975: rtogs pa'i khyad par gyis bsam pa ji bzhin du 'gro ba sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6976: lha yi dbang po lha yi lha //
NK051(zhi)002:6978: lha yi dbang po zhes pa /
NK051(zhi)002:6979: sum cu rtsa gsum dga' ldan lha yi pho brang du /
NK051(zhi)002:6980: lha yi dbang po brgya byin du sprul nas lha rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro //
NK051(zhi)002:6983: lha yi dbang po tshangs pa lta bur yang snang ngo //
NK051(zhi)002:6984: lha yi dbang po lha min bdag /
NK051(zhi)002:6986: lha ma yin gyi yul du /
NK051(zhi)002:6987: lha ma yin gyi bdag po thag bzang ris lta
NK051(zhi)002:6988: bur sprul nas chos 'chad cing 'thab rtsod kyi sdug
NK051(zhi)002:6990: lha min pa bdag ni r+aa hu lar yang snang ngo //
NK051(zhi)002:6991: 'chi med dbang po lha yi bla //
NK051(zhi)002:6993: lho 'dzam bu gling du mi rnams la /
NK051(zhi)002:6994: bcom ldan 'das sh+aakya thub pa lta bur sprul nas chos bshad de mi rnams nyon mongs pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:6995: sdug bsngal sa ma ya 'bum sde las thar bar mdzad pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:6996: yang na skye 'chi med pa skye med ka dag gi lhar yang snang ngo //
NK051(zhi)002:6999: 'joms byed ces pa gcan gzan gyi rgyal po seng ge lta bur sprul nas /
NK051(zhi)002:7000: byol song rnams la chos bshad cing glen lkugs kyi sdug bsngal las thar bar mdzad do //
NK051(zhi)002:7001: 'joms byed 'og mas ni yi dwags kyi rgyal po kha 'bar ma lta bur sprul nas /
NK051(zhi)002:7002: yi dwags rnams la chos bshad cing bkres skom gyi sdug bsngal las thar bar mdzad do //
NK051(zhi)002:7003: dbang phyug po zhes pa dmyal ba'i gnas su gshin
NK051(zhi)002:7004: rje a ba glang mgo can du sprul nas chos
NK051(zhi)002:7005: drag po'i sgo nas bshad cing tsha grang btso bsreg
NK051(zhi)002:7006: gi sdug bsngal las thar bar mdzad do //
NK051(zhi)002:7007: yang na spyi ti ltar bshad na /
NK051(zhi)002:7008: 'joms byed ces pa skye med ka dag gi dgongs
NK051(zhi)002:7009: pa nyon mongs pa dang blos btags bya rtsol gyi
NK051(zhi)002:7011: 'joms byed 'og ma ni theg pa 'og ma'i lta sgom thams cad 'joms par byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7012: dbang zhes pa rang dbang rang gis thob pas dbang gi rgyal po yin /
NK051(zhi)002:7013: phyug pa ni rtogs pa'i longs spyod phyug pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7014: srid pa'i dgon pa las brgal ba //
NK051(zhi)002:7018: drod gsher las srid pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:7019: bardzusa skyes su srid pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:7020: sgong las srid pa dang bzhi'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7021: de bzhi 'khor ba'i dgon pa bzhi yin te /
NK051(zhi)002:7022: de bzhi las brgal bas na nyon mongs pa thams cad las thar pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7023: ston pa gcig pu 'gro ba'i bla //
NK051(zhi)002:7025: ston pa ni skye med ka dag gi ston pa /
NK051(zhi)002:7026: gcig pu snying po skye ba med pa'i dgongs pa /
NK051(zhi)002:7027: rdzogs chen spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni 'gro ba'i bla ma yin no //
NK051(zhi)002:7028: 'jig rten phyogs bcur rab grags pa //
NK051(zhi)002:7030: 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcur grags pa ni bcom ldan 'das sh+aakya thub pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7031: chos kyi sbyin bdag che ba po //
NK051(zhi)002:7033: khams gsum 'gro drug gi sems can thams cad la
NK051(zhi)002:7034: chos kyi sbyin pa'i bdag po ni bcom ldan 'das
NK051(zhi)002:7035: sh+aakya thub pa'o // byams pa'i go cha chas pa ste //
NK051(zhi)002:7037: ston pa bcom ldan 'das sh+aakya thub pa de /
NK051(zhi)002:7038: byams pa dang snying rje chen po'i go cha gyon nas /
NK051(zhi)002:7039: 'gro ba'i sems can gyi don ma lus pa byed par ches pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7040: snying rje yi ni ya lad bgos //
NK051(zhi)002:7042: snying rje ni sems can thams cad sdug bsngal dang
NK051(zhi)002:7043: bral bar 'dod pa'i gos gyon nas sems can gyi
NK051(zhi)002:7045: shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs //
NK051(zhi)002:7047: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi phyag mtshan bstan no //
NK051(zhi)002:7048: zhal gcig phyag bzhi sku mdog dmar ser te /
NK051(zhi)002:7049: phyag g.yas gnyis na ral gri dang mda' bsnams pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7050: g.yon gnyis na gzhu dang ut+pa la'i me tog bsnams pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7051: nyon mongs mi shes g.yul ngo sel //
NK051(zhi)002:7053: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi phyag mtshan bzhis nyon mongs
NK051(zhi)002:7054: pa thams cad rtsad nas gcod cing bdud bzhi 'dul
NK051(zhi)002:7055: ba ste / ma shes shing ma rig pa /
NK051(zhi)002:7056: rmongs pa'i dgra'i g.yul ngo 'jam dpal gyis zlog cing sel ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7057: dpa' bo bdud dgra bdud 'dul ba //
NK051(zhi)002:7059: dpa' bo ni skye med ka dag gi dpa' bo /
NK051(zhi)002:7060: bdud ni sul mang blo'i chos /
NK051(zhi)002:7061: dgra ni theg pa'i grub mtha' log pa rnams /
NK051(zhi)002:7062: bdud ni blos btags kyi lta ba /
NK051(zhi)002:7066: de bdud yin pas gdul dka' ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7067: bdud 'dul bar byed pa ni spyi ti yo ga ste /
NK051(zhi)002:7071: rang gnas re med kyi 'bras bu /
NK051(zhi)002:7072: bdud gdul dka' ba'i lta sgom gyi bdud zhen 'dzin dang bcas pa de /
NK051(zhi)002:7073: dpa' bo chen po bzhi yis 'dul te lta sgom spyod 'bras bzhis /
NK051(zhi)002:7074: bdud chos nyid du bcom pas /
NK051(zhi)002:7075: skye med ka dag gi dgongs pa rang la ye gnas su grub pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7076: bdud bzhi'i 'jigs pa sel bar byed //
NK051(zhi)002:7078: gong gi bdud bzhi po de gdul dka' zhing 'jigs kyang /
NK051(zhi)002:7079: skye med rtogs pas bdud bzhi 'joms shing sel bar byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7080: bdud kyi dpung rnams pham byed pa //
NK051(zhi)002:7082: bdud bzhi ni nyon mongs pa'i bdud dang /
NK051(zhi)002:7086: bdud lha byin la sogs pa'i dpung rnams ni /
NK051(zhi)002:7087: skye med ka dag gi dgongs pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:7088: rje btsun 'jam dpal gyis 'joms shing bdud rnams pham par byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7091: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh+aakya thub pas
NK051(zhi)002:7092: 'jig rten gyi sems can sdug bsngal ba thams cad
NK051(zhi)002:7096: mchod pa dang bstod pa'i gnas su 'os pa ste /
NK051(zhi)002:7097: dkon mchog gsum dang bla ma rnams yin no //
NK051(zhi)002:7098: rtag tu rim gro bya ba'i 'os //
NK051(zhi)002:7100: rim gro dang mchod pa bkur sti bya ba'i 'os ni /
NK051(zhi)002:7101: skye med ka dag rtogs pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:7102: spyi ti yo ga ston pa'i bla ma dam pa rnams yin no //
NK051(zhi)002:7103: bkur 'os mchod par bya ba'i mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:7105: dkon mchog dang bla ma dam pa rnams la /
NK051(zhi)002:7106: dang po lus kyi sgo nas gus pa'i phyal 'tshal /
NK051(zhi)002:7107: ngag gi sgo nas snyan pa'i dbyangs kyis bstod /
NK051(zhi)002:7108: yid kyi sgo nas dam pa'i sku la 'dud /
NK051(zhi)002:7109: rin po che sna bdun gyis thugs mnyes par bya ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:7110: bla ma dam pa rnams la stan 'ding ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:7111: zhabs tog dang bkur sti bya ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:7112: mchod ba stod dang spyod lam gang gi sgo nas bla ma mchod cing mnyes par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7113: phyag byar 'os pa bla ma'i rab //
NK051(zhi)002:7115: 'jig rten dang 'dzam bu'i gling tsam na yang phyag dang mchod pa zhabs tog bya ba'i gnas //
NK051(zhi)002:7116: sngon byung du kun tu bzang po'am gsang ba'i bdag po la /
NK051(zhi)002:7117: rdo rje sems dpas phyag byas mchod pa phul /
NK051(zhi)002:7118: de'i rjes 'jug dga' rab rdo rje la /
NK051(zhi)002:7119: 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis ni phyag btsal mchod bstod phul /
NK051(zhi)002:7121: phyag 'tshal mchod bstod zhabs tog bkur sti bgyis /
NK051(zhi)002:7122: phyis 'byung skal ldan rnams kyis bla ma rnams la mchod par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7123: rang nas blo gzhan yang phyag 'tshal bkur ba'i gnas de ci'i phyir zhe na /
NK051(zhi)002:7124: bskal pa 'bum gyi sangs rgyas kyang //
NK051(zhi)002:7125: bla ma dag la bsten te byung //
NK051(zhi)002:7126: de phyir bla ma mchod par bya //
NK051(zhi)002:7128: sangs rgyas stong la mchod pa bas //
NK051(zhi)002:7129: rdo rje slob dpon gcig mchod 'phags //
NK051(zhi)002:7130: yon tan gsum ldan slob dpon de //
NK051(zhi)002:7131: srog la bab kyang bkur bar bya //
NK051(zhi)002:7133: de phyir lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgo nas gus
NK051(zhi)002:7134: pa dang mos pa dang zhabs tog dang bkur sti
NK051(zhi)002:7135: / phyag dang gdan gding ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:7136: spyod lam thams cad kyi sgo nas bla ma dam
NK051(zhi)002:7137: pa la mchod cing mnyes par byas pas dngos grub
NK051(zhi)002:7139: 'jig rten gsum po gom gcig bgrod //
NK051(zhi)002:7141: bla ma dam pa la gong ltar mchod cing snying
NK051(zhi)002:7142: po skye med nyams su blangs ba'i gnad kyis rdzu
NK051(zhi)002:7143: 'phrul dang mngon shes sprul pa 'gyed nus te /
NK051(zhi)002:7149: 'jig rten gsum ka gom pa'i stabs gcig gis phyin par byed do //
NK051(zhi)002:7150: mkha' ltar mtha' med rnam par gnon //
NK051(zhi)002:7152: chos nyid dang sems kyi dpe bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:7153: nam mkha' la mtha' dang dbus dang phyogs dang ris
NK051(zhi)002:7154: med par 'byung ba rnams pa bzhi zil gyis gnon
NK051(zhi)002:7155: pa ltar / dpe de bzhin du chos nyid kyi
NK051(zhi)002:7156: nam mkha' mtha' dang dbus med phyogs dang ris med
NK051(zhi)002:7157: pa'i nam mkha' de rtogs pas bya btsal rtsol sgrub
NK051(zhi)002:7158: kyi chos thams cad zil gyis gnon par bstan no
NK051(zhi)002:7159: pa ltar / // gsum rig gtsang ma dag pa ste //
NK051(zhi)002:7161: gsum rig ces pa don gsum rig pa la bya ste /
NK051(zhi)002:7164: don mtshungs pa med pa dang gsum rig pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7165: gtsang ma ni don gsum la dri mas ma gos pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7166: dag pa ste nyon mongs pa rnam par dag pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7167: yang na gsum ni dug rnam pa gsum /
NK051(zhi)002:7168: rig pa ni sku rnam pa gsum du rig /
NK051(zhi)002:7169: gtsang ma ni dri ma dang sgrib pas ma gos pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7170: mngon shes drug ldan rjes dran drug /
NK051(zhi)002:7173: sngon du bla ma dam pa la mchod bstod gyis mnyes par byas nas /
NK051(zhi)002:7174: bdag gis rtogs shing goms pa mngon du gyur na /
NK051(zhi)002:7175: bka' tshoms chen po bzhi rtogs shing gding dang ldan /
NK051(zhi)002:7179: sems kyi dri ma dug lnga dug gsum dang nyon
NK051(zhi)002:7180: mongs pa thams cad kyi dri ma yongs su dag
NK051(zhi)002:7181: pas / mngon par shes pa rnams ched du mi 'dod kyang /
NK051(zhi)002:7182: me long la dri ma dang g.ya' med na gzugs brnyan rang bzhin gyis gsal ba ltar /
NK051(zhi)002:7183: sems kyi sgrib pa dang dri ma nyon mongs dag na mngon shes shugs las 'byung ste /
NK051(zhi)002:7185: mngon par shes pa'i mngon shes dang /
NK051(zhi)002:7186: mi mngon pa shes pa'i mngon shes dang /
NK051(zhi)002:7187: kun rdzob shes pa'i mngon shes dang /
NK051(zhi)002:7188: don dam yang dag shes pa'i mngon shes dang bzhi'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7189: mi mngon pa shes pa'i mngon shes la drug ste /
NK051(zhi)002:7190: lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:7191: lha'i rna ba'i mngon par shes pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:7192: pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:7193: sngon gyi gnas shes pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:7195: zag pa zad par shes pa dang drug go //
NK051(zhi)002:7196: mngon par shes pa'i mngon shes ni /
NK051(zhi)002:7197: phung po lnga 'du byas su shes pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:7198: yul lnga 'khrul snang du shes pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:7199: sems yid 'khrul rgyur shes pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:7200: rlung dang 'gyu ba 'khrul rkyen du shes pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:7201: dran rtog 'khrul par shes pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:7202: gzugs lnga 'khrul pa'i 'bras bur shes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7203: kun rdzob shes pa'i mngon par shes pa ni /
NK051(zhi)002:7206: sdug bsngal dang bcas pa rnams shes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7207: don dam yang dag shes pa'i mngon shes ni /
NK051(zhi)002:7208: snying po ka nas dag cing blo ngo nyid las 'das par shes pa ste /
NK051(zhi)002:7209: de ni mngon shes kyi mchog yin ces gsungs so //
NK051(zhi)002:7211: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:7212: chos rjes su dran pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:7213: dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:7214: snying rje rjes su dran pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:7215: rigs rjes su dran pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:7216: khro ba rjes su dran pa dang drug go //
NK051(zhi)002:7218: bla ma rjes su dran pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:7219: gdams ngag rjes su dran pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:7220: dam tshig rjes su dran pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:7221: snying po chos nyid rjes su dran pa dang //
NK051(zhi)002:7222: skye med ka dag rjes su dran pa dang //
NK051(zhi)002:7223: dngos med blo 'das rjes su dran pa dang drug go //
NK051(zhi)002:7224: de ni khyad par gyi mngon shes dang rjes su dran pa ste /
NK051(zhi)002:7225: theg pa gzhan las khyad par du 'phags so //
NK051(zhi)002:7226: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
NK051(zhi)002:7228: gong ltar rtogs shing nyams su blangs nas mngon par
NK051(zhi)002:7229: shes pa dang ldan pa ni byang chub sems dpa'
NK051(zhi)002:7230: sems dpa' chen po yin no //
NK051(zhi)002:7231: byang ni ka dag chen por byang /
NK051(zhi)002:7237: gnyis su med par dpa' ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7238: che ba ni spyi ti yo ga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7241: rdzu 'phrul chen po ni snying po skye med ka dag rtogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul lo //
NK051(zhi)002:7242: chen po ni byar med blo 'das so //
NK051(zhi)002:7243: de rtogs pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7244: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mtha' //
NK051(zhi)002:7246: pha rol phyin pa ni gong du rgyas par bshad zin te /
NK051(zhi)002:7248: shes pa thams cad kyi rab ni snying po skye ba med par shes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7249: rab ni rtogs pa mngon du gyur pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7250: pha rol ni theg pa brgyad kyi pha rol te /
NK051(zhi)002:7251: phyin pa ni rdzogs pa chen po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7252: mtha' ni spros pa thams cad dang bral ba ste /
NK051(zhi)002:7253: spyi ti yo ga'i theg pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7254: yang na mtha' ni shes brjod las 'das pas mtshon du mi btub pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7255: shes rab kyis ni de nyid thob //
NK051(zhi)002:7257: shes rab ni chos thams cad yongs su shes pa'i shes rab bo //
NK051(zhi)002:7258: de nyid thob ces pa yang dag pa'i don snying po chos kyi sku thob pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7259: bdag rig gzhan rig thams cad pa //
NK051(zhi)002:7261: gong ma ltar snying pos kun la khyab cing /
NK051(zhi)002:7262: skye med ka dag gi don rtogs na bdag kyang rig /
NK051(zhi)002:7263: gzhan gyi sems nyid kyang rig /
NK051(zhi)002:7264: thams cad ma lus par rig pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7265: kun la phan pa'i gang zag mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:7267: de ltar rig cing skye ba med pa'i don rtogs shing gzhan rnams la yang ston par byed na /
NK051(zhi)002:7268: 'gro ba kun la phan pa'i gang zag gi mchog yin no //
NK051(zhi)002:7269: de ni sprul pa'i sku ste 'gro ba rnams kyi
NK051(zhi)002:7270: mir mthong yang thugs sangs rgyas dang khyad med par
NK051(zhi)002:7271: bzhugs so // dper bya kun las 'das pa ste //
NK051(zhi)002:7273: snying po skye med gdod ma nas rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag cing dngos med blo 'das te /
NK051(zhi)002:7274: de la mtshon tu med pas dper bya ba kun las 'das so //
NK051(zhi)002:7275: shes dang shes bya'i bdag po mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:7277: shes par bya'i yul shes par byed pa'i skal ldan
NK051(zhi)002:7278: mchog gi skye med ka dag gi dgongs pa mthar
NK051(zhi)002:7279: phyin pa'o // gtso bo chos kyi sbyin bdag ste //
NK051(zhi)002:7281: gtso bo ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ste gsang ba'i bdag po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7282: skye med gsang sngags kyi chos kyi sbyin pa gtong ba ni gu ru dga' rab rdo rje'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7283: phyag rgya bzhi po'i don ston pa //
NK051(zhi)002:7285: sku phyag rgya chen po dang /
NK051(zhi)002:7287: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
NK051(zhi)002:7288: las kyi phyag rgya dang bzhi'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7289: de'i don ston pa ni ma h+aa gu ru dam pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7290: 'gro ba'i bsnyen bkur gnas kyi mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:7292: 'gro ba ni 'gro ba sems can rnams kyi nang
NK051(zhi)002:7293: nas chos la mos shing skal ba dang ldan pa
NK051(zhi)002:7294: des bsnyen bkur bya ba'i gnas mchog ni dkon mchog
NK051(zhi)002:7295: gsum dang bla ma dam pa rnams yin no //
NK051(zhi)002:7296: nges 'byung gsum po bgrod rnams kyi //
NK051(zhi)002:7298: nges par 'byung ba'i gdams ngag gsum ni /
NK051(zhi)002:7299: bka' tshoms chen po gsum mam /
NK051(zhi)002:7300: yang na don zab pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:7302: mtshungs pa med pa dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)002:7303: de gsum ni 'gro ba rnams bgrod par byed pa'i
NK051(zhi)002:7304: lam ma nor ba yang dag nges pa'i lam mo
NK051(zhi)002:7305: // don gyi dam pa rnam dag dpal //
NK051(zhi)002:7307: don gyi dam pa ni skye ba med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7308: rnam dag ni dbang po lnga rnam pa dag pas ka dag go //
NK051(zhi)002:7309: dpal nii byar med blo 'das chen po rtogs pa'i dpal lo //
NK051(zhi)002:7310: 'jig rten gsum na skal bzang che //
NK051(zhi)002:7312: 'jig rten gsum na skal ba bzang zhing las 'phro dang skal bar ldan pa ni /
NK051(zhi)002:7313: theg pa dgu'i yang rtse spyi ti yo ga 'di
NK051(zhi)002:7314: rtogs shing rgyud la 'chang ba de skal ba bzang
NK051(zhi)002:7315: la che ba'o // dpal ldan 'byor pa kun byed pa //
NK051(zhi)002:7317: dpal ni zab mo'i gdams ngag rtogs pa'i dpal /
NK051(zhi)002:7318: de'i thugs rjes gzhan la khyab pas 'gro ba gzhan gyi dpal /
NK051(zhi)002:7319: 'byor pa ni rtogs pa'i don 'byor pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7320: kun byed pa ni chos zab mos 'gro ba sems can kun gyi don byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7321: 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog /
NK051(zhi)002:7323: de ni 'di ltar 'jam dpal gyi gdams ngag dgu ste /
NK051(zhi)002:7326: de nyid ye dag gi 'jam dpal /
NK051(zhi)002:7327: gzhi mi 'gyur ba dbyings kyi 'jam dpal /
NK051(zhi)002:7329: gzhi rtsal dbyer med kyi 'jam dpal /
NK051(zhi)002:7332: rang dwangs ka dag chen po'i 'jam dpal dang dagu'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7333: 'jam dpal ni lus ngag yid gsum 'jam la /
NK051(zhi)002:7334: dpal ni rtogs pa bdag dang thugs rje gzhan gyi dpal lo //
NK051(zhi)002:7335: ldan pa ni snying po'i don dang ldan /
NK051(zhi)002:7336: mchog ni 'khrul pa log 'bras bu thob /
NK051(zhi)002:7338: 'bras bu mi 'gyur ba'i gding gis zin /
NK051(zhi)002:7339: bka' tshoms chen po bzhi'i don rtogs pa'i gding dang
NK051(zhi)002:7340: ldan pa'i skal ldan de ni rnal 'byor pa rnams
NK051(zhi)002:7341: kyi nang nas kyang mchog yin no //
NK051(zhi)002:7342: sangs rgyas kun gyi zhes pa nas /
NK051(zhi)002:7343: dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog yan chod kyis /
NK051(zhi)002:7344: gong ltar 'bras bu thob nas mi 'gyur gding gis zin lugs bstan pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:7345: bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyi sgo nas
NK051(zhi)002:7346: don yod grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po la bstod
NK051(zhi)002:7348: ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud //
NK051(zhi)002:7349: ces pa yan chod kyis bka' tshoms chen po bzhi'i gdams ngag mdor bsdus te bstan pa dang //
NK051(zhi)002:7350: dkyil 'khor chen po bdun la spyir dril te bstod pa bstan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7351: mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud //
NK051(zhi)002:7352: yang dag mthar gyur khyod la 'dud //
NK051(zhi)002:7355: thams cad thams cad khyod la 'dud //
NK051(zhi)002:7356: ces tshig rkang lngas gnas pa gzhi'i bka' tshoms la dril te man ngag tu bstod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7357: stong nyid las byung khyod la 'dud //
NK051(zhi)002:7358: sangs rgyas 'byung ba khyod la bdud //
NK051(zhi)002:7359: sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la 'dud //
NK051(zhi)002:7360: sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la 'dud //
NK051(zhi)002:7362: ces tshig rkang lngas 'khrul pa 'phrang gi bka' tshoms la man ngag tu bsdus te bstod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7364: nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud //
NK051(zhi)002:7365: ye shes las byung khyod la 'dud //
NK051(zhi)002:7367: ces bya ba tshig rkang bzhis 'khrul pa 'phrang gi bka' tshoms bstan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7368: sangs rgyas byang chub khyod la 'dud //
NK051(zhi)002:7369: sangs rgyas gsung nyid khyod la 'dud //
NK051(zhi)002:7371: sags rgyas dgyes pa khyod la 'dud //
NK051(zhi)002:7372: ces tshig rkang bzhis bye brag shan gyi bka' tshoms bstan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7373: ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud //
NK051(zhi)002:7374: ces pa tshig rkang gcig gis dbyer med pa'i bka' tshoms man ngag tu bsdus te bstod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7375: de ni bka' tshoms chen po bzhi la 'dud nyi shus man ngag tu bsdus te bstod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7376: 'dud nyi shus ye shes lnga yi sgo nas dkyil
NK051(zhi)002:7377: 'khor bdun la bye brag tu bstod pa'i skabs kyi
NK051(zhi)002:7380: 'bru rnam pa lnga'am bcur bshad de /
NK051(zhi)002:7381: mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud //
NK051(zhi)002:7383: theg pa dgu dang sbyar te bshad na /
NK051(zhi)002:7384: sbyin zhes pas mtshan nyid sde gsum bstan /
NK051(zhi)002:7385: mchog ces pas kri yog sde gsum bstan /
NK051(zhi)002:7386: rdo rje zhes pas bskyed rdzogs gsum gyi theg pa bstan /
NK051(zhi)002:7387: mchog khyod ces pas spyi ti yo ga'i theg pa bstan no //
NK051(zhi)002:7389: mchog ni snying po'i don skye ba med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7390: sbyin ni skal ldan la chos kyi sbyin pa gtong ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7391: rdo rje ni gsang sngags kyi theg pa don zab mo dbyer med 'pho 'gyur med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7392: mchog ni theg pa dgu'i mchog spyi ti yo ga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7395: yang dag mthar gyur khyod la 'dud //
NK051(zhi)002:7397: yang dag ni mi bslu ste the tshom med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7398: mthar gyur ni chos kyi phugs su gyur pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7401: stong nyid las byung khyod la 'dud //
NK051(zhi)002:7403: stong nyid ni snying po'i don /
NK051(zhi)002:7404: las byung ni rtsal dang yan lag /
NK051(zhi)002:7406: 'dud ni yan lag rtsal zer snying po ma'i klong du dbyer med par 'dud do //
NK051(zhi)002:7407: sangs rgyas byang chub khyod la 'dud //
NK051(zhi)002:7410: ye shes lnga ru rgyas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7413: gnyis su dbyer med pas 'dud do //
NK051(zhi)002:7414: tshig de gsum gyis mtshan nyid sde gsum byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la 'dud do //
NK051(zhi)002:7415: sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la 'dud //
NK051(zhi)002:7418: rgyas ni byar med spros bral rgyas /
NK051(zhi)002:7419: chags pa ni bde ba chen po /
NK051(zhi)002:7424: zhe 'dod sangs la zhen med rgyas /
NK051(zhi)002:7425: 'dod pa ni bde ba chen po'i don //
NK051(zhi)002:7426: phyag ni nyon mongs pa phyag /
NK051(zhi)002:7427: 'tshal ni brjod du med pa'i klong du 'tshal /
NK051(zhi)002:7428: 'dud ni dbyer med pa'i don la 'dud pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7429: sangs rgyas dgyes pa khyod la 'dud //
NK051(zhi)002:7433: dgyes pa ni bde ba chen po'i don /
NK051(zhi)002:7435: 'dud ni gnyis su med par 'dud pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7438: thabs dang shes rab kyi sbyor ba mdzad pa la /
NK051(zhi)002:7439: 'dzum zhing gnyis su med par 'dud do //
NK051(zhi)002:7442: sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer gyis don rab tu gsal zhing bzhad pa la /
NK051(zhi)002:7444: sangs rgyas gsung nyid khyod la 'dud //
NK051(zhi)002:7446: gsung tshangs pa'i dbyangs la yang dag pa'i thugs kyis 'dud do //
NK051(zhi)002:7449: sangs rgyas kyi thugs rnam par dag pa de la
NK051(zhi)002:7450: phyag 'tshal zhing don dam par dbyer med pas 'dud
NK051(zhi)002:7451: do // ma h+aa yo ga'i theg pa bstan pa la 'dud pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7452: med pa las byung khyod la 'dud //
NK051(zhi)002:7454: tshig rkang bzhis 'khrul pa rtsad nas bcad cing ma bu ngo sprad bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:7455: med pa zhes snying po skye ba med pa'i klong na /
NK051(zhi)002:7456: las byung zhes pa rtsal zer rig pa bu'i mdangs /
NK051(zhi)002:7457: khyod ces pa ma bu la /
NK051(zhi)002:7458: 'dud ces gnyis su dbyer med pa la 'dud do //
NK051(zhi)002:7461: sangs rgyas ni snying po ka dag /
NK051(zhi)002:7465: sangs rgyas byang chub khyod la 'dud //
NK051(zhi)002:7467: nyon mongs sangs la ye shes rgyas te /
NK051(zhi)002:7468: sdug bsngal byang nas bde ba chen po'i klong du chub la dbyer med par 'dud do //
NK051(zhi)002:7469: nam mkha' las byung khyod la bdud //
NK051(zhi)002:7471: dper na nam mkha' las byung ba'i sprin dang khu
NK051(zhi)002:7472: rlangs thog glog char ser ba la sogs thams cad
NK051(zhi)002:7473: nam mkha' rang las byung zhing nam mkha' rang du
NK051(zhi)002:7474: sangs nas nam mkha'i klong du dbyer med par 'dud
NK051(zhi)002:7475: do // ye shes las byung khyod la 'dud //
NK051(zhi)002:7477: dpe gong bzhin du ye shes ni snying po'i klong nas rtsal du shar zhing 'byung ste /
NK051(zhi)002:7478: chos nyid ka dag snying po rgyu rkyen dang bral ba'i ngang du /
NK051(zhi)002:7479: rtsal yon tan gyi byin rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'byung zhing /
NK051(zhi)002:7480: de ngang 'das gsal dag tu shes pa'i ye shes te /
NK051(zhi)002:7481: snying po chos nyid du gnyis su med par 'dud pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7482: de ni a nu yo ga'i theg pa la bstod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7487: d+r+wa ba ma bu dbyer med /
NK051(zhi)002:7488: khyod don dam par ma bu dbyer med par 'dud pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7489: de ni sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i rgyud chen po nyid la 'dud pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7490: sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la 'dud //
NK051(zhi)002:7492: sangs pa ni sgrib pa thams cad sangs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7493: rgyas pa ni byar med blo 'das chen po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7494: rol ston ni ye shes kyi rol pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal zhing ma 'gag par snang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7495: de ni rdzogs pa chen po la 'dud pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7496: thams cad thams cad khyod la 'dud //
NK051(zhi)002:7498: thams cad ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan 'das pa'i chos thams cad do //
NK051(zhi)002:7499: thams cad 'og ma ni chos sde snod brgyad khri
NK051(zhi)002:7500: bzhi stong thams cad spyi ti yo gar 'ub bsdus
NK051(zhi)002:7501: chen por rdzogs shing snying po ka dag gi klong
NK051(zhi)002:7502: du bsam brjod las 'das pas 'dud do //
NK051(zhi)002:7503: ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud //
NK051(zhi)002:7505: ye shes ni ka dag chen po'i ye shes /
NK051(zhi)002:7506: sku ni skye med chos sku /
NK051(zhi)002:7508: 'dud ni rtsal zer yan lag rig pa'i snang tshul
NK051(zhi)002:7509: thams cad snying po'i klong du gnyis su med par
NK051(zhi)002:7510: 'dud de spyi ti yo ga'i theg pa la 'dud
NK051(zhi)002:7511: pa'o // mchog sbyin zhes pa nas /
NK051(zhi)002:7512: ye shes sku nyid ces pa de yan chad kyis
NK051(zhi)002:7513: bka' tshoms chen po bzhi la bsdus te gdams ngag
NK051(zhi)002:7515: dkyil 'khor chen po bdun la ye shes lngas bye
NK051(zhi)002:7516: brag tu bstod pa'i skabs kyii rnam par bshad pa'o
NK051(zhi)002:7517: // da ni sngags kyi don bshad de /
NK051(zhi)002:7519: dz+ny+aa na gar+b+ha +aah zhes pa yan chad kyi sngags
NK051(zhi)002:7520: kyi sgo nas chos thams cad snying po gcig tu
NK051(zhi)002:7525: b+h+aa wa ni ngo bo nyid /
NK051(zhi)002:7526: swa b+h+aa wa ni rang bzhin /
NK051(zhi)002:7527: bi shud+d+ha rnam par dag pa /
NK051(zhi)002:7529: tsak+shu ni ye shes kyi mig /
NK051(zhi)002:7530: a +aa ni skye med ka dag /
NK051(zhi)002:7531: am ahni snying po skye med ka dag brjod med blo 'das chen por thim pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7532: pra kri ti ni rang bzhin ka dag /
NK051(zhi)002:7533: pa ri shud+d+h+aahni rol pa rnam dag /
NK051(zhi)002:7536: ya du ta ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas so //
NK051(zhi)002:7537: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad /
NK051(zhi)002:7538: dz+ny+aa na k+aa ya ni ye shes ka nas dag pa'i sku'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7539: many+dzu sh+r+ai ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal lo //
NK051(zhi)002:7540: pa ri shud+d+he t+aa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7541: mu p+aa d+aa ya ni bdag gis don yongs su bzung bar bya'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7542: ti am ahni don zab pa /
NK051(zhi)002:7543: don rgya che ba sna tshogs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7544: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad /
NK051(zhi)002:7545: hri da ya ni snying po bcud du 'dus pa /
NK051(zhi)002:7546: ha ra ha ra ni mi bskyod pa /
NK051(zhi)002:7548: b+ha ga w+aa na ni bcom ldan 'das /
NK051(zhi)002:7551: w+aa g+ai shwa ra ni ngag gi dbang phyug /
NK051(zhi)002:7552: ma h+aa wa tsa ni spyi ti yo ga ste gar yang mi g.yo ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7553: sarba d+har+m+aa ni chos thams cad do //
NK051(zhi)002:7554: ga ga ni yongs su sdud pa /
NK051(zhi)002:7555: n+aa ma la su ni shin tu rnam par dag pa /
NK051(zhi)002:7556: pa ri shud+d+ha ni rnam par dag pa'i ye shes /
NK051(zhi)002:7557: d+har+m+aa d+h+aartu ni chos kyi dbyings /
NK051(zhi)002:7558: dz+ny+aa na ni skye ba med pa'i ye shes /
NK051(zhi)002:7559: gar+b+ha +aahzhesa pa ni chos thams cad kyi snying po'am
NK051(zhi)002:7560: don dam pa thig le nyag gcig tu 'dus so
NK051(zhi)002:7561: // +aa zhes pa thig le de nyid kyang skye
NK051(zhi)002:7562: med ka dag byar med blo 'das dngos med zang
NK051(zhi)002:7563: ka skye ba med pa'i dbyings su thim pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7564: de ni chos rnams kun gyi yang snying bcud 'dus yin zhes gsungs so //
NK051(zhi)002:7565: de yan chad kyis chos thams cad kyi snying po sngags kyi sgo nas gcig tu 'dus te /
NK051(zhi)002:7566: gcig pu skye ba med pa'i blo ngo bo nyid las 'das par la bzla ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7567: de yan chad kyis rgyud kyi don dang /
NK051(zhi)002:7570: dgongs pa'i don dang bzhis gtan la phab ste rgyas par bshad do //
NK051(zhi)002:7574: de yan chad kyis rgyud kyi don yongs su rdzogs par bshad zin to //
NK051(zhi)002:7575: da ni mjug gi don bstan te /
NK051(zhi)002:7576: de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
NK051(zhi)002:7578: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad //
NK051(zhi)002:7579: ces pa'i bar shwa lo ka lngas /
NK051(zhi)002:7580: 'khor phyag na rdo rjes ston pa la dris lan
NK051(zhi)002:7581: gyis nye bar bsdus pa'i sgo nas bstod pa bstan
NK051(zhi)002:7582: pa la / de nas zhes pa ni rgyud kyi don bshad pa'i mtshams sbyar ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7583: dpal zhes pa rtogs pa bdag gi dpal dang /
NK051(zhi)002:7584: thugs rje gzhan gyi dpal lo //
NK051(zhi)002:7585: ldan ni rang rig pa'i ye shes dang ldan no //
NK051(zhi)002:7586: rdo rje 'chang ni 'gyur ba med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7587: dga' zhing mgu nas thal mo sbyar //
NK051(zhi)002:7589: lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgo nas sems dga' ba dang /
NK051(zhi)002:7591: yid rab tu dwangs shing spro ba'i sgo nas thal
NK051(zhi)002:7592: mo sbyar pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
NK051(zhi)002:7593: btsugs nas ston pa'i spyan sngar 'dug go //
NK051(zhi)002:7594: mgon po bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs //
NK051(zhi)002:7596: mgon po ni bcom ldan 'das te sems can rnams kyi mgon dang skyabs mdzad pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7597: rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas //
NK051(zhi)002:7599: mkhyen pa dang thugs rje ma lus par rdzogs pa'i bcom ldan 'das la /
NK051(zhi)002:7600: 'khor phyag na rdo rjes lus ngag yid gsum gus pas phyag 'tshal nas /
NK051(zhi)002:7601: der ni mgon po gsang ba'i bdag /
NK051(zhi)002:7603: der ni zhes pa spyi ti yo ga'i theg pa
NK051(zhi)002:7604: der ni lta sgom dang grub mtha' log pa'i mgon
NK051(zhi)002:7605: no // gsang ba'i bdag ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ste gsang bdag chen po'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7606: ston pa ni gsang sngags la dbang thob cing mnga' brnyes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7607: lag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal //
NK051(zhi)002:7609: 'khor lag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po des /
NK051(zhi)002:7610: sna tshogs gzhan dang lhan cig tu //
NK051(zhi)002:7612: 'khor byin po sna tshogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang phyag na rdo rje lhan cig tu /
NK051(zhi)002:7613: gsang bstod nas ni tshig 'di gsol //
NK051(zhi)002:7615: gsang bstod ni gsung skad mthon po'i sgo nas /
NK051(zhi)002:7617: nang spros pa gcod pa lnga /
NK051(zhi)002:7618: gsang ba lta sgom spyod 'bras dang bcas pa lnga'i
NK051(zhi)002:7619: spros pa gcod pa'i gsang ba zab mo'i chos bla
NK051(zhi)002:7620: na med pa gong na med pa gzhan gyis 'gran
NK051(zhi)002:7621: zla med pa'i mchog zab mo ngo mtshar can la
NK051(zhi)002:7622: bstod pa tshig 'di skad ces gsol to zhes pa'o
NK051(zhi)002:7623: // mgon po bdag cag yi rang ngo //
NK051(zhi)002:7625: mgon po ni ston pa la bos pa /
NK051(zhi)002:7626: bdag cag ni phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams /
NK051(zhi)002:7627: theg pa'i rgyal po spyi ti yo ga theg dgu'i
NK051(zhi)002:7628: spyi phud 'khor rnams la bstan pa la ngo mtshar
NK051(zhi)002:7629: skyes shing ches yi rang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7630: legs so legs so legs par gsungs //
NK051(zhi)002:7632: legs so dang po ni dad pa'i sgo nas thos
NK051(zhi)002:7633: pa'i shes rab kyi sgro 'dogs gcod pa de legs
NK051(zhi)002:7634: so // legs so bar pas bsam pa'i shes rab kyis yid ches so //
NK051(zhi)002:7635: legs so tha mas bsgom pa'i shes rab kyis yongs su mthar phyin no //
NK051(zhi)002:7636: gsungs zhes pa don 'di 'dra ba ston pas gsungs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7637: yang na legs so zhes pa don zab pa gnas
NK051(zhi)002:7638: pa bzhi'i bka' tshoms su bstan te de shin tu
NK051(zhi)002:7639: yang legs so // legs so bar pa don rgya
NK051(zhi)002:7640: che ba 'khrul pa 'phrang gi bka' tshoms su bstan
NK051(zhi)002:7641: pa de shin tu yang legs so //
NK051(zhi)002:7643: don mtshungs pa med pa bye brag shan gyi bka'
NK051(zhi)002:7644: tshoms su bstan pa de shin tu yang legs so
NK051(zhi)002:7645: // de gang gis gsungs she na /
NK051(zhi)002:7646: gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs so //
NK051(zhi)002:7649: don zab par bshad pa kun gzhi'i rnam pa las grol /
NK051(zhi)002:7650: don rgya che ba rig pa'i rnam pa las grol /
NK051(zhi)002:7651: don mtshungs pa med pa snang ba'i rnam pa las grol bas na /
NK051(zhi)002:7652: 'bras bu btsal mi dgos par rang chas su rang la gnas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7653: 'gro ba mgon med rnams dang ni //
NK051(zhi)002:7656: mgon med pa ni sems can snying rje'i yul nyon
NK051(zhi)002:7657: mongs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gis gdungs pa rnams
NK051(zhi)002:7658: dang ni / bdag cag yang dag rdzogs pa yi //
NK051(zhi)002:7660: bdag cag thams cad kyang skye med ka dag gis
NK051(zhi)002:7661: bla na med pa'i byang chub mngon du mdzad pa'i
NK051(zhi)002:7662: phyir ro // byang chub thob pa'i don chen mdzad //
NK051(zhi)002:7664: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis khams gsum 'gro drug gi
NK051(zhi)002:7665: sems can bla na med pa'i byang chub thob pa'i
NK051(zhi)002:7666: don mdzad pa'o // sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i tshul bstan pa //
NK051(zhi)002:7668: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i rgyud le'u khri drug stong gi
NK051(zhi)002:7669: nang nas ting nge 'dzin d+r+wa ba'i le'u yang gsang
NK051(zhi)002:7670: bcud dril yang snying gi tshul bstan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7671: 'di ni rnam dag legs pa'i lam //
NK051(zhi)002:7673: 'di ni gong gi gdams ngag gi //
NK051(zhi)002:7675: dag pa ni nang gi sems kyi dri ma dag /
NK051(zhi)002:7677: kun gzhi skye ba med par dag /
NK051(zhi)002:7679: snang ba gzung 'dzin dgag sgrub med par dag /
NK051(zhi)002:7680: 'khrul pa rnam pa gsum po dag na legs pa'i lam zhes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7682: zab cing yangs la rgya che ste //
NK051(zhi)002:7684: don zab pa ni gting dpag dka' ba /
NK051(zhi)002:7685: yangs pa ni rgya che ba ste bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7686: don chen 'gro ba'i don byed pa //
NK051(zhi)002:7688: don chen po ni rdzogs chen gyi yang snying spyi ti yo ga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7689: 'gro ba ni rigs drug gi sems can rnams la
NK051(zhi)002:7690: snying rje chen po dang ldan pas thugs rjes bzung
NK051(zhi)002:7691: zhing sems can gyi don chen po byed do //
NK051(zhi)002:7692: sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul 'di ni //
NK051(zhi)002:7694: sangs rgyas kyi yul ni blos btags 'khrul pa'i snang pa sangs te /
NK051(zhi)002:7695: sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams rnam par dag pa'i yul lo //
NK051(zhi)002:7696: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad //
NK051(zhi)002:7698: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'khor lag na rdo rje la sogs pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:7699: sems can thams cad la zab cing yangs la rgya che ba'i theg pa bshad pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7700: yang na spyi ti yo gar bshad na /
NK051(zhi)002:7701: rdzogs pa ni snang srid 'khor 'das yod med rtag
NK051(zhi)002:7702: chad theg pa rim dgu chos sde brgyad khri bzhi
NK051(zhi)002:7703: stong spyi ti yo ga'i khongs su rdzogs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7704: theg pa'i grub lugs log pas sangs /
NK051(zhi)002:7706: rnams ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kun gyis 'gro ba'i don du bshad pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7707: don tha ma mjug yongs su bsdu ba la /
NK051(zhi)002:7708: 'phags pa 'jam dpal sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba le'u khri drug stong /
NK051(zhi)002:7710: 'phags pa ni theg pa dgu las 'phags pa /
NK051(zhi)002:7711: 'jam pa ni grub mtha'i zhe 'dod med pas 'jam la /
NK051(zhi)002:7712: dpal ni ye dag klong na gsal bas dpal lo //
NK051(zhi)002:7715: d+r+wa ba ni snying po dang yan lag gnyis su med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7716: le'u ni khri drug stong gi nang nas glu'i le'u'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7717: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi nang nas /
NK051(zhi)002:7719: rnal ni chos nyid rnal ma /
NK051(zhi)002:7721: rgyud ni 'gyur ba med cing rgyun chad pa med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7724: rgyud chen po le'u khri phrag drug khri drug stong gi nang nas /
NK051(zhi)002:7725: ting nge 'dzin d+r+wa ba'i le'u phyungs te bod skad du bsgyur ro //
NK051(zhi)002:7726: ting ni chos nyid gting mtha' med par grol /
NK051(zhi)002:7727: nge ni nges pa dam pa skye med blo 'das /
NK051(zhi)002:7729: d+r+wa ba rgyud legs par 'brel ba'i lam //
NK051(zhi)002:7730: le'u skabs dang mtshams su phye ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7731: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa /
NK051(zhi)002:7733: de dag gi don rgyas par gong du bshad do //
NK051(zhi)002:7734: ye shes sems dpa'i zhes pa /
NK051(zhi)002:7736: shes ni ka dag chen por shes /
NK051(zhi)002:7737: sems ni bsam med don la sems /
NK051(zhi)002:7738: dpa' ni snying po don la dpa' //
NK051(zhi)002:7739: mtshan ni bsam brjod dmigs pa'i yul las 'das /
NK051(zhi)002:7740: yang dag skye med brjod las 'das /
NK051(zhi)002:7741: nges par gsang bdag chen pos gsungs pa yin /
NK051(zhi)002:7742: bcom ldan 'das sh+aakya thub pas gsungs pa /
NK051(zhi)002:7744: de'i don gong du bshad zin to //
NK051(zhi)002:7746: snang srid dngos po'i chos rnams bcom /
NK051(zhi)002:7747: snying po ka dag klong du ldan /
NK051(zhi)002:7749: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes pa la lnga ru bshad de /
NK051(zhi)002:7750: snying po'i klong du gshegs pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:7751: 'od gsal mkha' la gshegs pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:7752: rtogs pa'i don la gshegs pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:7753: rang grol chen por gshegs pa dang /
NK051(zhi)002:7754: theg pa dgu'i lta sgom dgu la gshegs pa dang lnga'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7755: dgra bcom pa ni gzung 'dzin gyi dgra thams cad bcom /
NK051(zhi)002:7756: yang dag par rdzogs pa ni yang dag par rig /
NK051(zhi)002:7758: lhag ma med par rdzogs pa'i don no //
NK051(zhi)002:7759: sh+aaka ni shes rab lde mig gis /
NK051(zhi)002:7760: gzung 'dzin gnyis kyi sgo lcags phye /
NK051(zhi)002:7761: kya ni 'od gsal nyi zla'i snying po shar //
NK051(zhi)002:7762: ma rig sgrib g.yog bag chags sangs /
NK051(zhi)002:7764: thub ni dgu rtse spyi ti 'dis /
NK051(zhi)002:7765: theg pa dgu'i lta log grub mtha' ngan pa thub /
NK051(zhi)002:7766: zhal nas ni mngon sum du gsungs pa ston pas nges par gsungs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7767: rdzogs so zhes pa lhag ma ma lus par rgyas par bshad pa'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7772: &&&& 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par
NK051(zhi)002:7773: brjod pa'i rgya cher 'grel ba rin po che nyi
NK051(zhi)002:7774: zla 'bar ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba /
NK051(zhi)002:7775: rgya gar o rgyan mtsho dkyil pad+ma'i sdong po las
NK051(zhi)002:7776: sku 'khrungs pa'i pad+ma 'byung gnas sprul pa'i skus mdzad
NK051(zhi)002:7777: pa rdzogs so // rgya gar gu ru pad+mas gsungs pa bshad //
NK051(zhi)002:7778: rgya che rab zab theg mchog yangs pa'i lam //
NK051(zhi)002:7779: rgyud do cog gi mnga' bdag 'jam dpal sgyu 'phrul rgyud //
NK051(zhi)002:7780: theg pa kun gyi rtsa ba gsal ba'i nyi zla 'di //
NK051(zhi)002:7781: shin tu dgrol dka' rgyud don zab mo 'di //
NK051(zhi)002:7782: pad+ma bdag gis bkra la zhing legs par bshad //
NK051(zhi)002:7783: theg pa kun dang mi 'gal chos rnams kun gyi rje //
NK051(zhi)002:7784: theg pa kun gyi rtsa ba spyi ti yo ga 'dis //
NK051(zhi)002:7785: chos rnams kun gyi gshed ma lta sgom kun kyang phyags mas btab //
NK051(zhi)002:7786: chos sde brgyad khri bzhi stong 'dul khrims phus btab bo //
NK051(zhi)002:7787: sgrub chos rtsol sgrub mkhan gyi gnya' gcog chen por bshad //
NK051(zhi)002:7788: byar med bsgyur med 'bras bu blo 'das bshad //
NK051(zhi)002:7789: skye med ka dag snying po'i dgongs pa bkral //
NK051(zhi)002:7790: de la nyes skyon ci mchis pa //
NK051(zhi)002:7791: bla ma dam pa dkon mchog dus gsum bde gshegs la //
NK051(zhi)002:7792: nyes pa ci mchis thams cad bzod par gsol //
NK051(zhi)002:7793: mkha' 'gro chos skyong bka' srung ma lus la //
NK051(zhi)002:7794: tshig rnams bshad nor tshig gi lhag chad rnams //
NK051(zhi)002:7795: bzod par gsol na dag tshangs dngos grub stsol //
NK051(zhi)002:7796: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod
NK051(zhi)002:7797: pa'i 'grel ba rin po che nyi zla 'bar ba'i
NK051(zhi)002:7799: o rgyan gyi slob dpon pad+mas bshad cing /
NK051(zhi)002:7800: lo ts+aa ba ska ba dpal brtsegs kyis bod skad du bsgyur ba'o //
NK051(zhi)002:7807: // sh+r+ai rat+na badz+ra gu ru pad+ma la bstod pa /
NK051(zhi)002:7808: rgya gar o rgyan yul gyi mtsho dkyil nas //
NK051(zhi)002:7809: pad+ma'i sdong po me tog las //
NK051(zhi)002:7810: pha med ma med sprul pa'i sku //
NK051(zhi)002:7812: byin rlabs nus pa gong na 'da' ba med //
NK051(zhi)002:7813: sku yi byin rlabs nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam //
NK051(zhi)002:7814: tshe la dbang ba'i rig 'dzin thob //
NK051(zhi)002:7815: rig 'dzin brgyad thob rdo rje lta bu'i sku //
NK051(zhi)002:7816: gsung gi 'od zer tshangs pa'i 'brug sgra sgrogs //
NK051(zhi)002:7817: stong gsum 'jig rten khams su skye med chos rnams ston //
NK051(zhi)002:7818: thugs kyis 'od zer nyi zla rgya mtsho'i thugs //
NK051(zhi)002:7819: g.yo 'gul rtsis gdab mi mnga' ka dag rnam par gnas //
NK051(zhi)002:7820: sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan bsam mi khyab //
NK051(zhi)002:7821: nyi zla'i 'od bzhin nor bu dgos 'byung bzhin //
NK051(zhi)002:7822: thugs rje'i byin rlabs bdag la 'jug par mdzad du gsol //
NK051(zhi)002:7823: ces gu ru'i sku gsung thugs la bstod pa 'di
NK051(zhi)002:7824: nyid sus mdzad kyi gsal kha mi snang yang 'grel
NK051(zhi)002:7825: pa dpe rnying rang gi gsham na mu mthud du
NK051(zhi)002:7826: 'dug pas lo ts+aa ba dpal brtsegs rang gi gsung
NK051(zhi)002:7828: de ltar kho bo'i bsod nams kyi bgo skal du
NK051(zhi)002:7829: thob pa'i gu ru'i gsung mtshan brjod 'grel pa'i dpe
NK051(zhi)002:7830: rnying 'di gnyis sngon dus chos rgyal khri srong gi
NK051(zhi)002:7831: bla dpe bka' brgyad bde 'dus kyi gzhung pod dgu
NK051(zhi)002:7832: po las mang che ba ldan ma rtse mang dang
NK051(zhi)002:7833: / rgyud 'grel man ngag skor 'ga' zhig mkha' 'gro mtsho rgyal dang /
NK051(zhi)002:7834: bee ro tsa na'i phyag bris yin ces pa'i phyag
NK051(zhi)002:7835: dpe 'khrul med de lho brag smra bo lcog gi
NK051(zhi)002:7836: bla brang du bzhugs pa nyid dngos su mjal myong
NK051(zhi)002:7837: bas 'di dag yig rus gcig pa lta bur snang
NK051(zhi)002:7838: / 'on kyang 'bru sdeb dag sbyor skor la deng
NK051(zhi)002:7839: dus dang cung mi mtshungs pa mang po 'dug pa
NK051(zhi)002:7840: skabs der bod du yig rgyun dar nas rgyal rabs
NK051(zhi)002:7842: phyis khri ral gyi dus nas brtsams yig gzugs brda
NK051(zhi)002:7843: dag skor la do snang che ru song nges yin
NK051(zhi)002:7845: gang ltar mtshan brjod 'grel pa 'di nyid a ti'i
NK051(zhi)002:7846: spyi ti ltar du bkral ba'i gnad kyis gsang rgya
NK051(zhi)002:7847: che stabs thun mong du ma grags pa'i chig brgyud
NK051(zhi)002:7848: bka' rgya ma'i khongs su bzhugs pa las /
NK051(zhi)002:7849: da ni dus skabs 'di lta bur dpe rgyun tsam
NK051(zhi)002:7850: 'phel na'ang mthong thos don ldan du 'gyur ba'i re
NK051(zhi)002:7851: smon gyis / da lta snga 'gyur bka' ma'i chos
NK051(zhi)002:7852: sde bsdu ba bgyi ba'i skabs 'dir de'i rgyab chos
NK051(zhi)002:7853: kyi snying bcud du bzhugs su gsol sems kyis rigs
NK051(zhi)002:7854: bdag gu ru nyid la gsol 'debs rtse gcig pas
NK051(zhi)002:7856: lung zin mkhas grub rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug kun
NK051(zhi)002:7857: spangs pa sangs rgyas rdo rje la ma phyi'i slad
NK051(zhi)002:7858: du dpe rnying gnyis go bsdur dang 'brel bu dper
NK051(zhi)002:7859: phab ste zhus dag mdzad par bskul ba bzhin khong
NK051(zhi)002:7860: nyid nas nan tan chen pos gzigs zhib kyis gtsang
NK051(zhi)002:7862: slar yang kho bo 'jigs bral ye shes rdo rjes
NK051(zhi)002:7863: spar gzhi'i yi ge dngos la zhib bltas kyis gtan
NK051(zhi)002:7864: la phab pa mchog gsang bstan pa'i nyin byed 'grib
NK051(zhi)002:7865: med rtag tu 'char ba'i cha rkyen du gyur cig
